en: India and Japan prime ministers meet in Tokyo
de: Die Premierminister Indiens und Japans trafen sich in Tokio.
translated_de: Premier Ministers Indien and Japan have trafiqué in Tokio.

en: India's new prime minister, Narendra Modi, is meeting his Japanese counterpart, Shinzo Abe, in Tokyo to discuss economic and security ties, on his first major foreign visit since winning May's election.
de: Indiens neuer Premierminister Narendra Modi trifft bei seinem ersten wichtigen Auslandsbesuch seit seinem Wahlsieg im Mai seinen japanischen Amtskollegen Shinzo Abe in Toko, um wirtschaftliche und sicherheitspolitische Beziehungen zu besprechen.
translated_de: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is on his first international visit since his election in Mai to speak with his japanese counterpart, Shinzo Abe, to discuss economic and security policy relations.

en: Mr Modi is on a five-day trip to Japan to strengthen economic ties with the third largest economy in the world.
de: Herr Modi befindet sich auf einer fünftägigen Reise nach Japan, um die wirtschaftlichen Beziehungen mit der drittgrößten Wirtschaftsnation der Welt zu festigen.
translated_de: Mr Modi is on a five-day trip to Japan to establish economic relations with the third largest economic nation of the world.

en: High on the agenda are plans for greater nuclear co-operation.
de: Pläne für eine stärkere kerntechnische Zusammenarbeit stehen ganz oben auf der Tagesordnung.
translated_de: Plans for a more kerntechnische cooperation are on the agenda.

en: India is also reportedly hoping for a deal on defence collaboration between the two nations.
de: Berichten zufolge hofft Indien darüber hinaus auf einen Vertrag zur Verteidigungszusammenarbeit zwischen den beiden Nationen.
translated_de: Reports therefore hope to further discuss a contract on the securing of defence between the two nations.

en: Karratha police arrest 20-year-old after high speed motorcycle chase
de: Polizei von Karratha verhaftet 20-Jährigen nach schneller Motorradjagd
translated_de: Police of Karratha have a 20-year-old man in a faster motorrading situation

en: A motorcycle has been seized after it was ridden at 125km/h in a 70km/h zone and through bushland to escape police in the Pilbara.
de: Ein Motorrad wurde beschlagnahmt, nachdem der Fahrer es mit 125 km/h in einer 70 km/h-Zone und durch Buschland gefahren hatte, um der Polizei in Bilbara zu entkommen.
translated_de: A motorrad was thrown out of the ground, a speed of 125 km/h in a speed of 70 km/h and a speed of a Buschland, to be entailed by the police in Bilbara.

en: Traffic police on patrol in Karratha this morning tried to pull over a blue motorcycle when they spotted it reaching 125km/h as it pulled out of a service station on Bathgate Road.
de: Verkehrspolizisten in Karratha versuchten heute morgen, ein blaues Motorrad zu stoppen, nachdem sie es dabei beobachtet hatten, wie es mit 125 km/h eine Tankstelle auf der Bathdate Road verließ.
translated_de: Transporters in Karratha have tried to stop a blue motorrad, which they have seen as a tank station on the Bathdate Road, which is 125 km/h.

en: Police say the rider then failed to stop and continued on to Burgess Road before turning into bushland, causing the officers to lose sight of it.
de: Die Polizei berichtet, dass der Fahrer die Haltesignale dann ignorierte und weiter auf der Burgess Road fuhr, bevor er in das Buschland abbog, wo die Beamten es aus den Augen verloren.
translated_de: Police reported that the driver ignored the stop sign and continued on the Burgess Road before he was able to leave the road in the Buggy where the officers lost sight of them.

en: The motorcycle and a person matching the description of the rider was then spotted at a house on Walcott Way in Bulgarra.
de: Das Motorrad sowie eine Person, die der Beschreibung des Fahrers entsprach wurden später bei einem Haus im Walcott Way in Bulgarra gesehen.
translated_de: The motorrad and a person who was speaking of the driver' s description were later seen in a house on the Walcott Way in Bulgarra.

en: Karratha Police have charged a 20-year-old man with failing to stop and reckless driving.
de: Die Polizei von Karratha beschuldigt einen 20-jährigen Mann der Nichtbeachtung eines Haltesignals sowie rücksichtslosen Fahrens.
translated_de: The police of Karratha have accused a 20-year-old man of non-reachment of a halting signal and a re-straining.

en: He is due to appear in Karratha Magistrates Court on September 23.
de: Er soll am 23. September vor dem Amtsgericht in Karratha erscheinen.
translated_de: It will be presented to the Court on 23 September in Karratha.

en: The motorcycle was seized and impounded for three months.
de: Das Motorrad wurde sichergestellt und für drei Monate beschlagnahmt.
translated_de: The motorrad was secured and re-elected for three months.

en: George Webster accused of Nairn and Pitlochry hotel rapes
de: George Webster wegen Hotelvergewaltigungen in Naim und Pitlochry angeklagt
translated_de: George Webster has been criticized for hotel fraud in Naim and Pitlochry

en: A man is to stand trial accused of raping women at two hotels.
de: Ein Mann steht wegen der Vergewaltigung von Frauen in zwei Hotels vor Gericht.
translated_de: One man is facing trial for the alleged abuse of women in two hotels.

en: George Webster, 28, faced the charges during a hearing at the High Court in Glasgow.
de: George Webster, 28, wurde die Anklage bei einer Anhörung von dem Obersten Gericht in Glasgow verlesen.
translated_de: George Webster, 28, was convicted of a hearing by the Supreme Court in Glasgow.

en: He is alleged to have raped a woman at the Scotland's Hotel in Pitlochry in Perthshire on June 7, 2013.
de: Er wird beschuldigt, am 7. Juni 2013 eine Frau im Scotland's Hotel in Pitlochry in Perthshire vergewaltigt zu haben.
translated_de: It is a matter of fact that the 7 June 2013 fraud was committed at Scotland' s Pitlochry Hotel in Perthshire.

en: It is claimed Webster attacked her while she was "unconscious, asleep and incapable of giving consent."
de: Die Anklage lautet, dass Webster sie angriff, während sie "bewusstlos war, schlief, und kein Einverständnis signalisieren konnte."
translated_de: The argument is that Webster acted in a way that "was aware of the dangers of being a victim of a scepticism and not a sense of understanding."

en: Webster is then charged with raping a second woman at the Golf View Hotel in Nairn in the Highlands on May 4, 2014.
de: Webster wird darüber hinaus vorgeworfen, am 4. Mai 2014 eine zweite Frau im Golf View Hotel in Naim im schottischen Hochland vergewaltigt zu haben.
translated_de: Webster will be able to have a second Fraud at the Golf View Hotel in Naim in the schottischen Hochland on 4 Mai 2014.

en: Judge Lady Rae set a trial date for November 17 at the High Court in Edinburgh.
de: Richterin Lady Rae setzte den Verhandlungstermin für den 17. November am Obersten Gericht in Edinburgh an.
translated_de: Judge Rae set the meeting for the 17 November at the first court in Edinburgh.

en: Reconnecting With the Very American Ideal That Labor Rights Are Human Rights
de: Rückbesinnung auf das sehr amerikanische Ideal der Arbeitsrechte als Menschenrechte
translated_de: Reintroduction to the very American ideal of working rights as human rights

en: Congressmen Keith Ellison and John Lewis have proposed legislation to protect union organizing as a civil right.
de: Die Kongressabgeordneten Keith Ellison und John Lewis haben einen Gesetzesvorschlag eingebracht, um die Organisation von Gewerkschaften als Bürgerrecht zu etablieren.
translated_de: The Councillors Keith Ellison and John Lewis have drafted a set-up proposal to establish the organisation of working groups as citizens rights.

en: "As go unions, so go middle-class jobs," says Ellison, the Minnesota Democrat who serves as a Congressional Progressive Caucus co-chair.
de: "So wie Gewerkschaften sterben, sterben auch die Mittelklassejobs," sagte Ellison, ein Demokrat aus Minnesota und stellvertretender Vorsitzender des Progressive Caucus im Kongress.
translated_de: "So as cooperatives, they also contribute to the middle class jobs," said Ellison, a Minnesota Democrat and a representative of the Progressive Caucus.

en: That's why I'm proud to introduce the Employee Empowerment Act with civil rights icon John Lewis.
de: Daher stelle ich stolz gemeinsam mit der Bürgerrechtsikone John Lewis das Mitarbeiterermächtigungsgesetz vor.
translated_de: I am proud to present the employee-appropriation legislation with the Citizenship Council, John Lewis.

en: This ground-breaking legislation will give workers the same legal options for union organizing discrimination as for other forms of discrimination - stopping anti-union forces in their tracks
de: Dieses bahnbrechende Gesetz gibt Arbeitern die gleichen rechtlichen Möglichkeiten bei Diskriminierung wegen der Organisation von Gewerkschaften wie bei anderen Formen der Diskriminierung - und stoppt so antigewerkschaftlich eingestellte Kräfte.
translated_de: This stumbling block of legislation gives workers the same legal opportunities for discrimination due to organisation of work unions as in other forms of discrimination - and stops so enforcing work unions.

en: Amending the National Labor Relations Act to allow workers who face discrimination for engaging in union organizing to sue for justice in the civil courts - and to collect compensatory and punitive damages - is a sound and necessary initiative.
de: Die Ergänzung des nationalen Arbeitsrechtsgesetzes, um eine Möglichkeit für einer Diskriminierung ausgesetzte Arbeitern zur Organisation einer Gewerkschaftsvertretung zu schaffen, um vor einem Zivilgericht um Gerechtigkeit zu klagen - und um Schadensersatz oder Strafgelder zu erhalten - ist eine sinnvolle und notwendige Initiative.
translated_de: The addition of the national employment law, to enable discrimination from employed workers to organise a cooperative protection, to protect civil courts against law enforcement and to receive damages or penalties, is a reasonable and necessary initiative.

en: But it in certainly not a radical initiative - at least by American standards.
de: Aber es ist mit Sicherheit keine radikale Initiative - jedenfalls nicht nach amerikanischen Standards.
translated_de: But, in security, there is no radical initiative - but not in accordance with the US standards.

en: Indeed, the best way to understand what Ellison, Lewis and the cosponsors of their legislation are proposing is as a reconnection with a very American idea.
de: Tatsächlich ist die beste Art und Weise zum Verständnis dessen, was Ellison, Lewis und die weiteren Sponsoren ihrer Gesetzesvorlage vorschlagen, die Verbindung zurück zu einer sehr amerikanischen Idee.
translated_de: In fact, the best way to understand what Ellison, Lewis and the other sponsors propose, is to bring the connection back to a very American idea.

en: Despite the battering that unions have taken in recent years - in Wisconsin, Michigan and states across the country - Americans once encouraged countries around the world to embrace, extend and respect labor rights.
de: Trotz der Rückschläge, denen die Gewerkschaften in den vergangenen Jahren ausgesetzt waren - in Wisconsin, Michigan und anderen Staaten im ganzen Land - haben Amerikaner einst Länder in aller Welt dazu ermutigt, Arbeitsrechte anzuerkennen, auszuweiten und einzuhalten.
translated_de: In spite of the repercussions that have been affecting the work of the past few years - in Wisconsin, Michigan and other states in the whole of the world - Amerikaner has remutified, re-examined and re-examined some of the countries in the world, including the United States, to maintain employment rights.

en: There was a time, within the living memory of millions of Americans, when this country championed democracy, freedom of speech, freedom of the press and the right to organize in the same breath.
de: Es gab eine Zeit, an die sich Millionen von Amerikanern noch erinnern, als dieses Land Demokratie, Redefreiheit, Pressefreiheit und das Vereinigungsrecht in einem Atemzug nannte.
translated_de: It was a time when millions of Americans were reminded of this country' s democracy, freedom of speech, freedom of speech and freedom of expression and freedom of expression in a vote.

en: When the United States occupied Japan after World War II, General Douglas MacArthur and his aides encouraged the country to adopt a constitution designed to assure that Hideki Tojo's militarized autocracy would be replaced with democracy.
de: Als die Vereinigten Staaten nach dem Zweiten Weltkrieg Japan besetzte, ermutigten General Douglas Mac Arthur und sein Stab das Land dazu, eine Verfassung zu verabschieden, die sicherstellen solle, dass die militarisierte Autokratie Hedki Tojos durch Demokratie ersetzt würde.
translated_de: As the United States resisted Japan after the Second World War, the re-election of General Douglas Mac Arthur and his stab in the country, it was a decision to adopt a resolution which would ensure that the militarised autocrat Hedki Tojos would be replaced by democracy.

en: Fully aware that workers and their unions had a role to play in shaping the new Japan, they included language that explicitly recognized that "the right of workers to organize and to bargain and act collectively is guaranteed."
de: In vollem Bewusstsein dessen, dass die Arbeiter und ihre Gewerkschaften bei der Schaffung eines neuen Japan eine Rolle einnahmen, verwendeten sie eine Sprache, die explizit anerkannte, dass "die Rechte der Arbeiter auf Vereinigung und gemeinsames Verhandeln und Handeln garantiert sind."
translated_de: It is clear that the workers and their work in the creation of a new Japan play a role, and they use a language which is recognised as a "right of the workers to union and mutual trade and action" .

en: When the United States occupied Germany after World War II, General Dwight David Eisenhower and his aides urged the Germans to write a constitution that would assure that Adolf Hitler's fascism was replaced with muscular democracy.
de: Als die Vereinigten Staaten nach dem Zweiten Weltkrieg Deutschland besetzen, drängten General Dwight David Eisenhower und sein Stab die Deutschen, eine Verfassung zu schreiben, die dafür sorgen würde, dass der Faschismus Adolf Hitlers durch eine starke Demokratie ersetzt würde.
translated_de: As the United States put Germany on the brink of a war, General Dwight David Eisenhower and his colleagues would write a declaration that would make Hitler' s fascism a reality by a strong democratic regime.

en: Recognizing that workers would need to organize and make their voices heard in the new nation, the Germans included a provision that explicitly declared: "The right to form associations to safeguard and improve working and economic conditions shall be guaranteed to every individual and to every occupation or profession.
de: In Anerkennung der Tatsache, dass die Arbeiter sich würden organisieren müssen, und ihre Stimme in der neuen Nation erheben sollten, fügten die Deutschen eine Klausel ein, die explizit aussagte: "Das Recht, Vereinigungen zu gründen, um die Arbeits- und wirtschaftlichen Bedingungen zu sichern und zu verbessern wird jedem Einzelnen und jedem Beruf oder Gewerbe garantiert.
translated_de: In recognition of the fact that the workers would be organised and their vote should be reflected in the new nation, the Germans should add a clause which expels the German: "The right to fund, to facilitate associations, to ensure and improve employment and economic conditions will guarantee every individual and any profession or business.

en: Agreements that restrict or seek to impair this right shall be null and void; measures directed to this end shall be unlawful.
de: Vereinbarungen, die dieses Recht einschränken oder darauf abzielen, es zu schmälern sind null und nichtig; darauf abzielende Maßnahmen sind ungesetzlich.
translated_de: Conventions which restrict or restrict this right are not legal and are not legal.

en: When former First Lady Eleanor Roosevelt chaired the International Commission on Human Rights, which drafted the Universal Declaration of Human Rights that would in 1948 be adopted by the United Nations as a global covenant, Roosevelt and the drafters included a guarantee that "everyone has the right to form and to join trade unions for the protection of his interests."
de: Als die frühere First Lady Eleanor Roosevelt den Vorsitz über die Internationale Menschenrechtskommission innehatte, von der die Allgemeine Erklärung der Menschenrechte entworfen wurde, wie sie 1948 von den Vereinten Nationen als weltweites Abkommen übernommen wurde, fügten Roosevelt und die anderen Verfasser eine Garantie ein, dass "jeder das Recht hat, Gewerkschaften zum Schutze seiner Interessen zu bilden oder ihnen beizutreten."
translated_de: As the President of the International Human Rights Commission, the General Declaration on Human Rights, as it was adopted in 1948 by the United Nations as a global agreement, has a guarantee that "jeder has the right to create or to join forces to protect his interests" .

en: For generations, Americans accepted the basic premise that labor rights are human rights.
de: Seit Generationen akzeptieren Amerikaner die Grundprämisse, dass Arbeitsrechte Menschenrechte sind.
translated_de: Since generations, Amerikaners have accepted the principle that human rights are human rights.

en: When this country counseled other countries on how to forge civil and democratic societies, Americans explained that the right to organize a trade union - and to have that trade union engage in collective bargaining as an equal partner with corporations and government agencies - had to be protected.
de: Als dieses Land anderen Ländern dabei beriet, wie man zivile und demokratische Gesellschaften formen könne, erklärten Amerikaner, dass das Recht auf die Gründung einer Gewerkschaft - und darauf, dass diese Gewerkschaft dann an Kollektivverhandlungen als gleichwertiger Partner mit Unternehmen und Regierungsstellen teilnehmen dürfe - geschützt werden müsse.
translated_de: As the country is a country where civil and democratic societies can be used, the Amerikaner stated that the right to establish a cooperative - and that this cooperative is then a cooperative partnership with companies and government offices - must be protected.

en: Now, with those rights under assault in America, it is wise, indeed, to recommit to the American ideal that working people must have a right to organize and to make their voices heard in a free and open society.
de: Nachdem diese Rechte in Amerika unter Beschuss gerieten ist es tatsächlich sehr weise, sich das amerikanische Ideal wieder vor Augen zu führen, demzufolge die arbeitende Bevölkerung das Recht haben muss, sich zu vereinigen und sich in einer freien und offenen Gesellschaft Gehör zu verschaffen.
translated_de: After the Amerika Convention has been granted, it is very important to continue the American ideal in the face of the need to ensure that the working population has the right to be able to be able to be able to be able to be able to be able to be able to be able to be able to be able to be able to be able to be able to be able to be able to be able to be able to be able to be able to be

en: As the Reverend Martin Luther King Jr. said fifty years ago:
de: Wie Pastor Martin Luther King Jr. vor fünfzig Jahren sagte:
translated_de: As Pastor Martin Luther King Jr. said in five years:

en: History is a great teacher.
de: Die Geschichte ist ein großartiger Lehrmeister.
translated_de: The history is a great teacher.

en: Now everyone knows that the labor movement did not diminish the strength of the nation but enlarged it.
de: Jetzt wissen alle, dass die Arbeiterbewegung die Stärke der Nation nicht einschränkte, sondern sie vergrößerte.
translated_de: Now we know that the movement of workers is not restricted to the strength of the nation, but to the strength of the nation.

en: By raising the living standards of millions, labor miraculously created a market for industry and lifted the whole nation to undreamed of levels of production.
de: Durch die Anhebung des Lebensstandards von Millionen Menschen hat Arbeit auf wundersame Weise einen Markt für die Industrie geschaffen und die gesamte Nation auf unvorstellbare Produktionsniveaus angehoben.
translated_de: The rise in the standard of living of millions of people has created a market for the industry and a rise in the production level of the whole nation.

en: Those who attack labor forget these simple truths, but history remembers them.
de: Diejenigen, die die Arbeit angreifen, vergessen diese einfachen Wahrheiten, aber die Geschichte bewahrt sie.
translated_de: The people who are tackling the work forget these simple truths, but the history is a savage one.

en: History remembers, as should we.
de: Die Geschichte erinnert sich, und das sollten wir auch tun.
translated_de: The history of the past has been reminded and we should also do so.

en: The formal recognition of labor rights as human rights - and the extension of civil rights protections to prevent discrimination against labor organizing - is long overdue.
de: Die formelle Anerkennung der Arbeitsrechte als Menschenrechte - und die Erweiterung des Schutzes der Bürgerrechte als Schutz gegen Diskriminierung bei der Schaffung von Arbeitnehmervertretungen - ist längst überfällig.
translated_de: The form of recognition of employment rights as human rights - and the extension of protection of citizens rights as protection against discrimination in the creation of workers - has been too late.

en: Keith Ellison and John Lewis are renewing ideals that have historically enlarged America and made real the promise of democracy.
de: Keith Ellison und John Lewis erneuern die Ideale, die Amerika in der Vergangenheit groß gemacht haben und das Versprechen von Demokratie einlösten.
translated_de: Keith Ellison and John Lewis reaffirm the ideals that the Amerikas have made in the past and the voices of Democracies are re-emerged.

en: Judge temporarily blocks law that could close all Louisiana abortion clinics
de: Richter stoppt zeitweilig Gesetz, dass alle Abtreibungskliniken in Louisiana zur Schließung zwingen könnte
translated_de: The court has ruled that all re-abrogations in Louisiana could be withdrawn from the resolution.

en: A U.S. federal judge on Sunday temporarily blocked enforcement of a Louisiana law that advocates say would likely have closed all five abortion clinics in the state.
de: Ein US-Bundesrichter stoppte am Sonntag vorläufig die Umsetzung eines Gesetzes in Louisiana, von dem Anwälte sagen, dass es vermutlich zur Schließung aller fünf Abtreibungskliniken des Staates geführt hätte.
translated_de: The US-Bundesrich stoppts the implementation of a settlement in Louisiana on Sunday, as the economists say, that it would likely have been the case for the closure of all five re-abduction lines in the States.

en: The measure, signed into law by Louisiana Governor Bobby Jindal in June and due to take effect Sept. 1, would require doctors who perform abortions to have patient admitting privileges at a hospital within 30 miles of their practice.
de: Diese Maßnahme, die von Bobby Jindal, Gouverneur von Louisiana, im Juni zum Gesetz erhoben wurde und am 1. Sept. in Kraft treten soll, würde Ärzte, die Abtreibungen durchführen, dazu zwingen, ein Patientenaufnahmerecht bei einem Krankenhaus innerhalb eines Radius von 30 Meilen um ihre Praxis zu erwerben.
translated_de: This measure, which was taken by Bobby Jindal, Governor of Louisiana, in June, was taken to the law and which, on 1 Sept., was put in force, would allow doctors to obtain patient rights in a hospital within a Radius of 30 Meilen to practice.

en: However, the judge's ruling means that for the time being doctors can continue to perform legal abortions while seeking such privileges.
de: Die Entscheidung des Richters bedeutet jedoch, dass die Ärzte vorläufig weiterhin legal Abtreibungen durchführen können, während sie ein solches Recht beantragen.
translated_de: The decision of the Judge also means that doctors can continue to be allowed to withdraw their legal rights while they are granted such rights.

en: "Plaintiffs will be allowed to operate lawfully while continuing their efforts to obtain privileges," Federal Judge John deGravelles wrote in the decision.
de: "Die Kläger können gesetzeskonform weiterarbeiten, während sie sich um die Erlangung dieser Rechte bemühen," schrieb Bundesrichter John deGravelles in seinem Urteil.
translated_de: "The plaintiff can continue to work on legislation while he is trying to achieve this right," wrote Bundesrichter John deGravelles in his judgment.

en: A hearing will be scheduled within a month for the judge to make a more permanent ruling on the law.
de: Innerhalb eines Monats wird eine Anhörung für den Richter angesetzt, um für das Gesetz eine dauerhaftere Entscheidung herbeizuführen.
translated_de: Innerhalb a month, a hearing will be held for the Richter, to allow the law to be a permanent decision.

en: Abortion rights activists applauded the decision, the latest in a string of rulings against similar measures, saying it would give doctors more time to seek hospital privileges.
de: Abtreibungsbefürworter begrüßten die Entscheidung, die jüngste in einer Reihe von Urteilen gegen ähnliche Maßnahmen und sagten, dass Ärzte so mehr Zeit gewännen, um Krankenhauseinweisungsrechte zu erlangen.
translated_de: The spokesman for the stricken body welcomes the decision, which has been thrown out in a number of cases against similar measures, and says that doctors have so much time to seek hospital admission rights.

en: "Today's ruling ensures Louisiana women are safe from an underhanded law that seeks to strip them of their health and rights," said Nancy Northup, president and chief executive of the Center for Reproductive Rights, which sued to block the law on behalf of three of the state's five clinics.
de: "Die heutige Entscheidung bedeutet, dass die Frauen in Louisiana einem hinterhältigen Gesetz entgehen, das ihnen ihre Gesundheit und ihre Rechte nehmen will," sagte Nancy Northup, Präsidentin und Vorsitzende des Zentrums für Reproduktionsrechte, das im Namen von drei der fünf Kliniken des Staates geklagt hatte, um das Gesetz aufzuhalten.
translated_de: "The long-term decision means that women in Louisiana are a slander, which will take their health and their rights," said Nancy Northup, President-in-Office and President of the Centre for Reproduction Rights, which has been re-established by three of the five hospitals of the United States.

en: It was not immediately clear whether the ruling applied to doctors from the two clinics who were not plaintiffs in the suit and have also applied for admitting privileges.
de: Es war nicht unmittelbar klar, ob sich das Urteil auch auf die Ärzte aus den zwei Kliniken erstreckte, die sich der Klage nicht angeschlossen und ebenfalls Einweisungsrechte beantragt hatten.
translated_de: It is not immediately clear whether the judgment was made on the doctors from the two clinics which were not closed and which had also beaned a visa.

en: Louisiana is among 11 states that have passed similar laws, with courts recently ruling unconstitutional such measures in Alabama and Mississippi.
de: Louisiana ist einer von 11 Staaten, die ähnliche Gesetze erlassen haben, wobei Gerichte kürzlich solche Maßnahmen in Alabama und Mississippi für nicht verfassungsgemäß erklärt haben.
translated_de: Louisiana is one of 11 states which have been erected in similar circumstances, whereas courts have recently declared that such measures in Alabama and Mississippi are not deemed to be correct.

en: Key parts of a Texas law that would have shuttered most remaining clinics in that state were blocked by a federal judge on Friday.
de: Schlüsselstellen eines Gesetzes in Texas, das die meisten der im Staat verbliebenen Kliniken zur Schließung gezwungen hätte, wurden von einem Bundesrichter am Freitag gestoppt.
translated_de: The key to a settlement in Texas, which most of the hospitals in the state had been deprived of, was a federal richer on Friday.

en: Abortion rights campaigners, along with the American College of Obstetricians and Gynecologists and the American Medical Association, say admitting privileges laws impose medically unnecessary requirements on doctors.
de: Abtreibungsbefürworter und das American College of Ostretricians and Gynecologists sowie die American Medical Association sagen übereinstimmend, dass Einweisungsrechte von Ärzten unnötige Einschränkungen verlangen.
translated_de: The abolition advocate and the American College of Osteopaths and Gynecologists and the American Medical Association agree that the prohibition of a doctor' s right to appoint is a serious restriction.

en: Anti-abortion advocates have countered that the measures aim to protect women's health, though some have also lauded their effect of shuttering clinics.
de: Abtreibungsgegner halten dem entgegen, dass die Maßnahmen dem Schutz der Gesundheit der Frauen dienen, obwohl einige auch die Auswirkungen einer Schließung von Kliniken begrüßten.
translated_de: The abolitionists are against the fact that the measures to protect women' s health are useful, although some of the effects of a closure of hospitals are welcome.

en: Only one doctor who performs abortions in Louisiana has hospital admitting privileges, the Center for Reproductive Rights said.
de: Nur ein Arzt, der in Louisiana Abtreibungen durchführt, verfügt über Patienteineinweiserechte, teilte das Zentrum für Reproduktionsrechte mit.
translated_de: Only a doctor who has been involved in abortions in Louisiana has a right to patient consent, which is part of the centre of reproduction rights.

en: If all other doctors in the state are forced to stop performing abortions, that doctor, fearful for his safety, would stop carrying out the procedure, the group said.
de: Wenn alle übrigen Ärzte im Staat dazu gezwungen werden, keine Abtreibungen mehr durchzuführen, würde dieser Arzt aus Angst um seine Sicherheit die Operation nicht mehr durchführen, sagte die Gruppe.
translated_de: If all other doctors in the United States are to be able to do so, they would not be able to do so again, a group said.

en: In arguing against the ruling, Louisiana officials said they would not punish doctors performing abortions while their applications for admitting privileges were pending.
de: Bei ihrer Argumentation gegen das Urteil sagten Vertreter des Staates Louisiana, dass sie keine Ärzte wegen der Durchführung von Abtreibungen bestrafen würden, während deren Anträge auf Patienteneinweiserechte noch anhängig wären.
translated_de: In their argument against the judgment, representatives of the State of Louisiana said that they would not be able to treat doctors due to the execution of abortions, while the amendments to patient rights would be akin to this.

en: Delayed diagnosis and inability to access best treatment mean ovarian cancer kills more in rural areas
de: Verzögerte Diagnosen und mangelnder Zugang zu den besten Behandlungsmöglichkeiten führen zu höheren Todesraten durch Eierstockkrebs in ländlichen Gebieten.
translated_de: The lack of access to the best treatment options leads to higher levels of toxic waste by equestrian stocks in rural areas.

en: Angelina Jolie and her brother James have posted a video tribute to their late mother who died of Ovarian cancer in 2007.
de: Angelina Jolie und ihr Bruder James haben eine Videohommage für ihre Mutter online gestellt, die 2007 an Eierstockkrebs verstarb.
translated_de: Angelina Jolie and her brother James have posted a video tribute to their mother online, which has been re-branded as a Eierstockkreb in 2007.

en: Women living in rural Australia are at higher risk of dying from ovarian cancer than their city counterparts.
de: Für Frauen in den ländlichen Gebieten Australiens besteht ein höheres Risiko, an Eierstockkrebs zu sterben, als für Frauen in Städten.
translated_de: Women in the rural areas of Australia are more susceptible to extinction than women in cities.

en: Researchers analysed medical records of more than 1100 Australian women diagnosed with ovarian cancer in 2005, finding just 35 per cent lived for five years after diagnosis.
de: Forscher analysierten die medizinischen Daten von mehr als 1100 Australierinnen, bei denen 2005 Eierstockkrebs festgestellt wurde, und stellten fest, dass lediglich 25 Prozent fünf Jahre nach der Diagnose noch am Leben waren.
translated_de: Forscher analysed the medical data of more than 1100 Australians, in the Eierstockkrebs in 2005, and found that only 25% of the patients were alive five years after diagnosis.

en: Lead researcher Susan Jordan, of the QIMR Berghofer Medical Research Institute, said those living in regional and remote areas of the state were about 20 per cent more likely to die during the study than those in urban areas.
de: Die Forschungsleiterin Susan Jordan vom QIMR Berghofer Medical Research Institute sagte, dass für diejenigen, die in ländlichen und abgelegenen Regionen des Staates lebten, das Sterblichkeitsrisiko während der Studie um 20 Prozent höher lag als für diejenigen in Stadtgebieten.
translated_de: The research director, Susan Jordan, of the QIMR Medical Research Institute, said that for those who live in rural and rural regions of the States, the mortality rate in the study is 20 percent higher than in urban areas.

en: SMALL STUDY: New drugs may slow lung, ovarian cancer
de: KLEINE STUDIE: Neue Arzneimittel könnten Lungen- und Eierstockkrebs verlangsamen
translated_de: KLEINE STUDIE: New Arzneimittel could be used to smuggle and smuggle cattle

en: The researchers tracked the women's medical journeys across seven years.
de: Die Forscher untersuchten die medizinische Versorgung der Frauen über sieben Jahre.
translated_de: The Forscher has examined the medical care of women over seven years.

en: Dr Jordan said a woman's age at the time of diagnosis, ovarian cancer type, having existing illnesses and socio-economic status also impacted on survival chances.
de: Dr. Jordan sagte, dass das Alter einer Frau bei der Diagnose, der Typ des Eierstockkrebses, bestehende Vorerkrankungen sowie der soziale und wirtschaftliche Status ebenfalls die Überlebenschancen beeinflussten.
translated_de: Dr Jordan said that the Alter of a Frau in the diagnosis of the type of Eierstock, the prevalence of disease and the social and economic status also affects the survival of the disease.

en: Older women and those whose cancer was more advanced at the time of diagnosis had the poorest survival rates.
de: Für ältere Frauen und diejenigen, deren Krebs zum Diagnosezeitpunkt bereits weiter fortgeschritten war, lag die Überlebensrate am niedrigsten.
translated_de: For older women and those who have already been battling cancer for diagnosis, the rate of survival is still lower.

en: Those living in regional and remote areas of the state were about 20 per cent more likely to die during the study than those in urban areas.
de: Für diejenigen, die in ländlichen und abgelegenen Regionen des Staates lebten, lag das Sterblichkeitsrisiko während der Studie um 20 Prozent höher als für diejenigen in Stadtgebieten.
translated_de: For those who live in rural and rural regions of the States, the rate of stability during the study is 20 percent higher than for those living in urban areas.

en: Although the study was not designed to determine why women living outside the city were more likely to die from ovarian cancer, Dr Jordan suggested delayed diagnosis and inability to access best treatment might be factors.
de: Obwohl die Studie nicht untersuchte, warum außerhalb der Stadt lebende Frauen mit höherer Wahrscheinlichkeit an Eierstockkrebs starben, vermutet Dr. Jordan eine verspätete Diagnose und den mangelnden Zugang zu den besten Behandlungszentren als mögliche Faktoren dafür.
translated_de: Although the study does not examine why women living outside the city with higher probability of euphoria are staining, Dr Jordan believes that a versatious diagnosis and lack of access to the best treatment centres are possible factors.

en: "This disease is best treated by gynaecological oncology surgeons and they're mostly based in major cities," she said.
de: "Diese Krankheit wird am besten von gynäkologischen Onkologen behandelt, und diese sind meistens in größeren Städten zu finden," sagte sie.
translated_de: "The disease is treated best by gynäcological oncoogens and this is most common in larger cities," said the doctor.

en: Despite improving tele-medicine services to lessen the tyranny of distance, she suggested more fly-in, fly-out services to allow specialists to treat women closer to home and programs to support people in treatment away from their communities could help.
de: Trotz der Verbesserung der telemedizinischen Dienste, um den Entfernungen etwas entgegenzusetzen, schlug sie als mögliche Abhilfe eine Verstärkung des Service von eingeflogenen Ärzten vor, um Spezialisten die Möglichkeit zu geben, Frauen dichter an deren Wohnort zu versorgen, sowie Behandlungsprogramme für Menschen außerhalb ihrer Region.
translated_de: In spite of the improvement in the services of the telemedicine, to counter the distances, they are able to provide a service to the doctors who are in the fav, to give specialists the opportunity to send women to the homes and to provide treatment programmes for people outside their region.

en: Dr Jordan said regardless of geographical status, the study found long-term survival among women with ovarian cancer was poor, reinforcing the need for better treatment and prevention strategies.
de: Dr. Jordan sagte, dass die Studie unabhängig vom geographischen Status eine schlechte Langzeitüberlebensrate bei Frauen im Eierstockkrebs ergab und unterstrich den Bedarf an besserer Behandlung und Vorsorgestrategien.
translated_de: Dr Jordan said that the study, independent of the geographical status, is a poor long-term survival rate for women in Eierstockkrebs and that it is necessary to develop better treatment and prevention strategies.

en: The research, funded by the Rio Tinto Ride to Conquer cancer, will be published today in the Medical Journal of Australia.
de: Die von Rio Tinto Ride to Conquer Cancer finanzierte Studie wird heute im Medical Journal of Australia veröffentlicht.
translated_de: The Rio Tinto Ride to Conquer Cancer Studie is now available in the Medical Journal of Australia.

en: In March 2012, at 33 years of age, young Gold Coast mum Elisha Neave was told that she had an aggressive form of ovarian cancer.
de: Im März 2013 erfuhr Elisha Neave, eine junge Mutter von 33 Jahren von der Goldküste, dass sie eine aggressive Form von Eierstockkrebs hatte.
translated_de: In March 2013, Elisha Neave, a young mother of 33 years, told the Gold Coast that she had a aggressive form of Eierstockkrebs.

en: Garden centres rue fall in homeowners
de: Gartenzentren bedauern sinkende Hausbesitzerzahlen
translated_de: The garden centres are a long way from the cost of house owners

en: The drop, coupled with a particular decline in the number of homeowners aged under 35, could result in garden centres losing out on tens of millions of pounds a year when today's young consumers reach the "core gardening age group," according to the HTA's study, which was reported by the Financial Times.
de: Der Rückgang zusammen mit einem verstärkten Sinken der Anzahl der Hausbesitzer unter 35 Jahren könnte dazu führen, dass Gartenzentren zehntausende Pfund pro Jahr verlieren, wenn die heutigen jungen Konsumenten nach einer Studie der HTA, wie in der Financial Times berichtet, die "Kernaltersgruppe für Gartenprodukte" erreichen.
translated_de: The reintroduction of the number of housekeepers under 35 years could lead to a reduction in the number of gardeners by ten thousand Pfund per year, if the young consumers are able to get a HTA study, as Financial Times reported, which is the "Kernalters Group for Garden products".

en: According to the report, people renting properties spend an average of 55 per cent of the amount that those with their own homes spend on their gardens.
de: Der Bericht besagt, dass Mieter durchschnittlich 55 Prozent des Betrages ausgeben, die Menschen mit Eigenheim für ihren Garten ausgeben.
translated_de: The report states that the average rental rate is 55 percent, the people who live in their own home for their garden.

en: It cited the rise in people living in highly urbanised areas with no gardens, the popularity of paving over front gardens for parking and shrinking garden size as other factors threatening the industry, which is worth an estimated £5 billion in sales each year.
de: Der Anstieg von Menschen, die in hoch urbanisierten Gegenden ohne Gärten leben, das beliebte Verfahren, Vorgärten zu Parkzwecken zu asphaltieren und die sinkende Gartengröße sind weitere Faktoren, die die Branche bedrohen, in der geschätzt 5 Milliarden £ jährlich im Verkauf umgesetzt werden.
translated_de: The rise of people living in urban areas without gloom, the popular process of asphalting plants and the sinking garden size are another factor which will be able to implement the industry' s annual sales of 5 billion pounds.

en: Greater London, where home ownership has fallen from 61 per cent to 43 per cent in six years, has Britain's lowest spend per household on gardening products.
de: Im Großraum London, in dem über einen Zeitraum von 6 Jahren der Anteil an Hauseigentümern von 61 auf 43 Prozent gefallen ist, werden die geringsten Ausgaben für Gartenprodukte pro Haushalt vermeldet.
translated_de: In London, in a period of 6 years, the proportion of house owners at 61 to 43 percent is expected to be lowered by the budget.

en: The HTA and Royal Horticultural Society said that renting property or a lack of garden space did not mean people could not grow plants.
de: Die HTA und die Royal Horticultural Society weisen darauf hin, dass Wohnen zur Miete oder kleine Gärten nicht bedeuten, dass die Menschen keine Pflanzen ziehen können.
translated_de: The HTA and the Royal Horticultural Society insist that living in a house or small gloom cannot be a sign that people cannot be able to feed animals.

en: Guy Barter, chief horticultural adviser to the RHS, said: "Container gardening, for example, is especially popular with renters who can move their plants when they relocate."
de: Guy Barter, Chefgartenberater für die RHS sagte: "Container-Gärtnern ist beispielsweise bei Mietern sehr beliebt, weil sie ihre Pflanzen bei einem Umzug mitnehmen können."
translated_de: Guy Barter, Chef-Conseil-Conseil-Conseil-Conseil-Conseil-Conseil-Conseil-Conseil-Conseil-Conseil-Conseil-Conseil-Conseil-Conseil-Conseil-Conseil-Conseil-Conseil-Conseil-Conseil-Conseil-Cons

en: The HTA report identified the period between 1997 and 2005 as the garden retail sector's 'golden age" as a result of increased home ownership and economic prosperity from the late 1980s to mid-1990s.
de: Der HTA-Bericht identifizierte den Zeitraum zwischen 1997 und 2005 als das "goldene Zeitalter" des Garteneinzelhandels aufgrund steigender Hauseigentümerzahlen und wirtschaftlichen Wohlstands von den späten 1980er bis zur Mitte der 90er Jahre.
translated_de: The HTA rich has identified the period between 1997 and 2005 as the "golden time" of garden retail due to increased house prices and economic prosperity from the late 1980s to the mid 90s.

en: It also predicted an improved market this year due to better weather following unfavourable conditions in March and April last year.
de: Er prognostizierte für dieses Jahr außerdem eine verbesserte Marktsituation wegen des besseren Wetters nach unfreundlichen Wetterbedingungen im März und April letzten Jahres.
translated_de: The forecast for this year is also to improve market situation due to better weather conditions in the months of March and April last year.

en: In Pakistan, the protest movement led by political opponent, Imran Khan, and the spiritual leader, Tahirul Qadri, continues.
de: Die vom Oppositionspolitiker Imran Khan und dem Geistlichen Tahirul Qadri angeführte Protestbewegung in Pakistan geht weiter.

en: In the capital city of Islamabad, around 1000 demonstrators stormed the government-run television station, PTV.

translated_de: In Islamabad' s capital, around 1000 people have been sworn in to the public television channel PTV.

en: However, information minister, Pervaiz Rashid, said that soldiers had been able to force the protesters back out of the building.

translated_de: Mr President, the Information Minister said that Soldaten would have been a good way to draw the protesters back to the PTV-Gebäude.

en: The TV station stopped broadcasting for approximately 40 minutes, but has since begun to broadcast again.
de: Der Sender stellte seinen Betrieb für rund 40 Minuten ein, sendet inzwischen aber wieder.
translated_de: The sender arranged his operation for around 40 minutes, but it was sent back in the meantime.

en: At the same time, around 3000 demonstrators attempted to reach the official residency of Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif.
de: Gleichzeitig versuchten rund 3000 Demonstranten, zur Residenz von Premierminister Nawaz Sharif zu gelangen.
translated_de: Gleichzeitig, around 3000 Demonstranten were attempting to get to the presidency of Premier Nawaz Sharif.

en: Approximately one kilometre away, they clashed with security security services, armed with sticks and stones.
de: Rund einen Kilometer entfernt davon lieferten sie sich mit Stöcken und Steinen ausgerüstet Zusammenstöße mit Sicherheitskräften.

en: The Pakistan Army called for a political solution to the conflict "without delay and without resorting to violence."
de: Die Armee des Landes mahnt derweil zu einer politischen Lösung des Konflikts, "ohne Zeit zu verschwenden und ohne Gewalt anzuwenden".
translated_de: The Armed States are trying to find a political solution to the conflict, "without time to be wasted and without violence".

en: Following a meeting at its headquarters on Sunday evening, the military announced: "The Army remains committed to its task of ensuring security for the State".

translated_de: After a meeting in the mainquartier on Sunday evening, the military said: "The Armed Forces remain their role, to ensure the security of the States".

en: The military plays an important role in Pakistan and has taken power by force several times in the past.
de: Das Militär spielt in Pakistan eine wichtige Rolle und hat bereits häufiger geputscht.
translated_de: Militärs play a significant role in Pakistan and have been sputtered frequently.

en: The opposition politician, Imran Khan, accuses Prime Minister Sharif of rigging the parliamentary elections, which took place in May last year.

translated_de: The Oppositionspolitiker, Imran Khan, has a chance to be a Prime Minister, Sharif, in the Parliament' s election in Mai last year.

en: The protests escalated at the weekend, after Khan and Qadri called on their followers to advance to Sharif's residence.

en: Turkey Summons US Diplomat Over Spying Report
de: Türkei bestellt US-Diplomat wegen Spionageberichts ein
translated_de: Turkey has commissioned US diplomats to report on spying

en: The Turkish foreign ministry has summoned the most senior U.S. diplomat in the country for clarification of a report about American and British spying in Turkey.
de: Das türkische Außenministerium hat den dienstältesten US-Diplomaten des Landes zu Auskünften eines Berichts über amerikanische und britische Spionage in der Türkei einbestellt.
translated_de: The Turkish Foreign Ministry has commissioned the most prestigious US diplomats of the country to carry out a report on US and British spying in Turkey.

en: Deputy Prime Minister Bulent said the U.S. charge d'affaires and Turkish officials had discussed the report Monday.
de: Vizepremierminister Bülent sagte, dass der Geschäftsträger der US-Botschaft und türkische Beamte den Bericht am Montag besprochen hatten.
translated_de: Mr Bülent said that the businessman of the US-Botsh and Turkish officials had a report on Monday.

en: German magazine Der Spiegel and the online magazine The Intercept said that documents provided by former U.S. National Security Agency analyst Edward Snowden show that Turkey was a high priority intelligence target for U.S. and British intelligence services.
de: Das deutsche Magazin Der Spiegel sowie das Online-Magazin The Intercept meldeten, dass die von dem früheren US-Analysten der Nationalen Sicherheitsagentur, Edward Snowden, zeigen, dass die Türkei ein Haupttätigkeitsgebiet für die US-amerikanischen und britischen Geheimdienste war.
translated_de: The German magazine The Mirror and the Online magazine The Intercept have revealed that the former US-Analyst of the National Security Agency, Edward Snowden, showed that Turkey was the main activity area for the US-American and British Geheimdienst.

en: According to Turkish news wires, Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan downplayed the importance of the report, saying that all major countries spied on each other.
de: Nach Angaben türkischer Nachrichtenagenturen spielte der türkische Präsident Recep Tayyip Erdogan die Wichtigkeit des Berichts herunter und sagte, dass alle wichtigen Länder sich gegenseitig ausspionierten.
translated_de: According to Turkish news agencies, President Recep Tayyip Erdogan has praised the importance of the report and said that all important countries are being targeted.

en: An earlier report that Germany's main intelligence agency had also targeted Ankara drew a more angry response from the Turkish government.
de: Ein früherer Bericht, dass auch der wichtigste Geheimdienst Deutschlands Ankara im Visier hatte, sorgte für deutlich verärgertere Reaktionen der türkischen Regierung.
translated_de: A previous report, which also included the most important German refugee service in the Visier, cited the Turkish government' s clear response.

en: Deutsch Bahn in NW has announced that they will do everything they can to ensure disruptions are kept to a minimum.

en: Magaluf police chief charged over corruption
de: Polizeichef von Magaluf der Korruption angeklagt
translated_de: Police chief of Magaluf of Korruption apologises

en: The claimants presented proof of extortion by policemen and Calvià Town Hall civil servants at Mallorca's public prosecutor's office on Friday.
de: Die Ankläger legten am Freitag dem Büro des Staatsanwaltes von Mallorca Beweise für Erpressungen durch Polizisten und Angestellte der Stadt Calvià vor.
translated_de: The alleged attackers were presenting evidence on Friday in the Office of the Mallorcan Government of the State of the Interior for erpressing police and imposing the city of Calvià.

en: The head of Calvià police on the holiday island of Majorca has been arrested following corruption claims filed by businessmen and bar owners in the notorious binge drinking hotspot of Magaluf.
de: Der Chef der Polizei von Calvià auf der Ferieninsel Mallorca wurde nach Korruptionsvorwürfen von Geschäftsleuten und Barbesitzern im berüchtigten Binge-Drinking-Hotspot Magaluf verhaftet.
translated_de: The chef of the police of Calvià on the Mallorca holiday island was convicted of corruption by businessmen and barbecuers in the notorious Binge-Drinking Host Magaluf.

en: Chief Inspector José Antonio Navarro has been remanded in custody following corruption claims made against him by several businessmen from Punta Ballena, the street where most of Magaluf's bars and nightclubs are located.
de: Hauptkommissar José Antonio Navarro wurde nach Korruptionsvorwürfen gegen ihn von mehreren Geschäftsleuten aus Punta Ballena, der Straße, in der die meisten Bars und Nachtclubs von Magaluf liegen, in Untersuchungshaft genommen.
translated_de: Commissioner José Antonio Navarro was investigated by several businessmen from Punta Ballena, the Straße, in which the majority of the bars and nightclubs of Magaluf are located.

en: According to online daily Mallorca Diario, the claimants presented proof of extortion by policemen and Calvià Town Hall civil servants at the office of Majorca's anti-corruption prosecutor on Friday.
de: Nach Angaben der Online-Tageszeitung Mallorca Diario legten die Ankläger dem Büro des Staatsanwalts für Korruptionsbekämpfung Mallorcas am Freitag Beweise für Erpressungen durch Polizisten und Angestellte der Stadt Calvià vor.
translated_de: According to the online timetable of Mallorca, the alleged criminals of the Office of the State of the Interior for Korruption in Mallorca were able to demonstrate on Friday the erpressing of police and the occupants of the city of Calvià.

en: Two other local police officers were arrested by Spanish Civil Guards in connection to the corruption claims and will have to be questioned by a judge alongside Navarro.
de: Zwei weitere Ortspolizisten wurden von der spanischen Guardia Civil in Verbindung mit den Korruptionsvorwürfen festgenommen und werden gemeinsam mit Navarro von einem Richter befragt.
translated_de: Two other local police officers were arrested by the Spanish Guardia Civil in connection with the corruption laws and are asked by Navarro by a Richter.

en: Spanish national daily ABC reported the disgruntled nightclub owners as saying favouritism by authorities was having a serious effect on their businesses.
de: Die nationale spanische Tageszeitung ABC berichtete, dass die verärgerten Nachtklubbesitzer aussagten, die Vetternwirtschaft der Behörden habe schwerwiegende Auswirkungen auf ihre Geschäfte.
translated_de: The national spanish newspaper ABC reported that the most expensive nightclub owner said that the Vetternwirtschaft of the authorities had serious consequences on their business.

en: "It's not about making money anymore, it's about surviving," one of the businessmen told the court.
de: "Es geht nicht mehr ums Geldverdienen, es geht ums Überleben," sagte einer der Geschäftsleute dem Gericht.
translated_de: "It is not more about money, it is about life," said one of the judges of the business.

en: You don't mess with our livelihoods.
de: Lasst unsere Lebensgrundlage aus dem Spiel.
translated_de: Let us take our life-style from the game.

en: We have nothing to lose.
de: Wir haben nichts zu verlieren.
translated_de: We have nothing to lose.

en: Magaluf made international headlines this summer as a result of a viral YouTube video which showed an 18-year-old British holidaymaker performing fellatio on 24 men during a pub crawl.
de: Magaluf machte in diesem Sommer aufgrund eines viralen YouTube-Videos internationale Schlagzeilen, in dem ein 18jähriger britischer Tourist gezeigt wurde, der an 24 Männern während einer Sauftour Fellatio vollzog.
translated_de: Magaluf made it in this summer because of a viral YouTube video international troll which was shown by a 18-year-old British tourist, which was accompanied by 24 men during a Fellatio.

en: Island authorities have since attempted to clamp down on the drunk and disorderly behaviour of Magaluf holiday revellers by minimizing numbers on the notorious alcohol-fuelled bar crawls.
de: Die Inselbehörden haben seither versucht, das ordnungswidrige Verhalten alkoholisierter Urlauber in Magaluf zu stoppen, indem die Anzahl der Teilnehmer an den berüchtigten alkoholgetränkten Kneipentouren minimiert wurde.
translated_de: The island authorities either tried to stop the regulated behaviour of alcoholism-free travellers in Magaluf, reducing the number of participants to the berthousiastical snoozing.

en: In addition, the Playhouse club where the fellatio incident took place was forced to shut down for a year, while Playhouse and the bar crawl organizers Carnage were jointly fined €55,000 ($73,000).
de: Der Playhouse Club, in dem der Fellatiovorfall stattfand, wurde für ein Jahr zur Schließung gezwungen, während Playhouse und der Kneipentour-Organisator Carnage gemeinsam eine Strafe von 55.000 € (73,000 $) zahlen müssen.
translated_de: The Playhouse Club, which is a Fellatiovorfall, has been sentenced for a year, while Playhouse and the Kneipentour Organisation must pay a fine of 55.000 € (73 000 $).

en: The tourist resort of Magaluf, mainly popular with young British holidaymakers, has also seen numerous alcohol-fuelled accidents involving the craze known as "balconing," where people jump from one balcony to another or from a balcony into the hotel pool.
de: Der Touristenort Magaluf, der vor allem bei jungen britischen Urlaubern beliebt ist, ist auch für etliche Unfälle unter Alkoholeinfluss bekannt, darunter auch den Trend des "Balconing", bei dem Menschen von einem Balkon zum anderen oder von einem Balkon in den Hotelpool springen.
translated_de: The tourist town Magaluf, which is particularly popular among young British tourists, is also known for etiquette of alcohol abuse, including the trend of "booze" in the people of a balcony to another or of a balcony in the hotel pool.

en: First day of spring marked with wet and blustery conditions impacting Adelaide Airport flights
de: Der erste Frühlingstag mit nassen und stürmischen Wetterbedingungen beeinträchtigt Flüge vom Flughafen Adelaide
translated_de: The first spring day with nascent and sturdy weather conditions is a welcome welcome from Adelaide Airport

en: SPRING has sprung a wintry surprise on southern South Australia, bringing heavy showers and strong winds that have affected flights at Adelaide Airport.
de: Der FRÜHLING hat Südaustralien eine winterliche Überraschung beschert, mit heftigen Schauern und starkem Wind, die Flüge vom Flughafen Adelaide aus beeinträchtigten.
translated_de: The FRÜHLING has sparked a winter surprise in Southaustralien, with heavy rain and strong winds which have slowed the flights from Adelaide airport.

en: A further 5mm of rain fell on the city in the evening up to 9pm, following the 6.6mm that fell overnight on Sunday.
de: Am Abend bis 21 Uhr fielen weitere 5mm Regen auf die Stadt, nach 6,6mm, die bereits in der Nacht zum Sonntag niedergegangen waren.
translated_de: The next 5mm Regen was in the city, at 6,6mm, which was already in the night of Sunday.

en: The latest rain came courtesy of a couple of short, blustery showers, including a burst that started just before 8pm that dumped almost 4mm in about 10 minutes.
de: Der letzte Niederschlag war das Ergebnis einer Reihe kurzer, stürmischer Schauer, einschließlich eines Gusses, der kurz vor 20 Uhr begann und für fast 4mm Niederschlag in etwa 10 Minuten sorgte.
translated_de: The last pound was the result of a series of short, sturdish observers, and a sigh which began shortly before 20 p.m. and which was a fast 4mm pound in about 10 minutes.

en: After winter delivered an early dose of spring last week, temperatures dropped again on Monday to a high of just 15.8C in the city.
de: Nachdem der Winter letzte Woche für eine frühe Dosis Frühling gesorgt hatte, fielen die Temperaturen in der Stadt am Montag wieder auf einen Höchstwert von nur 15,8°C.
translated_de: After the winter last week, a early dosis spring, the temperature in the city am Montag was again at a maximum of 15,8°C.

en: The squally conditions are believed to have contributed to the delayed landing of a Virgin Airlines flight from Melbourne to Adelaide.
de: Die böigen Wetterbedingungen haben wahrscheinlich zu der verspäteten Landung eines Fluges von Virgin Airlines von Melbourne nach Adelaide geführt.
translated_de: The poor weather conditions have likely led to the verspäted landing of a Virgin Airlines flight from Melbourne to Adelaide.

en: The plane was scheduled to land just after 7.30pm but was hit by windshear - a sudden change in wind speed or direction over a short distance - and was forced to pull out.
de: Das Flugzeug hätte kurz nach 19.30 Uhr landen sollen, wurde jedoch von einem Scherwind getroffen - einer plötzlichen Veränderung der Windgeschwindigkeit oder -richtung über eine kurze Entfernung - und musste durchstarten.
translated_de: The aircraft would have to land at around 19:30 a.m., but a sudden change in wind speed or direction over a short distance, and it had to start.

en: Wind gusts were reaching about 50km/h on the ground at Adelaide Airport at the time.
de: Windstöße erreichten zu diesem Zeitpunkt etwa 50 km/h am Boden auf dem Flughafen Adelaide.
translated_de: Windstuffs reached at this time around 50 km/h on the ground on the Adelaide Airport.

en: Flight data showed the plane had to pull out of second landing and the plane eventually touched down about 8.40pm.
de: Die Flugdaten zeigten, dass das Flugzeug auch bei einem zweiten Landeanflug durchstarten musste und schließlich um etwa 20.40 Uhr aufsetzte.
translated_de: The flight data show that the aircraft had to start at a second landing and, finally, at around 20 p.m.

en: That flight's delay caused the subsequent delay of a few other flights, including an Emirates flight from Dubai and a Qantas flight from Sydney.
de: Die Flugverzögerung führte in der Folge zur Verspätung einiger anderer Flüge, einschließlich eines Emirates-Flugs aus Dubai und eines Quantas-Flugs aus Sydney.
translated_de: The flight control has also led to the escalating of some other flights, including a Emirates flight from Dubai and a Quantas flight from Sydney.

en: A top of 16C is forecast for Adelaide on Tuesday, with the chance of a shower or two.
de: Für Adelaide ist am Dienstag eine Höchsttemperatur von 16°C vorhergesagt, mit möglichen Schauern.
translated_de: The temperature of Adelaide is 16°C, which is possible at the time of the day.

en: Matthies thinks: High time for the Internet Of Things
de: Matthies meint: Höchste Zeit zum großen Vernetzen
translated_de: Matthies: Maximum time for large networks

en: Faced with runaway advances in consumer technology, which threaten to turn our homes into high-tech control rooms, our reporter, Bernd Matthies, takes heart from one electronic gadget that he really feels at home with.
de: Angesichts des galoppierenden technischen Fortschritts, der unser behagliches Zuhause in High-Tech-Schaltzentralen zu verwandeln droht, tröstet sich unser Kolumnist Bernd Matthies mit einem überaus vertrauten elektronischen Zubehör.
translated_de: In light of the technological progress that could threaten our home in high-tech buildings, our Kolumnist Bernd Matthies is putting on electronic accessories.

en: As I write this, my eye catches the spiral cable, which connects the handset to the telephone, and I'm thinking: Wow! How retro is that then?
de: Während ich das hier schreibe, fällt mein Blick auf das Spiralkabel, das den Hörer mit dem Telefon verbindet, und ich denke: Boah, wie retro ist das denn?
translated_de: I think that this is the case, and I think that the sound of the telephone is a bit retro.

en: But it started me thinking: If the cable was not there, all the handsets would be lying scattered around the house in no time at all - and that would be even more retro.
de: Aber dahinter steckt eine Überlegung: Wenn das Kabel nicht wäre, würden in kürzester Zeit sämtliche Hörer herrenlos im Haus herumfliegen, und das wäre noch bedeutend mehr retro.
translated_de: But here we are, in the end, a question: If the cable was not, it would be a shamble of all the earworms in the House in the short term, and it would be much more retro.

en: In any case, in the elephantine (elephantine?
de: Ohnehin gilt ja auf dem ekeltronischen (ekeltronischen?
translated_de: It is not just the eccletronic (eccletronic?

en: No - a typing error - electronics) sector, the basic rule is that the latest wonder of today is electronic rubbish tomorrow - once bought, it's out of date.
de: Nein, Tippfehler: elektronischen) Sektor die Regel, dass die Weltneuheit von heute der Elektroschrott von morgen ist, gekauft - veraltet.
translated_de: In the end, Tipperary: electronic) Sektor the rule that the world of the electrical rotting is bought by morgen - and that it is a waste of money.

en: And anyone, for example, who still has an old CRT TV in their living room, is merely announcing to the world that they're not interested in TVs!
de: Und wer zum Beispiel heute noch einen Röhrenfernseher im Wohnzimmer hat, der sagt damit lediglich, dass er Fernsehen grundsätzlich ablehnt.
translated_de: And, as we have seen, there is a rooster in the living room, which says that the television is basically opposed.

en: So why these thoughts?
de: Weshalb diese Überlegungen?
translated_de: Why are these decisions?

en: Because the International Consumer Electronics Fair (IFA) in Berlin, once again showed us how incompetent we are when it comes to questions about technology.
de: Weil uns das Andrängen der Ifa am Funkturm in dieser Woche wieder unsere absolute Inkompetenz in Fragen der Elektronik vor Augen führt.
translated_de: We are again pointing out the scepticism of the Ifa Funkturm in this week' s debate on electrical issues.

en: The layman, who once knew, blind, how to operate a washing machine and a CD-Player, is today faced with highfalutin expert talk about an array of gadgets, the purpose of which he doesn't even understand. "Connected Home, Wearables, Health Care and Urban Technologies," are what the press office promise us.
de: Der Laie, der früher Waschmaschine und CD-Spieler blind beherrschte, begreift heute nicht einmal den Zweck der Geräte, die mit unfassbar eitlem Expertensprech vor ihm ausgebreitet werden: "Connected Home, Wearables, Health Care und Urban Technologies" verspricht uns die Pressestelle.
translated_de: The slack of the previous Waschmaschine and CD player is not a tool which, with unfavorable experts, is a tool which is a tool that is a tool that is a tool that is a tool that is a tool that is a tool that is a tool that is a tool that is a tool that is a tool that is a tool that is a tool that is a tool that is a tool that is a tool that is a tool that

en: Yes - and?
de: Ja, geht's noch?
translated_de: What is the case?

en: What do you say to people, who clearly talk such guff voluntarily?
de: Worüber soll man reden mit Leuten, die offenbar freiwillig solchen Quark ausbreiten?
translated_de: What about people who are a free-spirited Quark?

en: Really, they've been trying to sell us the Internet of Things for our homes, for the last 20 years.
de: Im Grunde geht es ja seit etwa 20 Jahren vor allem darum, dass wir gefälligst unser Haus vernetzen sollen.
translated_de: We are going to have to make our house a bit more accessible since 20 years ago.

en: So that your yoghurt can place itself on your shopping list; so that your fire-alarm can tell you - when you're lying on the beach in the Maldives - that there's a fire in your study back home.
de: Damit sich der Joghurt selbst nachbestellt, damit uns der Brandmelder im Urlaub auf den Malediven mitteilt, dass es im Arbeitszimmer grad brennt.
translated_de: The Joghurt itself is a good example of how we are a Brandmelder in the Malediven holiday, that it is a job room.

en: And wouldn't it be wonderful if we could set our home air-conditioning to switch on just before we get back from the office ...?
de: Und wäre es nicht wunderbar, wenn wir vom Büro aus die Klimaanlage auf unsere baldige Ankunft ...?
translated_de: And would it not be wonderful if we were to be announcing our arrival from the office from the climate system...?

en: Yes - but that presupposes that you have an air-conditioner in the first place.
de: Ja, das setzt allerdings eine Klimaanlage voraus.
translated_de: However, it is a climate system.

en: However, one dream really will come true very soon: We lift our wrist watches, and in a loud voice say "Vacuum!" - and at home the vacuum cleaner robot begins to hoover.
de: Aber ein Traum wird ganz bestimmt demnächst wahr: Wir heben unsere Armbanduhr, sagen ihr laut "Saugen!" - und zu Hause fährt der Staubsaugroboter los.
translated_de: But a dream will be true first: we lift our armbands, say they say "saugen!" - and to house the Staubsaugroboter is the one who is a spokesman.

en: Fantastic.
de: Irre.
translated_de: Irre.

en: Everything is geared to nothing less than a revolution: "The boundary between white and brown goods is becoming blurred," mutters an industry insider. You can connect your washing machine to your headphone; your steam oven can send you a weather report; and your data-goggles can tell you how long your pizza still has to go in the oven - but that's of little use if you're sitting in a traffic jam.
de: Alles läuft auf nichts Geringeres als eine Revolution hinaus: "Die Grenzen zwischen weißer und brauner Ware verschwimmen", raunt ein Branchenkenner, man kann die Waschmaschine mit einem Kopfhörer verbinden, der Dampfgarer schickt den Wetterbericht und die Datenbrille zeigt an, wie lange die Pizza im Backofen noch braucht, was aber nichts nützt, weil wir im Stau stehen.
translated_de: All is nothing less than a revolution: "The boundaries between white and braunt warmen are broken," a branch-caller, a washing machine can be connected with a headphone, a damper sends the weather report and the databrille shows how long the pizza in backofen is needed, but nothing is a good thing because we are in Stau.

en: From everyday experience, we also know: If you need a new model gadget to urgently work, the battery will almost certainly be empty.
de: Aus der täglichen Praxis wissen wir außerdem: Wenn ein neumodisches Gerät mal wirklich dringend gebraucht wird, ist garantiert der Akku leer.
translated_de: We also know that if a new instrument is needed, the Akku is guaranteed to be a good one.

en: Which is another reason why the spiral cable on the telephone will out-live the next IFA exhibits in Berlin.
de: Was ein weiterer Grund dafür ist, dass das Spiralkabel am Telefon auch die nächsten Funkausstellungen überleben wird.
translated_de: Another reason for this is that the piralkabel on the telephone will also be reviving the next radio stations.

en: Israeli Children Return to School After Gaza War
de: Israelische Kinder kehren nach dem Krieg in Gaza in ihre Schulen zurück
translated_de: Israeli children return to Gaza after the war

en: Thousands of Israeli children in areas near the Gaza Strip went back to school Monday after spending the summer in bomb shelters as rockets and mortars rained on their communities during the 50-day Israel-Hamas war, while schools in Gaza remained shuttered as the territory recovered from the fighting.
de: Tausender israelischer Kinder aus den Gebieten in der Nähe des Gazastreifens kehrten am Montag in die Schulen zurück, nachdem sie den Sommer in Luftschutzräumen verbracht hatten, während Raketen- und Mörserbeschuss auf ihre Gemeinden während des 50-tägigen Kriegs zwischen Israel und der Hamas niederging und die Schulen in Gaza geschlossen blieben, während sich das Gebiet von den Kämpfen erholte.
translated_de: Israeli children from the area of Gaza retreated on Montag in the schools, after they had been retreated in air protection areas during the summer, while Raketen and Mörserbeschuss in their communities during the 50-day war between Israel and Hamas and the schools in Gaza were closed, while the areas of the Kämpfes were reopened.

en: The start of school brought a sense of joy and excitement to rocket-scarred communities in southern Israel, but the signs of the fighting remained fresh.
de: Der Schulstart brachte den von Raketeneinschusslöchern gezeichneten Gemeinden im Süden Israels ein Gefühl von Freude und Erwartung, aber die Zeichen der Kämpfe sind noch frisch.
translated_de: The school start brought the Raketenamen' s community to the South of Israel a sense of joy and pride, but the signs of conflict are still fresh.

en: In the southern city of Ashdod, employees at the "Pashosh" kindergarten, which was struck by a rocket, removed shrapnel marks off the walls and slides ahead of the students' arrival.
de: In der südlichen Stadt Ashdod entfernten Mitarbeiter des "Pashosh"-Kindergartens, der von einer Rakete getroffen wurde, vor dem Eintreffen der Schüler Granatsplitter aus den Wänden und Schiebewänden.
translated_de: In the rural city of Ashdod, staff from the "Pashosh"-Kindergarten, which was a Rakete, were removed from the walls and walls of the students' s shacks.

en: "We are a little scared but we are excited," said Ronit Bart, a resident of Kibbutz Saad and an English teacher in its school.
de: "Wir haben ein bisschen Angst, aber sind aufgeregt," sagte Ronit Bart, Anwohnerin im Kibbutz Saad und dortige Englischlehrerin.
translated_de: "We have some fear but we are being reacted to," said Ronit Bart, anwohner in Kibbutz Saad and english teacher in the area.

en: A lot of children in our area really need to go back to a routine.
de: Viele Kinder aus unserer Gegend brauchen dringend die Rückkehr zu einer Routine.
translated_de: Many children from our area need urgent return to a routine.

en: Her 11-year-old daughter, Shani Bart, said it felt a "little bit weird" to suddenly be going back to school.
de: Ihre 11-jährige Tochter Shani Bart sagte, es fühle sich "ein bisschen komisch" an, plötzlich wieder in die Schule zu gehen.
translated_de: Your 11-year-old daughter Shani Bart said that it feels "a little comical" and suddenly returns to school.

en: "There were some difficult times and we didn't leave our houses at all," she said.
de: "Das waren schwierige Zeiten, und wir sind überhaupt nicht aus dem Haus gegangen," sagte sie.
translated_de: "The time was difficult and we are not going to be in the House," said the spokesman.

en: President Reuven Rivlin visited the kibbutz, which is located close to the Gaza border, to offer his support.
de: Präsident Reuven Rivlin besuchte den Kibbutz nahe der Grenze zu Gaza, um seine Unterstützung anzubieten.
translated_de: President Reuven Rivlin visited the Kibbutz near the Gaza border to offer his support.

en: Until a cease-fire halted the war last week, thousands of residents of border communities like Saad remained indoors or left their homes for safer areas further away from Gaza to escape rocket and mortar fire.
de: Bis ein Waffenstillstand den Krieg letzte Woche unterbrach blieben Tausende von Bewohnern der Grenzgemeinden wie Saad in ihren Häusern oder verließen ihre Häuser, um in sicherere Gegenden weiter entfernt von Gaza zu ziehen und dem Raketen- und Mörserfeuer zu entgehen.
translated_de: The war ended last week and thousands of people from the border communities, such as Saad, have been displaced or displaced by their houses, to draw them further away from Gaza and to entice the rakets and mörserfire.

en: Many residents of Nahal Oz, a community close to the Gaza frontier where a 4-year-old boy was killed by a Palestinian mortar shell, are hesitant about coming back.
de: Viele Bewohner von Nahal Oz, einer Gemeinde in der Nähe der Grenze zu Gaza, in der ein 4-jähriger Junge von einer palästinensischen Mörsergranate getötet wurde, zögern noch mit der Rückkehr.
translated_de: Many residents of Nahal Oz, a community in the vicinity of the Gaza border, have been displaced by a Palestinian Mörsergranate for 4 years.

en: The Education Ministry said about a dozen families still had not returned.
de: Das Bildungsministerium teilte mit, etwa ein Dutzend Familien sei noch nicht zurückgekehrt.
translated_de: The education minister has not yet returned to the country, for example, a child' s family.

en: Their children have been placed in alternate schools for the time being.
de: Ihre Kinder wurden vorläufig in anderen Schulen untergebracht.
translated_de: Your children were introduced in other schools.

en: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu visited a school in Sderot, a Gaza border town that has been hard hit by Palestinian fire.
de: Premierminister Benjamin Netanjahu besuchte eine Schule in Sderot, einer Grenzstadt zu Gaza, die schwer vom palästinensischen Beschuss gezeichnet ist.
translated_de: Premier Benjamin Netanjahu visited a school in Sderot, a border town to Gaza, which is a major issue of palestinians' s repression.

en: He urged the children to study hard and said "we will make sure to provide you with knowledge and provide you with security."
de: Er appellierte an die Kinder, viel zu lernen und sagte "wir werden dafür sorgen, dass ihr Wissen erwerbt und bieten euch Sicherheit."
translated_de: He called the children to learn more and said: "we will ensure that their knowledge is gaining and you can provide security."

en: Israel and Hamas agreed to an open-ended truce last Tuesday.
de: Israel und Hamas einigten sich am vergangenen Dienstag auf einen unbefristeteten Waffenstillstand.
translated_de: Israel and Hamas have agreed on a cease-fire cease-fire on Tuesday last Tuesday.

en: The cease-fire brought an immediate end to the fighting but left key issues unresolved, such as Hamas' demand for the lifting of an Israel-Egyptian blockade of Gaza and the reopening of Gaza's air and seaports.
de: Die Waffenruhe sorgte für ein sofortiges Ende der Kämpfe; wichtige Probleme bleiben jedoch ungelöst, wie die Forderung der Hamas nach einer Aufhebung der israelisch-ägyptischen Blockade von Gaza und der Wiedereröffnung der Luft- und Seehäfen in Gaza.
translated_de: The weapons are a way of ending the fight, but important issues remain unsolved, such as the Hamas' demand for a cease-fire in Gaza and the reopening of air and seafen in Gaza.

en: Israel wants Hamas to disarm and the return of bodies of two Israeli soldiers killed in the war.
de: Israel fordert eine Entwaffnung der Hamas und die Übergabe der Leichen von zwei bei den Kämpfen getöteten israelischen Soldaten.
translated_de: Israel has called for a boycott of Hamas and a ban on the repercussions of two of the Israeli Soldaten in the Kämpfe.

en: A new round of indirect talks is expected to begin later this month in Egypt.
de: Eine neue Runde indirekter Gespräche wird voraussichtlich noch in diesem Monat in Ägypten beginnen.
translated_de: A new round of indirect talks will begin this month in Egypt.

en: The war killed more than 2,100 Palestinians, three-quarters of whom were civilians and at least 494 children, according to Palestinian and U.N. estimates.
de: In dem Krieg wurden mehr als 2.100 Palästinenser getötet, drei Viertel davon Zivilisten, und mindestens 494 Kinder nach Schätzungen der Palästinenser und der UN.
translated_de: In the war, more than 2,100 Palestinians were killed, three quarters of them civilians and at least 494 children were killed by Palestinians and the UN.

en: Israel disputes the figures and estimates that at least half of those killed were militants, though it has not provided firm evidence to back its claims.
de: Israel bestreitet diese Angaben und schätzt, dass es sich bei mindestens der Hälfte der Getöteten um Kämpfer handelt, legte jedoch keine konkreten Belege für diese Informationen vor.
translated_de: Israel disputes these statements and estimes that, at least half of the ice is a famine, it does not have any specific evidence for these information.

en: On the Israeli side, 66 soldiers and six civilians, including a Thai worker, were killed.
de: Auf israelischer Seite wurden 66 Soldaten und sechs Zivilisten, darunter ein thailändischer Arbeiter, getötet.
translated_de: On the Israeli side, 66 Soldaten and six Zivilisten, among them a Thai worker, were swooped.

en: Hamas and other Gaza militants fired 4,591 rockets and mortars at Israeli cities during the fighting, mostly in the south.
de: Hamas und andere Kämpfer in Gaza feuerten 4.591 Raketen und Mörsergranaten während der Kämpfe auf israelische Städte ab, die meisten im Süden des Landes.
