translated_de: Hamas and other fighters in Gaza feuern 4.591 Raketen and Mörsergranaten during the fighters in Israeli cities, most of which are in the South of the country.

en: The Israeli military, meanwhile, carried out more than 5,000 airstrikes and other attacks.
de: Währenddessen führte das israelische Militär mehr als 5.000 Luft- und andere Angriffe durch.
translated_de: The Israeli military has armed more than 5.000 air and other attacks.

en: The Israeli attacks damaged or destroyed thousands of homes in Gaza, and an estimated 250,000 people took refuge in more than 100 U.N. schools turned into makeshift shelters.
de: Die israelischen Angriffe beschädigten oder zerstörten Tausende von Häusern im Gazagebiet und etwa 250.000 Menschen suchten in mehr als 100 UN-Schulen Zuflucht, die in vorläufige Schutzräume umgebaut wurden.
translated_de: Israeli attacks have shattered or destroyed thousands of houses in Gaza and around 250.000 people have been killed in more than 100 UN refugee camps built in temporary protection areas.

en: With tens of thousands of people still in the shelters and fighting still raging, education officials delayed the start of the school year last week.
de: Während Zehntausende von Menschen weiterhin in den Schutzräumen leben und die Kämpfe andauern, verschoben die Bildungsbehörden vergangene Woche den Beginn des Schuljahres.
translated_de: During the period of ten thousand people still live in the protection areas and the fights andauern, the education authorities have wiped out the last week, the beginning of the school year.

en: "I hope the school will open soon to complete our education, just like the world's children and Jewish children," said Mohammad Amara, a 13-year-old boy staying in a Gaza City school.
de: "Ich hoffe, die Schule ist bald wieder geöffnet, damit wir weiter lernen können, so wie die Kinder in der Welt und die jüdischen Kinder," sagte Mohammad Amara, ein 13-jähriger Junge, der derzeit in einer Schule in Gaza-Stadt lebt.
translated_de: "I hope that the school will be opened soon so that we can learn more about children in the world and the Jewish children," said Mohammad Amara, a 13-year-old boy who lives in a school in Gaza-Stadt.

en: Following the election in Saxony: CDU Vice-Chairman Strobl questions NPD-banning process
de: Nach Wahl in Sachsen: CDU-Vize Strobl stellt NPD-Verbotsverfahren infrage
translated_de: After the election in Sachsen: CDU-Vize Strobl is in question of NPD-Verbotsverfahren

en: In view of the loss of votes by the German right-wing extremist party, NPD, in Saxony, the national CDU-Vice-Chairman, Thomas Strobl, has called for an end of the on-going NPD-banning process, which is taking place in the German Federal Constitutional Court.
de: Angesichts der Stimmenverluste der NPD in Sachsen hat sich CDU-Bundesvize Thomas Strobl für ein Ende des laufenden NPD-Verbotsverfahrens vor dem Bundesverfassungsgericht ausgesprochen.
translated_de: The CDU-Bundesvizor Thomas Strobl has spoken to the Bundesverfassungsgericht in the wake of the NPD vote loss in Sachsen.

en: Berlin - According to CDU National Vice-Chairman, Thomas Strobl, the current trial taking place in the German Federal Constitutional Court to decide whether to ban the NPD from the political process, should be brought to an end.
de: Berlin - Laut CDU-Bundesvize Thomas Strobl sollten die laufenden Verbotsverfahrens gegen die NPD vor dem Bundesverfassungsgericht ein Ende finden.
translated_de: Berlin - The CDU-Bundesvize Thomas Strobl should end the current judicial procedure against the NPD before the Bundesverfassungsgericht.

en: According to the "Leipziger Volkszeitung," the NPD performed worse than last time,"said Strobl, who is also CDU regional boss in Baden-Württemberg.
de: "Die NPD schneidet schlechter ab als beim letzten Mal", sagte Strobl, der auch CDU-Landeschef in Baden-Württemberg ist, der "Leipziger Volkszeitung".
translated_de: "The NPD is worse than last Mal", said Strobl, the CDU-Landeschef in Baden-Württemberg, the "Leipziger Volkszeit".

en: That is a good development, one that should make us happy, and this trend leads me to think that we should fight the NPD in the ballot box, and not in the constitutional court.
de: Das ist eine erfreuliche Entwicklung in die richtige Richtung und eine Entwicklung, die mich eher zu dem Ergebnis kommen lässt, dass man die NPD politisch bekämpft und nicht vor dem Verfassungsgericht.
translated_de: It is a reversal of the right direction and a development which I am able to achieve that NPD is politically fought and not before the Constitution.

en: On Sunday, the NPD narrowly missed achieving the five percent barrier, which would have seen it enter parliament.
de: Die NPD war bei der Abstimmung am Sonntag ganz knapp an der Fünf-Prozent-Hürde gescheitert.
translated_de: The NPD was very close to the vote on Sunday in the five-year-old country.

en: A first attempt at securing a ban of the right-wing extremist party failed in 2003, because the Federal Office for the Protection of the Constitution also had informants in the top echelons of the NPD.
de: Ein erster Anlauf für ein Verbot der rechtsextremen Partei war 2003 gescheitert, weil der Verfassungsschutz damals auch in der NPD-Spitze Informanten hatte.
translated_de: The first attempt to be a defender of the extremist party was in 2003 because the protection of constitutions had also been used in the NPD-Spitze Informants.

en: In December 2013 the Bundesrat submitted a further banning action to the constitutional court, which is based in Karlsruhe, after spending a long time preparing the case.
de: Im Dezember 2013 reichte der Bundesrat nach langer Vorbereitung einen neuen Antrag in Karlsruhe ein.
translated_de: In December 2013, the Bundesrat has been preparing a new proposal in Karlsruhe for a long time.

en: The German government and Bundestag did not take part in the banning submission.
de: Bundesregierung und Bundestag schlossen sich nicht an.
translated_de: The Bundesregierung and the Bundestag have not agreed.

en: Harburg: Tents for new refugees
de: Harburg: Zelte für neue Flüchtlinge
translated_de: Harburg: a new refugee policy

en: Refugees at Neuländer Platz will now be accommodated in tents.
de: Am Neuländer Platz werden Flüchtlinge jetzt in Zelten untergebracht.
translated_de: The new country will be bringing refugees to Zelten.

en: The reception centre for refugees in Harburg is full-to-bursting.
de: Die Zentrale Erstaufnahme für Flüchtlinge in Harburg platzt aus allen Nähten.
translated_de: The central first-hand experience of refugees in Harburg is a place in all the countries.

en: The German Internal Affairs Authority has now given the go-ahead for the Red Cross to erect the three tents.
de: Jetzt hat die Innenbehörde drei Zelte des Roten Kreuzes daneben aufstellen lassen.
translated_de: The interior authority has now imposed three ten-points on the Roten Kreuz.

en: The local area politicians were only informed about it a short while before - and they are not happy.
de: Die Bezirkspolitiker wurden erst kurz vorher informiert - sie sind wenig begeistert.
translated_de: The district policyrs were informed before they were very early - they are not enthusiastic.

en: "These one-off actions only stir up more doubts in the minds of the public, and they give the local politicians no chance to work out a constructive plan of how to house refugees in a humane manner," said, for example, Britta Herrmann, Chairwoman of the Green Party in the Harburg district assembly.
de: "Diese Hauruck-Aktionen schüren weiter Vorbehalte der Bürger und geben den Bezirkspolitikern keine Möglichkeit, konstruktiv an der humanen Unterbringung von Flüchtlingen mitzuwirken", sagt etwa Britta Herrmann, Fraktionsvorsitzende der Grünen in der Harburger Bezirksversammlung.
translated_de: "The Hauruck actions are threatening to further protect citizens and give the local policy no opportunity to cooperate with human trafficking of refugees", explains Britta Herrmann, the head of the Grüns in the Harburger Regional Assembly.

en: Her party is calling on the Harburg district authority to deploy empty houses to accommodate the refugees.
de: Ihre Partei fordert, dass die Bezirksverwaltung Harburg derzeit ungenutzte Häuser zur Unterbringung zur Verfügung stellt.
translated_de: Your party demands that the Harburg district council use houses to fight.

en: 96 refugees can be accommodated in the three tents.
de: 96 Flüchtlinge können in den drei Zelten untergebracht werden.
translated_de: 96 refugees can be brought to the three Zelten.

en: The reasons for the over-crowding in the initial reception centres are mainly the sudden increase in numbers of those seeking help, as well as the fact that the authorities cannot make available enough places in suitable accommodation.
de: Gründe für die Überfüllung in der Erstaufnahme sind der Ansturm von Hilfesuchenden - und der Umstand, dass die Behörden nicht genügend Plätze in Folgeeinrichtungen bereitstellen können.
translated_de: The reason for the delay in the initial consultation is the surge of aid agencies - and the fact that the authorities cannot provide sufficient places in the auxiliary facilities.

en: Many refugees therefore stay longer than the regular three months.
de: Viele Flüchtlinge bleiben daher länger als die regulären drei Monate.
translated_de: Many refugees remain therefore longer than the regular three months.

en: Housing prices have posted their strongest winter gain in seven years, according to a widely-watched gauge.
de: Die Hauspreise haben den stärksten Winteranstieg in sieben Jahre erlebt, zeigt ein weithin beobachteter Index.
translated_de: The house prices have experienced the strongest winter rise in seven years, a large index of adolescents.

en: The RP Data CoreLogic Hedonic home value index of Australian capital city dwelling prices rose by 1.1 per cent in August, RP data said on Monday.
de: Der RP Data CoreLogic Hedonic Home Value Index für Eigenheime in der australischen Hauptstadt stieg im August um 1,1 Prozent, so die RP-Daten vom Montag.
translated_de: The CoreLogic Hedonic Home Value Index for Home in the Austrian capital increased in August to 1,1 percent, and the RP-Daten from Montag.

en: The rise brought the total gain over the June, July and August to 4.2 per cent, the biggest rise over the winter months since 2007.
de: Durch diesen Anstieg liegt die Gesamterhöhung im Juni, Juli und August bei 4,2 Prozent, der größten Erhöhung in den Wintermonaten seit 2007.
translated_de: This increase is the total increase in the winter months between June, July and August, with 4%, the highest increase in the winter months since 2007.

en: Annual growth in prices came in at 10.9 per cent, more than double the gain of the 12 months to August 2013, but the gains were not evenly spread across the country.
de: Der jährliche Preisanstieg lag bei 10,9 Prozent, mehr als doppelt so hoch wie der Anstieg in den 12 Monaten bis August 2013, aber die Erhöhungen waren nicht gleichmäßig über das Land verteilt.
translated_de: The annual price increase is at 10,9 %, more than twice as high as the price increase in the 12 months to August 2013, but the increase was not equally distributed across the country.

en: RP Data research director Tim Lawless said Sydney and Melbourne are driving a two tier market.
de: Der Forschungsleiter von RP Data, Tim Lawless, teilte mit, dass Sydney und Melbourne einen zweigeteilten Markt antreiben.
translated_de: The research leader of RP Data, Tim Lawless, said that Sydney and Melbourne are a two-way market.

en: The RP Data figures show Sydney home prices rose by 16.1 per cent in the past year, while Melbourne's were up by 11.7 per cent.
de: Die Zahlen von RP Data belegen, dass die Hauspreise in Sydney im vergangenen Jahr um 16,1 Prozent anstiegen, in Melbourne dagegen um 11,7 Prozent.
translated_de: The figures from the RP data indicate that the house prices in Sydney increased by 16,1 percent last year, while Melbourne was a mere 11,7 percent.

en: The next strongest markets were Adelaide, Brisbane and Darwin, with price rises averaging between five and six per cent.
de: Die folgenden Märkte sind Adelaide, Brisbane und Darwin, in denen die Preise durchschnittlich um fünf und sechs Prozent anstiegen.
translated_de: The following markets are Adelaide, Brisbane and Darwin, where prices have risen by 5% and 6%.

en: At the other end of the scale was Canberra, hit by government spending cutbacks, where prices rose by only 1.4 per cent through the year.
de: Am anderen Ende der Skala liegt Canberra, das von den Einschnitten bei staatlichen Ausgaben hart getroffen wurde und wo die Preise über das Jahr lediglich um 1,4 Prozent anstiegen.
translated_de: At the other end of the Skala, Canberra was a country which had been harted down by the cuts to government expenditures and which was a major increase in prices over the year.

en: Mr Lawless said that now spring has begun there would be a rise in listings of properties for sale over the coming few months, which would be a "real test" for the market.
de: Herr Lawless sagte weiter, dass mit dem Frühlingsanfang nun für die nächsten Monate ein Anstieg bei den zum Verkauf stehenden Immobilien zu beobachten sein würde, der den Markt "einem echten Test" unterziehen würde.
translated_de: Mr Lawless said, in the meantime, that with the spring start, for the next few months, a rise in the sales of existing properties would be a sign of a "renewable test" on the market.

en: "Considering the ongoing high rate of auction clearance rates, a generally rapid rate of sale and the ongoing low interest rate environment, it's likely that dwelling values will rise even further over the next three months," he said.
de: "Wenn man die andauernd hohe Rate der Auktionspreise betrachtet, eine generell schnelle Verkaufsrate und die andauernd niedrige Zinsumgebung, ist es wahrscheinlich, dass die Eigenheimpreise in den nächsten drei Monaten noch weiter steigen werden," meinte er.
translated_de: "If the high rate of the price of the goods is considered, a general rate of sales and a rate of interest, it is likely that the price of the property in the next three months will continue to rise," he said.

en: In an announcement to the regional German newspaper 'die Neue Presse' Pötzl contradicted the comments of managing director, Peer Medau, and said that the latter was behaving like a "military general."
de: In einer Stellungnahme an die Neue Presse widerspricht er Aussagen des Geschäftsführers Peer Medau und attestiert diesem, "wie ein Feldherr" zu posieren.
translated_de: In a report on the new press, the CEO of the business, Peer Medau, said that he would like to put a field in the way of the matter.

en: This was not the style of the college, he said.
de: Der Stil der Hochschule sei dies nicht, heißt es in der Mitteilung.
translated_de: The style of the high school is not the same, so it is in the communication.

en: He said that the Medau family "were informed about the plans of the college in the middle of June.
de: So sei die Familie Medau bereits "Mitte Juni mündlich über das Ansinnen der Hochschule informiert worden.
translated_de: The family Medau has already been informed "within June of the year of the university' s teaching.

en: They are simply wrong to say that they only learned of the plans in July".
de: Die Aussage, dass die Pläne erst im Juli bekannt wurden, sind definitiv falsch", so Pötzl.
translated_de: The statement that the plans were first known in July is definitively false, so Pötzl.

en: At the same time he also said that the plans were not about "final decisions already made," but rather about "stating preferences".
de: Gleichzeitig verweist er darauf, dass es sich bei den Plänen nicht um "Vorfestlegungen oder gar Entscheidungen" handelt, es allerdings "Präferenzen" gäbe.
translated_de: Similarly, it is important that, in the plans, it does not involve "convictions or gar decisions" but rather a "privilege".

en: He also said that the building work to widen the narrow access road up to the castle would not be as radical as the Medaus feared.
de: Auch der für die Zufahrt notwendige Ausbau der schmalen Straße hinauf zum Schloss sei weniger dramatisch als von den Medaus befürchtet.
translated_de: The need for the transport to be redeveloped the sands in the castle is less dramatic than the Medaus.

en: It was not - and will not be - a matter of a nine metre-wide road.
de: Von einer neun Meter breiten Straße war und ist nicht die Rede.
translated_de: The new meter wide Straits were not the red.

en: We currently aim to widen it by 5.5 metres, which is one metre wider than before,"explained Pötzl.
de: Es geht nach derzeitigen Stand um 5,50 Meter, das ist ein Meter breiter als bisher", erklärt Pötzl.
translated_de: It is now at a distance of 5,50 meters, which is more than ever", apologies Pötzl.

en: Pötzl refutes the argument of the Medau concern, namely that its cost-free parking places which belong to the school, will in future only be available for use by the college students.
de: Das Argument der Medau-Betreiber, dass ihre kostenfreien und schuleigenen Parkflächen in Zukunft dann nur noch von Studenten der Hochschule genutzt werden, will Pötzl nicht gelten lassen.
translated_de: The argument of the Medau Treaty that their free and school-owned parks will be used only by students of the university in future will not apply to Pötzl.

en: It won't be a case of everywhere being parked up, because we have time to find intelligent solutions, as has been the case with other car parks, too.
de: Zugeparkt wird überhaupt nicht, weil sich das wie bei anderen öffentlichen Parkplätzen mittlerweile intelligent lösen lässt.
translated_de: It is not a problem because it is now intelligently solved as in other public parks.

en: Think of the neighbours
de: An die Anwohner denken
translated_de: The residents are concerned

en: The children's nursery Bergwichtel, which is situated on the space in question, and in front of the front door of which the access road to the parking level will run, is "not to be impacted" according to the college president.
de: Die Kinderkrippe Bergwichtel, die sich auf dem Gelände befindet und vor deren Haustür die Zufahrt zum Parkdeck entlang führen würde, soll laut dem Hochschulpräsidenten "nicht beeinträchtigt werden".
translated_de: The children' s playground, which is located on the ground and which would lead to the entrance to the park, should be "nothing to be reintroduced" by the high school presidents.

en: He is far more concerned to point out "that it's not only an issue concerning the children's nursery, rather it is about the people who live by the entrance to Friedrich-Streib-Strasse and the 800 schoolchildren of the adjacent secondary school.
de: Vielmehr gibt er zu bedenken, "dass es hier nicht nur um die Kinderkrippe geht, sondern auch um die Anwohner an der Einmündung zur Friedrich-Streib-Straße und die 800 Schüler der benachbarten Realschule.
translated_de: There is also a need to think that this is not just a child crime, but also a crime against the people who are in the midst of the eviction of the Friedrich-Streib-Streid and 800 students of the benachbarten real school.

en: It's therefore about a lot more than the individual interests of the Medau gentlemen," he said.
de: Es geht also um viel mehr als um Partikularinteressen der Herren Medau", so Pötzl.
translated_de: It is also more than a political interessence of the men Medau, so Pötzl.

en: Whether the criticism by the parents' association for the children's nursery is correct that the extension of the road will lead to "one of the few remaining natural spaces in Coburg being lost," he said the "readers can decide for themselves."
de: Ob die Kritik des Elternbeirats der Kinderkrippe, mit dem Ausbau der Straße würde einer "der wenigen naturbelassenen Flecken Coburgs verloren gehen" berechtigt sei, "kann der Leser selbst entscheiden".
translated_de: The criticism of the parents' children' s crime, which would have been a "little naturbelassene Flecken Coburg" would be justified, "can the Leser decide itself".

en: At the beginning of October, Pötzl, together with the Bamberg regional building authority, plans to present his plans of development of the college up to 2020 "and to talk about the importance of the extension work in this context."
de: Anfang Oktober will Pötzl zusammen mit dem Staatlichen Bauamt Bamberg die Stadträte über die bauliche Entwicklung der Hochschule bis 2020 informieren "und in diesem Zusammenhang die Bedeutung der neuen Erschließung ansprechen".
translated_de: In October, Pötzl will inform the Council of the City Council on the construction of the High School until 2020, together with the State Building Office, on the importance of the new resolution.

en: Peer Medau informed the parents of the children's nursery about the plans, last week.
de: Peer Medau hatte vergangene Woche die Eltern der Kinderkrippe über die Pläne der Hochschule informiert.
translated_de: Peer Medau has informed the parents of child abuse last week about the plans of the High School.

en: Accordingly, the access for the new parking level will not now lead, as before, via the campus and Friedrich-Streib-Strasse, but rather via the Medau-Berg.
de: Demnach soll die Zufahrt für das neue Parkdeck nicht wie bisher über den Campus und die Friedrich-Streib-Straße, sondern über den Medau-Berg führen.
translated_de: The transport for the new park should not be as far as the campus and the Friedrich-Streib-Streid, but rather as the Medau-Berg.

en: Thus, the narrow road must be widened into two lanes over a stretch of about one kilometre.
de: Damit müsste die schmale Straße auf etwa einem Kilometer Länge zweispurig ausgebaut werden.
translated_de: This would require a two-metre long sandbox.

en: According to higher estimates of the Medaus, the traffic in the Hohenfels castle park would increase ten-fold.
de: Laut Hochrechnungen der Medaus würde sich der Verkehr im Park von Schloss Hohenfels damit verzehnfachen.
translated_de: According to the Medaus calculations, the return in the Park of Schloss Hohenfels would be ten times more complicated.

en: They are talking of 2000 vehicles every day.
de: Von etwa 2000 Fahrzeugen täglich ist die Rede.
translated_de: The redearing is about 2000 vehicles daily.

en: Meanwhile, the town council refused to comment.
de: Von Seiten der Stadt wollte man sich bisher nicht zu dem Vorhaben äußern.
translated_de: The city' s side would not have been able to reach the point of view of the project.

en: Glandorf retires from German National Handball team
de: Glandorf tritt aus Handball-Nationalmannschaft zurück
translated_de: Glandorf re-engages in the Nationalmannschaft of Handball

en: Holger Glandorf will no longer play for the German National team.
de: Holger Glandorf wird nicht mehr für das DHB-Team spielen.
translated_de: Holger Glandorf will not play more for the DHB team.

en: The 31 year-old from German Bundesliga side SG Flensburg-Handewitt said that it was mainly for health reasons that he had reached this decision.
de: Der 31-Jährige vom Bundesligisten SG Flensburg-Handewitt führte für diese Entscheidung vor allem gesundheitliche Probleme an.
translated_de: The 31-year-old SG Flensburg-Handewitt, the Bundesminister, has led to health problems for this decision.

en: "It was not an easy decision to make, but I've been thinking about it for months.
de: Die Entscheidung ist mir nicht leicht gefallen, sie ist über mehrere Monate gereift.
translated_de: I do not feel that the decision is a good one, it has been re-evaluated for several months.

en: The time has come to listen to the signals my body sends and to end my national team career," announced the 2007 World Cup winner on his Facebook-Page.
de: Es ist für mich Zeit, auf die Signale meines Körpers zu hören und meine Karriere in der Nationalmannschaft zu beenden", teilte der Weltmeister von 2007 auf seiner Facebook-Seite mit.
translated_de: I am now able to listen to the signals I have received and my career in national leadership, which are part of the worldmeister' s Facebook page from 2007.

en: He retires from international competition with a record of 167 national games and 576 goals for Germany.
de: Er geht somit mit einer Bilanz von 167 Länderspielen und 576 Toren für Deutschland in den internationalen Ruhestand.
translated_de: This is a result of a Bilanz of 167 countries and 576 Toren for Germany in the international peace.

en: The powerful-throwing right-back wants to continue for the next few years to shoot goals for the Champions-League winners from Flensburg, and will therefore not be available for selection by new German National team head coach, Dagur Sigurdsson.
de: Weil der wurfgewaltige Rückraumspieler für den Champions-League-Sieger aus Flensburg noch einige Jahre auf Torejagd gehen will, steht er nun dem neuen Bundestrainer Dagur Sigurdsson nicht mehr zur Verfügung.
translated_de: We will be able to wait a few years for the re-election of the Champions League in Flensburg, but now the new Bundestrainer Dagur Sigurdsson is not available.

en: Glandorf said he had had a "nice long talk" with the Icelander, who will select his squad on Tuesday for the games against Switzerland.
de: Mit dem Isländer, der am Dienstag seinen Kader für die Länderspiele gegen die Schweiz bekanntgibt, führte Glandorf ein "langes und gutes Gespräch.
translated_de: The Island, which has been known for its contribution to the country games against Switzerland on Tuesday, has led to a "long and good dialogue" with Glandorf.

en: His ideas and approach to the game have always inspired me, as I am sure they will also inspire my long-term teammates and my successors, too.
de: Seine Ideen und Ansätze haben mich genauso begeistert, wie sie auch meine langjährigen Mitspieler und meine Nachfolger begeistern werden.
translated_de: I have been a fan of ideas and ideas as well as my long-time co-workers and my fellow followers.

en: "I would like to represent my club in the next few years and I need longer breaks and more recovery time to do so, and the double burden of also playing for the national team wouldn`t allow me to do that."
de: Aber für meinen Club möchte ich auch in den nächsten Jahren gesund zur Verfügung stehen, dafür sind längere Regenerationspausen nötig, die die aktuelle Doppelbelastung nicht zulässt.
translated_de: But for my Club, I would also like to be able to provide a healthy life in the next few years, because longer periods of recovery are needed, which are not able to justify the actual double-lasting.

en: The left-hander feared his career might end in 2012 when he had a heel infection.
de: Der Linkshänder hatte 2012 nach einer Ferseninfektion gar sein Karriereende befürchten müssen.
translated_de: The link-up has been a major issue for 2012 after a fracking campaign.

en: Due to achilles tendon problems he was given a cortisone injection by doctors working with the German Handball Association, and this caused severe swelling of his foot.
de: Wegen Achillessehnenproblemen hatte er sich von Teamärzten des Deutschen Handballbundes (DHB) mit einer Cortisonspritze behandeln lassen, die später eine starke Entzündung ausgelöst hatte.
translated_de: Wegen Achillessehnen problems have been dealt with by the team of the German Handballbundes (DHB) with a cortison injection which later had a strong entzündung.

en: He needed an emergency operation and two further surgeries as well.
de: Eine Notoperation und zwei weitere Eingriffe folgten.
translated_de: Two other actions are followed.

en: Glandorf then brought a legal action against the team doctor; however, this ended in a settlement.
de: Dann hatte Glandorf eine Klage gegen den Mannschaftsarzt angekündigt, die Auseinandersetzung endete mit einem Vergleich.
translated_de: Then, Glandorf had a kniffe against the team doctor, which ended up in a comparison.

en: Twelve years as a professional and eleven years with the national team would take their toll on any player.
de: Zwölf Jahre Profi- und elf Jahre Nationalmannschaftskarriere gehen an keinem Körper spurlos vorbei.
translated_de: Twenty-five years of professional andelf-year nationalmannschaftskarriere are not going to take a breath.

en: "I have some health issues I can't ignore anymore.
de: Ich habe einige gesundheitliche Baustellen, die ich nicht mehr ignorieren kann.
translated_de: I have some health-related structures which I cannot ignore.

en: After three foot-surgeries within a short period of time in 2012, caused by infections, I have never been able to control my blood pressure.
de: Nach den drei infektionsbedingten Fußoperationen, die 2012 in kurzen Abständen erfolgten, habe ich meinen Blutdruck nie richtig in den Griff gekriegt.
translated_de: After the three infections caused footoperations which took place in short time in 2012, I have never been able to get the blood pressure right in the Griff.

en: I've also got some other minor issues related - wear and tear.
de: Hierzu kommen einige andere verschleißbedingte Beschwerden.
translated_de: There are also other complaints which are caused by a slur.

en: At the beginning of the year I realized that I was able to control my head, but I couldn`t play tricks with my body," he explained in an interview with German magazine Handball Time.
de: Schon am Anfang des Jahres habe ich gemerkt, dass ich zwar meinen Kopf steuern, aber meinen Körper nicht täuschen kann", erklärte Glandorf im Interview dem Magazin "Handball Time".
translated_de: I have already noticed at the beginning of the year that I have a head, but my body cannot be taed up," said Glandorf in interview with the magazine "Handball Time".

en: He would only consider a comeback if really necessary.
de: Für ein Comeback würde er nur im absoluten Notfall bereitstehen.
translated_de: It would be impossible to make a comeback without a doubt.

en: "If we are in real big trouble, then I might consider it," the two-time father told the magazine.
de: "Wenn alle Stricke reißen, bin ich immer gesprächsbereit", erklärte der zweifache Familienvater dem Fachmagazin.
translated_de: "I am always talking about all the stricken people," said the two-time family member in the Fachmagazin.

en: "But I can count the years I will continue to play handball with one hand.
de: Allerdings kann ich die Jahre, in denen ich noch Handball spielen kann, an einer Hand abzählen.
translated_de: I can however count on the years in which I can play handball.

en: And I have to admit that I have become really humble after my long stay in the hospital in 2012, when it comes to my health.
de: Ich muss auch sagen, dass ich nach meinem langen Krankenhausaufenthalt 2012 auch ziemlich demütig geworden bin, was meine Gesundheit betrifft.
translated_de: I must also say that I have been quite depressed after my long hospital stay in 2012, when my health is affected.

en: After my career I would like to walk straight, to be honest."
de: Nach meiner Karriere möchte ich zumindest einigermaßen gerade gehen können.
translated_de: I would, at least, like to take a look at some of the things I have done.

en: Besides the 2007 World Championship he also won the Champions League in May and the EHF-Cup in 2008 (HSG Nordhorn) and 2010 (TBV Lemgo).
de: Neben dem WM-Titel 2007 und dem Gewinn der Champions League 2014 holte er 2008 (HSG Nordhorn) und 2010 (TBV Lemgo) den EHF-Pokal.
translated_de: The EHF-Pokal is a combination of the WM-Titel 2007 and the 2014 Champions League winners 2008 (HSG Nordhorn) and 2010 (TBV Lemgo).

en: He also won the Cup Winners Cup with Flensburg in 2012.
de: 2012 sicherte er sich zudem mit Flensburg den Europapokal der Pokalsieger.
translated_de: 2012 is certainly the case with Flensburg in the Europe of the Pokalsieger.

en: German economy as shrunk by 0.2 percent in spring
de: Deutsche Wirtschaft im Frühjahr um 0,2 Prozent geschrumpft
translated_de: The German economy was sluggish at a rate of 0 % in the spring

en: The crises around the globe have put a curb on the German economy in the the second quarter.
de: Die Krisen rund um den Globus haben die deutsche Wirtschaft im zweiten Quartal gebremst.
translated_de: The crisis around the Globus has bred the German economy in the second quarter.

en: The Gross Domestic Product sank from April to the end of June 2014 by 0.2 percent in comparison with the previous quarter.
de: Das Bruttoinlandsprodukt sank von April bis Ende Juni 2014 im Vergleich zum Vorquartal um 0,2 Prozent.
translated_de: The bruteinland product has sank from April to June 2014, in comparison to the previous quarter, at 0,2 %.

en: This was announced by the German Office for National Statistics, which thereby confirmed previous estimates.
de: Das teilte das Statistische Bundesamt mit und bestätigte damit vorläufige Berechnungen.
translated_de: The statistics of the Federal Government are part of the report and confirm it.

en: Consumption alone was a spur to the economy in the early part of the year, whilst investments were down.
de: Allein der Konsum belebte die Wirtschaft im Frühjahr, während die Investitionen zurückgingen.
translated_de: All the slums have dominated the economy in spring, while the investment has re-established.

en: Foreign goods trade had slowed, too.
de: Auch der Außenhandel bremste die Konjunktur.
translated_de: The external trade also breaks the conjuncture.

en: Due to the strong start to the year, figures for first half-year GDP were up 0.8 percent from the second quarter of 2013.
de: Dank des starken Jahresauftakts ergibt sich für das erste Halbjahr insgesamt ein BIP-Plus von 0,8 Prozent gegenüber der zweiten Jahreshälfte 2013.
translated_de: The strong annual budget for the first half of 2013 has a BIP-Plus of 0,8 % comparativement to the second quarter.

en: Horstmar was the starting point and the destination of "Münsterland-Mooiste", which lead through the city on Sunday.
de: Horstmar war der Startpunkt und das Ziel der "Münsterland-Mooiste", die am Sonntag erstmals durch die Burgmannsstadt führte.
translated_de: Horstmar was the start point and the objective of the "Münsty-Mooiste" which was first introduced by the Burgmannsstadt on Sunday.

en: The city of Horstmar experienced an invasion of Dutch "Fietzen riders" on Sunday.
de: Die Burgmannstadt Horstmar erlebte am Sonntag eine Invasion niederländischer "Fietzenfahrer".
translated_de: The Burgmannstadt Horstmar was a Dutch "Fietzer" on Sunday.

en: The largest cycling federation in Holland, NTFU, staged the so-called "Münsterlande-Mooiste".
de: Der größte Radsportverband der Niederlande, NTFU, veranstaltete die sogenannte "Münsterlande-Mooiste".
translated_de: The largest Radsport association in the Netherlands, NTFU, has organised the so-called "Münsterlande-Mooiste".

en: In other words, the largest bike ride straight through Münsterland, a bike rider's paradise close to Holland.
de: Dabei handet es sich um die größte Radtour quer durchs Münsterland, das Radfahrerparadies nahe der Niederlande.
translated_de: It is the most cyclone route in the country of Münster, the most cyclone-friendly country near the Netherlands.

en: By registering, more than 1000 participants thanked Jos ter Huerne for having organized this tour through Münsterland.
de: Über 1000 Teilnehmer bedankten sich mit ihrer Anmeldung bei Jos ter Huerne für die Organisation dieser Rundfahrt durch das Münsterland.
translated_de: Over 1000 participants are registered with Jos ter Huerne for the organisation of this round trip through the Münsterland.

en: The tour was advertised in several professional journals, and offered to those interested.
de: Ausgeschrieben in verschiedenen Fachzeitschriften wurde diese Tour Interessierten angeboten.
translated_de: This tour was offered in various journals.

en: We are from Den Helder, and drove here over night so we could take part in the tour.
de: Wir kommen aus Den Helder und sind über Nacht gefahren, um an dieser Rundfahrt teilzunehmen.
translated_de: We are going to be able to take part in the round trip after the last night.

en: We would also like to get know Münsterland a bit better in the same way", the cyclists eagerly said, looking forward to the route through Steinfurt, Borken and Coesfeld.
de: Wir möchten das Münsterland auch auf diese Art einmal näher kennen lernen", freuten sich die Radfahrer über die Route durch die Kreise Steinfurt, Borken und Coesfeld.
translated_de: We want to know the Münsterland once again about this art", he said, and the Radlers are delighted to be able to take the route through the circle of Steinfurt, Borken and Coesfeld.

en: After registering at the fraternity's club house, Sta.
de: Nach der Anmeldung im Vereinsheim der Schützenbruderschaft Sta.
translated_de: The registration is made at the club home of the Schützenbruderschaft Sta.

en: Katharina started off with a small "peace ride" through the city and over the embankment, which is also where the start line was.
de: Katharina ging es auf eine kleine "Friedensfahrt" durch die Stadt über den Wall, wo auch der Start erfolgte.
translated_de: Katharina went on a small "fried-out" by the city over the wall where the start was also carried out.

en: Then, the route, which was advertised in three different categories, headed in the direction of Herrenholz via Schöppinger Berg towards Coesfeld, passing by Havixbeck and Billerbeck, and then back to Horstmar.
de: Weiter führte die Route, die für drei verschiedene Kategorien ausgeschrieben war, in Richtung Herrenholz über den Schöppinger Berg in Richtung Coesfeld und über Havixbeck und Billerbeck zurück nach Horstmar.
translated_de: The route which was written for three different categories was then re-routed to Horstmar in direction of Herrenholz, the Schöppinger Berg, the Coesfeld and the Havixbeck and Billerbeck.

en: The riders prove just how good a shape they are in: stretches of 95 kilometers at an altitude of 1175 meters, 120 kilometers with an altitude of 1475 meters, and 145 kilometers with an altitude of 1775 meters.
de: Auf Strecken von 95 Kilometern mit 1175 Höhenmetern, 120 Kilometer mit 1475 Höhenmetern und 145 Kilometer mit 1775 Höhenmetern bewiesen die Radfahrer ihre gute Kondition.
translated_de: On the route of 95 km with 1175 meters, 120 km with 1475 meters and 145 km with 1775 meters, Radfahrer showed their good endurance.

en: They were fed and watered on their way back in Havixbeck and Billerbeck.
de: Verpflegt wurden sie unterwegs in Havixbeck und Billerbeck.
translated_de: They were spotted in Havixbeck and Billerbeck.

en: Chief organizer, Jos ter Huerne, and deputy mayor, Heinz Lölfing seemed to be very pleased with the success of this cycling event.
de: Hauptorganisator Jos ter Huerne und Bürgermeisterstellvertreter Heinz Lölfing zeigten sich über das Gelingen dieses Radsport-Events sehr erfreut.
translated_de: The principal organisator, Jos ter Huerne, and the Mayor' stellar, Heinz Lölfing, have been very impressed with the success of this Radsport event.

en: We are happy, and it was a wonderful experience for all participants.
de: Wir sind zufrieden und es war ein schönes Erlebnis für alle Beteiligten.
translated_de: We are satisfied and it was a beautiful experience for all Beteiligten.

en: The organization went smoothly, with no issues, and there were no nasty incidents", Heinz Lölfing positively concluded with regard to the event.
de: Die Organisation verlief ohne Probleme und es gab keine negativen Vorfälle", zieht Heinz Lölfing ein positives Fazit dieser Veranstaltung.
translated_de: The Organisation is a very good one and it has no negative events", heinz Lölfing says.

en: Unfortunately, there were not as many participants as the organizer had hoped for, which is presumably because of the bad weather forecast and the morning rain.
de: Leider kamen nicht so viele Teilnehmer, wie der Veranstalter sich erhofft hatte,was vermutlich an den schlechten Wetterprognosen und am morgendlichen Regen lag.
translated_de: Unfortunately, not so many participants, as the Organiser had hoped, were likely to have been able to see the bad weather forecasts and the morgens of rain.

en: "We shall see each other in 2015, hopefully with nice weather, on either 30 August, or on another weekend", the riders promised, but whatever the weather, they will return to Münsterland, and the organizers will plan a repeat.
de: "Wir sehen uns im Jahre 2015 wieder bei hoffentlich schönen Wetter am 30. August oder während eines anderen Wochenendes", versprachen die Radfahrer aber trotzdem wieder ins Münsterland zurückzukommen und die Veranstalter planen einen Neuauflage.
translated_de: "We see ourselves again in 2015, at the same time as the weather is expected to be on 30 August or during another weekend," the Radfahrers have resigned but are still in Münster and the Veranstalter plans to re-enter the scene.

en: Konstantin Wecker - scrupulously honest memoirs
de: Konstantin Weckers schonungslos ehrliche Memoiren
translated_de: Constantin Weckers has a sour humour

en: The 287-page "Monk and Warrior" by Konstantin Wecker, song writer, pacifist, political activist and ex-prisoner, is really more a statement of philosophy than it is a biography
de: Es ist eigentlich mehr philosophisches Zeugnis als Biografie, was Konstantin Wecker, Liedermacher, Pazifist, politsicher Aktivist, Ex-Häftling, in "Mönch und Krieger" auf 287 Seiten zu Papier gebracht hat.
translated_de: It is more philosophical than a biographie, which has been adapted by Constantin Wecker, Liedermacher, Pazifist, politically active, ex-Häftling, in "Mönch and Krieger" on 287 pages.

en: Composed more as a collection of thought-provoking ideas rather than a chronological history, the author, who was born in Munich on 1 June 1947, has provided every chapter with an accompanying suitable song-text.
de: Nicht chronologisch, sondern mehr Gedankenfetzen für Gedankenfetzen hat der am 1. Juni 1947 geborene Münchner seine Memoiren niedergeschrieben, jedes Kapitel eingeleitet durch einen passenden Liedtext.
translated_de: It is not chronological, but more ideas for ideas have been written by the Mother of Münchner, on 1 June 1947, in which he wrote his Memories, each chapter being adapted by a suitable text.

en: And he has been unstintingly honest throughout: From masturbating as a grammar school pupil to shoplifting and drug-taking, he has left none of his human weaknesses untold.
de: Und er ist dabei schonungslos ehrlich: Von der Onanie als Gymnasiast bis zum Ladendiebstahl und Drogenkonsum lässt er keine menschliche Schwäche aus.
translated_de: And it is a very honest thing: from gymnastics to a symbiosis, it is not human shackling.

en: And this was also a means to explain why he is now come to be so tolerant towards his fellow man.
de: Auch, um aufzuzeigen, wie er selbst Toleranz im Umgang mit seinen Mitmenschen gelernt hat.
translated_de: And to show how he has learned to tolerate his own behaviour in dealing with his fellow men.

en: As a result, abstract concepts, which he liberally uses throughout the text, take on a clearer, more important meaning: Love; Soul; Ego; Existing in the Here and Now; Spirituality - he seeks to understand the essential meaning of these concepts, in a highly philosophical, but also very personal way.
de: Breiten Raum nehmen auch abstrakte, aber umso wichtigere Begriffe ein: Liebe, Seele, Ego, das Sein im Jetzt, Spiritualität - all dem versucht er auf den Grund zu gehen, auf sehr philosophische, aber auch sehr persönliche Weise.
translated_de: The wide area is also a matter of scope, but it is also a matter of importance to say: love, soul, ego, the soul in the moment, spirituality - all the things which are trying to take place in the foundation, in very philosophical, but also very personal way.

en: And he explains why he is pacifist; what lies behind his criticism of society; his political heart and soul; and also how his thoughts and ideas have been shaped and moulded - not only by music (he was an opera lover who became a soul and rock musician) but by his prison experience, too.
de: Und er erläutert auch seinen Pazifismus, seine Gesellschaftskritik, sein politisches Engagement - und auch, wie ihn nicht nur die Musik geprägt hat (der Opernliebhaber wurde zum Soul- und Rockmusiker), sondern auch sein Gefängnisaufenthalt.
translated_de: And he also explained his pazifisme, his social critique, his political engagement - and also, as he has not only been influenced by music (the Opernliebhaber was a Soul and Rock music) but also his angst.

en: He says that the latter experience gave him a closer understanding of the life of the monks, who live their lives by a process of "subtraction" whereby they "rid themselves of all things superfluous."
de: Letzterer hat den Lebemann Konstantin Wecker auch dem asketischen Mönch nähergebracht, der "durch Subtraktion" entsteht, wie er sagt, "indem man alles Unnötige weglässt".
translated_de: The last one has also enacted the Lebemann Constantin Wecker' s questioning mönch, which is a "subtraction" which is, as he said, "in the event that it is impossible to do anything".

en: In-between all the highbrow stuff, there are also short anecdotes of a more earthy nature - for example, fist-fights in a bar frequented by GIs, or else a crazy drive on the motorway, in which he drove full-on straight into a tree.
de: Zwischen all den hochgeistigen Ansichten gibt es aber auch kurze Anekdoten zum Erden: etwa über Schlägereien in einem von GIs frequentierten Lokal oder eine wahnwitzige Autofahrt, bei der er frontal einen Baum anvisierte.
translated_de: There are also short observations on the ground, such as a scavenge in a frequented local area by GI or a wahnwitzee autoroute, where the frontal is a tree.

en: And he's unsparing also, as he describes that too.
de: Auch da ist er schonungslos ehrlich.
translated_de: It is also fair to say that it is too.

en: Lenny Henry: My father never hugged me.
de: Lenny Henry: Mein Vater hat mich nie in den Arm genommen.
translated_de: Lenny Henry: My father never took the arm.

en: Never said "I love you"
de: Hat nie gesagt "Ich liebe dich"
translated_de: I never said "I love you"

en: Henry was one of seven children born to Jamaican immigrants in Dudley in the Midlands in 1958.
de: Henry war eines von sieben Kindern einer Familie jamaikanischer Einwanderer in Dudley in den Midlands im Jahre 1958.
translated_de: Henry was a jamaican born in 1958 in Dudley, in the Midlands.

en: His father, who died when Henry was 19, worked in a factory and their relationship was limited.
de: Sein Vater, der starb, als Henry 19 war, arbeitete in einer Fabrik und ihr Verhältnis war begrenzt.
translated_de: Father, who was starving as Henry 19, worked in a factory and his relationship was limited.

en: Henry is rehearsing a comedy, Rudy's Rare Records, which is based in part on an imaginary conversation with his father and has grown out of the Radio 4 series.
de: Henry probt für eine Komödie, Rudy's Rare Records, die teilweise auf einem imaginären Gespräch mit seinem Vater beruht und aus der Serie auf Radio 4 entstand.
translated_de: Henry probt for a Commission, Rudy's Rare Records, which partly based on a dream conversation with his father and which is now on Radio 4.

en: The soundtrack is a mix of reggae and rap and the tunes are upbeat.
de: Der Soundtrack ist eine Mischung aus Reggae und Rap, mit lebhaften Melodien.
translated_de: The soundtrack is a mix of Reggae and Rap, with a few melodies.

en: But Henry has had to work through some difficult memories of childhood.
de: Aber Henry musste sich durch einige schwierige Kindheitsmomente arbeiten.
translated_de: But Henry had to work through some difficult Kindnessmomente.

en: There was "a lot" of therapy after his mother died and Henry is reflective about his relationship with his father.
de: Er besuchte "viele" Therapien nach dem Tod seiner Mutter, und Henry ist nachdenklich über seine Beziehung zu seinem Vater.
translated_de: He visited "multiple" therapies after his mother, and Henry is referring to his relationship with his father.

en: He was very unknowable.
de: Es war schwer, ihn zu kennen.
translated_de: It was hard to know him.

en: You never saw his face, you just heard his voice: 'Stop the noise.
de: Man sah nie sein Gesicht, hörte nur seine Stimme: "Hör mit dem Krach auf.
translated_de: He never heard his voice: "Horry on the Krach.

en: Leave your sister alone.
de: Lass deine Schwester in Ruhe.
translated_de: Let your sister relax.

en: Move!
de: Beweg dich!
translated_de: You are right!

en: I want to watch the cricket.
de: Ich will Cricket schauen.
translated_de: I will watch Cricket.

en: My older brothers Seymour and Hilton - who were grown-up when I was a kid - went to the pub with him and talked about things like the shape of the beer glass, the beauty of the stroke in cricket.
de: Meine älteren Brüder Seymour und Hilton - die schon erwachsen waren, als ich ein Kind war - gingen mit ihm in die Kneipe und sprachen über Dinge, wie die Form des Bierglases oder die Schönheit eines Cricketschlags.
translated_de: My older brother, Seymour and Hilton - who were already growing, as I was a Kind - went with him in the Kneipe and spoke about things like the form of beer or the beauty of a cricketschlag.

en: I never had a conversation with him like that.
de: Ich hatte nie ein solches Gespräch mit ihm.
translated_de: I never had a such conversation with him.

en: He was this unsmiling bloke in the corner, reading the paper for a lot of my life.
de: Einen Großteil meines Lebens war er dieser ernste Typ in der Ecke, der die Zeitung las.
translated_de: I am very much living in this type of a nutshell, which is the newspaper.

en: Recently Henry opened a foundry in Dudley and, although conditions were better than in his father's day, he got a snapshot of what life must have been like for him.
de: Kürzlich eröffnete Henry eine Gießerei in Dudley, und obwohl die Bedingungen besser sind als zu Zeiten seines Vaters, gewann er doch einen Einblick darin, wie das Leben für ihn gewesen sein mochte.
translated_de: Henry opened a restaurant in Dudley, and although the conditions are better than when his father was born, he gained a glimpse of how his life had been changed.

en: It's a bit brighter now but they're dark, smoky, Stygian labyrinthine depths with bursts of flame and smoke and lots of soot.
de: Es ist jetzt etwas heller, aber sie sind dunkel, verraucht, tiefe stygische Labyrinthe mit Flammenstößen und Rauch und viel Ruß.
translated_de: It is now a little heller, but they are dark, dark, dark, deep styrofoam with flammenstuffs and smoke and many ruffles.

en: My dad used to get in the bath and just lie there and you'd hear him slowly start to sing to himself because he would wash the foundry off him.
de: Mein Vater legte sich früher einfach in die Wanne und dann konnte man ihn langsam hören, wie er zu singen anfing, weil er die Gießerei von sich waschen konnte.
translated_de: My father sat in the Wanne and then he could slowly listen to him, as he was singing because he could wash the water.

en: When I walked round it, I realised that he had done that for years and years to put food on the table, and my estimation of him went up.
de: Als ich dort herumlief, wurde mir klar, dass er das jahrelang getan hatte, um das Essen auf den Tisch zu bringen, und meine Achtung vor ihm wurde größer.
translated_de: As I was in this position, I was clear that the years have passed to bring the essence to the table, and my respect for him has increased.

en: None the less, Henry emerged from a childhood stripped of parental affection.
de: Dennoch wuchs Henry als Kind ohne Liebesbezeugungen seiner Eltern auf.
translated_de: He is still a kind of child without love for his parents.

en: My dad never did hugging, never said, 'I love you'.
de: Mein Vater umarmte mich nie, er sagte nie "ich liebe dich".
translated_de: My father never said "I am dear to you".

en: It wasn't until my mum was poorly near the end of her life that we started saying 'I love you, I love you, I love you.
de: Erst als es meiner Mutter gegen Ende ihres Lebens schlecht ging, fingen wir an, "ich liebe dich, ich liebe dich, ich liebe dich" zu sagen.
translated_de: First, as my mother was unable to live up to their life, we said, "I love you, I love you, I love you" .

en: Having a daughter of his own, Billie, with Dawn French, enabled him to share the love he missed as a child.
de: Durch seine eigene Tochter Billie, mit Dawn French, konnte er die Liebe teilen, die er als Kind vermisst hatte.
translated_de: By his own daughter Billie, Dawn French, he had the love which he had been given as a Kind.

en: Could you stop with the "I love you"?
de: Könntest du mal mit dem "ich liebe dich" aufhören?
translated_de: What is the point of the question of "I love you"?

en: Just stop hugging me!
de: Hör doch auf, mich zu umarmen!
translated_de: But I am a little awry!

en: Dad, I'm 22!
de: Papa, ich bin 22!
translated_de: Papa, I am 22!

en: With Dawn French.
de: mit Dawn French.
translated_de: with Dawn French.

en: Why wouldn't I be friends with her?
de: Warum sollten wir nicht Freunde sein?
translated_de: Why should we not be friends?

en: She's a great mum
de: Sie ist eine großartige Mutter.
translated_de: You are a great mother.

en: He's still very good friends with French, to whom he was married for 25 years.
de: Es ist immer noch mit French befreundet, mit der er 25 Jahre verheiratet war.
translated_de: It is still a French heirate, with 25 years of marriage.

en: Dawn's a good person.
de: Dawn ist ein guter Mensch.
translated_de: Dawn is a good person.

en: Why wouldn't I be friends with Dawn?
de: Warum sollten wir nicht Freunde sein?
translated_de: Why should we not be friends?

en: She's a great mum.
de: Sie ist eine großartige Mutter.
translated_de: You are a great mother.

en: Henry's own mother was diabetic.
de: Henrys eigene Mutter war Diabetikerin.
translated_de: Henry' s own mother was a diabetic.

en: It was one of the things that killed her.
de: Das trug zu ihrem Tod bei.
translated_de: That is what they are doing.

en: So when I became very, very overweight and started getting diabetic symptoms, my doctor said, 'You've got to be radical.
de: Als ich also sehr, sehr übergewichtig wurde und Symptome von Diabetes zeigte, sagte mein Arzt "Sie müssen radikal sein.
translated_de: As I also felt very, very stressed and the symptoms of diabetes, my doctor said: "You must be radical.

en: So I went on a big fitness thing, and I also had to go on a drastic diet to reverse the symptoms.
de: Also zog ich dieses Fitnessding durch und musste auch eine drastische Diät machen, um die Symptome umzukehren.
translated_de: I also re-examined this exercise and had to make a drastic dialysis to stop the symptoms.

en: It's very hard.
de: Es ist sehr schwer.
translated_de: It is very difficult.

en: And it's tedious.
de: Und es ist anstrengend.
translated_de: And it is a great deal.

en: Nobody likes eating carrots.
de: Niemand isst gerne Karotten.
translated_de: Niemand is keen to be a karotten.

en: Henry's change in career trajectory is, perhaps, reflected in his distinguished, close-cropped beard.
de: Henrys Karrierewechsel zeigt sich vielleicht in seinem eleganten, kurzgeschnittenen Bart.
translated_de: Henry' s career change may be a result of his elegant, short-cut bart.

en: Since he won critical acclaim for his Othello, he has become engrossed in the theatre.
de: Seit er von den Kritikern für seinen Othello gelobt wurde, ist er vom Theater vereinnahmt.
translated_de: Since the criticism of his Othello was lobte, the theatre has been a part of it.

en: Comedy of Errors followed, as did Fences by August Wilson.
de: Es folgte Die Komödie der Irrungen, und dann Fences von August Wilson.
translated_de: It follows the Commission on the irritability and then the fences of August Wilson.

en: It's a different experience from the sitcoms and comedies that have upholstered his busy working life.
de: Das ist eine andere Erfahrung als die Sitcoms und Komödien, die sein geschäftiges Arbeitsleben ausgefüllt haben.
translated_de: This is another experience than the Sitcoms and the Comodies, which have filled their business life.

en: He started out when he was just 16 and working at a factory.
de: Er begann mit nur 16 Jahren, als er in einer Fabrik arbeitete.
translated_de: It began with only 16 years as a factory worker.

en: A DJ spotted him on stage doing impressions and wrote to New Faces about him.
de: Ein DJ entdeckte ihn auf der Bühne, als er Personen imitierte und schrieb an New Faces über ihn.
translated_de: A DJ discovered him on the stage as he was a person who he was a part of and wrote a new face.

en: His TV career was launched in the mid-Seventies: "For quite a long time I was the only black impressionist/comedian on telly."
de: Seine Fernsehkarriere begann Mitte der siebziger Jahre. "Ich war für eine ziemlich lange Zeit der einzige schwarze Imitator/Comedian im Fernsehen."
translated_de: The television industry began in the mid-2000s, referring to the fact that I was the only black Imitator/Comedian in the television industry for a long time.

en: He learnt on the job.
de: Er lernte im Beruf.
translated_de: It is a profession.

en: Not only did I have to grow up in the public eye, I had to learn how to be an efficient joke-delivering mechanism between 1975 and 1985, whilst being a star, being on television and it was really difficult.
de: Ich musste nicht nur vor den Augen der Öffentlichkeit groß werden, sondern auch von 1975 bis 1985 lernen, wie ich eine effiziente Witze-Erzähl-Maschine werden konnte, während ich durch das Fernsehen ein Star war, und das war wirklich schwierig.
translated_de: I must not only be able to see the public eye, but I must also learn from 1975 to 1985 how I could produce a powerful Wi-Fi machine during my television career, and it was really difficult.

en: Lenny on New Faces in 1975
de: Lenny 1975 bei New Faces
translated_de: Lenny 1975 in New Faces

en: Because his manager owned the stage rights to The Black and White Minstrel Show, a light entertainment programme in which people "blacked up," Henry found himself performing his comedy in it for five years.
de: Da sein Manager die Bühnenrecht an der Black and White Minstrel Show besaß, einem leichten Unterhaltungsprogramm, in dem sich die Leute "schwarz anmalten", führte Henry seine Comedy dort über fünf Jahre auf.
translated_de: The manager of the stage rights at the Black and White Minstrel Show said that a light entertainment programme which is "black anmalten" has led Henry to his comedy there for five years.

en: My family were very uncomfortable about it.
de: Meiner Familie war das sehr unangenehm.
translated_de: My family was very uneasy.

en: I sort of wish it had never happened, but I don't regret that I did it.
de: Ich wünschte irgendwie, dass es nie passiert wäre, aber ich bereue nicht, dass ich es getan habe.
translated_de: I think that it would never happen, but I do not regret that I have done it.

en: Although it was a weird, reprehensible position to be in, I was working in huge venues and learning how to work a crowd.
de: Es war eine sonderbare, unangenehme Position für mich, aber ich arbeitete an Riesenprojekten mit und lernte, wie man mit einem großen Publikum umgeht.
translated_de: It was a very difficult position for me, but I worked on Riesen projects and learned how to do it with a large audience.

en: But what was an "award-winning light entertainment staple of British television for years and years" was also a "grotesque parody of black people."
de: Aber diese "jahrelange preisgekrönte leichte Säule des britischen Fernsehens" war auch eine "groteske Parodie schwarzer Menschen."
translated_de: But this "year-long preis-priced saule of the British TV" was also a "grotesk parodie schwarzes person".

en: Introducing characters who both lampooned and celebrated black British culture, Henry worked on the alternative comedy circuit in the Eighties.
de: Durch die Einführung von Figuren, die die britische schwarze Kultur sowohl verspotteten wie feierten, arbeitete Henry in den Achtzigern an einem alternativen Comedykreis.
translated_de: By introducing figures which the British black culture is both a celebration of, Henry was a coma in the Achtzigern.

en: The first series of The Lenny Henry Show aired in 1984, and in the Nineties he was known as, among other things, chef Gareth Blacklock in the comedy series Chef!.
de: Die erste Reihe der Lenny Henry Show ging 1984 auf Sendung, und in den Neunzigern war er unter anderem als der Küchenchef Gareth Blacklock in der Comedyserie Chef! bekannt.
translated_de: The first series of Lenny Henry Show went on show in 1984 and in the Neunzigern was known as the chef-in-chief of the Comedyserie!

en: Advertisements, documentaries, TV series and parts in films consumed his next decade but after his 2008 BBC series, LennyHenry.tv, he thought: "What are you going to do next, Len, because it all feels a bit like you're marking time or you're slightly going sideways."
de: Werbung, Dokumentarfilme, TV-Serien und Filmrollen prägten sein nächstes Jahrzehnt, aber nach seiner BBC-Serie LennyHenry.tv 2008 dachte er sich: "Was machst du als Nächstes, Len, weil es sich alles so anfühlt, als bringst du nur die Zeit rum oder trittst ein wenig auf der Stelle."
translated_de: Advertising, documentaries, TV series and filmrolls are the next decade, but according to his BBC series LennyHenry.tv 2008, "Was machst you as a naive, a naive, because it is so much more affluent than brings only the time or takes a little time to the table."

en: What came next was a Radio 4 documentary series called What's So Great About...?
de: Danach kam eine Dokumentarserie für Radio 4 mit dem Titel What's So Great About ...?
translated_de: Then there was a documentary series for Radio 4 with the title What's So Great About ...?

en: The first was on Shakespeare.
de: Die erste Folge drehte sich um Shakespeare.
translated_de: The first result is Shakespeare.

en: I had a real allergy to Shakespeare.
de: Auf Shakespeare war ich regelrecht allergisch.
translated_de: I was rightly wrong on Shakespeare.

en: I wasn't really taught it at school properly and thought it was very much the reserve of middle-class white people with tights and a cabbage down the front.
de: Ich hatte in der Schule nie richtig etwas über ihn gelernt und hielt ihn überwiegend für eine Domäne der Mittelklasse, Weiße in Strumpfhosen und einem Kohlkopf vorne drin.
translated_de: I never learned anything about him in the school and he was a major figure in the middle class, a white in sand and a coalhead.

en: So I was very frightened of it.
de: Also hatte ich große Angst davor.
translated_de: I also had a great fear of this.

en: Everybody we interviewed on that show, Peter Hall, Trevor Nunn, Adrian Lester, Judi Dench, said, 'You should try it.
de: Alle, die wir für die Show interviewten, Peter Hall, Trevor Nunn, Adrian Lester, Judi Dench sagten "Du solltest es mal probieren.
translated_de: All the interviewers who were interviewed for the show say: Peter Hall, Trevor Nunn, Adrian Lester and Judi Dench: "Du has to be careful.

en: Don't slag it off if you don't know what you're talking about.

en: There was one moment where I thought, 'Oh, you've changed.""
de: Da gab es einen Moment, als ich dachte, "Oh, du hast dich verändert.""

translated_de: The stage leader has said that the idea is continuing, so soon as the problem is resolved.

en: I walked off the stage and something in me went, "Oh, thank God".
de: Ich ging von der Bühne und irgendetwas in mir sagte "Oh, Gott sei Dank".
translated_de: I went from the stage and some of those who said "Oh, Gott is thanks".

en: It's not my responsibility.

en: I'm just choosing not to do stand-up because that thing of getting instant gratification from a room full of strangers I guess is kind of dangerous.

en: If you're constantly seeking that it can lead to a brick wall.

translated_de: If you are always able to do so, you will be able to make a mistake.

en: I do Live at the Apollo sometimes when I want to, but generally it doesn't float my boat like it used to.

en: The joy of sitting in a room with a director who is helping to shape a beginning, middle and end of a journey - I don't think I'll ever want to give that up.
