en: Houthi rebels block roads in Yemeni capital
de: Huthi-Rebellen blockieren Straßen in Jemens Hauptstadt
translated_de: Huthi-Rebellen blockes roads in Jemen' s capital

en: In the conflict between the shiite Houthi rebels and the Yemen government, the Houthis have called for civil disobedience in the capital, Sanaa.
de: Im Konflikt zwischen schiitischen Huthi-Rebellen und der jemenitischen Regierung haben die Huthis zu zivilem Ungehorsam in der Hauptstadt Sanaa aufgerufen.
translated_de: The Huthis have been re-elected in the conflict between the Chinese Huthi-Rebells and the Chinese Government in the capital of Sanaa.

en: Houthi supporters had occupied central roads in Sanaa on Monday, said a spokesman of the Houthi party "Ansar Allah."
de: Huthi-Anhänger hätten am Montag zentrale Straßen in Sanaa besetzt, sagte ein Sprecher der Huthi-Partei "Ansar Allah".
translated_de: Huthi-Anhänger had been seated on the central street in Sanaa, said a Huthi-Partei spokeswoman "Ansar Allah".

en: Access to the parliament was blocked as well.
de: Auch die Zufahrt zum Parlament sei blockiert worden.
translated_de: The passage to Parliament was also blocked.

en: Yemeni media report that there is traffic chaos in the capital.
de: Jemenitische Medien berichten von einem Verkehrschaos in der Hauptstadt.
translated_de: The media is a monopoly in the capital.

en: According to a report in the on-line edition of the newspaper "Yemen Post" Houthi leader Abdulmalik al-Huthi called for these actions on Sunday evening.
de: Nach Angaben der Online-Ausgabe der Zeitung "Yemen Post" hatte Huthi-Führer Abdulmalik al-Huthi am Sonntagabend zu den Maßnahmen aufgerufen.
translated_de: The online publication of the newspaper "Yemen Post" cited the actions of Huthi leader Abdulmalik al-Huthi on Sunday evening.

en: The report said that Huthi threatened further escalation of the conflict, should his demands not be met.
de: Huthi drohte nach Angaben des Blattes mit einer weiteren Eskalation des Konflikts, sollten seine Forderungen nicht erfüllt werden.
translated_de: Huthi is facing further escalating conflict, if his intentions are not fulfilled.

en: The shiite Houthis are fighting for more independence fro the sunni-ruled Yemen, and are demanding that the government resign.
de: Die schiitischen Huthis kämpfen für mehr Unabhängigkeit vom sunnitisch regierten Jemen und fordern den Rücktritt der Regierung.
translated_de: The schiitic Huthis fight for more independence from sunnitians and demand the return of the government.

en: According to the report, Houthi tribes have been besieging the Yemeni capital for almost two weeks.
de: Der Volksstamm der Huthi belagert seit knapp zwei Wochen die jemenitische Hauptstadt.
translated_de: The Huthi population has been in the city for two weeks.

en: Around 30,000 rebels had set up protest camps on the major access routes to Sanaa.
de: Rund 30.000 Rebellen haben Protestlager an den großen Zufahrtswegen von Sanaa errichtet.
translated_de: Around 30.000 Rebellen have defended protests in the large flights of Sanaa.

en: In the surrounding areas of the town, bloody clashes with the Yemeni army have continued unabated.
de: Im Umland kommt es immer wieder zu blutigen Kämpfen mit der jemenitischen Armee.
translated_de: In the United Kingdom, there are always bluffing battles with the jemenitian army.

en: Kenya registers civil servants to target 'ghost workers'
de: Kenia registriert Beamte, um "Geisterangestellte" einzudämmen
translated_de: Kenia is registering officials to be a "secretary"

en: Kenya has started biometrically registering all civil servants in an attempt to remove "ghost workers" from the government's payroll.
de: Kenia hat damit begonnen, alle Staatsbeamten biometrisch zu registrieren, um "Geisterangestellte" aus den Gehaltslisten der Regierung zu löschen.
translated_de: Kenia has started to register all the state biometrists to re-register the "secretary" from the government' s haltslisten.

en: Employees who failed to register over the next two weeks would no longer be paid, a government statement said.
de: Mitarbeiter, die sich in den nächsten zwei Wochen nicht registrieren, würden nicht mehr bezahlt, lautete eine Regierungsmitteilung.
translated_de: Employees who are not registered in the next two weeks would not be paid more, a government commission.

en: The government suspects that thousands of people continue to receive salaries after leaving the civil service.
de: Die Regierung vermutet, dass Tausende Personen auch nach ihrem Abschied aus dem öffentlichen Dienst noch Gehaltszahlungen erhalten.
translated_de: The government believes that Tausende people will also receive a refund after their withdrawal from the public service.

en: President Uhuru Kenyatta pledged to curb corruption in the public service after taking office in 2013.
de: Präsident Uhuru Kenyatta versprach bei seinem Amtsantritt 2013, Korruption im öffentlichen Dienst zu bekämpfen.
translated_de: President Uhuru Kenyatta has spoken of corruption in public service during his resignation in 2013.

en: An audit earlier this year found that at least $1m (£700,000) a month was lost in payments to "ghost workers" and other financial malpractice.
de: Bei einer Prüfung zu Anfang diesen Jahres wurde festgestellt, dass mindestens 1 Million $ (700.000 £) pro Monat an Zahlungen für "Geisterangestellte" und durch andere missbräuchliche Finanzpraktiken verloren gingen.
translated_de: After a review of this year, a total of a million dollars (700.000 £) was lost in the month of the payments for "secretary funds" and other irregular financial practices.

en: The government suspects that salaries continue to be deposited into bank accounts, even after a person dies or leaves the public service, reports the BBC's Wanyama Chebusiri from the capital, Nairobi.
de: Die Regierung vermutet, dass Gehälter weiterhin auf Konten ausgezahlt werden, nachdem eine Person gestorben ist oder den öffentlichen Dienst verlässt, berichtet Wanyama Chebusiri für den BBC aus der Hauptstadt Nairobi.
translated_de: The Government believes that the government will continue to pay for the money, if a person is a victim or the public service, according to Wanyama Chebusiri, for BBC in Nairobi' s capital.

en: All public servants are required to present themselves over the next two weeks at identification centres to ensure their data is captured through the biometric registration exercise, a government statement said.
de: Alle Beamten müssen nun in den nächsten zwei Wochen bei Identifikationszentren erscheinen, um sicherzustellen, dass ihre Daten über die biometrischen Registrierungen aufgenommen werden, wurde in einer Regierungsnachricht mitgeteilt.
translated_de: All officials must now appear in the next two weeks in order to ensure that their data on biometric registrations will be taken into account by a government-sensit.

en: Anyone who failed to do so without a valid excuse would be eliminated from the payroll, it said.
de: Alle, die dies nicht ohne eine glaubhafte Entschuldigung täten würden von der Gehaltsliste gestrichen, lautete die Mitteilung weiter.
translated_de: All those who would not have been liable for any wrongdoing would be slammed by the Committee on the Environment, and the communication continued.

en: "This exercise will contribute significantly to the rationalization of the public service by determining the actual numbers of public servants and will also be used to cleanse the payroll at both levels of government- hence bring a stop to the issue of 'ghost workers'," said Anne Waiguru, the cabinet secretary in the Ministry of Devolution and Planning.
de: "Durch dieses Vorgehen wird wesentlich zur Rationalisierung des öffentlichen Dienstes beigetragen, indem die tatsächliche Anzahl der Beamten festgestellt wird und auch die Gehaltsliste auf beiden Regierungsebenen bereinigt wird - so werden die "Geisterangestellten" eliminiert," sagte Anne Waiguru, die Kabinettssekretärin im Ministerium für Dezentralisierung und Planung.
translated_de: "This is a fundamental step towards rationalisation of the public service, if the number of officials is determined and if the committee is re-evaluated, the "secretary" will be eliminated," said Anne Waiguru, the Kabinettssekretary in the Ministerium for Dezentralisation and Planning.

en: The scandal surrounding arts advisor, Helge Achenbach, will be heard for the first time in court on 11 November.
de: Der Skandal um den Kunstberater Helge Achenbach wird am 11. November erstmals vor Gericht verhandelt.
translated_de: The Skandal for the artist Helge Achenbach will be presented to the Court on 11 November.

en: Five heirs of Berthold Albrecht, the son of the founder of Aldi, Theo Albrecht, are suing Achenbach and two of his companies, who are in the process of declaring themselves bankrupt, for 19.4 million euros compensation in a civil case brought before the Düsseldorf district court.
de: Fünf Erben von Berthold Albrecht, Sohn des Aldi-Gründers Theo Albrecht, fordern in einem Zivilprozess am Düsseldorfer Landgericht 19,4 Millionen Euro Schadenersatz von Achenbach und zwei seiner Unternehmen, die sich in Insolvenzverfahren befinden.
translated_de: Five people, including Berthold Albrecht, the son of Aldi-Gründers Theo Albrecht, have demanded in a civil proceeding at the Düsseldorf Landgericht, a total of 194 million euros, from Achenbach and two of his companies, which are insolvency proceedings.

en: The news was announced by a court spokeswoman on Monday.
de: Das teilte eine Gerichtssprecherin am Montag mit.
translated_de: This is a hearing hearing on Montag.

en: According to the statement of claim, when purchasing the works of art and antique cars, Achenbach conned them, and invoiced Berthold Albrecht for more than the actual sales price.
de: In der Klageschrift heißt es, Achenbach habe beim Ankauf von Kunstwerken und Oldtimern betrogen und Berthold Albrecht höhere als tatsächlich gezahlte Kaufpreise berechnet.
translated_de: In the Klageschrift, Achenbach has calculated higher prices for the purchase of art works and oldtimers and Berthold Albrecht than the actual price.

en: In so doing, the agreed commission also turned out to be more.
de: Dadurch sei auch die vereinbarte Provision höher ausgefallen.
translated_de: This also means that the agreed provision is more likely to be applied.

en: Achenbach purchased valuables for Albrecht for 121 million euros.
de: Achenbach habe für 121 Millionen Euro Wertgegenstände für Albrecht angekauft.
translated_de: Achenbach has amounted to 121 million Euro worth of goods for Albrecht.

en: Children need roots and wings
de: Kinder brauchen Wurzeln und Flügel
translated_de: Children need root and fluke

en: He was a school teacher for 44 years, 23 of which he was the principal.
de: 44 Jahre war er im Schuldienst, davon 23 als Schulleiter.
translated_de: 44 years ago, he was employed in the school service, of which 23 were employed as a teacher.

en: During his teaching time, Manfred Richter got to know many schoolchildren who are now fully-grown adults living in Petershausen and Kollbach.
de: Aus dieser Zeit kennt Manfred Richter viele gestandene Petershausener und Kollbacher aus deren Zeit als Schüler.
translated_de: In this time, many Petershauseners and Kollbachers were a student.

en: His methods were sometimes unconventional, but they were always based on his desire to see the adult in the child.
de: Seine Methoden waren manchmal unkonventionell, aber stets getragen von seinem Streben, im Schüler den Menschen zu sehen.
translated_de: Some of these methods were sometimes unconventional, but they were always influenced by their efforts to see the people.

en: Mount Sněžka is one of the best-known peaks in the Czech Giant Mountains.
de: Die Schneekoppe ist der bekannteste Berg des Riesengebirges.
translated_de: The snowkoppe is the most famous mountain of the riesengebirges.

en: Manfred Richter loves this painting of a picture from his childhood home.
de: Manfred Richter liebt das Gemälde mit dem Motiv aus seiner Heimat.
translated_de: Manfred Richter loves the Gemalde with the motives of his home.

en: Richter was born in 1930 in Trautenau/Nordböhmen, today's Trutnov.
de: Richter wurde 1930 in Trautenau/Nordböhmen geboren, heute Trutnov.
translated_de: Richter was born in 1930 in Trautenau/Nordböhmen, today Trutnov.

en: He was interested in becoming a teacher as early as the age of 14, after he had been a secondary school pupil for four years.
de: Schon mit 14 interessierte er sich nach vier Jahren Oberschule für den Lehrerberuf.
translated_de: In the past 14 years, the teachers' education has been a priority.

en: One year later the Germans living in the Sudetenland were dispossessed.
de: Ein Jahr danach wurden die Sudetendeutschen enteignet.
translated_de: The South Germans were able to enter the country in a year.

en: Within half an hour, the family had to leave their home.
de: Binnen einer halben Stunde musste die Familie ihr Haus verlassen.
translated_de: In a half hour, the family had to leave their house.

en: After a few months spent in a holding camp, they moved to Bavaria in 1946 - in a goods train.
de: Nach einigen Monaten in einem Lager ging es 1946 nach Bayern - im Güterwaggon.
translated_de: After a few months in a warehouse, Bayern was a warehouse in 1946.

en: That was how he came to live in Senkendorf, in Upper Franconia.
de: So verschlug es Richter ins oberfränkische Senkendorf.
translated_de: So, the Richter is in the upper chamber of Senkendorf.

en: The teacher training course was in Bamberg.
de: Die Lehrerbildung fand in Bamberg statt.
translated_de: The teacher education fand in Bamberg.

en: In order to get to the school, Manfred Richter had to go six times per week on foot to the nearest train station; take the train to Bamberg; from there walk three kilometres right across the town to the school; and then make the return journey home.
de: Dazu musste Manfred Richter sechsmal pro Woche zehn Kilometer zum nächsten Bahnhof laufen, mit der Bahn nach Bamberg fahren, dort drei Kilometer quer durch die ganze Stadt zur Schule gehen und abends zurück.
translated_de: The next train was a six-mile journey from Manfred Richter to the next station, with the train going to Bamberg, where three miles were taken by the whole city to school and then returned.

en: After two months. Manfred Richter was given a bed to sleep at the Red Cross Home in Bamberg, in a sleeping quarter that he shared with 15 fellow students.
de: Nach zwei Monaten bekam Manfred Richter in einem Rot-Kreuz-Heim in Bamberg eine Schlafgelegenheit: zusammen mit bis zu 15 Mitschülern in einem Schlafsaal.
translated_de: After two months, Manfred Richter was given a sleep-saal in a Rot-Kreuz-Heim in Bamberg, with up to 15 schülern.

en: In 1951, he took his first state exam, and his second in 1954, after spending three further years as a teaching candidate.
de: 1951 machte er das erste und 1954 nach drei Jahren Lehramtsanwärter das zweite Staatsexamen.
translated_de: 1951, the first and 1954, after three years of teaching, was the second State Examination.

en: Since Upper Franconia had no free teaching place for him, he applied to Upper Bavaria and received a post on 1 November 1954 at a school in Kollbach.
de: Da Oberfranken für ihn keine freie Lehrerstelle hatte, bewarb er sich nach Oberbayern und kam am 1. November 1954 an die Schule in Kollbach.
translated_de: In the case of the French teacher, he had no free teacher place and was notified by the Oberbayerns on 1 November 1954 by the school in Kollbach.

en: The "Young Women's Room" was his first "Service Flat" in the school building.
de: Das "Fräulein-Zimmer" war seine erste "Dienstwohnung" im Schulhaus.
translated_de: The "French-Zimmer" was his first "servicehouse" in the Schulhaus.

en: In 1958, he moved into the new-build teacher accommodation next door to the school, into a three-room service flat.
de: 1958 bezog er im neuerbauten Lehrerhaus neben der Schule eine Drei-Zimmer-Dienstwohnung.
translated_de: 1958 a three-room service was re-established in the new teacher house alongside the school.

en: Manfred Richter bought this house in 1980, after the school in Kollbach was closed in 1968.
de: Dieses Haus kaufte Manfred Richter 1980, nachdem die Schule in Kollbach 1968 aufgelöst worden war.
translated_de: This house bought Manfred Richter in 1980, after the school in Kollbach in 1968.

en: Until then, the school district association of Petershausen-Kollbach had three classes in Kollbach and five in Petershausen.
de: Bis dahin gab es in Kollbach im Schulverband Petershausen-Kollbach drei Klassen und in Petershausen fünf.
translated_de: In Kollbach, the school association Petershausen-Kollbach had three classes and Petershausen five.

en: In the school year of 1968/69, these classes were accommodated in Petershausen, in today's town hall.
de: Ab dem Schuljahr 1968/69 wurden diese in Petershausen im heutigen Rathaus zusammengefasst.
translated_de: In the course of 1968/69, the Council of Petershausen Council reorganized the report.

en: When the Indersdorf Schools Association was founded, the only school left in the locality was the primary school.
de: Als der Schulverband Indersdorf gegründet wurde, blieb nur noch die Grundschule im Ort.
translated_de: The Indersdorf Schulverband gründete, but it still remained the foundation school in the area.

en: In order to avoid a deranking of position in the now smaller school, the then dean, Georg Sigl decided to move to Karlsfeld - and Manfred Richter became his successor.
de: Um einer Rückstufung in der nun kleineren Schule zu entgehen, wechselte der damalige Rektor Georg Sigl nach Karlsfeld - und Manfred Richter wurde sein Nachfolger.
translated_de: In order to take a back seat in the now smaller school, the damalige Rector, Georg Sigl, was replaced by Manfred Richter.

en: However, Petershausen continued to grow, and so the children and their teachers, from September 1982 onwards, could move into the present-day building, which has since been extended, after Richter took his retirement.
de: Doch Petershausen wuchs, und so konnten die Kinder und ihre Lehrer ab September 1982 den heutigen Bau beziehen, der 1997 nach Richters Pensionierung erweitert wurde.
translated_de: But Petershausen was a great example of the construction of the children and teachers in September 1982, when the pension was extended to the pension in 1997.

en: Manfred Richter praises the uncomplicated manner and spirit of generosity of the then Mayor, Ludwig Götz, who was able to secure municipal funds to build an additional work-room and extra rooms in the cellar as part of the 1997 extensions - although the council guidelines governing school-building work did not allow subsidies to be used to pay for this work.
de: Manfred Richter lobt die unkomplizierte Großzügigkeit des damaligen Bürgermeisters Ludwig Götz, der auf Gemeindekosten zusätzlich einen Werkraum und bei der Erweiterung 1997 Kellerräume bauen ließ, obwohl das nach den Richtlinien für Schulbauten nicht zuschussfähig war.
translated_de: Mr Richter lobte for the straightforward size of the damaligen mayor, Ludwig Götz, who also built a work space and cellar space for the municipality in 1997, although the directive on school buildings was not sufficiently able to be a factor.

en: "Mayor Götz was a great friend of the school," recalls Richter, with gratitude.
de: "Bürgermeister Götz war sehr schulfreundlich", erinnerte sich Richter dankbar.
translated_de: "Bürgermeister Götz was very educational friendly", he said.

en: Throughout his whole career, Manfred Richter never forgot a reply given in a speech by a government representative, in answer to a presentation given by the schools council on law and justice: "One should never forget to love". Manfred Richter duly implemented what he had heard as a young teacher.
de: In seiner ganzen Karriere hat Manfred Richter nie den Redebeitrag eines Regierungsvertreters vergessen, der auf ein Referat eines Schulrates über Recht und Gerechtigkeit geantwortet hatte: "Man darf nie die Liebe vergessen". Manfred Richter setzte um, was er da als junger Lehrer gehört hatte.
translated_de: In his entire career, Manfred Richter never forgot the Redecision of a Government Commissioner who had referred to a school of law and law: "Man should never forget love," he said, as a young teacher.

en: "One has to give children two things: Roots and wings," says the 84 year-old.
de: "Man muss den Kindern zweierlei mitgeben: Wurzeln und Flügel", sagt der heute 84-Jährige.
translated_de: "Man must give birth to two children: roots and flies", says the 84-year-old.

en: But experience has also taught him that: "One doesn't always achieve that." Whether by that he means his pupils or his own six children, is unclear.
de: Und er musste erfahren: "Das gelingt nicht immer". Ob er da nur seine Schüler oder genauso seine eigenen sechs Kinder meint, ist nicht ganz klar.
translated_de: And he must learn: "The geling is not always going to happen" - if only his students or his own six children are concerned, it is not clear.

en: In any case, Richter's methods were at times unconventional.
de: In jedem Fall war Richters Tun manchmal unkonventionell.
translated_de: In every case, Judges are sometimes unconventional.

en: If school children got into fights, they were not given punishments like, for example, writing out lines or serving a detention.
de: Wenn Schüler sich prügelten, bekamen sie von ihm nicht etwa eine Strafarbeit und wurden auch nicht zum Nachsitzen verdonnert.
translated_de: If students were prügeling, they had no criminal work and were not able to be relegated to the country.

en: At the cost of the council, Richter bought two pairs of boxing gloves, and then let the two antagonists fight it out, even if this did occasionally produce a black-eye.
de: Auf Kosten der Gemeinde hatte Richter zwei Paar Boxhandschuhe anschaffen lassen und ließ die beiden Kontrahenten gegeneinander antreten, auch wenn es dabei mal ein Veilchen geben sollte.
translated_de: The municipality had to create two pairs of box shoes and allow the two parties to be contested, even if there is a vegetable.

en: For the benefit of the school, Richter nurtured a good relationship with the then Mayor, Ludwig Götz (CSU).
de: Zum Wohle der Schule pflegte Richter als Rektor ein gutes Verhältnis zum damaligen Bürgermeister Ludwig Götz (CSU).
translated_de: The school' s welfare is a good relationship with the damaligen mayor, Ludwig Götz (CSU).

en: Following his retirement, Richter, who had no political allegiances, was encouraged by the Mayor to run for election onto the local council as a candidate for the CSU in 1996.
de: Dieser bewegte den parteilosen Richter nach dessen Pensionierung dazu, 1996 zumindest als letzter auf der CSU-Liste für den Gemeinderat zu kandidieren.
translated_de: This has pushed the party-lose Richter to a position in 1996, at least as the last member of the CSU list for the Council.

en: However, Richter finished in sixth and joined the CSU.
de: Doch Richter wurde auf Platz sechs vorgewählt und trat der CSU bei.
translated_de: But Richter was selected on the sixth place and treated the CSU.

en: 180 kilometres in three days
de: 180 Kilometer in drei Tagen
translated_de: 180 km in three days

en: HR4-CYCLE TOUR 700 cyclists are taking a breather in the health resort of Bad Salzhausen and Schotten
de: HR4-RADTOUR 700 Fahrradfahrer legen im Kurpark von Bad Salzhausen und Schotten Zwischenstopps ein
translated_de: HR4-RADTOUR 700 cyclists are able to take part in the Kurpark of Bad Salzhausen and Schotten Interstopps.

en: There is nothing particular out of the ordinary about touring cyclists take a rest in Bad Salzhausen or in Schotten.
de: Wenn Radler auf ihrer Tour in Bad Salzhausen oder Schotten Rast machen, ist das an sich nichts Besonderes.
translated_de: If Radler makes his tour in Bad Salzhausen or Schotten Rast, it is not something special.

en: However, on Friday, the sheer numbers of those resting up was striking: The 700 participants of the hr4 cycle tour, together with their entourages, were all enjoying a break in the lower resort of Bad Salzhausen, and they would later be attending an open air party in the Alteburgpark in Schotten, too.
de: Am Freitag jedoch machte allein die Anzahl der Rastenden Eindruck: Die 700 Teilnehmer der hr4-Radtour samt Begleittross genossen eine Pause im unteren Kurpark von Bad Salzhausen und später eine Party unter freiem Himmel im Schottener Alteburgpark.
translated_de: However, on Friday, the number of people who are sat alone is a factor: 700 participants of the hr4 race accompanied by a group of friends enjoyed a break in the Bad Salzhausen Kurpark and then a party under the free air in the Schottener Alteburg Park.

en: Under the logo "Cycling and celebrating along the newly-discovered routes between Nidda and Kinzig," the participants had met up on Thursday in Bad Vilbel and had listened to a concert there by Van Baker & Band.
de: Unter dem Motto "Radeln und feiern auf neu entdeckten Wegen zwischen Nidda und Kinzig" hatten sich die Teilnehmer am Donnerstag in Bad Vilbel getroffen und dort ein Konzert von Van Baker & Band miterlebt.
translated_de: The participants at the Donnerstag in Bad Vilbel were invited to the theme "Radels and celebrations of new wegen between Nidda and Kinzig" and there was a concert by Van Baker & Band.

en: On Friday it was down to business: The riders set out to attack the first stage - 60 kilometres via Florstadt to Bad Salzhausen and then further on to Schotten.
de: Am Freitag wurde es ernst: Die Radler nahmen die erste Etappe, die 60 Kilometer über Florstadt nach Bad Salzhausen und weiter nach Schotten in Angriff.
translated_de: On Friday, the Radlers took the first Etappe, which was 60 km over Florstadt, Bad Salzhausen, and then on Schotten.

en: In Bad Salzhausen, the sportsmen-and-women were greeted by mayor Hans-Peter Seum, who had ridden off the start-line in Bad Vilbel on his own bike, and the boss of the municipal company Bad Salzhausen, Petra Schwing-Döring.
de: In Bad Salzhausen wurden die Sportler von Bürgermeister Hans-Peter Seum, der in Bad Vilbel mit dem Fahrrad mitgestartet war, und der Leiterin des Eigenbetriebs Bad Salzhausen, Petra Schwing-Döring, begrüßt.
translated_de: In Bad Salzhausen, the Sportler of Hans-Peter Seum, who was riding in Bad Vilbel, was welcomed by the Director of the Bad Salzhausen Eigenbetrieb, Petra Schwing-Döring.

en: All sorts of food and drink had been prepared, to refresh body and mind: The local women from Ranstadt and Nieder-Mockstadt had baked 85 apple-, plum- and cheesecakes - as well as streusel cake which the intrepid riders let melt in their mouths.
de: Zur Erfrischung von Körper und Geist war allerlei an guten Dingen vorbereitet worden: Die Landfrauen aus Ranstadt und Nieder-Mockstadt hatten 85 Bleche Apfel-, Zwetschen-, Streusel- und Käsekuchen gebacken, die den tüchtigen Radlern wunderbar mundeten.
translated_de: The re-election of body and spirit was all good: the landfrauds from Ranstadt and the Netherlands had 85 Bleche Apfels, Zwetschen, Streusels and Käsekuchens, which were a wonderful munde of the tady Radlern.

en: "Such cakes only the local women can make," praised the rider from Aulendiebach, at the same time as he ordered another slice.
de: "Solche Kuchen können nur Landfrauen backen", lobte ein Teilnehmer aus Aulendiebach, während er ein weiteres Stückchen orderte.
translated_de: "Solche cakes can only be used to smuggle land fraud", lobte a participant from Aulendiebach, while he ordered another piece of bread.

en: At the drinks stand of the Geiß-Nidda gymnasium club, the riders could acquire cold drinks.
de: Am Getränkestand des Turnvereins Geiß-Nidda konnten kalte Erfrischungen erstanden werden.
translated_de: The Geiß-Nidda Turn Club' s stall was a perfect place to start.

en: The "Duo Bravo" entertained the visitors with well-known melodies from Operettas and Musicals and reaped enthusiastic applause.
de: Das "Duo Bravo" unterhielt die Besucher mit bekannten Melodien aus Operetten und Musicals und erntete begeisterten Applaus.
translated_de: The "Duo Bravo" received the visitors with famous Melodies from Operette and Musicals and a very enthusiastic appluse.

en: The lovely atmosphere in the Park had a relaxing effect.
de: Das schöne Ambiente des Parks wirkte entspannend.
translated_de: The beautiful atmosphere of the park is relaxing.

en: One gentleman even received a head-massage from his lady partner: "He certainly earned it - after all, he had to fix a bicycle chain that had come off, earlier in the day."
de: Ein Herr genoss überdies eine Kopfmassage von seiner Partnerin: "Die hat er verdient, schließlich hat er heute schon abgesprungene Fahrradketten wieder befestigt".
translated_de: Mr Mauricio shook his head with a joke from his partner: "I have earned the right to be able to keep the bikes in place today."

en: Meanwhile, the mayor and the company boss still had work to do: They were interviewed at the fountain in front of the watering-hole inn, the Trinkkurhaus, by reporter, Rainer Janke, and took their radio opportunity to give a big thumbs up for Bad Salzhausen.
de: Derweil mussten der Bürgermeister und die Betriebsleiterin noch arbeiten: Sie wurden am Brunnen vor dem Trinkkurhaus von Reporter Rainer Janke interviewt und nutzten die Gelegenheit, im Radio für Bad Salzhausen zu werben.
translated_de: The mayor and the manager of the business had to work on the matter: they interviewed the Brunnen in the water supply of Rainer Janke and used the opportunity to get a radio station in Bad Salzhausen.

en: Even head of promotions, Tobias Hagen, who had worked as tour head since it first started in 2004, could only get a short rest, as he had a lot of work to do involving the local technology.
de: Auch Promotionchef Tobias Hagen, seit der ersten hr4-Radtour 2004 als Tourleiter dabei, konnte nur kurz verschnaufen, hatte er doch reichlich mit der Technik vor Ort zu tun.
translated_de: The Promotionchef Tobias Hagen, who has been a tour guide since the first hr4 tour in 2004, has just a few minutes to do, but has a great deal of technique to do in the area.

en: His pick-up truck, in which he used three telephones and a radio to communicate with his colleagues and a 15-strong Hessen Police team; made Facebook entries and also wrote his reports, also needed a check.
de: Sein Pickup-Truck, in dem er mittels drei Telefonen und einem Funkgerät mit seinen Mitarbeitern und der 15-köpfigen Motorradstaffel der Polizei Hessen kommunizierte, Facebook-Einträge schrieb und Reportagen machte, brauchte ebenfalls einen Check.
translated_de: The pick-up of the snooping, which he uses via three telephones and a radio device with his staff and the 15-strong motorradstaffel of police helicopters, written Facebook adverts and reported on, also needs a check.

en: "The majority of riders come from the Rhein-Main-Region," he explained, "but riders have also come from Gießen and Fulda, from Lauterbach or from the Taunus and even from many towns in Westfalia.
de: "Der Großteil der Teilnehmer stammt aus dem Rhein-Main-Gebiet", erzählte er, "doch auch aus Gießen oder Fulda, aus Lauterbach oder dem Taunus und sogar aus zahlreichen Städten in Westfalen sind Radfahrer angereist.
translated_de: "The majority of participants come from the Rhein-Main-Gebiet", he said, "but also from Gießen or Fulda, from Lauterbach or the Taunus and sogar from many cities in West-Westfalen are Radfahrer angered.

en: The number of participants depends a little on the number of places where they can stay.
de: Die Teilnehmerzahl richtet sich ein bisschen nach den zur Verfügung stehenden Übernachtungskapazitäten.
translated_de: The participants are based on the current capacity to achieve the desired objectives.

en: Category 1 riders are accommodated in hotels, with Category 2 riders being put up in hostel-style lodging.
de: In Kategorie I werden die Teilnehmer in Hotels untergebracht, in Kategorie II in Sammelunterkünften.
translated_de: In category I, participants will be invited to hotels and in category II in Sammelunterkünften.

en: As the riders set out again on the road, they had a good impression and happy memories of the resort: "Bye!"
de: Vom Kurort hatten die Radler einen guten Eindruck, als sie nach eineinhalb Stunden wieder aufbrachen: "Tschüss!"
translated_de: The Radler had a good impression from Kurort, as they were again sat down for a half hour: "Tschup!"

en: "It was very nice in Bad Salzhausen!" they shouted, as they waved goodbye.
de: "Es war schön in Bad Salzhausen!" winkten sie zum Abschied.
translated_de: "It was nice in Bad Salzhausen!", they winkt to the vote.

en: After arriving in Schotten, the group could take a short rest.
de: Nach der Ankunft in Schotten durfte die Gruppe eine kurze Verschnaufpause einlegen.
translated_de: After the arrival in Schotten, the group had a short break.

en: But then in the evening, the riders were requested to go to the idyllic Alteburgpark.
de: Aber am Abend waren die Radler im idyllischen Alteburgpark gefordert.
translated_de: But on the evening the Radler was asked to be in the idyllic Alteburgpark.

en: Under the guidance of manager of the Schotten Association for Tourism and Town Marketing (GTS) the Park had acquired a lovely festive ambience and, of course, there were plenty of nice nibbles, such as Flammkuchen with well-chilled Federweißer wine, too.
de: Unter der Regie der Schottener Gesellschaft für Tourismus und Stadtmarketing (GTS) hatte der Park ein schönes Festambiente erhalten und natürlich hatte man Leckereien, etwa Flammkuchen mit gut gekühltem Federweißer, vorbereitet.
translated_de: Under the management of the GTS, the Park was a beautiful Festambiente and, of course, there were some small bugs, such as flammkuchen with a good Federweißer.

en: Mayoress Susanne Schaab, GTS-boss, Markus Hoßfeld and MSC-Chairman, Wolfgang Wagner-Sachs, in his capacity as board member of the Hessen-Thüringen section of the ADAC welcomed the visitors.
de: Bürgermeisterin Susanne Schaab, GTS-Geschäftsführer Markus Hoßfeld und MSC-Vorsitzender Wolfgang Wagner-Sachs in seiner Funktion als Vorstandsmitglied des ADAC Hessen-Thüringen begrüßten die Besucher.
translated_de: Mr Susanne Schaab, the GTS-Geschäftsführer Markus Hoßfeld and the MSC President, Wolfgang Wagner-Sachs, welcome visitors in his role as Chairman of the ADAC Committee.

en: The three were visibly delighted by the "roaring trade in Schotten."
de: Die Drei zeigten sich sichtlich erfreut über den "vielen Betrieb in Schotten".
translated_de: The three have shown their resurgence in the "multiple businesses in Schotten".

en: DJ Tobias Hagen opened the dancing stage.
de: DJ Tobias Hagen gab anschließend die Tanzbühne frei.
translated_de: DJ Tobias Hagen gave the dance floor a free time later.

en: The cyclists were happy to have the chance to show off their dancing movements in the open air - despite their sporting feats on their bicycles earlier in the day.
de: Die Gelegenheit zum schwungvollen Bewegen unter freiem Himmel wurde trotz der sportlichen Betätigung auf dem Fahrrad eifrig genutzt.
translated_de: The opportunity to enjoy a full day of free time was used to avoid the sport of betting on bicycles.

en: The appeared among the guests an increasing number of local people, who were as attracted by the pleasant atmosphere as much as the mass crowd of riders.
de: Unter die Gäste mischten sich zunehmend Bürger, die von der guten Stimmung ebenso angetan waren wie die große Schar der Radfahrer.
translated_de: The guests are becoming more citizens, who were also influenced by the good mood, as the great shame of the Radfahrer.

en: On the second day of the tour program, the riders would call at the stopping points of Birstein; Wächtersbach; and Bad Orb - including a concert with the Trenkwaldern.
de: Am zweiten Tag standen für die Radfahrer die Stationen Birstein, Wächtersbach und Bad Orb - inklusive eines Konzerts mit den Trenkwaldern - auf dem Programm.
translated_de: The second day for Radfahrers was the Birstein, Wächtersbach and Bad Orb stations, including a concert with the Trenkwalders.

en: Yesterday, after 180 kilometres of cycling, the sportsmen-and-women arrived back in Bad Vilbel once again.
de: Gestern, nach 180 Kilometern Radelns, trafen die Sportler wieder in Bad Vilbel ein.
translated_de: Then, after 180 km of radels, the sportler returned to Bad Vilbel.

en: Tens of Turkish Policemen Arrested over 'Plotting' against Gov't
de: Dutzende türkischer Polizisten wegen "Verschwörung" gegen die Regierung festgenommen
translated_de: Turkish policymakers have been arrested for "violence" against the government

en: A total of 33 police officers have been detained in Turkey on suspicions of 'plotting against the government', local media outlets say.
de: Insgesamt 33 Polizisten wurden in der Türkei aufgrund des Verdachts der "Verschwörung gegen die Regierung" festgenommen, melden örtliche Medienagenturen.
translated_de: Insgesamt 33 Polizists in Turkey were arrested in connection with the 'Versolation against the Government' s alleged 'reflection', melding media agencies.

en: Police officials have not immediately commented.
de: Die Polizeibehörden gaben keinen unmittelbaren Kommentar ab.
translated_de: Police officials have not made any immediate comments.

en: Among the detainees were 14 high-ranking officers, according to Hurriyet Daily News.
de: Unter den Verhafteten sind 14 hochrangige Polizisten, meldet Hürriyet Daily News.
translated_de: The worst offenders are 14 highly-regarded police officers, according to the Hürriyet Daily News.

en: Some of them were involved in last December's corruption probes targeting government officials, including four government ministers.
de: Einige von ihnen waren an den Korruptionsuntersuchungen gegen Regierungsmitarbeiter, darunter vier Regierungsminister im letzten Dezember beteiligt.
translated_de: Several of them were involved in corruption investigations against government officials, including four government ministers in December last year.

en: In July a number of Turkish policemen were arrested for allegedly having set up an organized criminal gang and having tapped phone number.
de: Im Juli wurde eine Reihe von türkischen Polizisten verhaftet, weil sie angeblich eine organisierte kriminelle Vereinigung gegründet und Telefonnummern angezapft hatten.
translated_de: In July, a number of Turkish police officers were arrested because they were a group of organised criminals and had telephones.

en: Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan (who was Prime Minister back then) described their actions as part of activity conducted by Islamist cleric Fethullah Gullen against him and others in power.
de: Der türkische Präsident Recep Tayyip Erdogan (der damals Premierminister war) beschrieb ihr Vorgehen als Teil der Aktivitäten, die von dem islamistischen Geistlichen Fethulla Güllen gegen ihn und andere Personen in Machtpositionen angeführt werden.
translated_de: The Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan (the former Premier Minister) described his actions as part of the activities which the Islamic Fethulla Güllen have carried out against him and other people in power positions.

en: Not all children back to school in Ukraine
de: Nicht alle Kinder in der Ukraine kehren in die Schule zurück
translated_de: No children in Ukraine have returned to school

en: Schools across most of Ukraine reopened their doors on Monday (September 1), after the summer holidays.
de: Schulen fast überall in der Ukraine öffneten am Montag (1. September) nach den Sommerferien.
translated_de: Schulen fast everywhere in Ukraine are open on Monday (1. September) after the summer.

en: The day is traditionally a big one for families, and like thousands of other Ukrainian parents, Prime Minister Arseny Yatsenyuk took his daughter to school.
de: Dieser Tag ist traditionell ein wichtiger Tag für Familien, und wie Tausende anderer ukrainischer Eltern brachte Premierminister Arsenij Jazenjuk seine Tochter in die Schule.
translated_de: This is a traditional day for families and as many other Ukrainian parents have brought Premier Arsenij Jazenjuk to the school.

en: While there, he told waiting journalists that not all schools had reopened, but that he was committed to defending the country for future generations:
de: Dort teilte er wartenden Journalisten mit, dass nicht alle Schulen wieder geöffnet hatten, dass er jedoch entschlossen sei, das Land für zukünftige Generationen zu verteidigen:
translated_de: There was a debate between the Journalists that not all schools were opened, that he was able to defend the land for future generations:

en: The first of September ceremony was not held in every school.
de: Die Septemberfeiern wurden nicht in jeder Schule abgehalten.
translated_de: The September celebrations were not held in any school.

en: There is not a peaceful sky over every part of Ukraine.
de: Der Himmel ist nicht überall über der Ukraine friedlich.
translated_de: The sky is not all over the Ukraine.

en: We must fight for a peaceful sky.
de: Wir müssen für einen friedlichen Himmel kämpfen.
translated_de: We must fight for a peaceful Himmel.

en: The whole of Ukraine, a huge joint Ukrainian's people's front, must fight for a peaceful sky.
de: Die gesamte Ukraine, eine riesige gemeinsame ukrainische Volksfront muss für einen friedlichen Himmel kämpfen.
translated_de: The whole Ukraine, a huge commune Ukrainian government, must fight for a peaceful sky.

en: Aleksan Pastukhov, the head teacher of Slaviansk School, attended by Yatsenyuk's daughter, spoke in Russian.
de: Aleksan Pastukhow, Schulleiter der Schule in Slawjansk, die Jazenjuks Tochter besucht, sprach auf Russisch.
translated_de: Aleksan Pastukhow, teacher of the school in Slawjansk, daughter of Jazenjuk, spoke in Russian.

en: We hope that peace will finally be established here and that children will receive knowledge that will be useful in their future lives.
de: Wir hoffen, dass hier endlich wieder Frieden herrscht und dass die Kinder eine Bildung erhalten, die ihnen im weiteren Leben nützlich sein wird.
translated_de: We hope that peace will finally be restored and that children will be able to get a school which will be useful for their future lives.

en: The first day back at school is traditionally celebrated by children wearing embroidered shirts, carrying balloons and giving flowers to their teachers.
de: Der erste Schultag des neuen Schuljahres wird traditionell gefeiert, wobei die Kinder bestickte Hemden tragen, Ballons in den Händen halten und ihren Lehrern Blumen schenken.
translated_de: The first school year will be celebrated traditionally, with children suffocating their heads, smuggling their heads and smuggling their teachers.

en: In Rona Fairhead, the BBC may have found the formidable chief it needs
de: Mit Rona Fairhead hat die BBC vielleicht den großartigen Direktor gefunden, den sie braucht.
translated_de: Rona Fairhead, BBC, may have found the great director who needs to be a director.

en: She comes trailing clouds of glory from the world of banking, media management and the inner conclaves of the Tory party.
de: Sie trifft mit einer stolzen Ruhmesschleppe aus der Bankenwelt, dem Medienmanagement und dem inneren Kreis der Tory-Partei ein.
translated_de: You are a proud Russian spokesman from the Bank of America, the media management and the inner circle of Tory Parti.

en: Indeed, she has had frontline experience of her own.
de: Und sie hat eigene Fronterfahrung.
translated_de: They have their own front experience.

en: Her career began at global management consultants Bain and Co, then progressed via Morgan Stanley, Bombadier, ICI and the media world of Pearsons.
de: Ihre Karriere begann bei dem weltweiten Managementberatungsunternehmen Bain and Co., worauf sie zu Morgan Stanley, Bombadier, ICI und die Medienwelt von Pearsons wechselte.
translated_de: Your career began at the global management consultancy firm Bain and Co., where they were re-elected to Morgan Stanley, Bombadier, ICI and the media world of Pearsons.

en: She was chief executive of the Financial Times for seven years, resigning when the top job at its parent company Pearson's went to a junior male colleague.
de: Sie war sieben Jahre lang Vorstandsvorsitzende der Financial Times und trat zurück, als der oberste Posten des Mutterunternehmens Pearsons an einen jüngeren männlichen Kollegen ging.
translated_de: You were President of the Financial Times for seven years and have returned to the post of the Mother Company Pearson, a young colleague.

en: Her pay-off is said to be close to £1 million.
de: Ihre Abfindung betrug angeblich fast 1 Million £.
translated_de: Your arrest has risen fast to 1 million pounds.

en: Her political rating is sturdy, too.
de: Auch ihr politisches Ranking ist solide.
translated_de: It is also solid in its political ranking.

en: She was recommended to David Cameron by Lord Browne, the former head of BP, when he was looking to bring private expertise into Whitehall: she became a cabinet office adviser.
de: Sie wurde David Cameron von Lord Browne, dem früheren Vorsitzenden von BP empfohlen, als dieser nach mehr privatwirtschaftlichen Kenntnissen in Whitehall suchte: sie wurde zur Beraterin des Kabinetts.
translated_de: David Cameron, from Lord Browne, which was recommended by the previous Chairman of BP, was a consultant in Kabinett' s cabinet.

en: Her husband is a former Tory councillor.
de: Ihr Ehemann ist ein früheres Tory Ratsmitglied.
translated_de: Your Ehemann is a former Tory Council member.

en: Back in May, I described the chairman's job as a poisoned chalice.
de: Schon im Mai beschrieb ich die Aufgabe des Vorsitzenden mit einem vergifteten Kelch.
translated_de: I wrote in Mai that the President' s task was to give a sigh of wine.

en: Not only is the BBC a vast and complex entity at the heart of public life, but there is an inner paradox to its structure.
de: Nicht nur steht die BBC als riesige und komplexe Einheit im Herzen des öffentlichen Lebens, sondern es gibt auch ein internes Paradox in seiner Struktur.
translated_de: The BBC is not only a huge and complex unit in the heart of the public life, but it also has a internal paradox in its structure.

en: The trust faces in two directions: inwards as the upper tier of the BBC's own management hierarchy, but also outwards as the voice of public concern and disquiet when things go awry.
de: Das Vertrauen wirkt in zwei Richtungen: nach innen auf die erste Garde der eigenen Managementhierarchie in der BBC, aber auch nach außen als Stimme öffentlicher Besorgnis und Unruhe, wenn die Dinge falsch laufen.
translated_de: The trust is in two directions: in the first place in the own management hierarchy in the BBC, but also in the second place as public symphonies and symphonies when things are wrong.

en: This is an almost untenable duopoly calling for complete root-and-branch reform.
de: Das sorgt für ein fast unhaltbares Duopol, das nach einer vollständigen umfassenden Reform verlangt.
translated_de: This is a fast-moving duopol which is required after a comprehensive reform.

en: But what incoming chairman would risk coming in, crashing around and dismantling an institution as complex as a Chinese dynasty in case they put themselves out of a job in the process.
de: Aber welcher neu ankommende Vorsitzende würde es riskieren, anzutreten, auf alles einzuschlagen und eine Institution auseinanderzunehmen, die so komplex ist wie eine chinesische Dynastie, während er sich dabei selbst vielleicht um seinen Job bringt.
translated_de: But the new proposal would risk a re-election of all the proposals and a structure which is so complex as a Chinese Dynastie, while it might possibly be able to do so.

en: It's a difficult call.
de: Es ist eine schwierige Aufgabe.
translated_de: It is a difficult task.

en: If that weren't tough enough, plenty of people are keen to see the BBC cut down in size - its power, its finances and its status overhauled.
de: Und als wäre das nicht schon genug, sind auch noch viele daran interessiert, die BBC verkleinert zu sehen - Macht, Geld und Status überholt.
translated_de: And as it would not be enough, there are still many people who are interested in the BBC - power, money and status.

en: As competitors circle ever closer and new technology challenges cosy old certainties, the imminent negotiation of the licence fee is fraught with especial danger for the BBC.
de: Während die Konkurrenz näher rückt und neue Technologien alte, bequeme Sicherheiten bedrohen, ist die anstehende Verhandlung der Lizenzgebühren für die BBC mit besonderen Gefahren verbunden.
translated_de: In the event of competition and new technologies are gaining more secure security, the ongoing negotiations on licences for BBC is a major risk.

en: For the modest sum of £145.50 a year, the British public buys into what is surely the greatest media enterprise in the world.
de: Für die bescheidene Summe von 145,50 £ pro Jahr kauft sich die britische Öffentlichkeit in das sicherlich größte Medienunternehmen der Welt ein.
translated_de: The sum of 145,50 £ per year is worth the British public in the most important media company in the world.

en: The BBC tells a good story: it claims that its output reaches 96 per cent of households, and costs each one of them just 40p a day.
de: Die BBC erzählt eine gute Geschichte: sie sagt, dass sie 96 Prozent aller Haushalte erreicht und jeden davon nur 40 Pence pro Tag kostet.
translated_de: The BBC has a good history: they say that 96 percent of all budgets are achieved and every one is worth only 40 Pence pro Tag.

en: What's more, apparently the Beeb's popularity is rising: 53 per cent support today as against 31 per cent 10 years ago.
de: Und anscheinend steigt die BBC auf der Beliebtheitsskala wieder nach oben: 53 Prozent unterstützen sie heute, im Vergleich zu 31 Prozent vor 10 Jahren.
translated_de: And, as it appears, the BBC is again boosting its popularity by a staggering 53 per cent, compared to 31 per cent in 10 years.

en: Patterns of watching and using the BBC have changed: I receive news headlines on my mobile phone these days, and catch up on missed programmes with iPlayer.
de: Die Seh- und Nutzungsgewohnheiten für die BBC haben sich verändert: Ich bekomme heutzutage Nachrichtenschlagzeilen auf meinem Handy und sehe verpasste Programme später auf meinem iPlayer.
translated_de: The social and social conditions for the BBC have changed: I am able to make heutzutage news reports on my mobile and then pass the programme on my iPlayer.

en: But it remains a much-loved and formidable institution.
de: Aber sie bleibt eine sehr geliebte und beachtliche Institution.
translated_de: But it remains a very loving and beachy institution.

en: It needs a formidable chairman - I hope it has found one.
de: Sie braucht einen beachtlichen Vorsitzenden - ich hoffe, sie hat ihn gefunden.
translated_de: You need a beachy chair - I hope they have found them.

en: Texas' Perry Says Disparaging Tweet Unauthorized
de: Perry aus Texas sagt, dass herabsetzender Tweet nicht autorisiert war
translated_de: Perry from Texas said that herabsetting Tweets were not autorised

en: A tweet from Republican Texas Gov. Rick Perry's verified account on Sunday night included a disparaging image of the Democratic district attorney who is at the center of his criminal indictment on charges of abuse of power.
de: Ein Tweet vom offiziellen Benutzerkonto des republikanischen Gouverneurs von Texas, Rick Perry, am Sonntag enthielt eine herabsetzende Bemerkung über die demokratische Bezirksstaatsanwältin, die im Mittelpunkt einer strafrechtlichen Anklage gegen ihn wegen Missbrauchs der Amtsgewalt steht.
translated_de: A Tweet from the official user account of the Republic of Texas Governor Rick Perry, on Sunday, referred to the democratic district courts which are in the centre of a criminal complaint against him because of the slander of the armed forces.

en: The tweet was later deleted, followed by another from Perry's account that disavowed the post.
de: Der Tweet wurde später gelöscht und durch einen anderen von Perrys Benutzerkonto ersetzt, der den vorherigen abstritt.
translated_de: The Tweet was deleted and replaced by another user account by Perry, which has previously been abstained.

en: A tweet just went out from my account that was unauthorized.
de: Gerade ist ein Tweet von meinem Konto aus versendet worden, der nicht von mir autorisiert war.
translated_de: I just received a Tweet from my Konto, which was not approved by me.

en: "I do not condone the tweet and I have taken it down," the later post said.
de: "Ich billige den Tweet nicht und habe ihn gelöscht," hieß es in der späteren Nachricht.
translated_de: "I did not bill the Tweet and I deleted it," he said in the later message.

en: Perry aides did not immediately return messages seeking comment.
de: Mitarbeiter von Perry antworteten nicht umgehend auf Anfragen nach Kommentaren.
translated_de: The staff of Perry have not responded immediately to questions relating to comments.

en: Although the tweets were sent from Perry's verified account, it was unclear who does the actual posting for the feed.
de: Obwohl die Tweets von Perrys offiziellem Benutzerkonto ausgingen, war nicht klar, wer tatsächlich den Feed bedient.
translated_de: Although Perry' s Tweets were a result of the official user account, it was not clear who actually was the feed.

en: The earlier tweet posted an unflattering mock image of Travis County District Attorney Rosemary Lehmberg, who was convicted of drunken driving in April 2013.
de: In dem früheren Tweet wurde ein unvorteilhaftes Bild des Bezirksstaatsanwältin von Travis County, Rosemary Lehmberg, gezeichnet, die im April 2013 wegen Trunkenheit am Steuer verurteilt wurde.
translated_de: In the previous Tweet, a unfavourable image of the district of Travis County, Rosemary Lehmberg, was taken down in April 2013 because of the thorny nature of the tax.

en: Perry vetoed funds to her office when she refused to resign, which led to a grand jury in Austin this month indicting Perry - who is a potential 2016 presidential candidate.
de: Perry legte ein Veto gegen eine finanzielle Förderung ihres Büros ein, als sie sich weigerte, zurückzutreten, was zu einer Anklage gegen Perry - der möglicherweise 2016 Präsidentschaftskandidat sein könnte - vor einer Grand Jury diesen Monat in Austin führte.
translated_de: Perry voted against a financial support for his office, as he was unable to return, to a protest against Perry - the 2016 presidential candidate could be - this month, before a grand jury in Austin.

en: The caption on the tweet reads: "I don't always drive drunk at 3x the legal blood alcohol limit ... but when I do, I indict Gov. Perry for calling me out about it."
de: Der Text des Tweets lautet: "Ich fahre nicht immer betrunken mit dem dreifachen zulässigen Alkoholspiegel ... aber wenn ich es tue, klage ich Gouverneur Perry an, wenn er es ausplaudert."
translated_de: The text of the Tweets said: "I do not always drive with the triple alcoholspiegel... but when I do, I blame Gouverneur Perry, when he is applauded."

en: I am the most drunk Democrat in Texas.
de: Ich bin die betrunkenste Demokratin in Texas.
translated_de: I am the most violent Democrat in Texas.

en: Lehmberg's office did not lead the grand jury investigation against Perry.
de: Lehmbergs Büro war nicht mit der Leitung über die Untersuchung der Grand Jury gegen Perry betraut.
translated_de: Lehmberg' s office has not been consulted with the Director of the Grand Jury on Perry.

en: It was handled by Michael McCrum, a San Antonio-based special prosecutor who was assigned by a Republican judge.
de: Diese wurde von Michael McCrum, einem Sonderstaatsanwalt aus San Antonio geführt, der von einem republikanischen Richter ausgewählt wurde.
translated_de: This was a report by Michael McCrum, a special state of San Antonio, which was selected by a Republic Judge.

en: Perry has pleaded not guilty and called the charges a political ploy.
de: Perry plädiert auf nicht schuldig und nannte die Anklage einen politischen Trick.
translated_de: Perry plädiert not guilty and nannts the controversy a political trick.

en: His high-powered legal team has asked the judge overseeing the case to dismiss the indictment, claiming that the law being used to prosecute the longest-serving governor in Texas history is unconstitutionally vague.
de: Sein hochklassiges Team von Rechtsbeiständen beantragte bei dem mit dem Fall betrauten Richter, die Anklage abzuweisen und argumentierte, dass das Gesetz, mit dem gegen den dienstältesten Gouverneur in der Geschichte des Staates Texas vorgegangen wird, unverfassungsgemäß diffus ist.
translated_de: The highly-skilled Team of lawyers beantrags a motion to the Supreme Court in the Fall, which argues that the law, which is against the most prestigious governor in the history of Texas, is a matter of a different view.

en: Perry cut off $7.5 million in state funds to the state's Public Integrity Unit - which is based in Travis County and prosecutes public corruption in Texas - when Lehmberg refused to resign.
de: Perry stoppte 7,5 Millionen $ staatlicher Gelder an die Public Integrity Unit des Staates - die in Travis County ansässig ist und in Fällen staatlicher Korruption in Texas ermittelt - als Lehmberg sich weigerte, zurückzutreten.
translated_de: Perry stopped $7,5 million of state money from the Public Integrity Unit of the States - which is ansessed in Travis County and in cases of state corruption in Texas - as Lehmberg is a weaker one.

en: That veto drew a formal complaint from a left-leaning watchdog group.
de: Dieses Veto sorgte für eine öffentliche Beschwerde seitens einer linksstehenden Watchdog-Gruppe.
translated_de: This Veto is a public priority for a links-up watchdog group.

en: Perry's verified account is updated frequently - and sometimes famously.
de: Perrys offizielles Benutzerkonto wird häufig aktualisiert - und manchmal berühmt.
translated_de: Perry' s official user account is often updated - and sometimes re-evaluated.

en: After finishing in fifth place in the Iowa caucuses during his 2012 presidential campaign, Perry addressed speculation that he might call it quits with a tweet of a photo of himself jogging near a lake, and the words, "Here we come South Carolina!"
de: Nachdem er bei den Wahlversammlungen in Iowa während seiner Präsidentschaftskandidatur 2012 als Fünfter abgeschlossen hatte, ging Perry auf Spekulationen ein, dass er aufhören werde, indem er ein Tweet eines Fotos von sich beim Joggen in der Nähe eines Sees postete, mit den Worten "South Carolina, wir kommen!"
translated_de: After a successful election in Iowa in 2012, when he was elected to the presidency, Perry was able to speak out, and he was able to tweet a photo of himself in a post on a See, with the words "South Carolina, we come!"

en: Berkeley says housing market back to "normal"
de: Berkeley erklärt Wohnungsmarkt wieder für "normal"
translated_de: Berkeley declared the housing market again as "normal"

en: One of London's most prominent property developers has warned that the housing market in southeast England has "reverted" to normal levels of activity.
de: Einer der prominentesten Bauunternehmer Londons wies darauf hin, dass der Wohnungsmarkt im Südosten Englands wieder zu normalem Niveau "zurückgekehrt" sei.
translated_de: One of the prominent builders in London said that the housing market in South-East England is returning to normal levels.

en: Homes in the capital have been the subject of red-hot demand and surging prices, with widespread fears of a credit bubble prompting the Bank of England to impose limits on mortgage borrowing in June.
de: Eigenheime im der Hauptstadt waren heiß begehrt und Gegenstand enormer Preisanstiege, was die Bank von England aufgrund der weit verbreiteten Furcht vor einer Kreditblase dazu bewog, im Juni Obergrenzen für Hypothekenkredite zu setzen.
translated_de: The capital city was a hot and imposing price rises, and the Bank of England was forced to set the limit for hypotheken loans in June due to the widespread discontent of the widespread influx of loans.

en: Tony Pidgley, founder and chairman of upmarket housebuilder Berkeley, on Monday said: "Since the start of the current financial year, the market has reverted to normal transaction levels from the high point in 2013," adding that this offered a "stable operating environment."
de: Tony Pidgley, Gründer und Vorstandsvorsitzender des hochklassigen Bauunternehmens Berkeley sagte am Montag: "Seit Beginn des aktuellen Finanzjahrs ist der Markt wieder auf normale Transaktionsniveaus seit dem Höchststand 2013 zurückgekehrt" und fügte hinzu, dass dies eine "stabile Handlungsumgebung" biete.
translated_de: Tony Pidgley, founder and CEO of the high-profile Berkeley construction company, said on Monday that "the market is returning to normal transparency since the peak of 2013" and added that it is a "stability of action" statement.

en: London's property market fared well during the downturn as foreign buyers piled into the capital.
de: Der Immobilienmarkt in London war während des Abschwungs gut aufgestellt, da ausländische Käufer in die Hauptstadt drängten.
translated_de: The London property market was badly damaged during the collapse, when foreign buyers in the capital were slammed.

en: Prices in the city have leapt 18.5 per cent in the past year alone, according to Land Registry data, far outstripping the 6.7 per cent average for England and Wales as a whole.
de: Nach Informationen des Katasteramts sind die Preise im Stadtgebiet allein im vergangenen Jahr sprunghaft um 18,5 Prozent angestiegen, weit mehr als der durchschnittliche Anstieg in England und Wales insgesamt.
translated_de: According to the Katasteramts, the prices in the city area increased by 18,5 percent last year, much more than the average increase in England and Wales.

en: Average selling prices on Berkeley's private, affordable and student schemes have risen by about a fifth in the past year, reaching £423,000 at the end of April.
de: Die durchschnittlichen Verkaufspreise bei Berkeleys privaten, preiswerten und studentischen Angeboten stiegen um ungefähr ein Fünftel im vergangen Jahr und lagen Ende April um die 423.000 £.
translated_de: The average sales price for private, high-quality and student-only products in Berkeley has increased by around five times last year and ended April at £ 423,000.

en: However, a strengthening pound has in recent months made London property less attractive to foreign buyers - some of whom have also been deterred by the introduction of new property taxes and political rhetoric around a potential "mansion tax" ahead of the general election next May.
de: Ein stärkeres Pfund hat jedoch in den letzten Monaten Immobilieneigentum in London für ausländische Käufer weniger attraktiv gemacht - einige von ihnen sind auch durch die Einführung neuer Immobiliensteuern und politischer Rhetorik um eine mögliche "Villensteuer" vor den allgemeinen Wahlen im kommenden Mai abgeschreckt worden.
translated_de: However, a more substantial Pfund has made the London property market less attractive for foreign buyers in recent months - some of them are also a result of the introduction of new taxation and political rhetoric to a possible "taxation" before the general elections in the coming month.

en: London estate agent Foxtons last week warned that April's Mortgage Market Review, which introduced tougher lending rules, would also spark lower rates of market growth in both property sales transactions and prices during the second half of the year.
de: Der Londoner Immobilienmakler Foxtons warnte in der vergangenen Woche, dass der Hypothekenmarktbericht für April, in dem schärfere Kreditvergaberegelungen vorgestellt wurden, in der zweiten Jahreshälfte auch zu geringerem Marktwachstum sowohl beim Immobilienverkauf wie bei den Preisen führen würde.
translated_de: The Londoner Foxtons warned last week that the hypotheken market report for April, which was presented with a slick regulation of credit, would also lead to a low market growth in the second quarter, both in terms of property sales and in terms of prices.

en: Fresh data from the Bank of England on Monday showed a drop in the number of mortgage approvals in July, further suggesting the housing market is cooling.
de: Neue Daten der Bank von England vom Montag zeigen einen Rückgang bei der Hypothekenbewilligung im Juli, was ebenfalls darauf hindeutet, dass sich der Immobilienmarkt abkühlt.
translated_de: New data from the Bank of England show that a return to the mortgage lending scheme in July was also a sign that the market was sluggish.

en: Hamptons International, another estate agent, has cut its 2015 forecast for London property price growth to 3 per cent on the basis that house price sentiment is already starting to weaken.
de: Hamptions International, eine andere Immobilienagentur, korrigierte seine Voraussage für den Anstieg der Immobilienpreise in London für 2015 nach unten auf 3 Prozent, auf der Grundlage eines bereits jetzt schwächelnden Hauspreisbewußtseins.
translated_de: Hamptions International, a other property agency, korrigated his proposal for the increase in the London property prices for 2015 by 3%, on the basis of a house price agreement which is already in the works.

en: Transaction volumes have meanwhile dropped by a quarter year on year in London's most expensive postcodes, such as Chelsea, Mayfair and Kensington, according to agent WA Ellis.
de: Das Transaktionsvolumen in den teuersten Gegenden Londons wie Chelsea, Mayfair und Kensington ist mittlerweile Jahr für Jahr um ein Viertel zurückgegangen, so der Makler WA Ellis.
translated_de: The volume of transaktions in the most expensive areas of London, such as Chelsea, Mayfair and Kensington, has now gone back to a quarter of an year, so the Makler WA Ellis.

en: Still, appetite for homes in the capital has been a boon to Berkeley, pushing up cash due on forward sales to more than £2.2bn.
de: Dennoch ist der Wunsch nach einem Eigenheim in der Hauptstadt für Berkeley ein Segen, da die fälligen Beträge für Terminverkäufe sich auf mehr als 2,2 Milliarden £ belaufen.
translated_de: However, the desire for a home in Berkeley' s capital is a sigh, because the accumulated sums for a fixed price of over £2 billion are being paid.

en: Mr Pidgley added: "Demand for the right product with good design in the best locations has remained resilient and, reflecting this, forward sales have been maintained."
de: Herr Pidgley fügte hinzu: "Die Nachfrage nach dem richtigen, gut geplanten Produkt an den besten Standorten blieb stabil und als Ergebnis sind auch die Terminverkäufe stabil geblieben."
translated_de: Mr Pidgley added: "The demand for the right, well planned product to be the best place has been stable and as a result, the Terminverkäufe remain stable."

en: In June the company reported it had sold 3,742 new homes in the year to the end of April - almost a third more than the pre-crisis peak in 2007.
de: Im Juni berichtete das Unternehmen, dass es 3.742 neue Eigenheime in dem Jahr bis Ende April verkauft hatte - fast ein Drittel mehr als zum Höchststand 2007 vor der Krise.
translated_de: In June, the company reported that 3.742 new homes were sold in the year to end April - fast a third more than the maximum value of 2007 before the crisis.

en: Annual pre-tax profits rose 40 per cent year on year to £380m, on revenues up 18 per cent to £1.6bn.
de: Das jährliche Vorsteuerergebnis stieg jährlich um 40 Prozent auf 280 Mio. £, der Umsatz um 18 Prozent auf 1,6 Milliarden £.
translated_de: The annual annual taxation results have increased annually to 40 per cent, on 280 Mio. EUR, and the sales are now at 18 per cent, on 1,6 billion EUR.

en: Speaking on Monday ahead of the company's annual meeting, Mr Pidgley said Berkeley's earnings for the year were anticipated to be in line with current market expectations.
de: In einer Mitteilung am Montag vor der Jahresversammlung des Unternehmens sagte Herr Pidgley, dass die Einnahmen für Berkeley im laufenden Jahr voraussichtlich den derzeitigen Markterwartungen entsprechen würden.
translated_de: In a communication made on Monday before the Annual Meeting of the Company, Mr Pidgley said that the investment in Berkeley would be based on the market expectations currently set.

en: Analyst consensus is for full-year pre-tax profit of £450m.
de: Die Analysten schätzen übereinstimmend das jährliche Vorsteuerergebnis auf 450 Mio. £.
translated_de: Analysts have estimated that the annual taxation results are 450 million pounds.

en: Berkeley shares were flat at £23.96 in afternoon London trading.
de: Berkeley-Aktien standen am Nachmittag im Londoner Handel fest bei 23,96 £.
translated_de: Berkeley-Aktien held a Londoner Handel event on afternoon at £ 23,96.

en: Nude photos of Jennifer Lawrence leaked online by hacker
de: Nacktfotos von Jennifer Lawrence durch Hacker im Internet veröffentlicht
translated_de: New photos of Jennifer Lawrence by Hacker on the Internet

en: Jennifer Lawrence arrives at the 85th annual Academy Awards.
de: Jennifer Lawrence Auftritt bei der 85. Oscarverleihung.
translated_de: Jennifer Lawrence is on the podium at the 85th Oscar.

en: Nude photos of Oscar-winning actress Jennifer Lawrence have been leaked online by a hacker who claimed to have a "master list" of images of 100 other starlets.
de: Nacktfotos des Oscarpreisträgerin Jennifer Lawrence wurden online von einem Hacker veröffentlicht, der behauptete, eine "Masterliste" von Bildern weiterer 100 Starlets zu haben.
translated_de: The photos of Oscar-winning actress Jennifer Lawrence were published online by a hacker who claimed to have a "Masterlist" of images of more than 100 stars.

en: A representative for the star of "The Hunger Games" confirmed the photos of Lawrence were real and blasted the hacker for "a flagrant violation of privacy."
de: Ein Vertreter des Stars aus "Die Tribute von Panem" bestätigte, dass die Fotos von Lawrence echt seien und klagte den Hacker wegen "eklatanter Verletzung der Privatsphäre" an.
translated_de: One representative of the Stars from "The Tribute of Panem" confirmed that Lawrence photos were real and that Hacker was a victim of "eloquent violation of private privacy".

en: The authorities have been contacted and will prosecute anyone who posts the stolen photos of Jennifer Lawrence.
de: Die Behörden wurden benachrichtigt und werden all diejenigen verfolgen, die die gestohlenen Fotos von Jennifer Lawrence weiterposten.
translated_de: The authorities were rewarded and all those who have been following the photos of Jennifer Lawrence will be re-posted.

en: The photos, which originally were posted on the image-sharing site 4chan, were purportedly obtained through a weakness in Apple's iCloud online storage system, and a purported "master list" of the hacking victims includes the names of dozens of female stars, including Rihanna, Kim Kardashian, Mary Elizabeth Winstead and Mary-Kate Olsen, according to BuzzFeed.
de: Die Fotos, die ursprünglich auf der Foto-Sharing-Seite 4chan gepostet wurden, wurden angeblich durch eine Lücke im Online-Speichersystem iCloud von Apple beschafft. Die angebliche "Masterliste" der Hackingopfer umfasst die Namen Dutzender weiblicher Stars, darunter Rihanna, Kim Kardashian, Mary Elizabeth Winstead und Mary-Kate Olsen, berichtete BuzzFeed.
translated_de: The photos originally posted on the photo-sharing page 4chan were subsequently slashed by a Lücke in the Online Storage System iCloud by Apple.

en: It is not clear how many of the images are authentic, though "Scott Pilgrim vs. the World" star Winstead took to Twitter to denounce the hack as well.
de: Es ist nicht sicher, wie viele der Bilder echt sind, obwohl Winstead, Star aus "Scott Pilgrim gegen den Rest der Welt" auf Twitter ebenfalls den Hack verurteilte.
translated_de: It is not as secure as many images are, although Winstead, Star from the Scottish Pilgrim against the Rest of the World on Twitter also criticise the Hack.

en: "To those of you looking at photos I took with my husband years ago in the privacy of our home, hope you feel great about yourselves," Winstead tweeted.
de: "An diejenigen von euch, die sich Fotos ansehen, die mein Mann und ich vor Jahren im privaten Umfeld unseres Hauses aufgenommen haben - ich hoffe, ihr seid so richtig zufrieden mit euch", schrieb Winstead auf Twitter.
translated_de: "As you see the photos taken by my Mann and I have taken them in our private environment for years - I hope they are so happy with you," he wrote on Twitter.

en: However, Victoria Justice, of the Nickolodeon series "iCarly" and "Victorious," denied that the photos were of her, tweeting, "These so called nudes of me are FAKE people.
de: Victoria Justice aus den Nickolodeonserien "iCarly" und "Victorious" stritt jedoch ab, dass es sich bei den Fotos um Bilder von ihr handele und tweetete "Diese sogenannten Nacktbilder von mir sind GEFÄLSCHT, Leute.
translated_de: Victoria Justice, from the Nickolodeon series "iCarly" and "Victorious", is not saying that the photos are based on their handele and tweets "The so-called Nacktbilder of me are GEFLSCHT, people.

en: Let me nip this in the bud right now. *pun intended*.
de: Wehren wir doch mal gleich den Anfängen. *Wortspiel beabsichtigt*.
translated_de: We are not a single person, but we are a bit concerned with the 'worstspiel'.

en: Buzzfeed reported late Sunday that a spokesman for pop star Ariana Grande denied that purported photos of her were authentic.
de: Buzzfeed berichtete am späten Sonntag, dass ein Sprecher des Popstars Ariana Grande die Echtheit der angeblichen Fotos von ihr abstritt.
translated_de: Buzzfeed reported late Sunday that a spokeswoman for the popstar Ariana Grande was able to show the authenticity of the photographs they have taken.

en: Exclusive extract from Howard Jacobson's acclaimed new novel about love and the letter 'J'
de: Exklusiver Auszug aus Howard Jacobsons hochgelobtem neuen Roman über Liebe und den Buchstaben "J".
translated_de: Exklusive withdrawal from Howard Jacobsons' s new Roman on Liebe and the Buchstabins "J".

en: They dissolved, that was the best way of putting it, they gradually came apart like a cardboard box that had been left out in the rain.
de: Sie zerflossen, so konnte man es am besten beschreiben, sie lösten sich langsam auf wie ein Karton, den man im Regen hat stehen lassen.
translated_de: You have slowed down, so I am best to say that they are slowly resolving as a Karton, which has been a keeper in the Regen.

en: Just occasionally a woman told him he was too serious, hard-going, intense, detached, and maybe a bit prickly.
de: Gelegentlich sagte ihm eine Frau, er sei zu ernsthaft, anstrengend, intensiv, distanziert und vielleicht etwas kratzbürstig.
translated_de: It was a Mrs who said that she would be a bit more affluent, more affluent, dissatisfied and perhaps a bit crazy.

en: And then shook his hand.
de: Und schüttelte ihm dann die Hand.
translated_de: And then he shook the hand.

en: He recognised prickly.
de: Kratzbürstig kannte er.
translated_de: Kratzbürstig kannte it.

en: He was spiny, like a hedgehog, yes.
de: Er war stachelig, wie in Igel, ja.
translated_de: It was a stale thing, as in Igel.

en: The latest casualty of this spininess was an embryo-affair that had given greater promise than usual of relieving the lonely tedium of his life, and perhaps even bringing him some content.
de: Das letzte Opfer dieser Stacheligkeit war eine gerade beginnende Affäre, die vielversprechender für eine Linderung der einsamen Langeweile seines Lebens gewesen war als sonst, und ihm vielleicht sogar eine gewisse Zufriedenheit gebracht hätte.
translated_de: The last victim of this stability was a very startling aff which was much more likely to be a re-election of the long-term life of the aforementioned, and perhaps a certain satisfaction would have been brought to him.

en: Ailinn Solomons was a wild-haired, quiveringly delicate beauty with a fluttering heart from a northern island village more remote and rugged even than Port Reuben.
de: Ailinn Solomons war eine zitternd zarte Schönheit mit ungezähmten Haaren und einem flatternden Herzen aus einem Dorf auf der Nordinsel, das sogar noch abgelegener und rauer war als Port Reuben.
translated_de: Ailinn Solomons was a zart beauty with ungeshy hair and a flattering heart from a village on the North Island, which was so much more adrift and a raunchy port.

en: She had come south with an older companion whom Kevern took to be her aunt, the latter having been left a property in a wet but paradisal valley called, felicitously, Paradise Valley.
de: Sie war mit einer älteren Begleitung nach Süden gekommen, die Kevern für ihre Tante hielt, und die ein Grundstück in einem feuchten aber paradiesischen Tal mit dem treffenden Namen Paradise Valley geerbt hatte.
