en: Alone again, Ailinn Solomons looked at her feet.
de: Als sie wieder allein war, blickte Ailinn Solomons auf ihre Füße.
translated_de: As they were re-elected, Solomons stood on their feet.

en: A score or so years before the events related above, Esme Nussbaum, an intelligent and enthusiastic 32-year-old researcher employed by Ofnow, the non-statutory monitor of the Public Mood, prepared a short paper on the continuance of low- and medium-level violence in those very areas of the country where its reduction, if not its cessation, was most to have been expected, given the money and energy expended on uprooting it.
de: Etliche Jahre vor den gerade erzählten Vorkommnissen arbeitete Esme Nussbaum, eine intelligente und begeisterte 32-jährige Forscherin im Auftrag von Ofnow, dem nichtlegislativen Überwachungsorgan für die öffentliche Stimmung, an einem kurzen Vortrag über die fortgesetzte Gewalt auf niedrigem und mittlerem Niveau in genau den Landesteilen, in denen deren Verringerung, wenn nicht Abschaffung, am ehesten zu erwarten gewesen werden, in Anbetracht der Gelder und Energie, die in die Ausrottung dieser Gewalt investiert worden waren.
translated_de: In the last few years, the newly recalled proposal was conceived by the 'employee', a 32-year-old forscherin, in the order of Ofnow, the non-legislative monitoring body for public opinion, and a short talk on the fortified violence at low and medium levels in precisely the regions, in the reduction of the amount of money and energy invested in the destruction of this violence, if not abolished.

en: "Much has been done, and much continues to be done," she wrote, "to soothe the native aggressiveness of a people who have fought a thousand wars and won most of them, especially in those twisted knarls and narrow crevices of the country where, though the spires of churches soar above the hedgerows, the sweeter breath of human kindness has, historically, been rarely felt.
de: "Es wurde schon viel getan, und viel muss noch getan werden," schrieb sie, "um die angeborene Aggressivität eines Volkes zu beschwichtigen, das tausend Kriege geführt und die meisten davon gewonnen hat, insbesondere in den abgelegenen Ecken und Tälern des Landes, in denen der süße Atem menschlicher Freundlichkeit historisch gesehen trotz der hochaufragenden Kirchtürme zwischen den Hecken selten verspürt wurde.
translated_de: "It has been a lot of progress and it has to be done much more," he wrote, "to ensure that the abolition of a population is a vital force, which has led thousands of wars and which have gained most of them, particularly in the disputed corners and villages of the country, in the sense of human kindness, even though the soaring cries between the cries of the cries of the cries of the cries of the cries of the

en: But some qualities are proving to be ineradicable.
de: Aber einige Eigenschaften stellen sich als unausrottbar heraus.
translated_de: But some qualities are not as good.

en: The higher the spire, it would seem, the lower the passions it goes on engendering.
de: Je höher der Kirchturm, so scheint es, desto geringer die Leidenschaft, die er weiterhin weckt.
translated_de: I am more than the Kirchturm, so I think it is less than the passion which is still sucked.

en: The populace weeps to sentimental ballads, gorges on stories of adversity overcome, and professes to believe ardently in the virtues of marriage and family life, but not only does the old brutishness retain a pertinacious hold equally on rural communities as on our urban conurbations, evidence suggests the emergence of a new and vicious quarrelsomeness in the home, in the workplace, on our roads and even on our playing fields.
de: Die Bevölkerung weint beim Hören sentimentaler Balladen, berauscht sich an Geschichten über überwundene Schwierigkeiten und behauptet, fest an die Tugenden von Heirat und Familienleben zu glauben, aber dennoch hält nicht nur die frühere Rohheit die ländlichen Gemeinden ebenso wie unsere städtischen Gefüge fest in der Hand, sondern es gibt auch Belege für das Entstehen einer neuen und hinterhältigen Streitsucht zu Hause, am Arbeitsplatz, auf den Straßen und sogar auf den Spielfeldern.
translated_de: The population is a smuggler of sentimental Balladen, a story of overwunding difficulties and, of course, a feast on the tumultuous villages of Heirat and Family life, but, in the meantime, it does not only keep the rural communities alive as our urban communities, but also gives a badge for the establishment of a new and persistent reiteration to houses, on the job site, on the roads and so on.

en: "You have an unfortunate tendency to overwrite," her supervisor said when he had read the whole report.
de: "Sie haben eine unglückliche Tendenz zur Übertreibung," meinte ihr Mentor, als er den ganzen Bericht gelesen hatte.
translated_de: "They have a terrible attitude towards treason," meintes their mentor, as he read the entire report.

en: May I suggest you read fewer novels.
de: Ich schlage vor, dass Sie weniger Romane lesen.
translated_de: I believe that you are less Roman.

en: Esme Nussbaum lowered her head.
de: Esme Nussbaum senkte ihren Kopf.
translated_de: The President of the Council, Mr Nussbaum, has shook his head.

en: I must also enquire: are you an atheist?
de: Ich muss auch fragen: sind Sie Atheist?
translated_de: I also need to ask: are you atheist?

en: "I believe I am not obliged to say," Esme Nussbaum replied.
de: "Ich glaube, das muss ich nicht sagen," antwortete Esme Nussbaum.
translated_de: "I believe that I must not say that," said Esme Nussbaum.

en: Are you a lesbian?
de: Sind Sie lesbisch?
translated_de: Are you lesbisch?

en: Again Esme protested her right to privacy and silence.
de: Wieder berief sich Esme auf ihr Recht auf Privatsphäre und Verweigerung der Aussage.
translated_de: It is a good idea to ask the public to defend their rights on private matters and on the basis of the apologies.

en: A feminist?
de: Feministin?
translated_de: Feminist?

en: Silence once more.
de: Wieder Schweigen.
translated_de: Re-Suède.

en: "I don't ask," Luther Rabinowitz said at last, "because I have an objection to atheism, lesbianism or feminism.
de: "Ich frage das nicht," sagte Luther Rabinowitz schließlich, "weil ich gegen Atheismus, Lesbentum oder Feminismus wäre.
translated_de: "I do not want to do that," said Luther Rabinowitz, "because I would be against the atheism, the aristocracy or the feminism."

en: This is a prejudice-free workplace.
de: Das hier ist ein vorurteilsfreier Arbeitsplatz.
translated_de: This is a very poor job.

en: We are the servants of a prejudice-free society.
de: Wir dienen einer vorurteilsfreien Gesellschaft.
translated_de: We serve a prejudice-free society.

en: But certain kinds of hypersensitivity, while entirely acceptable and laudable in themselves, may sometimes distort findings such as you have presented to me.
de: Aber bestimmte Arten von Hypersensibilität, die an sich absolut akzeptabel und lobenswert sind, können gelegentlich Ergebnisse, wie Sie sie vorgestellt haben, verzerren.
translated_de: But certain types of hypersensibilities which are absolutely acceptable and worthy can, in some cases, be reduced to the results they have presented.

en: You are obviously yourself prejudiced against the church; and those things you call "vicious" and "brutish," others could as soon interpret as expressions of natural vigour and vitality.
de: Sie selbst haben offensichtlich Vorurteile gegen die Kirche, und diese Dinge, die Sie als "hinterhältig" und "roh" bezeichnen, könnten von anderen ebenso gut als Ausdruck einer natürlich Kraft und Vitalität interpretiert werden.
translated_de: You have obviously expressed prejudices against the church and these things, which you call "hinterhältig" and "roh" , could also be interpreted as a manifesto of natural power and vitality.

en: To still be harping on about WHAT HAPPENED, IF IT HAPPENED, as though it happened, if it happened, yesterday, is to sap the country of its essential life force.
de: Wenn man weiter auf dem herumreitet, WAS GESCHEHEN IST, WENN ES GESCHEHEN IST, als ob es, falls es geschehen wäre, gestern geschehen wäre, bedeutet, dem Land seine wesentliche Lebenskraft zu nehmen.
translated_de: If we continue to say that WAS GESCHEHENIST, WENN ES GESCHEHENIST, as if it would happen, then it would happen yesterday, and it would mean that the country will take its vitality.

en: Esme Nussbaum looked around her while Rabinowitz spoke.
de: Esme Nussbaum sah sich um, während Rabinowitz sprach.
translated_de: Mr Nussbaum is a good candidate for Rabinowitz.

en: Behind his head a flamingo pink LED scroll repeated the advice Ofnow had been dispensing to the country for the last quarter of a century or more.
de: Hinter seinem Kopf wiederholte ein LED-Schriftzug in Flamingorosa die Ratschläge, die Ofnow dem Land im letzten Vierteljahrhundert oder länger erteilt hatte.
translated_de: In Flamingorosa, a LED-scratch has been re-opened, and the Ratschläges have been re-emerged in the last quarter of the century or longer.

en: Smile at your neighbour, cherish your spouse, listen to ballads, go to musicals, use your telephone, converse, explain, listen, agree, apologise.
de: Lächeln Sie ihren Nachbarn an, wertschätzen Sie ihren Partner, hören Sie Balladen, besuchen Sie Musicals, nutzen Sie ihr Telefon, sprechen Sie, erklären Sie, hören Sie zu, stimmen Sie zu, entschuldigen Sie sich.
translated_de: You are a member of the club, a partner, a lover, a musical, a telephone, a telephone, a voice, a voice, a voice, a voice, a voice, a voice, a voice, a voice, a voice, a voice, a voice, a voice, a voice, a voice, a voice, a voice, a voice, a voice, a voice, a voice, a voice,

en: Talk is better than silence, the sung word is better than the written, but nothing is better than love.
de: Sprechen ist besser als Schweigen, das gesungene Wort ist besser als das geschriebene, aber nichts ist besser als Liebe.
translated_de: Speaking is better than Swedish, the words are better than the written, but nothing is better than love.

en: "I fully understand the points you are making," Esme Nussbaum replied in a quiet voice, once she was certain her supervisor had finished speaking, "and I am saying no more than that we are not healed as effectively as we delude ourselves we are.
de: "Ich verstehe absolut, worauf Sie hinaus wollen," antwortete Esme Nussbaum mit ruhiger Stimme, als sie sicher war, dass ihr Vorgesetzter zu Ende gesprochen hatte, "und ich sage nichts anderes, als dass wir noch nicht so wirksam geheilt sind, wie wir uns selbst vormachen.
translated_de: "I understand absolutely what you want to do," he said with calm voice, as he assured them that their predecessor had spoken to end, "and I do not think that we are still not so effective as we do ourselves."

en: My concern is that, if we are not forewarned, we will find ourselves repeating the mistakes that led to WHAT HAPPENED, IF IT HAPPENED, in the first place.
de: Meine Besorgnis liegt darin, dass wir ohne Vorwarnung uns womöglich dabei wiederfinden, wie wir die Fehler wiederholen, die überhaupt erst zu DEM WAS GESCHEHEN IST, WENN ES GESCHEHEN IST führten.
translated_de: My concern is that we can, without any warning, find out how we can recover the errors which, in fact, were caused by DEM WAS GESCHEHENIST, WENN ES GESCHEHENIST.

en: Only this time it will not be on others that we vent our anger and mistrust.
de: Dieses Mal sind es aber nicht die anderen, an denen wir unsere Wut und unser Misstrauen auslassen.
translated_de: This is not the other, but we are letting our anger and our Misstrauen be wiped out.

en: Luther Rabinowitz made a pyramid of his fingers.
de: Luther Rabinowitz formte mit den Händen eine Pyramide.
translated_de: Luther Rabinowitz formte a pyramid.

en: This was to suggest infinite patience.
de: Um damit eine Engelsgeduld anzudeuten.
translated_de: I want to suggest a Engel.

en: "You go too far," he said, "in describing as "mistakes" actions which our grandparents might or might not have taken.
de: "Sie gehen zu weit," sagte er, "wenn Sie Handlungen als "Fehler" bezeichnen, die unsere Großeltern vielleicht oder auch nicht begangen haben.
translated_de: "You are going to be far too far," he said, "you are a frightened person who may have been a frightened man or not.

en: You go too far, as well, in speaking of them venting their "anger" and "mistrust" on "others."
de: Sie gehen auch zu weit, wenn Sie davon sprechen, dass diese ihre "Wut" und ihr "Misstrauen" an "anderen" ausgelassen hätten.
translated_de: You also go far too far, if you say that they have 'sut' and 'sustainability' to be 'anders'.

en: It should not be necessary to remind someone in your position that in understanding the past, as in protecting the present, we do not speak of "us" and "them."
de: Es sollte eigentlich nicht notwendig sein, jemandem in Ihrer Position daran zu erinnern, dass wir beim Verständnis der Vergangenheit wie beim Schutz der Gegenwart, nicht von "uns" und "anderen" sprechen.
translated_de: It should not be necessary to remind anyone in your position that we are not talking about "uns" and "anders" in the understanding of the past.

en: There was no "we" and there were no "others."
de: Es gab kein "wir" und es gab keine "anderen".
translated_de: It was not "we" and no "anders".

en: It was a time of disorder, that is all we know of it.
de: Es war eine Zeit der Unordnung, das ist alles, was wir wissen.
translated_de: It was a time of confusion, which is everything we know.

en: "In which, if we are honest with ourselves," Esme dared to interject, "no section of society can claim to have acquitted itself well.
de: "Von der, wenn wir ehrlich zu uns selbst sind," wagte Esme einzuwerfen, "kein Teil der Gesellschaft behaupten kann, sich gut verhalten zu haben.
translated_de: "If we are honest to ourselves, we should ask ourselves to say that no part of society can be able to have good behaviour.

en: I make no accusations.
de: Ich klage niemanden an.
translated_de: I cannot blame anyone.

en: Whether it was done ill, or done well, what was done was done.
de: Ob es schlecht oder gut getan wurde, was geschehen ist, ist geschehen.
translated_de: It is not a bad or bad thing to be done.

en: Then was then.
de: Das war damals.
translated_de: That was the time.

en: No more needs to be said - on this we agree.
de: Dazu muss nichts mehr gesagt werden - da sind wir uns einig.
translated_de: This is not enough, but we are here.

en: And just as there is no blame to be apportioned, so there are no amends to be made, were amends appropriate and were there any way of making them.
de: Und genau wie keine Schuld zugewiesen werden muss, so muss auch keine Schuld getilgt werden, falls eine solche Tilgung angemessen wäre und falls es einen Weg gäbe, sie zu tilgen.
translated_de: And as no school must be given, no school must be given, if such a tilgung would be appropriate and if it is a way to tilgen.

en: But what is the past for if not to learn from it -
de: Aber zu was dient die Vergangenheit, wenn wir nicht daraus lernen -
translated_de: But this was a good time for us to learn -

en: The past exists in order that we forget it.
de: Die Vergangenheit dient dazu, dass wir sie vergessen.
translated_de: The past serves to forget us.

en: If I may add one word to that -
de: Wenn ich dazu etwas sagen darf -
translated_de: If I can say that, I would like to say that.

en: Luther Rabinowitz collapsed his pyramid.
de: Luther Rabinowitz ließ seine Pyramide zusammenfallen.
translated_de: Luther Rabinowitz sat down his pyramids.

en: "I will consider your report," he said, dismissing her.
de: "Ich werde ihren Bericht bedenken," sagte er und entließ sie.
translated_de: "I will think of their report," he said and said.

en: The next day, turning up for work as usual, she was knocked down by a motorcyclist who had mounted the pavement in what passers-by described as a "vicious rage."
de: Am nächsten Tag, als sie wie gewohnt zur Arbeit ging, wurde sie von einem Motorradfahrer überfahren, der, wie Passanten beschrieben, in einer Art "brutaler Wut" auf den Fußweg gefahren war.
translated_de: The next day, as they were working, they were driven by a motorcyclist who, as Passanten described, was a "brutal wrath" on the footpath.

en: Coincidences happen.
de: Zufälle gibt es.
translated_de: There are some cases.

en: Lesotho military says no coup planned; PM stays in South Africa
de: Lesotho-Militärmitglied sagt, dass kein Staatsstreich geplant sei; Premierminister bleibt in Südafrika
translated_de: The Italian Member said that no State-run government was planned; the Premier Minister remains in South Africa

en: Lesotho military officials denied staging a coup to overthrow the government, saying they were acting against police suspected of trying to arm political fanatics.
de: Offizielle Vertreter des Militärs in Lesotho stritten ab, einen Staatsstreich zum Sturz der Regierung geplant zu haben und sagten, dass sie gegen Polizisten vorgingen, denen die Bewaffnung politischer Fanatiker vorgeworfen wird.
translated_de: The military representatives in Lesotho are stepping down to have a State Reich to Sturz the Government planned and said that they are against policyists who will be threatening the political fanatical era.

en: Prime Minister Thomas Thabane fled the country, saying the country's military had surrounded his official home and seized government buildings in the capital of Maseru.
de: Premierminister Thomas Thabane floh aus dem Land und teilte mit, dass die Armee des Landes seinen Amtswohnsitz umzingelt und Regierungsgebäude in der Hauptstadt Maseru besetzt habe.
translated_de: Premier Thomas Thabane floh from the country and said that the Armed Forces of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the Republic of the

en: The premier took his family to neighboring South Africa after saying he received an assassination threat.
de: Der Premier brachte seine Familie in das angrenzende Südafrika, nachdem er von Attentatsdrohungen berichtet hatte.
translated_de: The Premier brought his family to the south of South Africa, according to the report from the Council of Attentats.

en: Military spokesman Major Ntlele Ntoi said there was not, in fact, a coup, but that the military was responding to a threat from "political fanatics" whom police were attempting to arm.
de: Militärsprecher Major Ntlele Ntoi sagte, dass es de facto keinen Staatsstreich gebe, dass aber das Militär auf die Bedrohung durch "politische Fanatiker" reagiere, deren Bewaffnung durch die Polizei bevorstand.
translated_de: Major Ntlele Ntoi, Militärsprecher, said that it is not a state of affairs, but that the Militarians are reassuring the threat of 'political fanaticism' which is a threat to the police.

en: "What happened this morning was that the command of the Lesotho Defense Force was acting after receiving several intelligence reports that amongst the police service, there are some elements who are actually planning to arm some of the political, party political youth fanatics who were on the verge of wreaking havoc," he told Voice of America.
de: "Was heute morgen geschah war, dass der Stab der Verteidigungskräfte von Lesotho agierte, nachdem er mehrere Geheimdienstberichte erhalten hatte, dass innerhalb der Polizei einige Elemente agieren, die tatsächlich einige der politischen, parteipolitischen jungen Fanatiker bewaffnen wollten, die kurz davor standen, verheerenden Schaden anzurichten," sagte er gegenüber Voice of America.
translated_de: "As of today, the Stab of the Lesotho Police forces has appointed several reports on the police' s response to certain elements which, in fact, were a few of the political, political young fanatics who had been threatening to suffer, which were just too late," said the former President of the United States Voice.

en: South African government spokesman Clayson Monyela said the military's actions had the appearance at an overthrow.
de: Der südafrikanische Regierungssprecher Clayson Monyela sagte, die Militäraktion habe den Eindruck eines Umsturzes gemacht.
translated_de: The Swedish Government spokeswoman, Clayson Monyela, said that the military action had a sense of turbulence.

en: "Although no one has claimed to have taken over government through the use of force, by all accounts the activities of the Lesotho defense force thus far bear the hallmarks of a coup d'etat," he said.
de: "Auch wenn niemand behauptet hat, die Regierung durch Gewalt an sich gerissen zu haben, sind sich alle Berichte darüber einig, dass die Aktivitäten der Verteidigungskräfte von Lesotho bisher Anzeichen für einen Staatsstreich zeigen," sagte er.
translated_de: "As long as nobody has claimed that the government has been abused by violence, all reports are saying that the activities of the Lesotho military forces have been a sign of a state," he said.

en: Lesotho military officials said soldiers returned to their barracks Sunday and there was calm in the capital.
de: Sprecher des Militärs von Lesotho teilten am Sonntag mit, dass die Soldaten sich in ihre Kasernen zurückzögen und die Lage in der Hauptstadt ruhig sei.
translated_de: The President of the Lesotho Military said on Sunday that the Soldaten are back in their Kasernes and are still in the main city.

en: Meanwhile, Deputy Prime Minister Mothetjoa Metsing in control of the government in Thabane's absence.
de: In der Zwischenzeit übernimmt der Vizepremier Mothetjoya Metsing die Regierungsführung während Thabanes Abwesenheit.
translated_de: In the interim, the Vice President of the Council assumes the administration during the Thabanes absence.

en: Thabane said he believes he is being targeted due to his attempt to fight corruption in the country.
de: Thabane teilte mit, dass er glaubt, er sei wegen seines Versuchs, die Korruption im Land zu bekämpfen, zur Zielscheibe geworden.
translated_de: Thabane is a part of the idea that he would allow him to fight corruption in the country to be a target.

en: Tensions have been high in Lesotho since June when Thabane suspended parliament sessions due to feuding in his unity government.
de: In Lesotho gab es seit Juni große Spannungen, nachdem Thabane Parlamentssitzungen aufgrund der Auseinandersetzungen in seiner Einheitsregierung aussetzte.
translated_de: In Lesotho, since June, there has been a lot of tension, resulting in Thabane Parliament' s parliamentary elections due to the separation of its unity.

en: He said his actions have not undermined the government, despite allegations otherwise.
de: Er sagte, seine Handlungen hätten die Regierung nicht unterminiert, anders lautenden Beschuldigungen zum Trotz.
translated_de: He said that his actions would not have been ruled out by the Government and that the blame was still being blamed.

en: Eurozone manufacturing at 13-month low
de: Produktion in der Eurozone auf einem 13-Monats-Tief
translated_de: Production in the Eurozone at a 13-Monat-Tief

en: Manufacturing growth in the eurozone slowed to a 13-month low in August, according to a closely-watched survey.
de: Der Anstieg bei der Produktion in der Eurozone verlangsamte sich im August auf den niedrigsten Punkt der letzten 13 Monate, so eine genau beobachtete Studie mit.
translated_de: The increase in production in the Eurozone reached the lowest point in the last 13 months, so a very detailed study.

en: The final Markit's Eurozone Manufacturing Purchasing Managers' Index (PMI) dipped to 50.7 in August, down from 51.8 in July.
de: Der endgültige Markit Einkaufsmanagerindex des produzierenden Gewerbes (PMI) fiel im August auf 50,7 in, nach einem Stand von 51,8 in im Juli.
translated_de: The end-of-the-line mark-it-shops manager index of produzier-owned businesses (PMI) is at 507 in August, with a Stand of 518, in July.

en: A figure above 50 indicates expansion.
de: Eine Angabe über 50 gibt eine Expansion an.
translated_de: A report of over 50 gives a further expansion.

en: New orders dwindled and factories suffered amid rising tensions between the EU and Russia over Ukraine.
de: Neue Aufträge gingen zurück und Fabriken erlebten Einbrüche in einer Zeit steigender Spannungen zwischen der EU und Russland über die Ukraine.
translated_de: New pressures were re-established and Fabriken experienced a brash in a time of increasing tensions between the EU and Russia over Ukraine.

en: The figures come ahead of the European Central Bank (ECB) meeting on Thursday.
de: Die Zahlen treffen vor dem Treffen der Europäischen Zentralbank (EZB) am Donnerstag ein.
translated_de: The figures are gathered at the European Central Bank meeting on Thursday.

en: Markets will be looking for a clear plan from the bank to deal with a stalled eurozone recovery, as well as the threat of deflation with inflation standing at just 0.3%.
de: Die Märkte erwarten von der Bank einen klaren Plan für den Umgang mit einer zögernden Erholung der Eurozone sowie für den drohende Deflation bei einer Inflationsrate von nur 0,3%.
translated_de: The markets expect the Bank to develop a clear plan to deal with a soaring recovery in the Eurozone and to reduce the rate of inflation by only 0.3%.

en: There is speculation that ECB boss Mario Draghi could offer further indications later this week that he is considering a quantitative easing scheme for the eurozone, similar to those taken by the UK and US during the financial crisis.
de: Es gibt Spekulationen dazu, dass der Leiter der EZB, Mario Draghi, im Verlauf dieser Woche weitere Angaben machen könnte, ob er eine quantitative Erleichterung für die Eurozone in Betracht zieht, entsprechend derjenigen, die von Großbritannien und den USA während der Finanzkrise vorgenommen wurden.
translated_de: There are some speculations that the President of the European Union, Mario Draghi, could make further statements this week, if it is to consider a quantitative increase in the Eurozone, based on those which were taken by Britain and the USA during the financial crisis.

en: "Although some growth is better than no growth at all, the braking effect of rising economic and geopolitical uncertainties on manufacturers is becoming more visible," said Rob Dobson, senior economist at Markit.
de: "Obwohl ein kleines Wachstum besser ist als gar kein Wachstum, sind die bremsenden Auswirkungen der zunehmenden wirtschaftlichen und geopolitischen Unsicherheiten für die Hersteller deutlicher geworden," sagte Rob Dobson, leitender Wirtschaftswissenschaftler bei Markit.
translated_de: "While a small growth is better than a small growth, the impact of the increasing economic and geopolitical uncertainty for the manufacturers has become much more evident," said Rob Dobson, head of economic sciences at Markit.

en: The factory PMI for Germany, Russia's biggest trade partner in the EU, fell to an 11-month low of 51.4.
de: Der Fabrik-PMI für Deutschland, dem größten Handelspartner Russlands in der EU, fiel auf den tiefsten Stand in 11 Monaten mit 51,4.
translated_de: The Fabrik-PMI for Germany, the largest trade partner Russia in the EU, is on the deepest position in 11 months with 51.4.

en: Meanwhile, in the bloc's second-largest economy, France, the PMI fell to 46.9.
de: In der Zwischenzeit fiel in der zweitgrößten Wirtschaftsnation des Blocks, Frankreich, der PMI auf 46,9.
translated_de: In the period between the two largest economic blocs, France, the PMI was 469.

en: France remains a real concern, as does Italy's descent from solid expansion to stagnation.
de: Frankreich bleibt ein Sorgenkind, wie auch der Abstieg Italiens von einer soliden Expansion zur Stagnation.
translated_de: France remains a concern, as well as the abandonment of Italy by a solid expansion of the stagnation.

en: Signs that growth impetus waned in the key industrial engine of Germany, and in Spain and the Netherlands too, is also less than reassuring," Mr Dobson said.
de: Hinweise darauf, dass Wachstumsanreize im Schlüsselindustriemechanismus Deutschland sowie in Spanien und den Niederlanden nicht mehr greifen, sind ebenfalls nicht beruhigend," sagte Herr Dobson.
translated_de: The indication that growth in the key industries in Germany and Spain and the Netherlands is not more a concern, said Mr Dobson.

en: The slowdown in industry is likely to add further fuel to the fire for analysts expecting additional monetary or fiscal stimulus to be implemented.
de: Der Rückgang der Industrie schürt vermutlich das Feuer der Analysten, die weitere monetäre oder fiskale Anreize erwarten.

en: One positive note was from the Republic of Ireland, which saw its PMI grow to 57.3, its highest level since the end of 1999.

en: Howard Archer, chief economist at IHS Global Insight, said: "The best that can be said for the August eurozone manufacturing purchasing managers' survey is that it indicates that the sector is still growing."

translated_de: Howard Archer, Chefwirtschaftsexpert at IHS Global Insight, said: "The best thing that can be said for the purchasing manager index of produzier goods in the Eurozone from August is that the sector will continue to grow."

en: He added: "Eurozone manufacturers are clearly finding life very difficult at the moment as current heightened geopolitical tensions - particularly related to Russia/Ukraine - add uncertainty to still challenging conditions in many countries.
de: Er fügte hinzu: "Produzenten in der Eurozone finden das Leben derzeit offensichtlich recht schwierig, da die aktuellen erhöhten geopolitischen Spannungen - besonders in Bezug auf Russland und die Ukraine - Unsicherheiten in den weiterhin schwierigen Bedingungen in vielen Ländern vergrößern.
translated_de: Then, he adds: "Produzents in the Eurozone are obviously rightly difficult to live in, because the increasing geopolitical tensions - particularly in relation to Russia and Ukraine - have increased in recent years, and the uncertainty in the still difficult conditions in many countries is increasing.

en: This heightened uncertainty has clearly hit business - especially, and consumer confidence, and it is likely causing some orders to be delayed or even cancelled, particularly big-ticket orders.
de: Diese erhöhten Unsicherheiten haben ganz klar die Wirtschaft beeinträchtigt - insbesondere, und das Vertrauen der Verbraucher, und führt vermutlich dazu, dass einige Aufträge verzögert oder sogar storniert werden, insbesondere Großaufträge.
translated_de: These increased uncertainty have completely influenced the economy - particularly the confidence of consumers - and it is likely that some monopolies are being storned or even storned, particularly monopolies.

en: He said it was looking "ever more likely" that the ECB would ultimately have to undertake some form of QE, "although we suspect that it will be limited."
de: Er sagte, dass es "immer wahrscheinlicher" werde, dass die EZB schließlich eine Art der QE einleiten müsse, "obwohl wir vermuten, dass dies begrenzt sein wird."
translated_de: He said that it will "immerly likely" that the EZB will let the QE be a way of defining the QE, "and we believe that this will be limited."

de: Wenn ich online das Foto von mir sehe, wie ich in die Schule zurückklettere, denke ich, dass viele Menschen es zum ersten Mal sehen, unsere Katastrophe verstehen und dazu beitragen, dass so etwas nicht wieder geschieht.

de: Sein Vater Wladimir, der seinen Sohn draußen in die Arme schloss, sagte: "Damir sagte mir, dass seine Mutter gestorben sei.

en: I couldn't believe it.

en: 'This horror comes back to you every day, but I wish I could stop recalling it,' he said yesterday.

en: I remember my trip to London so well, specially the toy shop where I was allowed to pick anything I wanted, and riding in an open top car.

en: But now he fears for places like Ukraine where wars cause the kind of misery he and his friends suffered.
de: Aber nun hat er Angst um Ort wie die Ukraine, wo Kriege die Art von Unglück verursachen, die er und seine Freunde erlitten.

en: This horror comes back to you every day, but I wish I could stop recalling it
de: Dieser Horror verfolgt dich jeden Tag, aber ich wünschte, ich könnte aufhören, mich daran zu erinnern.
translated_de: This horror is a horror that I have seen every day, but I wish to hear what I could do to remind you.

en: 'I feel so sorry for all those who suffer from these horrors,' said Damir, who was last week doing voluntary work at a nunnery.
de: "Es tut mir so leid um alle diejenigen, die unter den Greueln leiden," sagte Damir, der vergangene Woche als Freiwilliger in einem Kloster arbeitete.
translated_de: "I am so happy to all those who are suffering under the Greuels," said Damir, who worked as a volunteer in a monastery last week.

en: I want to help so much.

en: His mother Tamara, 48, said: '37 kids were killed in our neighbourhood, can you imagine?
de: Seine Mutter Tamara, 48, sagte: "37 Kinder aus unserer Nachbarschaft wurden getötet, können Sie sich das vorstellen?
translated_de: Mrs Tamara, 48, said: "37 children from our neighbouring countries have been able to imagine this?

en: I remember terrible silence right after the siege, there were just no children to shout and run around, and that silence lasted for many months.
de: Ich erinnere mich an die schreckliche Stille nach der Belagerung, es gab einfach keine Kinder, die rufen und herumlaufen konnten, und diese Stille dauerte viele Monate an.
translated_de: I have been reminded of the squeak stills after the lagering, which were simply no children who were called and enrolled and which took many months.

en: She vividly recalls her trip with Damir to London.
de: Sie erinnert sich lebhaft an ihre Reise nach London mit Damir.
translated_de: You reminded me of their journey to London with Damir.

en: People in London were crying when I told our story.
de: Die Menschen in London weinten, als ich unsere Geschichte erzählte.

en: I realised then how folk on the other side of the world can understand our feelings, can show their support.
de: Ich verstand damals, wie Menschen auf der anderen Seite der Welt unsere Gefühle verstehen können, und ihre Unterstützung zeigen.
translated_de: I remember how people can understand our feelings on the other side of the world and show their support.

en: She was grateful to 'Cherie Blair and her foundation for that award and the opportunity to go to London in autumn 2004.
de: Sie war Cherie Blair und ihrer Stiftung dankbar für den Preis und die Möglichkeit, im Herbst 2004 nach London zu reisen.
translated_de: Cherie Blair and her Foundation were grateful for the price and the opportunity to travel to London in autumn 2004.

en: I wish I could call Cherie and just say it myself that 10 years have gone but I still remember meeting her and her husband in London, and how that helped Damir and me.
de: Ich wünschte, ich könnte Cherie anrufen und ihr einfach selbst sagen, dass 10 Jahre vergangen sind, aber ich mich immer noch an das Treffen mir ihr und ihrem Mann in London erinnern, und wie das Damir und mir geholfen hat.
translated_de: I wish to call Cherie to say, and they simply say, that 10 years ago, but I am always reminded of the meeting I had with their and their Mann in London, as Damir and I have said.

en: I remember when Damir wanted to eat borsch soup, they called all the local Russian restaurants.
de: Ich erinnere mich noch, wie Damir gerne Borschtsch essen wollte und sie alle örtlichen russischen Restaurants anriefen.
translated_de: I was reminded of the way Mr Borschtsch would like to eat and they were reminded of all the Russian restaurants.

de: Ich erinnere mich, wie er mit Kellnern in einem Restaurant spielte. Damir schoss mit seiner Wasserpistole auf sie und sie rannten weg und spielten mit ihm.
translated_de: I was a little surprised by how he played with Kellners in a restaurant, and he schoss with his waterpistole and ran out and played with him.

en: And we were just one month away from our horror then.
de: Und das war nur einen Monat nach dem Horror.

en: I was amazed that the British people were so ready to share our pain and to support us.
de: Ich war überrascht, dass die Briten so bereitwillig unseren Schmerz teilten und uns unterstützten.

en: She said: 'I keep thinking this world did not get better within these 10 years.
de: Sie sagte: "Ich denke immer, dass diese Welt in diesen 10 Jahren nicht besser geworden ist.
translated_de: You said: "I always believe that this world has not been better in these 10 years.

en: Now in Ukraine the war goes on, people are dying every day, and I believe many children were killed and will be killed.
de: In der Ukraine geht der Krieg jetzt weiter, und jeden Tag sterben Menschen, und ich glaube, dass viele Kinder getötet wurden und noch getötet werden.
translated_de: In Ukraine, the war continues and every day, people are dying and I believe that many children have been killed and are still being killed.

en: They are just the same children, like ours.
de: Das sind genau solche Kinder wie unsere.

en: I think for many people the war is a news report they listen to when they are bored or busy with something else.

translated_de: I believe that many of the wars are part of the news they hear when they are being occupied or with something else.

en: I just know what those people feel, the horror of it.
de: Ich weiß einfach, was diese Menschen fühlen, den ganzen Horror.
translated_de: I know simply that these people were frightened, the whole horror.

en: And I can't stop feeling it.
de: Und ich kann nicht damit aufhören, das zu fühlen.

en: Nothing has changed, people still want to kill each other and it is so sad.
de: Nichts hat sich verändert, die Menschen wollen sich immer noch gegenseitig töten und das ist so traurig.
translated_de: It has not changed, people want to continue to be tangled and this is so traurig.

en: Damir grew up and became a very gentle and calm boy, he is not at all aggressive or angry.
de: Damir wurde groß und ist ein sehr sanfter und ruhiger Junge, er ist überhaupt nicht aggressiv oder wütend.
translated_de: This was great and is a very gentle and quiet Jungle, which is not agressive or wütty.

en: He is not seeking revenge for example, he is not preoccupied with this past horror.
de: Er sucht zum Beispiel nicht nach Rache, er ist nicht überwältigt von den vergangenen Greueln.
translated_de: This is not the case, for example, in the case of Rache, but it is not the case of the past Greuels.

en: I know that he does not like to recall it but he is very close with six classmates and they go to the gym from time to time and light candles there.
de: Ich weiß, dass er sich nicht gerne daran erinnert, aber er hat sechs enge Freunde aus der Klasse und sie gehen gelegentlich in die Sporthalle und entzünden dort Kerzen.
translated_de: I know that I do not wish to forget that, but I have six friends from the class and they are going to the sports hall and in the centre of Kerzen.

en: When he was smaller he suffered from it - I remember he used to lie down on the sofa with his face turned away from us, for hours at a time.
de: Als er kleiner war, litt er darunter - ich erinnere mich, wie er sich manchmal auf das Sofa legte, das Gesicht von uns abgewandt, stundenlang.
translated_de: As a small person, I was able to say that I am a bit confused with what I have put on the sofa, which is the face of us.

en: Not sleeping, his eyes were open.
de: Nicht schlafend, seine Augen waren offen.
translated_de: It was not sleepy, his eyes were offend.

en: I also remember how he threw away all his guns and other army-type toys.Damir is 17 now, taller than me, nice looking, clever and healthy.
de: Ich erinnere mich auch noch, wie er alle seine Waffen und sonstigen Militärspielzeuge fort warf. Damir ist jetzt 17, größer als ich, gutaussehend, intelligent und gesund.
translated_de: I also remember that all his weapons and other military products were warped, and now I am 17, more than I am, well-known, intelligent and healthy.

en: I can hardly believe that for some hours I was so sure he was dead and I'd never see him again.
de: Ich kann kaum glauben, dass ich einige Stunden lang so sicher war, dass er tot sei und ich ihn nie wieder sehen würde.
translated_de: I can only imagine that I had to wait for hours to ensure that it was to be done and that he never would see again.

en: When I managed to recover after the explosion and got on my feet I looked around, I saw the hell around me, when body parts were lying everywhere.
de: Als ich mich nach der Explosion erholte und auf die Beine kam, sah ich mich um, und sah die Hölle um mich herum, mit überall herumliegenden Körperteilen.
translated_de: As I was a witness to the explosion and the sand, I was a witness to the sand and the sand, and I was a witness to the sand, with all the bodies.

en: I was absolutely sure that there was no way my little boy could have survived in this hell.
de: Ich war absolut sicher, dass mein kleiner Junge in dieser Hölle unmöglich überlebt haben konnte.
translated_de: I was absolutely sure that my small boy in this Hölle could not live in this place.

en: 'I remember I was shouting to him 'Damir, run, run away' but again I was so sure he had not heard me.
de: "Ich erinnere mich, dass ich ihm zurief, "Damir, lauf, lauf weg", aber ich war auch so sicher, dass er mich nicht gehört hatte.
translated_de: "I reassured him that he was going to be going, but I was also so sure that he did not belong to me.

en: But he did hear, and he did run away.
de: Aber er hat es gehört und er ist weggelaufen.
translated_de: But it has been heard and it has been a long way.

en: So life goes on for us unlike for so many.
de: Und so geht das Leben, anders als das vieler anderer, für uns weiter.
translated_de: And so we will continue to live, anders than many other people.

en: Georgy Ilyin, 17
de: Georgij Ilyin, 17
translated_de: Georgij Ilyin, 17

en: The boy whose shocking image after the siege came to define the horror of Beslan
de: Der Junge, dessen schreckliches Bild nach der Belagerung zum Symbol der Greuel von Beslan wurde
translated_de: The Jungle' s resemblance to the Symbol of the Greuel of Beslan was a skewed image

en: Comfort: Beslan survivor Georgy Ilyin with his mum Fatima after the siege in 2004, while on the right is Georgy today
de: Trost: Der Beslan-Überlebende Georgij Lyin mit seiner Mutter Fatima nach der Belagerung 2004, rechts ein Bild von Georgij heute
translated_de: Trost: Georgij Lyin, a syrian-born woman with his mother Fatima, was a symphony of Georgij in 2004, and he is now a picture of him

en: His bloodstained face was etched with fear as he ran for his life as Chechen terrorists gunned down his classmates.
de: Sein blutüberströmtes Gesicht war von Angst gezeichnet, als er um sein Leben rannte, während tschetschenische Terroristen seine Klassenkameraden niederschossen.
translated_de: The blut-outs of fear were a result of the stalemate of the life of the terrorists who sat in their class cameras.

en: His picture was one of the most shocking symbols of the barbarity at Beslan.
de: Sein Bild war eines der schockierendsten Symbole für die Barbarei von Beslan.
translated_de: This is one of the most sluggish symbols for the Barbarei of Beslan.

en: His mother Fatima, 54, a senior GP, had dropped him for his first day at school before rushing to take her elder son Vladimir to university.
de: Seine Mutter Fatima, 54, eine Ärztin, hatte ihn für seinen ersten Schultag abgesetzt, bevor sie los eilte, um ihren älteren Sohn Wladimir zur Universität zu bringen.
translated_de: Seine Mutter Fatima, 54, a rztin, had a job in his first school before they were able to bring their older son Wladimir to the university.

en: 'I left two minutes before the terrorists rushed into the yard, so my little boy was left there alone for three days of horror,' she recalled.
de: "Ich verließ den Hof etwa zwei Minuten, bevor die Terroristen ihn stürmten, und so blieb mein kleiner Junge dort für drei schreckliche Tage allein," erinnert sie sich.
translated_de: "I would have to wait for two minutes before the terrorists stürmled him and I would have left my small boy alone for three resurgence days," he said.

en: Not completely alone, we had a family of relatives there but all of them were killed.
de: Nicht ganz allein, da war eine ganze Familie von Verwandten von uns, aber sie wurden alle getötet.
translated_de: It was not entirely alone, because we were all a family of people, but they were all getting a lot of attention.

en: Only my Georgy managed to survive.
de: Nur mein Georgij schaffte es, zu überleben.
translated_de: Only my Georgij has created a way to live.

en: The closer this date is, the harder it is to think and talk about it.
de: Je näher dieses Datum rückt, desto schwerer ist es, daran zu denken und darüber zu reden.
translated_de: I am adjusting this date to make it harder to think and to rediscover it.

en: There is no single day when we do not recall this tragedy.
de: Es gibt keinen einzigen Tag, an dem wir uns nicht an diese Tragödie erinnern.
translated_de: It is not a single day that we cannot remember this tragedy.

en: We do not feel it was long ago, I think it happened yesterday, some scenes from those days come to my mind all the time.
de: Wir denken nicht, dass es lange her ist, ich meine, es wäre gestern geschehen, einige Szenen aus diesen Tagen verfolgen mich immerzu.
translated_de: We do not think that it is long before it is, and I think it would happen yesterday, and I will continue to watch some scenes from this day.

en: Nobody will ever forget, I promise you.
de: Niemand wird das je vergessen, das verspreche ich Ihnen.
translated_de: I am not sure what I will say.

en: Haunting: The image of Georgy (left) was one of the most shocking of the attack and has been immortalised in a statue (right)
de: Eindringlich: Das Bild von Georgij (links) war eines der schockierendsten des Angriffs und wurde als Statue (rechts) verewigt.
translated_de: The image of Georgij (links) was one of the most threatening attacks and was a statue (right) of the country.

en: I remember Georgy so much wanted to go to school on that day, he said he wanted to hug his teacher.
de: Ich erinnere mich, dass Georgij an diesem Tag so gerne zur Schule gehen wollte. Er sagte, er wolle seinen Lehrer umarmen.
translated_de: I have said that Georgij would like to go to school on this day, and he would like to be able to speak to his teacher.

en: I only got to know he was alive when I saw him TV.
de: Ich wusste erst, dass er am Leben war, als ich ihn im Fernsehen sah.
translated_de: I first knew that I was living as I was in the TV.

en: And now there is even a statue to crying Georgy in San Marino.
de: Und nun gibt es sogar diese Statue des weinenden Georgij in San Marino.
translated_de: And now, this statue of the weinous Georgij is in San Marino.

en: Georgy does not like to look at this picture and it is hidden it in the bookcase in our home.
de: Georgij sieht das Bild nicht gerne, und es ist bei uns zu Hause im Bücherregal versteckt.
translated_de: Georgij does not like the image and it is in our house in booksregal.

en: I understand, but I also think that thanks to this picture people from all over the world feel our pain.
de: Ich verstehe das, aber ich meine auch, dass die Menschen in aller Welt dank dieses Bildes unseren Schmerz fühlen.
translated_de: I understand that, but I also understand that the people of all the world are suffering from this image.

en: Georgy says now: 'It's important this can never happen again.
de: Georgij sagt heute: "Es ist wichtig, das so etwas nie wieder geschehen kann.
translated_de: Georgij said today: "It is important that something cannot be done again.

en: 'I doubt we'll ever know the truth.
de: "Ich bezweifle, dass wir jemals die Wahrheit erfahren.
translated_de: "I am sure that we have learned the truth.

en: People keep investigating such tragedies and never know the truth.
de: Die Menschen untersuchen solche Tragödien immer wieder und erfahren nie die Wahrheit.
translated_de: The people who are suffering such tragedies are always begging for truth.

en: Now they are investigating this Boeing crash in Ukraine.
de: Und nun untersuchen sie den Absturz dieser Boeing in der Ukraine.
translated_de: And now they are calling for the Boeing to be withdrawn in Ukraine.

en: Will we ever know what caused it?
de: Werden wir jemals erfahren, was ihn verursacht hat?
translated_de: What happened to us?

en: This world is moving to something very bad.
de: Diese Welt wird zu etwas Schrecklichem.
translated_de: This world will be a bit skeptical.

en: 'I can't understand how it happens, because if you ask people, no-one wants a war, so how does it happen?
de: "Ich kann nicht verstehen, wie das möglich ist, denn wenn Sie die Menschen fragen, will niemand einen Krieg, also wie geschieht das?
translated_de: "I cannot understand how this is possible, because when you ask the people, will nobody be able to fight, as it is?

en: Ten years is nothing for such pain.
de: Zehn Jahre sind gar nichts bei solchem Schmerz.
translated_de: Years are nothing but a pain.

en: We need dozens of years to pass in order to forget it a little.
de: Wir brauchen Dutzende Jahre, um es ein klein wenig zu vergessen.
translated_de: We need years to go on, but it is a little too late.

en: It affected my health and I still feel it.
de: Es hat meine Gesundheit angegriffen und ich fühle es immer noch.
translated_de: I have been able to treat my health and I feel that I am still in the process.

en: For about three or four years I had some nightmares because of the siege but then it got better.
de: Etwa drei oder vier Jahre lang hatte ich ein paar Albträume wegen der Belagerung, aber dann wurde es besser.
translated_de: I have had a few Albträume for three or four years, but then it was better.

en: I got back to school later in 2004, I was very scared every day.
de: Ich ging später im Jahr 2004 wieder zur Schule und hatte jeden Tag Angst.
translated_de: I returned to school in 2004 and had every day panic.

en: I was thinking about my friends and classmates who were killed.
de: Ich dachte an meine Freunde und Klassenkameraden, die getötet worden waren.
translated_de: I thought about my friends and classkameras who were getting involved.

en: This is why I keep going to the gym as each 1 September approaches.
de: Darum gehe ich immer in die Sporthalle, wenn der 1. September näher rückt.
translated_de: I am always in the Sporthalle when the 1. September is closer.

en: I want to pay tribute to my old childhood friends.
de: Ich will meinen meinen alten Kindheitsfreunden Tribut zollen.
translated_de: I will zoll my old Kindness Fundreunds Tribut.

en: It is hard for me to go inside the gym but I must do it.
de: Es ist schwer für mich, in die Sporthalle zu gehen, aber ich muss es tun.
translated_de: It is difficult for me to go to the Sporthalle, but I must do it.

en: I do not feel myself a victim, this story is the part of my past now.
de: Ich fühle mich nicht als Opfer, diese Geschichte ist jetzt ein Teil meiner Vergangenheit.
translated_de: I do not feel like a victim, this history is now part of my past.

en: I will not forget it but I do not feel sorry for myself.
de: Ich werde es nicht vergessen, aber ich bemitleide mich nicht.
translated_de: I will not forget, but I do not regret it.

en: My life goes on.
de: Mein Leben geht weiter.
translated_de: My life continues.

en: I finished school this year entered a medical university in Vladikavkaz.
de: Ich habe dieses Jahr die Schule abgeschlossen und besuche eine medizinische Hochschule in Wladikawkaz.
translated_de: I have completed the school this year and visited a medical university in Wladikawkaz.

en: I will learn to be a heart surgeon.
de: Ich werde Herzchirurg werden.
translated_de: I will be undergoing cardiac surgery.

en: My first choice was to go in the army.
de: Meine erste Wahl war eine Ausbildung in der Armee.
translated_de: My first choice was to train in the Armee.

en: I wanted to be a military man, but my health did not let me.
de: Ich wollte ein Soldat werden, aber meine Gesundheit ließ das nicht zu.
translated_de: I wanted to sell a solution but my health did not allow it.

en: I wanted to fight for my country but it will not happen.
de: Ich wollte für mein Land kämpfen, aber das wird nicht geschehen.
translated_de: I wanted to fight for my country but this will not happen.

en: Georgy Farniyev, 20
de: Georgij Fanijew, 20
translated_de: Georgij Fanijew, 20

en: The boy who survived despite having been trapped at the feet of a murderous terrorist
de: Der Junge, der überlebte, obwohl er zu Füßen eines mörderischen Terroristen gefangen war
translated_de: The young people who lived in the jungle were caught by a foreign terrorist

en: Miraculous: Georgy Farniyev was trapped at the foot of a murderous terrorist during the siege but still managed to survive
de: Ein Wunder: Georgij Fanijew war während der Belagerung zu Füßen eines mörderischen Terroristen gefangen, aber er schaffte es, zu überleben.
translated_de: One miracle: Georgij Fanijew was able to escape a terrorist group during the lagering but he managed to survive.

en: As the siege was underway, he was pictured trapped inside the gym, sitting next to a bomb at the foot of a murderous terrorist.
de: Während der Belagerung war er in der Sporthalle gefangen und saß neben der Bombe, die am Fuß eines mörderischen Terroristen befestigt war.
translated_de: In the event of the incident, the sportshalle was occupied and the bombs were consolidated by a foreign terrorist.

en: It is truly a miracle he was not killed.
de: Es ist wirklich ein Wunder, dass er nicht getötet wurde.
translated_de: It is really a miracle that it has not been done.

en: 'We feel as if it was just yesterday,' said Georgy, who wanted to train as an intelligence officer in the FSB, but was unable to because of damage to his health in the siege.
de: "Wir fühlen es, als ob es gestern gewesen wäre," sagt Georgij, der als Geheimdienstoffizier zum FSB gehen wollte, aber dies wegen seiner gesundheitlichen Schäden aufgrund der Belagerung nicht tun konnte.
translated_de: "We were pleased as if it was yesterday," said Georgij, who was a FSB spokesman, but that was not done due to his health damage due to the incident.

en: It is still with me, this is not something I left behind.
de: Es ist immer noch bei mir, es ist nichts, was ich hinter mir gelassen habe.
translated_de: It is always there, and it is nothing I have been allowed to do.

en: I am older now and people use to say children easily cope with bad experience - I must say this is not true.
de: Ich bin jetzt älter und die Menschen sagen, dass Kinder leicht mit schlimmen Erfahrungen umgehen können - ich muss sagen, das stimmt nicht.
translated_de: I am now older and people say that children can be easily able to avoid terrible experiences - I must say that this is not true.

en: 'In 2006 I worked with psychologists and I did feel a bit better afterwards but I can't forget it.
de: "2006 arbeitete ich mit Psychologen und fühlte mich danach tatsächlich etwas besser, aber ich kann es nicht vergessen.
translated_de: "2006 I worked with psychologists and felt a little better then I did, but I can not forget it.

en: And I would like to forget.
de: Und ich würde gerne vergessen.
translated_de: I would like to forget.

en: 2005 - the year after - was the first and the last time when I went inside the gym again.
de: 2005 - im Jahr danach - war das erste und einzige Mal, dass ich wieder in die Sporthalle ging.
translated_de: 2005 - and then the year after that - was the first and only time I was in the Sporthalle.

en: I lost consciousness.
de: Ich verlor das Bewusstsein.
translated_de: I am aware.

en: I would never ever go there again and please don't ask me to show where I sat in that well-known picture.
de: Ich werde nie wieder dorthin zurückkehren und fragen Sie mich bitte nicht, Ihnen zu zeigen, wo ich in diesem berühmten Bild gesessen habe.
translated_de: I will never return to the area and ask you to show me what I am talking about in this famous image.

en: Survivor: Georgy Farniev pictured today, with a photograph of him in hospital follwoing the siege on his laptop
de: Überlebender: Georgij Fanijew heute, mit einem Foto von sich im Krankenhaus nach der Belagerung auf dem Laptop
translated_de: The survivors: Georgij Fanijew today, with a photo of himself in hospital after the incident on the laptop

en: My pain is enormous and I carry it with me every day.
de: Mein Schmerz ist ungeheuer und ich trage ihn jeden Tag mit mir.
translated_de: My pain is utterly painful and I traged him every day.

en: My friends know that I do not like to think or discuss it and they never asked me about the school.
de: Meine Freunde wissen, dass ich nicht gerne daran denke oder darüber spreche und sie fragten mich nie nach der Schule.
translated_de: My friends know that I do not like to speak or speak to them and they never ask me to go to school.

en: In terms of physical condition I am well.
de: Körperlich geht es mir gut.
translated_de: I am a bit nervous.

en: I should be careful with my knee which was injured but I walk fine now.
de: Ich sollte vorsichtig sein mit meinem verletzten Knie, aber ich kann jetzt gut laufen.
translated_de: I should be careful with my broken Knie, but I can now run well.

en: Still my health did not let me go and study in FSB secret service academy in St Petersburg as I wanted.
de: Aber wegen meiner Gesundheit konnte ich nicht an der Geheimdienstakademie des FSB in Sankt Petersburg studieren, wie ich wollte.
translated_de: But because of my health, I did not have the opportunity to study the FSB in Sankt Petersburg as I wanted.

en: I sent my documents, including medical papers, and they replied it was not possible.
de: Ich habe meine Unterlagen, auch die medizinischen eingeschickt und sie haben geantwortet, dass es nicht möglich sei.
translated_de: I have received my documents, and I have heard them saying that it is not possible.

en: My second passion was animals, so I went to the veterinary institute.
de: Meine zweite Leidenschaft waren die Tiere, also ging ich an das tierärztliche Institut.
translated_de: My second passion was animal welfare, and I also went to the tier medical institute.

en: I have completed two years there.
de: Ich habe dort schon zwei Jahre hinter mir.
translated_de: I have been there for two years.

en: He is learning to treat all animals 'from cats to cows'.
de: Er lernt die Behandlung aller Tiere "von Katzen bis zu Kühen".
translated_de: It is a good idea to treat all animals from cats to animals.

en: He said: 'I know I would never tell my children about my experience.
de: Er sagte: "Ich wusste, dass ich meinen Kindern nie von meinen Erfahrungen berichten würde.
translated_de: He said: "I knew that I would never be able to tell my children about my experiences.

en: This is not something children should know about, and of course not something they should experience.
de: Darüber sollten Kinder nichts wissen und sie sollten es selbstverständlich auch nicht erleiden.
translated_de: Children should not know what they should do and they should, in fact, not be able to do so.

en: His mother Marina, 42, said: 'This pain never leaves me.
de: Seine Mutter Marina, 42, sagte: "Dieser Schmerz verlässt mich nie.
translated_de: Seine Mutter Marina, 42, said: "This pain has never been cured.

en: It is in my soul, worse when the anniversary gets close.
de: Er ist in meiner Seele, schlimmer, wenn der Jahrestag näher rückt.
translated_de: I am a little saddened when the year is approaching.

en: I will go and attend ceremonies being held to mark it.
de: Ich werde zu den Feierlichkeiten zum Gedenken gehen.
translated_de: I will go to the celebrations to reflect on the events.

en: I know Georgy won't go.
de: Ich weiß, dass Georgij nicht hingehen wird.
translated_de: I know that Georgij will not be able to speak.

en: It must be even stronger for him because he was there and I was not.
de: Es muss für ihn noch viel heftiger sein, weil er dort war und ich nicht.
translated_de: It must be much more expensive for him because he was there and I did not.

en: I was waiting for him at home, not able to help.
de: Ich wartete zu Hause auf ihn und konnte nicht helfen.
translated_de: I was waiting for him to be heard in Parliament and I did not have any help.

en: I am so grateful to God that he was returned to me.Here in Beslan the imprint is on everyone.
de: Ich bin Gott so dankbar, dass er mir zurückgegeben wurde. Hier in Beslan sind alle davon gezeichnet.
translated_de: I am so grateful for the fact that I have returned to the country, and all of them are being mapped here in Tunisia.

en: It stays with us.
de: Es bleibt in uns.
translated_de: It remains in us.

en: Georgy is an adult now but that horror is still with him.
de: Georgij ist jetzt ein Erwachsener, aber dieser Horror ist immer noch in ihm.
translated_de: Georgij is now a adult, but this horror is still in it.

en: It is hard to accept it when something so terribly unfair happens to you.
de: Es ist schwer, das zu akzeptieren, wenn einem etwas so Unfaires zustößt.
translated_de: It is difficult to accept this when something is so unfair.

en: He is a boy, he likes sports but he can't take part because of his knee.
de: Er ist ein Junge, er mag Sport, aber er kann wegen seinem Knie nicht teilnehmen.
translated_de: It is a young sport, but it can not participate because of its Knie.

en: He had several surgeries, he walks but cannot exercise.
de: Er wurde mehrfach operiert, er kann laufen, aber keinen Sport treiben.
translated_de: It has been more frequently operated, but it can not run sport.

en: I would say he 50% overcame this horror, but one can never completely overcome and forget it.
de: Ich würde sagen, dass er den Horror zu 50% überwunden hat, aber man kann das nie völlig überwinden und vergessen.
translated_de: I would say that the horror has been surpassed by 50%, but it is never completely gone and forgotten.

en: This horrible experience will stay with us.
de: Diese schreckliche Erfahrung wird uns immer verfolgen.
translated_de: This terrible experience will continue to be a reality.

en: Many friends and neighbours were killed in the siege, and it only adds to my pain.
de: Viele Freunde und Nachbarn wurden bei der Belagerung getötet und das verstärkt nur meinen Schmerz.
translated_de: Many friends and neighbors were getting into the lager and I am only a little paind.

en: I lost many people I knew well and they were dear for me.
de: Ich habe viele Menschen verloren, die ich gut kannte und die mir teuer waren.
translated_de: I have lost many people who I know well and who I am.

en: My son is with me and this is the greatest gift God could do for me but my heart aches about those killed.
de: Mein Sohn ist bei mir, und das ist das größte Geschenk, dass Gott mir machen konnte, aber mein Herz weint um die Getöteten.
translated_de: My son is here and this is the greatest gift that God has made, but my heart is a bit concerned with the tepids.

en: I know families where new children were born, but also widows who never married again.
de: Ich weiß von Familien, in denen neue Kinder geboren wurden, aber auch von Witwen, die nie wieder geheiratet haben.
translated_de: I know of families who have been born in the new children, but also of Witws who never have been born again.

en: It is hard to accept that life goes on, even if you do not want it.
de: Es ist schwer zu akzeptieren, dass das Leben weitergeht, auch wenn man das nicht will.
translated_de: It is difficult to accept that the life continues, even if it is not.

en: I will never forget my heart jumping out of my chest at the moment I saw him in hospital.
de: Ich werde nie vergessen, wie mein Herz in mir sprang, als ich ihn im Krankenhaus sah.
translated_de: I will never forget how my heart came from me as I was in hospital.

en: Now I look at what is going on in the world - wars in different regions.
de: Und nun sehe ich, was in der Welt vorgeht - Kriege in anderen Regionen.
translated_de: And now I am going to be fighting in the world - in other regions.

en: What are those people fighting for?
de: Wofür kämpfen diese Menschen?
translated_de: What do you think of these people?

en: Why are they killing each other?
de: Warum töten sie sich gegenseitig?
translated_de: Why do they stand against them?

en: The war is very close to our country now and I can hardly believe it.
de: Der Krieg ist unserem Land jetzt sehr nahe und ich kann das fast nicht glauben.
translated_de: The war is now very close to our country and I cannot believe it.

en: We used to be one friendly country in the past, how did it happen that we are fighting now?
de: Wir waren früher ein freundliches Land, wie kann es sein, dass wir nun kämpfen?
translated_de: We were a friendly country, as can we be now?

en: People and children are suffering, I am sure many children were already killed in Ukraine and many will be killed.
de: Menschen und Kinder leiden, ich bin sicher, dass in der Ukraine schon viele Kinder getötet wurden und noch viele getötet werden.
translated_de: People and children suffer, I am sure that many children have been killed in Ukraine and many have been killed.

en: If we could only grab all the rebels and throw them away - as far away as possible.
de: Wenn wir nur alle diese Rebellen greifen und hinauswerfen könnten - so weit weg wie nur möglich.
translated_de: If we could only take all these Rebellen into account and re-evaluate it, it would be so far as possible.

en: Alyona Tskaeva, 10
de: Aljona Tskajewa, 10
translated_de: Aljona Tskajewa, 10

en: The baby who was carried poignantly to safety by a special forces commando
de: Das Baby, das so ergreifend von einem Spezialeinsatzkommando in Sicherheit getragen wurde

en: 4 tips for better underwater photos and video

translated_de: If you want to make pictures or videos under water, there is a selection of devices.

en: The cheapest option is a waterproof point-and-shoot, such as the Nikon Coolpix AW120 or an action cam, such as the GoPro Hero3+ Silver Edition, which both go for around $300.
de: Die preiswerteste Option ist eine wasserdichte Point-and-Shoot, wie die Nikon Coolpix AW120 oder eine Action-Cam wie die GoPro Hero3+ Silver Edition, die beide für etwa 300 $ zu haben sind.

translated_de: You are able to control your saviour.

translated_de: Even if you have a waterdichte camera, you should be aware that batteries and other flanges are locked.

translated_de: You can also place your camera on the photos or videos you want to take.

en: Some cameras and camcorders have scene or shooting modes that will optimize the exposure for dim undersea settings.
de: Einige Kameras und Camcorder verfügen über Szenen- und Aufnahmemodi, mit denen die Belichtungszeit für die dämmrigen Unterwasserbedingungen optimiert wird.
translated_de: Several cameras and cameras have a camera and camera with a camera and camera, with the optimal time for the dry conditions.

en: And before you jump in, know how deep your equipment can go.
de: Und bevor Sie hinein springen, prüfen Sie, bis in welche Tiefe Ihre Ausrüstung funktionsfähig ist.

en: Some cameras are rated to only 5 feet, others to 50 or 60 feet.

en: Take multiple shots - because many of them won't work.

en: Even if you have an LCD, it's going to hard to see it underwater, and composing your shot will be a hit-or-miss process.

en: So shoot multiples.

en: Stay near the surface.
de: Bleiben Sie nahe der Oberfläche.
translated_de: You are near the surface.

en: Light falls off dramatically the deeper you dive underwater.
de: Das Licht wird dramatisch schlechter, je weiter Sie sich von der Oberfläche entfernen.

en: Get close to your subjects.
de: Gehen Sie dicht an die Objekte heran.

en: This is great advice for shooting on dry land, but it is even more important underwater because of the dim lighting conditions.
de: Das ist auch an Land ein guter Rat, aber er ist unter Wasser umso wichtiger wegen der schlechten Lichtverhältnisse.
translated_de: It is also a good country, but it is also important to be in water because of poor lighting conditions.

en: It's particularly important if you're shooting with an action cam: These devices often have a fixed, wide angle lens, which means you have to get closer to your subjects if you want them to fill the picture frame.
de: Es ist ganz besonders wichtig, wenn Sie mit einer Action-Cam arbeiten: Diese Geräte verfügen oft über eine feste Weitwinkellinse, was bedeutet, dass Sie dichter an Ihre Objekte heran müssen, wenn diese den gesamten Bildrahmen ausfüllen sollen.

en: Andrew Lawson was the kind of man whose force of personality could shake things up, even in a gargantuan organisation like the NHS.

en: I've had difficulty in energising myself.

en: Struggling with flu-like symptoms, he found himself impatiently berating his wife, Juliet.

de: "Ich will alles lieber sofort als später", notierte er.

en: When Juliet went away on business for a week, Lawson found himself unusually, and unaccountably, upset.
de: Als Juliet für eine Woche auf einer Geschäftsreise war, fühlte sich Lawson ganz ungewöhnlicherweise und ohne Grund beunruhigt.

en: He had mesothelioma, an incurable cancer that affects the pleura, or lining of the lung.
de: Er litt an Mesotheliom, einem unheilbaren Krebs, der das Brustfell, also die die Lungen überziehende Haut angreift.
translated_de: It lit an esotheliom, a non-heiling cancer, the breast, which also attacks the skin.

de: Wie bei den meisten Krebserkrankungen ist der genaue Auslöser meist schwer zu bestimmen.
translated_de: As for most cancers, the exact amount of toxins is often difficult to determine.

en: Though some smokers get lung cancer, for example, not all lung cancer sufferers have smoked.
de: Während beispielsweise einige Raucher an Lungenkrebs erkranken, sind nicht alle Lungenkrebserkrankten früher Raucher gewesen.

en: But mesothelioma is different.
de: Aber Mesotheliom ist anders.
translated_de: But Mesotheliom is anders.

en: In almost every case, the cause is exposure to asbestos - a fibrous building material once dubbed "miraculous," but now known to be mortally dangerous.
de: In fast allen Fällen ist der Auslöser eine Asbestbelastung - Kontakt mit dem Faserbaustoff, der einmal als "Wunderstoff" galt aber inzwischen als tödlich erkannt wurde.
translated_de: In almost every case, the sludge is a waste - contact with the fibre-based material which once was a "wunder material" but which has now been a bit of a sludge.

en: For most of us, mesothelioma has been an easy disease to ignore.
de: Für die meisten von uns ist Mesotheliom eine Erkrankung, die wie leicht ignorieren können.
translated_de: For most of us, Mesotheliom is a disease which can be ignored as easily.

en: Asbestos, after all, is a product of the past.
de: Asbest ist schließlich ein Produkt der Vergangenheit.

en: The most dangerous type of asbestos has not been used in Britain since the 1960s, when a voluntary industry ban came into effect.
de: Der gefährlichste Asbesttyp wurde in Großbritannien seit den 1960er Jahren nicht mehr verwendet, als sich die Industrie freiwillig dazu verpflichtete, diesen nicht mehr zu verwenden.
translated_de: The most dangerous asbestos has been used in Britain since the 1960s, as the industry is obliged to use it freely.

en: Even when it was used, only people in specific industries worked closely with it - pipe laggers, builders, carpenters and shipyard workers, for example.
de: Auch dort, wo er noch eingesetzt wurde, arbeiteten nur Menschen in bestimmten Branchen direkt mit dem Stoff - Klempner, Bauarbeiter, Zimmerleute und Werftarbeiter zum Beispiel.

de: Als ein industrieller Gefahrstoff aus einer anderen Zeit scheint er heute kaum noch besorgniserregend zu sein.
translated_de: As a industrial danger material from another time, it seems that it is not yet possible to be sabotage.

en: But such complacency is misplaced.
de: Aber diese Selbstzufriedenheit ist unangebracht.

en: Britain, it turns out, is today at the peak of a mesothelioma epidemic.
de: Großbritannien, so scheint es, erlebt heute den Höhepunkt einer Mesoltheliom-Epidemie.

en: With an annual toll of about 2,500, more than twice as many people die of the disease as die in accidents in motor vehicles.
de: Mit insgesamt 2.500 Todesfällen pro Jahr sterben doppelt so viele Menschen an dieser Krankheit als bei Verkehrsunfällen.

translated_de: The number of deaths in the eu of the 1980s and the likely future of the deaths in Britain

en: The reason that we are feeling its deadly effects now is that, though asbestos use has been illegal for years (all types of asbestos were eventually banned by law in 1999), it usually takes decades for mesothelioma to develop.
de: Der Grund, warum wir die tödlichen Auswirkungen jetzt erleben, obwohl Asbest seit Jahren illegal ist (1999 wurden alle Asbesttypen verboten), ist der, dass ein Mesotheliom sich erst nach Jahrzehnten entwickelt.

de: Und die Geißel des Mesotheliom ist nicht auf ehemaliger Arbeiter der Baubranche beschränkt.
translated_de: And the slur of the Mesotheliom is not restricted to former workers of the construction industry.

de: Asbest war, und ist häufig noch, in den Häusern vorhanden, in denen wir leben, den Büros, in denen wir arbeiten, den Schulen, in denen wir lernen und den Geschäften, in denen wir einkaufen.

translated_de: Mesotheliom is particularly heimtückisch because our lifestyle-mechanisme - the Atmen itself - is caused by the tödlichen Krebs.

en: Most Mesothelioma cases are caused by exposure to asbestos.
de: Die meisten Fälle von Mesotheliom werden durch Asbestkontakt verursacht.
translated_de: Most cases of Mesotheliom are caused by asbestos.

en: Asbestos is made up of tiny fibres.
de: Asbest besteht aus kleinsten Fasern.
translated_de: The best is from the small ones.

en: When the asbestos is disturbed and the fibres are inhaled, they can become embedded in the pleura, the lining of the lungs.
de: Wenn das Asbest aufgewirbelt wird und die Fasern inhaliert werden, können sie sich im Brustfell, der Haut um die Lungen herum, festsetzen.
translated_de: If the best is thrown and the fascists are inhaled, they can be fixed in the breast, the skin to the skin.

en: Asbestos fibres irritate the pleura and can cause cell mutations.
de: Asbestfasern irritieren das Brustfell und können Zellmutationen auslösen.
translated_de: Asbest fibres canirritate the breast and can cause cellmutation.

en: "The problem comes from inhaled needle-shaped fibres of asbestos," Professor Tom Treasure, a cardio-thoracic surgeon who moved in 2001 to Guy's Hospital.
de: "Das Problem entsteht mit den inhalierten nadelförmigen Asbestfasern," so Professor Tom Treasure, ein Herz-Thorax-Arzt, der 2001 an das Guy's Hospital wechselte.
translated_de: "The problem arises with the inhalable nadelförming asbestos fibres," Professor Tom Treasure, a Herzhorax-Arzt, changed in 2001 to Guy's Hospital.

en: The very hospital where Andrew Lawson suspected he was exposed to asbestos is now, ironically, a leading centre in treating mesothelioma.
de: Genau das Krankenhaus, von dem Andrew Lawson vermutet, dass es ihn dem Asbest ausgesetzt hat, ist nun ironischerweise, ein führendes Zentrum bei der Behandlung von Mesotheliom.
translated_de: The hospital, which Andrew Lawson believes is the best, is now ironically a leading centre for treatment of mesotheliom.

en: Treasure knew Lawson, and treated some others who are likely to have been exposed while training at the hospital.
de: Treasure kannte Lawson und behandelte einige andere, die vermutlich ebenfalls während ihrer Ausbildung im Krankenhaus dem Asbest ausgesetzt waren.

en: Once the asbestos needles get into the lung tissue, says Treasure, "the act of breathing pushes them on the periphery, which is where the lining is.

translated_de: As soon as the asbestos lands reach, Treasure says, "were they pushed by the adrift at the Rand, where the Haut is.

en: It is by its nature invasive from the very beginning.

de: Als Reaktion darauf gab es in diesem Jahr deutliche neue Gesetzgebungen, die es für Mesotheliom-Betroffene einfacher macht, eine Entschädigung einzuklagen, auch wenn ihre früheren Arbeitgeber nicht mehr aufzufinden sind.

en: The law has created a £350m pot of money, funded by the insurance industry, for those diagnosed after July 2012 who can prove exposure but have no one to sue.

translated_de: Nellie Kershaw stirred in Rochdale.

en: Dr William Cooke testifies that asbestos particles in the lungs "were beyond reasonable doubt the primary cause of death."
de: Dr. William Cooke sagt aus, dass Asbestpartikel in der Lunge "ohne jeden vernünftigen Zweifel die Haupttodesursache sind".
translated_de: William Cooke said that asbestos in the Lunge "ohne any doubts that the principal cause of death is the underlying cause".

en: It is the first case of its kind.
de: Das ist der erste Fall dieser Art.
translated_de: This is the first case of this type.

en: Kershaw's employers, Turner Bros Asbestos, do not admit liability.
de: Kershaws Arbeitgeber, Turner Bros Asbestos, übernehmen keine Haftung.
translated_de: Kershaws employer, Turner Bros Asbestos, assumes no liability.

en: No compensation is paid.
de: Es wird kein Schadensersatz gezahlt.
translated_de: It is not a claim.

en: World War Two sees intensive shipbuilding, one of the deadliest occupations for asbestos exposure.
de: Während des zweiten Weltkriegs werden intensiv Schiffe gebaut, eine der tödlichsten Verrichtungen mit Asbestkontakt.
translated_de: In the second world war, ships were built to be a major source of contamination.

en: Voluntary industry ban on the import of Blue asbestos
de: Freiwilliger Verzicht der Branche auf den Import von blauem Asbest
translated_de: The voluntary quotas of the branches on the import of blue asbestos

en: Court of Appeal confirms the first successful personal injury claim in Britain as a result of asbestos exposure.
de: Ein Berufungsgericht bestätigt die erste erfolgreiche Personenschadensersatzklage in Großbritannien wegen Kontakts mit Asbest.
translated_de: The first successful criminal damage claim in Britain was confirmed by a court of appeal based on contacts with the best.

en: Global asbestos production rises to more than 4,213,000 tons annually.
de: Die globale Asbestproduktion steigt auf mehr als 4.213.000 Tonnen jährlich an.
translated_de: The global average of the best-in-class production is up to 4.213.000 tonnes annually.

en: UK imports 139,000 tons.
de: Großbritannien importiert 139.000 Tonnen.
translated_de: Britain imported 139 000 tonnes.

en: Health and Safety Executive in Britain requires all contractors working with asbestos to be licensed.
de: Eine Gesundheits- und Sicherheitsexekutive in Großbritannien verpflichtet alle Firmen, die mit Asbest arbeiten, zum Lizenzerwerb.
translated_de: The Government of Britain is obliged to provide health and security services to all companies who work with asbestos to be licensed.

en: Import and use of Blue and Brown asbestos banned by law in Britain.
de: Der Import und die Verwendung von blauem und braunem Asbest werden gesetzlich in Großbritannien verboten.
