translated_de: The import and use of blue and braunem asbest are legal in Britain.

en: All asbestos use banned in Britain.
de: Jede Verwendung von Asbest wird in Großbritannien verboten.
translated_de: Every use of asbestos is banned in Britain.

en: Mesothelioma Act passed in the UK.
de: Das Mesotheliom-Gesetz wird in Großbritannien verabschiedet.
translated_de: The Mesotheliom Treaty will be adopted in Britain.

en: A £350m compensation scheme is announced.
de: Ein Entschädigungsprogramm von 350 Millionen £ wird angekündigt.
translated_de: A 350 million-pound compensation programme will be announced.

en: Asbestos is banned in more than 50 countries, but white asbestos is still used as a cheap building material in many parts of the world.
de: Asbest ist in mehr als 50 Ländern verboten, weißer Asbest wird allerdings weiterhin in vielen Ländern der Erde als preiswertes Baumaterial verwendet.
translated_de: Asbest is used in more than 50 countries, but asbest is still used in many of the countries of the earth as a pricey construction material.

en: Global production hovers around 2m tons annually.
de: Die weltweite Produktion liegt bei etwa 2 Millionen Tonnen jährlich.
translated_de: Worldwide production is estimated at around 2 million tonnes annually.

en: China refuses to give Hong Kong right to choose leaders; protesters vow vengeance
de: China verweigert Hongkong Recht auf Regierungswahl, Demonstranten schwören Vergeltung
translated_de: China' s weakest Hong Kong law on election of government, a sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish s

en: China's parliament decided Sunday against letting Hong Kong voters nominate candidates for the 2017 election, despite growing agitation for democratic reform.
de: Am Sonntag entschied das chinesische Parlament trotz der vermehrten Rufe nach demokratischen Reformen gegen die Nominierung von Kandidaten für die Wahlen 2017 durch die Hongkonger Wählerschaft.
translated_de: On Sunday, the Chinese Parliament rejected the fact that it had a more prominent reputation for democratic reforms against the nomination of candidates for the 2016 elections by the Hong Kong electorate.

en: The move is likely to spark long-promised protests in Hong Kong's business district, as activists began planning and mobilizing within hours of the announcement.
de: Dieses Vorgehen befeuert vermutlich die lang angekündigten Proteste in Hongkongs Geschäftsbezirk, während Aktivisten die Planung und Mobilisierung dazu innerhalb weniger Stunden nach der Verlautbarung in die Wege leiteten.
translated_de: This is likely to be the long-term proteste in Hong Kong business, while Aktivists are planning and mobilizing to take the route within less than two hours after the release.

en: The decision by China's National People's Congress essentially allows Communist leaders to weed out any candidates not loyal to Beijing.
de: Die Entscheidung des chinesischen Volkskongresses erlaubt es den kommunistischen Führern grundsätzlich, alle nicht pekingtreuen Kandidaten abzuweisen.
translated_de: The decision of the Chinese Volkskongress permits the Communist leaders to reject all candidates who are not able to vote.

en: "It's not unexpected, but it is still infuriating," said legislator Emily Lau, chairwoman of the Democratic Party.
de: "Das kommt nicht unerwartet, aber es macht uns doch wütend," sagte Rechtsexpertin Emily Lau, Vorsitzende der Demokratischen Partei.
translated_de: "This is not a problem, but it is a problem that we are not expecting," said the legal expert, Emily Lau, chairman of the Democratic Party.

en: This is not what Beijing promised.
de: Das ist nicht das, was Peking versprochen hatte.
translated_de: This is not the case, which Peking had.

en: They've lied to the people of Hong Kong.
de: Man hat die Einwohner von Hongkong angelogen.
translated_de: The people of Hong Kong have been angelogen.

en: And it's clear we are dealing with an authoritarian regime.
de: Und es ist klar, dass wir es mit einem autoritären Regime zu tun haben.
translated_de: And it is clear that we have a self-governing regime.

en: Defending China's ruling, Li Fei, deputy secretary general of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, said allowing public nominations in the election for Hong Kong's leader would be too "chaotic."
de: In seiner Verteidigung der chinesischen Entscheidung sagte Li Fei, Vizegeneralsekretär des Ständigen Ausschusses des Nationalen Volkskongresses, dass die Zulassung öffentlicher Nominierungen bei den Wahlen für die Hongkonger Regierung zu "chaotisch" wäre.
translated_de: In his defence of the Chinese decision, Li Fei, Vice-General of the Committee on Foreign Affairs of the National People' s Congress, said that the public nominations for the Hong Kong Government would be "chaotisch" if the decision was to be made.

en: Since 1997, when Britain handed control of Hong Kong back to China, Beijing had promised to allow the region's residents to vote for the chief executive beginning in 2017.
de: Seit 1997, als Großbritannien die Kontrolle über Hongkong den Chinesen zurückgab, hat Peking versprochen, die Einwohner ab 2017 den Regierungsvorsitz wählen zu lassen.
translated_de: Since 1997, as the British returned to Hong Kong, Peking has turned to the people who were elected to the presidency in 2017 by the British Government.

en: Chinese leaders presented the Sunday ruling as a democratic breakthrough because it gives Hong Kongers a direct vote, but the decision also makes clear that Chinese leaders would retain a firm hold on the process through a nominating committee tightly controlled by Beijing.
de: Die chinesische Führung präsentierte die Entscheidung vom Sonntag als demokratischen Durchbruch, weil es den Bürgern von Hongkong ein direktes Wahlrecht gibt, aber die Entscheidung macht auch deutlich, dass die chinesische Führung den Ablauf durch ein eng von Peking kontrolliertes Nominierungskomitee fest in der Hand behält.
translated_de: The Chinese leadership presented the decision on Sunday as a democratic break because the citizens of Hong Kong have a direct electoral right, but the decision also shows that the Chinese leadership is keeping the process of a controlled Nomination Committee.

en: And, according to a new clause, only candidates who "love the country, and love Hong Kong" would be allowed.
de: Nach einer neuen Klausel sollen außerdem nur Kandidaten "mit Liebe zum Land und Liebe zu Hongkong" zugelassen werden.
translated_de: The new clause will also allow only candidates to "love the land and love Hong Kong" .

en: The ruling comes after a summer that has featured some of the largest and most high-profile protests in Hong Kong in years.
de: Die Entscheidung folgt einem Sommer, in dem einige der größten und publikumswirksamsten Proteste in Hongkong seit etlichen Jahren stattfanden.
translated_de: The decision follows a summer in which some of the most important and most effective Protestes in Hongkong have been held since the last few years.

en: Behind much of the pro-democracy campaign in Hong Kong is the Occupy Central With Love and Peace movement, whose organizers have threatened to shut down the financial district if Beijing does not grant authentic universal suffrage.
de: Hinter der prodemokratischen Kampagne in Hongkong steht die Bewegung Occupy Central With Love and Peace, deren Organisatoren damit gedroht haben, den Finanzbezirk abzuschotten, wenn Peking kein echtes allgemeines Wahlrecht zulässt.
translated_de: In the pro-democratic campaign in Hongkong, the movement Occupy Central with Love and Peace, which the Organisators have threatened to sabotage the financial budget, if Peking does not allow a real general election right.

en: On Sunday night, within hours of the announcement, hundreds of Occupy Central supporters had assembled in the rain outside the Hong Kong government's headquarters.
de: Am Sonntagabend hatten sich innerhalb weniger Stunden nach der Verlautbarung Hunderte von Occupy-Central-Anhängern im Regen vor dem Regierungshauptquartier in Hongkong versammelt.
translated_de: On Sunday evening, the number of occupy central-assigned members in the Regen' s office in Hong Kong was re-assessed in less than a week after the ban on the slams.

en: At the demonstration, organizers said that their movement was entering a new stage of civil disobedience and that they would mount waves of protests in the coming weeks.
de: Bei der Demonstration sagten die Organisatoren, dass ihre Bewegung eine neue Stufe zivilen Ungehorsams erreicht habe und sie in den kommenden Wochen Protestwellen planten.
translated_de: The Demonstration said to the Organisers that their movement had reached a new level of zivil escalation and that they were preparing for the next week' s protestwells.

en: However, they did not give details, apparently looking to avoid problems with authorities.
de: Sie machten dazu jedoch keine näheren Angaben, anscheinend um Probleme mit den Behörden zu vermeiden.
translated_de: However, you do not make any further information about this, which is a sign that problems with the authorities are being avoided.

en: In an online statement, organizers said the movement "has considered occupying Central only as the last resort, an action to be taken only if all chances of dialogue have been exhausted and there is no other choice.
de: In einer Online-Mitteilung teilten die Organisatoren mit, dass die Bewegung "die Besetzung des Zentralbezirks nur als letztes Mittel in Betracht gezogen hat, eine Aktion, die nur dann stattfinden soll, wenn alle Dialogchancen ausgeschöpft sind und keine andere Wahl besteht.
translated_de: In a online communication, the Organisators share that the movement "has only been drawn up as the last medium to view the central area, a action which will only be carried out if all dialogues are negotiated and no other choice exists."

en: We are very sorry to say that today all chances of dialogue have been exhausted and the occupation of Central will definitely happen.
de: Es tut uns leid, sagen zu müssen, dass heute alle Dialogchancen ausgeschöpft wurden und die Besetzung des Zentralbezirks definitiv stattfinden wird.
translated_de: We must say that all dialogues are now being negotiated and the establishment of the central area will end.

en: Authorities in Hong Kong have been preparing for Beijing's announcement for days, and security was tight Sunday at the government headquarters, with police and barricades deployed.
de: Die Behörden in Hongkong haben sich seit Tagen auf die Ankündigung Pekings vorbereitet, und es galten am Sonntag vor dem Regierungsgebäude verschärfte Sicherheitsmaßnahmen einschließlich Polizeikräften und Barrikaden.
translated_de: The authorities in Hong Kong have prepared the announcement of a plight for days and it is galvanised on Sunday before the government building, announcing security measures, including police and barricades.

en: Driving the unrest is a sense among many in Hong Kong that they are slowly losing control over their city.
de: Die Unruhen werden durch das Gefühl vieler in Hong Kong verstärkt, dass sie langsam die Kontrolle über ihre Stadt verlieren.
translated_de: The fear of a stalemate in Hong Kong will be increased by the feeling that they will lose control of their city slowly.

en: An influx of mainlanders is fueling competition for products and services.
de: Der Zuzug von Menschen vom Festland verstärkt den Wettbewerb um Produkte und Dienstleistungen.
translated_de: The rise of people from the continent has increased the competition for products and services.

en: There is also growing fear that Hong Kong's values, such as democracy and freedom of speech, are beginning to bend under increasing pressure from Beijing.
de: Außerdem wächst die Furcht, dass die Werte Hongkongs wie Demokratie und Redefreiheit unter dem wachsenden Druck Pekings zu bröckeln beginnen.
translated_de: The fear of a rise in the value of Hong Kong, such as democracy and redeliberation, is also growing.

en: Some have criticized the Occupy Central movement, saying its demonstrations put business - the lifeblood of Hong Kong - at risk.
de: Einige kritisierten die Demonstrationen der Occupy-Central-Bewegung, da sie den Geschäftsbetrieb - die Lebensader Hongkongs - gefährde.
translated_de: Several criticised the demonstrations of occupations in central areas, because they fährded the business of the life-threatening Hong Kong.

en: "The protest they are talking about, it could result in much economic damage, depending on how many are involved and for how long," said legislator Regina Ip, who has long criticized the movement.
de: "Die Proteste, von denen sie sprechen, könnten großen wirtschaftlichen Schaden anrichten, je nachdem, wie viele daran beteiligt sind und wie lange sie andauern," sagte Rechtsexpertin Regine Ip, die die Bewegung seit langem kritisiert.
translated_de: "The Proteste, by whom they speak, could cause significant economic damage, as many are involved and as long as they have been able to do so," said the legal expert, Regine Ip, who has been criticised for the movement.

en: We don't want concern to spread that Hong Kong is getting out of control.
de: Wir wollen keine Befürchtungen schüren, dass Hongkong außer Kontrolle gerät.
translated_de: We do not want to fear that Hong Kong will be unable to control it.

en: This is a perception that is bad for investment.
de: Dieser Eindruck ist schlecht für Investitionen.
translated_de: This impression is bad for investment.

en: China's state-run media also has run stories in recent days painting Hong Kong's democracy activists as agents of subversion directed by Western powers.
de: Die staatlich kontrollierten Medien Chinas berichteten auch unlängst über die Demokratieaktivisten in Hongkong als von westlichen Mächten gesteuerte subversive Agenten.
translated_de: The government-controlled media China has also reported in recent years that the democratic activists in Hongkong were controlled by subversive agents of west-central countries.

en: This summer, activists organized an unofficial referendum on voting rights that drew 780,000 participants - more than a fifth of Hong Kong voters.
de: In diesem Sommer organisierten Aktivisten ein inoffizielles Referendum zu den Wahlrechten, an denen 780.000 Menschen teilnahmen - mehr als ein Fünftel der Wähler in Hongkong.
translated_de: In this summer, activists organised a referendum on the right of choice which included 780.000 people - more than a fivetel of the electorate in Hongkong.

en: And in July, tens of thousands turned out for one of the largest pro-democracy demonstrations in the region's history.
de: Im Juli nahmen Zehntausende an einer der größten Demokratiedemonstrationen in der Geschichte der Region teil.
translated_de: In July, Zehntausende of people took part in one of the largest democratic demonstrations in the region' s history.

en: US prom culture hits university life with freshers offered private jet entrances
de: Die Tradition der Schulabschlussbälle in den USA wird nun auf die Universitäten übertragen, wo Freshmen Auftritte mit dem Privatflugzeug angeboten werden.
translated_de: The tradition of the school district in the USA will now be transferred to the universities where freshmen will be offered the private flight ticket.

en: We're excited to be answering this demand by launching the UK's first luxurious travel service for the students of today.
de: Wir freuen uns, auf diese Nachfrage reagieren zu können und den den ersten luxuriösen Reisedienst Großbritanniens für Studenten von heute anzubieten.
translated_de: We are delighted to be able to respond to this challenge and we are delighted to be able to offer the first luxury travel service for students today.

en: To make the maximum impact arriving at university, the company also offers transport options including private jet, Rolls-Royce Phantom, Aston Martin or McLaren P1.
de: Um einen besonders beeindruckenden Auftritt an der Universität erzielen zu können, bietet das Unternehmen auch Transportoptionen wie Privatflugzeuge, Rolls-Royce Phantom, Aston Marten oder McLaren P1 an.
translated_de: For a particularly impressive visit to the University, the companies can also offer transport options such as private aircraft, Rolls-Royce Phantom, Aston Marten or McLaren P1.

en: Mr Stewart also claimed the service had a safety aspect.
de: Herr Stewart gab auch an, dass der Service eine Sicherheitssparte habe.
translated_de: Mr Stewart also said that the Service had a security service.

en: The service is an ideal alternative for students who would usually have to haul their belongings across the country in a dangerously overloaded car.
de: Dieser Service ist eine ideale Alternative für Studenten, die ansonsten ihre Habseligkeiten in einem gefährlich überladenen Auto durch das Land kutschieren müssten.
translated_de: This service is an ideal alternative for students who, in other words, must be able to sabotage their own possessions in a dangerously overladen auto by the country.

en: Paired with our new VIF options, we're looking forward to ensuring this year students reach university with minimum fuss and maximum luxury.
de: Zusammen mit unseren neuen VIF-Optionen freuen wir uns darauf, in diesem Jahr dafür zu sorgen, dass die Studenten die Universität mit einem Minimum an Aufwand und einem Maximum an Luxus erreichen.
translated_de: Together with our new VIFOptions, we are delighted to ensure that students at the University can achieve a minimum cost and a maximum Luxus in this year.

en: A spokesman for the company said that because the service has just launched there have been no bookings yet but added that "students will be booking the service over the next few weeks."
de: Ein Unternehmenssprecher sagte, dass noch keine neuen Buchungen vorlägen, da der Service gerade erst eingeführt worden sei, fügte jedoch hinzu, dass "Studenten den Service in den nächsten Wochen buchen" würden.
translated_de: One company spokeswoman said that there were no new books, since the service was being introduced in the first place, but that "Students the Service would be able to write in the next week" .

en: The company also said that despite students facing tuition fees of £9,000 a year, it still expected to find a market for the service.
de: Das Unternehmen teilte außerdem mit, dass es trotz der Studiengebühren von 9.000 £ pro Jahr einen Markt für dieses Angebot erwarte.
translated_de: The company also believes that, even though the fees for studies are at £9 000 per year, there is a market for this offer.

en: Students of today are quite different in terms of expectations and aspirations, compared to students 10, 20, 30 or 40 years ago - it's more important than ever to make a great first impression and VIF is just the way to do that.
de: Studenten heute unterscheiden sich in ihren Erwartungen und Ansprüchen sehr von den Studenten vor 10, 20, 30 oder 40 Jahren - es ist wichtiger denn je, einen großartigen ersten Eindruck zu machen, und mit VIF kann man genau das.
translated_de: Students today differ very much in their expectations and demands of students over 10, 20, 30 or 40 years - it is important to make a great first impression and with VIF, one can precisely do that.

en: However, the National Union of Students criticised the service as out of touch.
de: Die Nationale Studentenunion kritisierte den Service jedoch als abgehoben.
translated_de: The National Student Union criticised the service but was dismissed.

en: Megan Dunn, NUS vice president for higher education, said: "This scheme seems incredibly out of touch with the lives of the majority of students.
de: Megan Dunn, Vizepräsidenten des NUS für Hochschulbildung sagte: "Dieses Angebot scheint völlig getrennt vom Leben der Mehrzahl der Studenten.
translated_de: Megan Dunn, Vice-President of the National Institute for Higher Education, said: "The supply of services seems to be completely separated from the lives of the more students.

en: Many students starting university this month are facing a cost of living crisis, with available financial support in loans and grants failing to keep pace with spiralling bills for basic essentials, before they can even start thinking about forking out thousands of pounds for something as simple arriving at their halls of residence.
de: Viele Studenten, die diesen Monat mit dem Studium beginnen, sehen sich einer Krise der Lebenshaltungskosten ausgesetzt, da die verfügbaren Finanzhilfen in Form von Krediten und Stipendien nicht mit den stark steigenden Rechnungen für die einfachsten Lebensgrundlagen Schritt halten, bevor sie überhaupt daran denken können, Tausende von Pfund für so etwas Einfaches wie die Ankunft im Studentenwohnheim auszugeben.
translated_de: Many students who start this month with the study see a crisis in the costs of living because the available financial aid in Form of credit and stipendien does not bear the sharp rise in the simple basic life-based steps before they can even imagine a rise in Pfund for so simple things as the arrival in Studentenwohnheim.

en: Feminists take on race and police conduct post-Ferguson
de: Feministinnen kritisieren Rassenfrage und Polizeiverhalten nach Ferguson
translated_de: Feminists criticise racism and police behaviour in Ferguson

en: The unarmed teenager was killed by a police officer in Ferguson, Mo., earlier this month.
de: Der unbewaffnete Teenager wurde Anfang dieses Monats von einem Polizeibeamten in Ferguson, Mo. getötet.
translated_de: The unborn teenager was notified of the police raid in Ferguson, Mo.

en: Attendees hold their hands up while chanting, "Hands up, don't shoot," as they wait in line before the funeral.
de: Die Teilnehmer hoben ihre Hände in die Luft und sangen, "Hände hoch, nicht schießen," während sie vor der Beerdigung warteten.
translated_de: The participants hob their hands in the air and sang, "Hands high, not savour," while they waited before the beer.

en: After two weeks of protests in Ferguson, Mo. over the shooting of unarmed teenager Michael Brown, blogger Miriam Zoila Perez noticed a shift in the online conversation among white feminists.
de: Nach zweiwöchigen Protesten in Ferguson, Mo, wegen der Erschießung des unbewaffneten Teenagers Michael Brown bemerkte die Bloggerin Miriam Zoila Perez eine Änderung in den Onlinediskussionen weißer Feministinnen.
translated_de: After two-week protests in Ferguson, Mo, due to the death of the innocent Teenager Michael Brown, the Blogger Miriam Zoila Perez has referred to a change in the online discussions as a white woman.

en: In her experience, white feminist commenters prioritized gender above race when it came to pushing forward reproductive rights and income inequality.
de: Nach ihrer Erfahrung setzen weiße feministische Kommentatoren das Geschlecht vor die Rasse, wenn es darum geht, Reproduktionsrecht und Einkommensungleichheiten anzusprechen.
translated_de: After their experience, feminists have a tendency to re-examine the gender when it comes to production rights and income inequality.

en: But as tensions rose in the Midwest and drew nationwide coverage, Perez saw responses from white women that centered 100 percent around race.
de: Während die Spannungen im Mittleren Westen jedoch anstiegen und im ganzen Land Beachtung erhielten, sah Perez, dass die Antworten von weißen Frauen sich zu 100% um die Rasse drehten.
translated_de: While tensions in the Middle East have risen and the whole country has been flooded, sah Perez said that the answers of women in the world are 100% about the stale.

en: Compared to the responses of black women soon after the shooting on August 9, the personal essays with titles like "thoughts on ferguson as a white woman" and "Feminism Is Not Just About Women's Oppression" came relatively late.
de: Im Vergleich mit den Antworten schwarzer Frauen kurz nach den Schüssen vom 9. August kamen die persönlichen Essays mit Titeln wie "Gedanken zu Ferguson von einer weißen Frau" und "Feminismus dreht sich nicht nur um die Unterdrückung von Frauen" verhältnismäßig spät.
translated_de: In comparison with the responses to black women, the personal essay, which was published on 9 August, was a little late on the personal essay, which included titles such as "Gedanken to Ferguson by a white woman" and "Feministism, not only to reduce women' s poverty" .

en: But to Perez, it demonstrated a significant shift.
de: Aber für Perez bedeutete das eine wichtige Veränderung.
translated_de: But for Perez, this is a significant change.

en: "In feminism, I don't think you get a lot of people talking about whiteness and privilege in such a high level way," she said.
de: "Ich glaube nicht, dass man im Feminismus viele Menschen findet, die über das Weiß sein und Privilegien auf so hochklassige Art sprechen," sagte sie.
translated_de: "I do not believe that many people are in the Feminist movement, who speak of the White and the Privilegien in such a high-quality way," said the spokesman.

en: People felt called to voice something about what happened.
de: Die Menschen fühlten sich dazu gedrängt, etwas zu den Vorfällen auszudrücken.
translated_de: The people feel that they are begging for something to be done to prevent the events.

en: It's very emblematic of the crisis we face and because [the situation in Ferguson] is so racialized, they have to call that out.
de: Es ist charakteristisch für die Krise, in der wir uns befinden und weil die Situation in Ferguson so ethnisiert ist, dass sie das ausdrücken müssen.
translated_de: It is a characteristic of the crisis in which we are located and because the situation in Ferguson is so ethnic that they must be pushed out.

en: For Ohio State University English professor Koritha Mitchell, Ferguson brought to light issues that black American women face every day but that aren't seen as "women's issues" in the cultural sphere.
de: Für Englischprofessorin Koritha Mitchell von der Ohio State University brachte Ferguson Probleme ans Licht, denen schwarze Amerikanerinnen jeden Tag ausgesetzt sind, die aber nicht als "Frauenthemen" im kulturellen Raum betrachtet werden.
translated_de: The English professor Koritha Mitchell of the Ohio State University has brought Ferguson problems to light, which are black-americans every day, but not as "frauenthemen" in the cultural space.

en: "I can post something funny on Facebook about what's going on with me and my partner and it will get 150 likes from all over the place," said Mitchell.
de: "Ich kann etwas Lustiges auf Facebook über mich und meinen Partner veröffentlichen und bekomme 150 Likes von überall her," sagte Mitchell.
translated_de: "I can be a bit tempted on Facebook about myself and my partner and make 150 likes from all over her," said Mitchell.

en: When I post something about how people of color are under siege in their own country, the silence is deafening.
de: Wenn ich etwas darüber poste, wie Farbige in ihrem eigenen Land unter Belagerung stehen, ist das Schweigen ohrenbetäubend.
translated_de: If I ask about the fact that they are a colorid in their own country, the Swedish is a smuggler.

en: "How is it safe for women to speak publicly about relationships but not about safety in the public sphere?" she asked.
de: "Wie kann es für Frauen sicher sein, öffentlich über eine Beziehung zu sprechen, aber nicht über Sicherheit im öffentlichen Raum?" fragte sie.
translated_de: "Is it possible for women to speak publicly about a relationship, but not about security in public space?" asks the question.

en: For black women like Mitchell who have studied race, gender and sexuality in U.S. history, there is no dichotomy between issues regarding race and gender.
de: Für schwarze Frauen wie Mitchell, die Rasse, Geschlecht und Sexualität in der Geschichte der USA studiert haben, gibt es keine Dichotomie zwischen Rassen- und Geschlechterproblemen.
translated_de: For black women, such as Mitchell, who have studied gender, gender and sexuality in the USA history, there is no dichotomie between Rassen and Sexuality.

en: To her, black women have not had the luxury of neatly separating the issues; they live the combined reality every day.
de: Für sie haben schwarze Frauen nicht den Luxus gehabt, die Themen sauber zu trennen; sie leben jeden Tag in der kombinierten Realität.
translated_de: They have black women not voted for the Luxus, which is a clean topic, they live every day in the combined reality.

en: While white women are now combining issues of race and gender in mainstream feminist spheres, Angela Hattery, women and gender studies professor at George Mason University, says their predecessors did the opposite.
de: Während weiße Frauen nun die Themen Rasse und Geschlecht in den feministischen Mainstreamkreisen verbinden, sagt Angela Hattery, Professorin für Frauen und Geschlechterforschung an der George Mason University, dass ihre Vorgängerinnen das Gegenteil taten.
translated_de: While women are now aware of the issues of gender and gender in feminist mainstream circles, Angela Hattery, Professor of Women and Sexual Research at the George Mason University, said that their predecessors are the opposite.

en: "Between 1865 and 1890, at least 10,000 black men were lynched and the justification was almost always the rape of a white woman," said Hattery.
de: "Zwischen 1865 und 1890 wurden mindestens 10.000 schwarze Männer gelyncht und die Begründung war fast immer die Vergewaltigung einer weißen Frau," sagte Hattery.
translated_de: "In the period between 1865 and 1890, at least 10.000 black men were slashed and the investigation was fast always a result of the exploitation of a white woman," said Hattery.

en: You needed the white woman to be complicit in the narrative to justify the lynching.
de: Weiße Frauen mussten an der Geschichte beteiligt sein, um den Lynchmord zu rechtfertigen.
translated_de: White women had to be involved in the history to justify Lynchmord.

en: To Hattery, the breakdown between white and black women came when white suffragists like Susan B. Anthony surveyed the landscape in the late 1800s and saw that the fight for voting rights would only work for one group at a time: women or blacks.
de: Für Hattery kam die Spaltung zwischen weißen und schwarzen Frauen an dem Punkt, an dem weiße Kämpferinnen für das Frauenwahlrecht wie Susan B. Anthony das Land in den späten Jahren des 19. Jahrhunderts analysierten und feststellten, dass der Kampf für das Wahlrecht nur für jeweils eine Gruppe erfolgreich sein konnte: Frauen oder Schwarze.
translated_de: In the end, the disparity between white and black women was a point of the debate on the white women in the electoral system, as Susan B. Anthony was the country in the late 19th century and determined that the fight for electoral rights only had a positive effect on each group: women or blacks.

en: "They made the decision to put their eggs in the basket for votes for women and votes for Blacks would come later," said Hattery.
de: "Sie trafen die Entscheidung, sich für das Frauenwahlrecht einzusetzen, und das Wahlrecht für Schwarze sollte später kommen," sagte Hattery.
translated_de: "They voted for women' s elections and then voted for blacks," said Hattery.

en: To look back at things like that gives us a powerful perspective on why women of color don't trust white women.
de: Wenn man sich an solche Dinge erinnert, wird einem mit Macht bewusst, warum farbige Frauen weißen Frauen nicht trauen.
translated_de: If you recall these things, you will know how to trust white women.

en: We haven't done a good job.
de: Wir haben unseren Job nicht gut gemacht.
translated_de: We have not done our job well.

en: We haven't helped black women protect their husbands and sons ever.
de: Wir haben niemals schwarzen Frauen dabei geholfen, ihre Ehemänner und Söhne zu beschützen.
translated_de: We have never seen black women be abused, their empathetic and their söhnes protected.

en: Even after women won the right to vote in 1920, it took a decade for white women to organize against lynching as the Association of Southern Woman for the Prevention of Lynching.
de: Auch nachdem Frauen 1920 das Wahlrecht erhielten, dauerte es noch ein Jahrzehnt, bis sich weiße Frauen gegen das Lynchen in der Association of Southern Woman for the Prevention of Lynching organisierten.
translated_de: In 1920, the election rights were granted to women, which is a year since the Association of Southern Women for Prevention of Lynching organised women against the Lynching.

en: The group came nearly 40 years after black women originally asked for assistance, said Mitchell.
de: Die Gruppe entstand fast 40 Jahre nach der ursprünglichen Bitte um Hilfe von Seiten schwarzer Frauen, sagt Mitchell.
translated_de: The group is now 40 years old after the initial request to help black women, says Mitchell.

en: To Mitchell, the upswell of white feminist responses to the issues raised by Ferguson - police conduct, racial discrimination - reflect the times white feminists have had to play "catch up" to issues black women have grappled with for generations.
de: Für Mitchell ist die Flut weißer feministischer Reaktionen auf die durch Ferguson aufgeworfenen Fragen - Polizeiverhalten, Rassendiskriminierung - ein Spiegel der Zeit, in denen weiße Feministinnen "Fangen" mit den Problemen spielten, mit denen schwarze Frauen sich seit Generationen auseinander setzten.
translated_de: Mitchell is a reflection of the flut white feminist responses to Ferguson' s questions - police behaviour, racism - and the time when white women' s "fangs" play a role in the problems with black women forming apart from generations.

en: "Wouldn't it be great if the activists who have those [traditional feminist] platforms took as seriously the right to raise a child as they did their right to have birth control?" posed Mitchell.
de: "Wäre es nicht toll, wenn die Aktivistinnen, die über solche traditionellen feministischen Plattformen verfügen das Recht auf Erziehung eines Kindes so ernst nähmen wie sie das mit dem Recht auf Empfängniskontrolle tun?" fragte Mitchell.
translated_de: "What would it be like to see if the Aktivists who have access to such traditional feminist platforms have the right to re-election a kind of kind of as they do with the right to re-employers?" asked Mitchell.

en: Second wave feminists who made careers out of fighting for reproductive rights and access to birth control are now figuring out what that means.
de: Feministinnen der zweiten Generation, die ihre Karriere auf dem Kampf um Reproduktionsrechte und den Zugang zu empfängnisverhütenden Mitteln aufbauten, versuchen nun zu verstehen, was das bedeutet.
translated_de: Feminists of the second generation who are now launching their careers in the fight for production rights and access to emigrant resources, are now trying to understand what this means.

en: Noted white feminist activist Gloria Steinem took to Facebook two weeks after Michael Brown's shooting to post a pointed column by Guardian columnist Rebecca Carroll that demanded more protest from white Americans on the issue of racism.
de: Die bekannte weiße feministische Aktivistin Gloria Steinem ging zwei Wochen nach der Erschießung von Michael Brown auf Facebook und veröffentlichte einen pointierten Artikel von Rebecca Carroll, Kolumnistin des Guardian, in dem sie mehr Proteste von weißen Amerikanern zum Thema Rassismus verlangt.
translated_de: The famous white feminist activist Gloria Steinem was contacted two weeks after the death of Michael Brown on Facebook and published a point-of-mouth article by Rebecca Carroll, the Guardian' s co-founder, in which she demands more publicity from white Americans on racism.

en: "I hope women, who have a different but parallel reason for understanding a danger that is located in the body - and racial opinions that are measurably different in public polls - will lead the change," Steinem wrote.
de: "Ich hoffe, dass Frauen, die einen anderen, aber parallelen Grund dafür haben, eine dem Körper innewohnende Gefahr zu verstehen - und Meinungen zur Rasse, die in öffentlichen Umfragen deutlich anders sind - die Veränderungen anführen werden," schrieb Steinem.
translated_de: "I hope that women, who have one other, but parallelly a reason for this, will be able to understand the body' s danger - and opinions are being expressed in public inquiries - that change will be made," said Steinem.

en: Although Steinem has vouched for a more intersectional feminism that includes issues of race as well as gender, her comments on race in America still puzzle some.
de: Obwohl Steinem für einen eher intersektionalen Feminismus steht, in dem Rassen- ebenso wie Geschlechterthemen angesprochen werden, sind einige von ihren Kommentaren zum Rassenthema in Amerika doch verblüfft.
translated_de: While Steinem is a sign of a repressive feministism, in the Rassen-as well as the gender-based feminists, some of their comments on racism in Amerika are verblüfft.

en: American Enterprise Institute scholar Christina Sommers, author of "Who Stole Feminism?," told She The People that young men in the United States, especially young men of color, are "far more vulnerable than their sisters," but Steinem's remarks on Ferguson counter the criticism she has launched in the past.
de: Christina Sommers, Forscherin am American Enterprise Institute und Autorin von "Who Stole Feminism?" sagte gegenüber She The People, dass junge Männer in den Vereinigten Staaten, insbesondere junge farbige Männer, "weit verletzlicher sind als ihre Schwestern," aber Steinems Bemerkungen zu Ferguson stehen im Gegensatz zu ihrer früheren Kritik.
translated_de: Christina Sommers, the American Enterprise Institute and author of "Who Stoles Feminism?", said to She The People that young men in the United States, particularly young black men, "were far more dangerous than their western counterparts," but Steinems comments to Ferguson are contrary to their earlier criticism.

en: We now have hundreds of special programs for girls and young women, but almost nothing for boys.
de: Es gibt jetzt hunderte von speziellen Programmen für Mädchen und junge Frauen, aber fast nichts für Jungen.
translated_de: There are now hundreds of special programmes for girls and young women, but fast nothing for young women.

en: But when the White House recently initiated a small program, My Brother's Keeper, to help vulnerable black and Hispanic young men, there was an angry reaction from many feminists, including Gloria Steinem.
de: Aber als das Weiße Haus kürzlich ein kleines Programm, My Brother's Keeper, auflegte, um verletzlichen jungen schwarzen und hispanischen Männern zu helfen, gab es ärgerliche Reaktionen von vielen Feministinnen, darunter Gloria Steinem.
translated_de: But as the White House recently launched a small programme, My Brother' s Keeper, to help young black and hispanic men, there were a number of famines, including Gloria Steinem.

en: Police relations with the black community is not the only issue pushing to the forefront of mainstream feminism.
de: Das Verhältnis der Polizei zur der schwarzen Community ist nicht das einzige Problem, dass sich in den Vordergrund des Mainstreamfeminismus drängt.
translated_de: The relationship between police and the black community is not the only problem that is a priority in mainstreamfeminism.

en: After U.S. border patrol apprehended nearly 63,000 unaccompanied minors at the country's southwest border this year, immigration reform surfaced once again - this time as a women's issue.
de: Nachdem die US-Grenzpolizei fast 63.000 unbegleitete Minderjährige an der Südwestgrenze des Landes in diesem Jahr aufgegriffen hat, tritt auch das Thema der Einwanderungsreform wieder an die Oberfläche - dieses Mal als ein Frauenthema.
translated_de: After the US-Grenzpolizei' s fast 63.000 yearly minority population in the South-West of the country has risen, the issue of immigration reform is again a topic of concern - this is a women' s theme.

en: Andrea Mercado, co-chair of We Belong Together, an organization mobilizing women for immigration reform, said that in order to rebrand the issue as essential for women, all she needed to do was share immigrant women's stories.
de: Andrea Mercado, Co-Vorsitzende von We Belong Together, einer Organisation, die Frauen für die Einwanderungsreform mobilisiert, sagte, dass für eine Neubetrachtung des Themas als ein wesentliches Frauenthema sie lediglich die Geschichten der Einwandererfrauen veröffentlichen müsse.
translated_de: Andrea Mercado, co-chairman of We Belong Together, a organisation mobilising women for the reform of immigration, said that for a new approach to the issue as a fundamental women' s theme, they only have the history of the illegal fraud.

en: "They speak for themselves," Mercado said.
de: "Diese sprechen für sich selbst," sagte Mercado.
translated_de: "The people speak for themselves," said Mercado.

en: When the vast majority of employment visas are given to [male immigrants], the women who come with them are left in a position vulnerable to domestic violence and exploitation.
de: Wenn die große Mehrzahl der Arbeitsvisa an männliche Einwanderer geht, sind die Frauen, die sie begleiten, in einer Position, in der sie für häusliche Gewalt und Ausbeutung anfällig sind.
translated_de: If the large number of workers are a minority, the women who accompany them are a victim of a position of a disproportionate violence and a disproportionate exploitation.

en: "These stories resonate with women's organizations," she said.
de: "Diese Geschichten finden einen Nachhall in den Frauenorganisationen," sagte sie.
translated_de: "The history of women' s organisations is a resurgence," said the group.

en: Ipswich 'pig in residence' house for sale
de: "Schweine-Haus" in Ipswich steht zum Verkauf
translated_de: The "Schweine-Haus" in Ipswich is to be sold

en: A picture for a house for sale in Suffolk was removed by estate agents when it emerged it showed a large pig at rest in the living room.
de: Das Bild eines zum Verkauf stehenden Hauses wurde von Immobilienmaklern entfernt, als deutlich wurde, dass es ein großes Schwein zeigte, das es sich im Wohnzimmer bequem gemacht hatte.
translated_de: The image of a house being sold has been removed by property brokers, as it was clearly shown that a large Swedish man had made it easy to make it in the living room.

en: On sale for £120,000, the detached one-bedroom property sits on a private road in Ipswich.
de: Das freistehende Haus verfügt über ein Schlafzimmer, liegt an einer privaten Straße in Ipswich und wird für 120.000 £ angeboten.
translated_de: The free house has a bedroom, is situated on a private street in Ipswich and is available for 120.000 £.

en: The particulars featured a picture of the living room of the house - which included a pig with its head resting on a settee.
de: Zu den Details gehörte eine Abbildung des Wohnzimmers des Hauses - zu dem auch ein Schwein gehörte, dass seinen Kopf auf ein Sofa gebettet hatte.
translated_de: The details included a picture of the living room of the house - and a Swedish pillow that had been a sofa.

en: Estate agents Connells said the pig in the photo was the home owner's pet.
de: Immobilienmakler Connells sagte, das Schwein auf dem Foto sei das Haustier des Eigentümers.
translated_de: Mr Connells said that the Swedish market is the property of the owner.

en: "However, the photo was put up in error and has since been removed," a spokeswoman for the company said.
de: "Das Foto wurde jedoch irrtümlich veröffentlicht und wurde inzwischen entfernt" sagte eine Sprecherin des Unternehmens.
translated_de: "The photo was not published yet and has now been removed," said a spokeswoman for the company.

en: In the particulars for the property, Connells described the former meeting house as a "unique one bedroom detached house."
de: Im Exposé des Hauses beschrieb Connells das frühere Versammlungshaus als ein "einzigartiges Einfamilienhaus mit einem Schlafzimmer."
translated_de: The Exposé of the House referred to the previous House as a "independent family house with a bedroom".

en: Although the agency has removed the image from its website, it still appears in publicity material.
de: Obwohl der Makler das Bild von der Webseite entfernt hat, erscheint es noch auf Werbematerial.
translated_de: Although the Makler' s image has been removed from the website, it appears in advertising material.

en: The house sale has sparked interest on social media, where some have enquired whether the pig is included in the sale.
de: Der Hausverkauf sorgte in den sozialen Medien für Interesse, als einige fragten, ob das Schwein im Kaufpreis enthalten sei.
translated_de: The house sale is a source of interest in the social media, as some ask, whether the Swedish price is included in the purchase price.

en: SW town of Harvey has fresh millionaire after Lotto win
de: Die SW-Stadt Harvey beheimatet nach Lottogewinn einen neuen Millionär
translated_de: The SW-Stadt Harvey is a new millionaire

en: A Harvey lotto player is in the month.
de: Ein Lottospieler aus Harvey ist diesen Monat dran
translated_de: The Harvey saga is a month of speculation.

en: The search is on for a new millionaire in Perth's south-west, with one lucky person taking home nearly $1.1 million from Saturday night's lotto draw.
de: Die Suche nach einem neuen Millionär im Südwesten von Perth dauert an, mit einem glücklichen Gewinner, der aus der Lottoziehung am Samstag fast 1,1 Million $ erhält.
translated_de: The search for a new millionaire in South-West Perth takes a long time to find a happy winner, who has received fast 1 million dollars from Lottoziehung on Saturday.

en: A Harvey newsagency struck gold in the division one draw for the second time in five years, the last being $1 million in November 2009.
de: Eine Zeitungskiosk in Harvey zog zum zweiten Mal in fünf Jahren den Jackpot in der Ziehung der ersten Division, nach 1 Million $ im November 2009.
translated_de: A newspaper skiosk in Harvey re-opened the second half of the Jackpot in the first division, after 1 Million $ in November 2009.

en: However the lucky winner has yet to come forward.
de: Der glückliche Gewinner muss sich jedoch noch melden.
translated_de: However, the lucky winner must still be re-elected.

en: Owner of the store Steve Forward said the win was creating a buzz around the small town in Perth's south west.
de: Der Ladenbesitzer Steve Forward sagte, der Gewinn sorge für Gesprächsstoff in der kleinen Stadt im Südwesten von Perth.
translated_de: The Ladenbesitzer Steve Forward said that the profit sorge for dialogue in the small town in South-West Perth.

en: It's the talk of the town and everyone is pretty excited.
de: Die Stadt redet von nichts anderem, und alle sind ziemlich aufgeregt.
translated_de: The city has nothing to do with it and all are quite a bit a bit a bit too much.

en: We thought a win like this might be close.
de: Wir dachten, dass ein solcher Gewinn eintreten könnte.
translated_de: We believe that such a profit could be achieved.

en: Eight WA winners have celebrated division one wins last month, capping off a lucky few weeks for the state's players.
de: Acht WA-Gewinner haben im vergangenen Monat Gewinne in der ersten Division gefeiert, ein gebührender Abschluss für ein paar glückliche Wochen für die Spieler im Staat.
translated_de: The WA winners have celebrated their last month' s winners in the first division, a pay-off for a few happy weeks for the players in the States.

en: Last week a Canning Vale player became one of five August millionaire's, following a Belmont couple's massive $7.5 million win only a few weeks prior.
de: In der vergangenen Woche wurde ein Spieler aus Canning Vale einer der fünf Millionäre im August, nachdem ein Ehepaar aus Belmont nur wenige Wochen zuvor den Megagewinn von 7,5 Millionen $ erzielt hatte.
translated_de: In the last week, a player from the Canning Vale was one of the five millionaires in August, a pair of Ehepaars from Belmont had only a few weeks before the Megagewinn of $75,000.

en: The winning couple had played the game for twenty years and said the win gifted them the opportunity to travel the world and buy a new house.
de: Das Siegerpaar hatte seit zwanzig Jahren gespielt und sagte, der Gewinn erlaube ihnen die Möglichkeit einer Weltreise und den Kauf eines neuen Hauses.
translated_de: The couple has played and said for a few years that the profits allow them to take a world trip and buy a new house.

en: The Harvey millionaire brings WA up to 59 division one winners for the year, totalling in nearly $85 million.
de: Der Millionär aus Harvey ist der 59. Gewinner der ersten Division in der WA in diesem Jahr, mit insgesamt fast 85 Millionen $.
translated_de: The Millionaire from Harvey is the 59th winner of the first division in WA in this year, with total $ fast 85 million.

en: Leonidas begged in the gladiatorial arena
de: Leonidas bat in die Gladiatorenarena
translated_de: Leonidas bats in the Gladiatorenarena

en: It was not only the gladiators that stood ankle deep in the mud at the park during Rheinbach's first Roman day.
de: Nicht nur die Gladiatoren standen knöcheltief im Matsch beim ersten Rheinbacher Römertag im Freizeitpark.
translated_de: The Gladiators were not only snoozing in the Matsch at the first Rheinbacher Römertag in the leisure park.

en: The appeal of the event was so great that it attracted more than 1000 visitors yesterday, who braved the rain and autumn chill, and who were completely taken in by the historical show.
de: Doch die Anziehungskraft der Veranstaltung war stark genug, um gestern weit über 1000 Besucher anzulocken, die den Regenschauern und der herbstlichen Kälte trotzten und sich vom historischen Spektakel restlos begeistern ließen.
translated_de: But the excitement of the event was a huge one, which was a huge hit for over 1000 visitors, who were still unable to see the rain and the herbs and who were buried in the historical sand.

en: There was a colorful start with representations, performances, games, exhibition pieces and information on Roman times and their significance to the Rhineland.
de: Es gab einen bunten Reigen von Darstellungen, Aufführungen, Spielen, Ausstellungsstücken und Informationen über die Zeit der Römer und ihre Bedeutung für das Rheinland.
translated_de: It had a good range of representations, tours, games, exhibitions and information on the time of the Römer and their significance for the Rheinland.

en: The main attraction of the day was undoubtedly the martial arts group from the gladiator school "Amor Mortis", which, every time it stopped raining, seized the opportunity to demonstrate their robust martial arts in the soft sand covered arena.
de: Hauptattraktion des Tages war zweifellos die martialische Kämpfertruppe von der Gladiatorenschule "Amor Mortis", die jede Regenpause dazu nutzte, in der mit weichem Sand präparierten Arena ihre robuste Kampfeskunst zu demonstrieren.
translated_de: The main objective of the day was to demonstrate the martial combat force of the Gladiator School "Amor Mortis" which, in the arena of a weichem Sand, used to demonstrate its robust combat skills.

en: The owner of gladiators "Leonidas" proved himself to be a humorous and expert presenter, who sent men, one after one, into the ring for a heroic duel in a variety of gladiatorial genres.
de: Gladiatorenbesitzer "Leonidas" erwies sich als humorvoller und sachkundiger Präsentator und schickte nacheinander seine Männer in den Ring zum heldenhaften Zweikampf in verschiedenen Gladiatorengattungen.
translated_de: Gladiator-besitzer "Leonidas" is a humor-filled and sach-headed presentator and sends his men in the Ring to the held two-fight in various Gladiatorgattations.

en: At first the "provocateurs" were lined up with a rectangular shield and short sword, as well a cuisse on the left leg, and a vembrace on the right arm.
de: Zuerst waren die "Provocatoren" an der Reihe mit Rechteckschild und Kurzschwert sowie Beinschiene am linken Bein und Armschiene am rechten Arm.
translated_de: The "provocators" were the group of rightschild and short-term, and the 'bright-arm' s 'bright-arm' 'bright-arm' 'bright-arm' 'bright-arm' 'bright-arm' 'bright-arm' 'bright-arm' 'bright-arm' 'bright-arm' 'bright-arm' 'bright-arm' 'bright-arm'

en: Then there were the "Essedarii" wearing a breast-plate, and carrying a short sword and a spear, as well as an iron gladiator helmet, a cuisse and an arm guard.
de: Es folgten die "Essedarii" mit Brustschild, Kurzschwert und Wurflanze sowie eisernem Gladiatorenhelm, Bein- und Armschutz.
translated_de: The second is the "essedarii" with breastchild, short-schwert and wormlanze, and the eisernem Gladiatorhelm, bein- and arm protection.

en: What was particular impressive was the performance of the "Retiarius", who went up against the "Secutor" with a cast-net, trident and dagger, and who, after a short fight, knocked the guys to the ground.
de: Besonders eindrucksvoll war der Auftritt des "Retiarius", der mit Wurfnetz, Dreizack und Dolch gegen den "Secutor" antrat und nach kurzem Kampf den Burschen zu Boden stieß.
translated_de: The arrival of the "Retiarius", which was fought by the squats, threezacks and dolch, was a particularly impressive and the Burst was stifled after a short battle.

en: The swords clashed against one another, the shields clanked and the spears flew, zooming through the arena, so much so that you feared for the safety of the gladiators.
de: Da krachten die Schwerter metallisch aneinander, die Schilde schepperten und die Wurflanzen flogen surrend durch die Arena, dass einem Angst und Bange werden konnte um die Gesundheit der Gladiatoren.
translated_de: The Swedish metallic slur, the schilded slur and the slur of the slur, slurred the arena, that a fear and a ban could be able to harm the Gladiators.

en: However, the gigantic "Summa Rudis", a muscular referee, constantly kept a keen eye on them.
de: Doch auf die hatte der imposante "Summa Rudis", der muskulöse Schiedsrichter, ein stets aufmerksames Auge.
translated_de: But the 'Summa Rudis', the musculous Schiedsrichter, has always been attentive.

en: "We wanted to revive the Roman everyday life, and enable the culture of Roman times to be experienced", Lorenz Euskirchen, the chairman of the events organization "Freundeskreis Römerkanal" explained as the intention behind the spectacle.
de: "Wir wollten den römischen Alltag wieder aufleben lassen und die Kultur der Römerzeit erlebbar machen", erläuterte Lorenz Euskirchen, Vorsitzender des Veranstalters "Freundeskreis Römerkanal", die Intention hinter dem Spektakel.
translated_de: "We wanted to revive the roomish lifestyle and to make the culture of the roomish period", explained Lorenz Euskirchen, Chairman of the Organisator' s "Roomary Circle", who was in the intention of re-election.

en: Claus Wehage, the deputy mayor, announced in his welcome speech that after two years of preparation, the park was transformed for one day into an "Oppidum Romanum", a Roman city.
de: Nach zwei Jahren Vorbereitungszeit wurde aus dem Freizeitpark für einen Tag eine "Oppidum Romanum", eine römische Stadt, wie Vizebürgermeister Claus Wehage in seinem Grußwort feststellte.
translated_de: After two years of preparation, the leisure park was set up for a day of 'Oppidum Romanum', a Roman city, as Claus Wehage, a bourgeoisie.

en: In the end, the Romans not only brought war and conquest to our region, but also the Roman culture and numerous buildings, which we can still admire today.
de: Schließlich haben die Römer nicht nur Krieg und Eroberung in unserer Region gebracht, sondern auch die römische Kultur und zahlreiche Bauwerke, die wir noch heute bewundern.
translated_de: Finally, the Römer have not only brought war and robbery in our region, but also the römische culture and many construction works which we have been amazed by.

en: Some of these remains could also be marveled at during the Roman day, such as "Aduädukt-Marmor" from the eleven-meter high, and 1400 meter long, Roman canal bridge, which is the only one in Lüftelberg.
de: Überreste davon waren auch beim Römertag zu bestaunen, etwa "Aquädukt-Marmor" von der elf Meter hohen und 1400 Meter langen Römerkanal-Brücke, die dereinst bei Lüftelberg stand.
translated_de: The repercussions were also at the roostertag, such as the "Aquädukt-Marmor" of the elf meters high and the aqueous roosters of 1400 meters, which are the most common in Lüftelberg.

en: The Frontinus organization compared, both then and now, the water and energy supply, and the managing director, Petra Fricke, said: "We still derive benefit today from the knowledge of back then".
de: Die Frontinus-Gesellschaft stellte die Wasser- und Energieversorgung einst und jetzt gegenüber, und Geschäftsführerin Petra Fricke wusste: "Wir ziehen heute noch Nutzen aus dem Wissen von damals".
translated_de: The Frontinus Group sat on water and energy supply and now, the business leader, Petra Fricke, said: "We are still drawing on the knowledge of the past".

en: This was confirmed by the surveyor Ralph Heiliger from "IngenieurteamZwei" in Rheinback, who introduced the instruments used by the Romans for surveying, such as the Chorobat, Groma and Dioptra.
de: Das bestätigt auch Diplom-Vermessungsingenieur Ralph Heiliger vom "IngenieurteamZwei" aus Rheinbach, der Vermessungsinstrumente der Römer wie Chorobat, Groma oder Dioptra vorstellte.
translated_de: The Diplom-Vermessungsenieur Ralph Heiliger, from the "Ingenieurteam" in Rheinbach, has also been confirmed by the Römer Vermessungsinstruments, such as Chorobat, Groma or Dioptra.

en: The Römervilla in Blankenheim presented sketches and models of the excavations of 1894, as well as bricks made from the original hypocaust, forced-air heating, which was once used to warm up Römervilla.
de: Die Römervilla in Blankenheim präsentierte Skizzen und Modelle von den Ausgrabungen anno 1894 sowie Ziegelsteine aus der Original-Hypokauste, der Warmluftheizung, die einst die Römervilla erwärmte.
translated_de: The Römervilla in Blankenheim presented skizzes and models from the 1894 excavations and Ziegelsteine from the original hypocose, the heating of air, which was one of the most enlightened buildings in the region.

en: The footprints of a wolf and fox from two thousand years ago were also impressive, and were left behind after they trod in clay before it was burnt.
de: Beeindruckend auch die Fußabdrücke, die von Wolf und Fuchs vor zwei Jahrtausenden in den Fußtritten aus Ton hinterlassen worden waren, bevor man diese brannte.
translated_de: The footfalls, which were thrown from Wolf and Fuchs over two thousand years ago, were also a sign of a brannt.

en: In 2011 the office of archaeological monument conservation at the state association in Rheinland excavated the remains of a Roman Villa in an industrial estate in north Rheinbach.
de: 2011 hatte das Amt für Bodendenkmalpflege beim Landesverband Rheinland die Überreste einer römischen Villa im Gewerbepark Nord in Rheinbach ausgegraben.
translated_de: In 2011, the Amt for soil maintenance in the Rheinland Lands Association had a large crop of a roomish villa in the north-east of Rheinbach.

en: The enclosing walls of an agricultural building were discovered and contained a kiln for drying crops and malting.
de: Man habe Umfassungsmauern eines Wirtschaftsgebäudes mit einer Darre zum Trocknen von Getreide und zum Mälzen gefunden.
translated_de: I have found a building in a business building with a Darre to the trocks of cereal and the mutilators.

en: The building probably belonged to a Villa Rustica, an agricultural manor, archaeologist Dr. Jennifer Morscheiser explained.
de: Das Gebäude habe wahrscheinlich zu einer Villa Rustica, einem landwirtschaftlichen Gut, gehört, erläuterte die Archäologin Dr. Jennifer Morscheiser.
translated_de: The building probably has a Villa Rustica, a land-based Gut, which is explained by Archaeologist Dr Jennifer Morscheiser.

en: A range of finds from the excavation were presented in a glass cabinet, among which were a large plate, several fine glass jars and parts of a small necklace.
de: Eine Reihe von Fundstücken aus diesen Ausgrabungen stellte sie in einer Glasvitrine vor, darunter einen großen Teller, mehrere feine Glasgefäße sowie Teile einer zierlichen Halskette.
translated_de: A number of funds from these expenditures have been placed in a glassvitrine, including a large plate, several fine glass feces and some a fine chain.

en: Morscheiser presumed that the Villa was there from between the first and fourth century Anno Domini until the invasion of the Germanic people in the former Roman Rheinland.
de: Die Villa habe wohl vom ersten bis zum vierten Jahrhundert nach Christus existiert, bis zum Einfall der Germanen im damals römischen Rheinland, vermutet Morscheiser.
translated_de: The Villa has probably existed from the first to the fourth century after Christus, until the Germans were buried in the rheumatical Rhine in the time.

en: The children also kept themselves busy playing the Roman windmills game, similar to today's mill game, or they wrote, as did the Roman pupils at the time, their names with metal pens on wax tablets.
de: Bei ihr beschäftigten sich die Kinder zudem mit dem römischen Windmühlenspiel, ähnlich dem heutigen Mühlespiel, oder sie schrieben wie einst die römischen Schüler ihre Namen mit Metallgriffeln auf Wachstafeln.
translated_de: In their work, children are involved in the rood windmill, similar to the rood millmille, or they are ascribed to the roods of the school as a rood with metal griffels on a sand.

en: At the Roman thermal bath stand from Zülpich, the children were allowed to lay mosaics themselves; at the Rheinbach glass museum stand they made glass mosaics; and at the Eifel Nettersheim nature center stand, they got to use a heavy wheat mill made of stone so they could grind the flour needed for a pita bread or muesli.
de: Am Stand der Römerthermen Zülpich durften die Kinder Mosaiken selber legen, am Stand des Glasmuseums Rheinbach Glasmosaiken basteln und am Stand des Naturzentrums Eifel Nettersheim eine schwere Weizenmühle aus Stein bedienen, um das Mehl für ein Fladenbrot oder ein Müsli zu mahlen.
translated_de: The children' s Mosaiken was put on the ground at the Römerthermal Centre, at the Glasmuseum Rheinbach Glasmosaiken and at the Nature Centre Eifel Nettersheim, a grave wetter from stone bediens, to make a fladenbrot or a waste.

en: The visitors rode through the park in a Roman carriage, which had been reconstructed to be true to the original, and pulled along by two cold blood horses, and also passed by the impressive city gym stand, where the results of their "Roman project week" were revealed.
de: Mit dem von zwei Kaltblütern gezogenen originalgetreu nachgebauten römischen Reisewagen fuhren die Besucher durch den Freizeitpark und kamen dabei auch am beeindruckenden Stand des Städtischen Gymnasiums vorbei, das hier die Ergebnisse ihrer "Römer-Projektwochen" präsentierte.
translated_de: The two caltblüterns redesigned original römischen travelwagens travelled the visitors to the leisure park and walked along the impressive stand of the Städty Gymnastics, which presented the results of their "Rom Project Weeks".

en: From 13 to 21 September, the community of Wachtberg will also participate in a Roman week, in what is being called Roman Year 2014 throughout the Rhineland. The event will remember the death of Kaiser Augustus 2000 years ago.
de: Mit einer Römerwoche vom 13. bis 21. September wird sich auch die Gemeinde Wachtberg in das rheinlandweit ausgerufene Römerjahr 2014, das an den Tod von Kaiser Augustus vor 2000 Jahren erinnern soll, einbringen.
translated_de: The Council of the Wachtbergs in the northern region will also be bringing the re-election of the re-election 2014, which will be commemorated by the Emperor Augustus in 2000 years.

en: Together with the clubs dedicated to local, regional and historical traditions and characteristics, as well as the Wachtberg hiking club, the partnership association, and the Oberbachem amateur dramatics club, hiking, recitals, cooking evening and guidance for school classes, among other things, will be offered, and the Roman history of Wachtberg shall be remembered.
de: Gemeinsam mit den Heimat- und Geschichtsvereinen sowie dem Wachtberger Wander-Verein, dem Partnerschaftsverein und dem Laienspielkreis Oberbachem werden unter anderem thematische Wanderungen, ein Vortrag, Kochabende sowie Führungen für Schulklassen angeboten und an die römische Vergangenheit Wachtbergs erinnern.
translated_de: Together with the local and local groups, the Wachtberger Wandering Association, the Partnerships Association and the Laienspielkreis Oberbachem, a talk, Kochabends and leadership for schools and an era of Wachtbergs will be presented.

en: The Roman legionnaire will, for example, talk about his drafty work in Wachtberg; plants will be presented as living monuments of Roman times, and a humorous lesson on the matter of international understanding between a "Germanic" group from Wachtberg and Roman invaders will be showcased.
de: Dabei wird zum Beispiel ein römischer Legionär von seiner Arbeit auf dem zugigen Wachtberg erzählen, Pflanzen als lebende Denkmale aus der Römerzeit vorgestellt und eine witzige Lehrstunde in Sachen Völkerverständigung zwischen einer Gruppe Wachtberger "Germanen" und zugezogenen Römern dargeboten.
translated_de: In this way, a roomish Legionaire from his work on the adversity of the Wachtberg, a plant as a living dand from the Römer period and awitzed lesson on the völkerverständing between a group of adversity of the Germans and adversity of the Römer.

en: Adendorf elementary school has devoted itself to a week-long, Roman-themed project.
de: Die Adendorfer Grundschule widmet sich im Rahmen einer Projektwoche dem Römerthema.
translated_de: The Adendorfer Grundschule widmete its scope in the framework of a project week in the Römerthema.

en: The Roman week should, once again, enable us to experience the numerous and common, yet, at first glance, no longer visible, traces of the Romans in Wachtberg.
de: Mit der Römerwoche sollen die zahlreichen, häufig aber nicht mehr auf den ersten Blick sichtbaren Spuren der Römer in Wachtberg wieder erfahrbar gemacht werden.
translated_de: The roosterwoche will see the many, often but not more visible Spurs of the rooster in Wachtberg again.

en: Wachtberg town hall will give a small presentation on the sanctuary in Berkum, which was found in 1879.
de: Im Wachtberger Rathaus wird eine kleine Präsentation an den Fund des Berkumer Matronenheiligtums im Jahr 1879 erinnern.
translated_de: The Wachtberger Rathaus will give a small presentation to the Fund of the Berkumer Matronenheiligtum in 1879.

en: Ebola: The epidemic is putting strain on West Africa's economy
de: Ebola: Die Epidemie belastet Westafrikas Wirtschaft
translated_de: Ebola: The Epidemie destroys West Africa' s economy

en: The Ebola epidemic in West Africa is also a huge hit for the economy.
de: Die Ebola-Epidemie in Westafrika ist auch ein schwerer Schlag für die Wirtschaft.
translated_de: The epidemic of ebola in West Africa is also a serious blow to the economy.

en: Markets have been abandoned, and international companies are keeping their distance.
de: Märkte sind verwaist - und internationale Unternehmen gehen auf Distanz.
translated_de: Märkte are a skeptic - and international companies are ignoring them.

en: The devastating Ebola epidemic has dealt the economy in West Africa a heavy blow.
de: Die verheerende Ebola-Epidemie versetzt der Wirtschaft Westafrikas einen schweren Schlag.
translated_de: The ebola epidemic has left the economy of West Africa a serious blow.

en: Crops are rotting in the fields, mines have been deserted, and the markets have been abandoned. The virus has cost the region dearly.
de: Die Ernte verrottet auf den Feldern, die Minen sind verlassen und die Märkte verwaist - das Virus hat der Region schwer zugesetzt.
translated_de: The worms are rotting on the fields, the mines are left and the worms are rotting - the virus has severely damaged the region.

en: Even some international companies are keeping their distance.
de: Auch einige internationale Unternehmen gehen bereits auf Distanz.
translated_de: Some international companies are already in distanzation.

en: "The Ebola epidemic is not only a medical crisis, but also an economic one", the head of the African Development Bank, Donald Kaberuka, concluded.
de: "Die Ebola-Epidemie ist nicht nur eine medizinische Krise, sondern auch eine wirtschaftliche", urteilt der Chef der Afrikanischen Entwicklungsbank, Donald Kaberuka.
translated_de: "The epidemic of ebola is not only a medical crisis, but also a economic crisis," said the head of the African Development Bank, Donald Kaberuka.

en: Liberia is the most affected country
de: Liberia ist am härtesten betroffen
translated_de: Liberia is at the heart of the crisis

en: "It is a total catastrophe; we are losing a lot of money", Alhaji Bamogo said, who sells clothes in the second largest market in Liberia's capital city, Monrovia.
de: "Es ist eine totale Katastrophe, wir verlieren sehr viel Geld", sagt Alhaji Bamogo, der auf dem zweitgrößten Markt in Liberias Hauptstadt Monrovia Kleidung verkauft.
translated_de: "This is a total disaster, we lose very much money," said Alhaji Bamogo, who sold clothing on the second largest market in the capital of Liberia, Monrovia.

en: The only people to come to the market are those who want to buy food or disinfectant against Ebola.
de: Auf den Markt kommt nur, wer Lebensmittel oder etwas zur Desinfektion gegen Ebola kaufen will.
translated_de: On the market, only food or something will be bought to combat Ebola.

en: Liberia is the country most affected by the virus; here alone more than 600 people have fallen victim to the fever.
de: Liberia ist am härtesten von dem Virus getroffen, alleine hier fielen dem Fieber mehr als 600 Menschen zum Opfer.
translated_de: Liberia is being beaten by the virus, which is the only way to get more than 600 people to be opportunized.

en: The health authorities recently explained that the disease has reached all corners of the country.
de: Kürzlich erklärten die Gesundheitsbehörden, die Krankheit sei in jeden Winkel des Landes vorgedrungen.
translated_de: The health authorities have declared that the disease is being spread in every country.

en: The virus has even spread to Guinea, Sierra Leone and Nigeria.
de: Auch in Guinea, Sierra Leone und Nigeria hat sich das Virus ausgebreitet.
translated_de: In Guinea, Sierra Leone and Nigeria, the virus has been spread.

en: In total, more than 1500 people have already died, and thousands more have been infected.
de: Insgesamt starben bereits mehr als 1500 Menschen, tausende weitere steckten sich an.
translated_de: Insgesamt, there are already more than 1500 people, and a thousand more are dead.

en: Foreign businesses are pulling their employees out
de: Ausländische Firmen ziehen Mitarbeiter ab
translated_de: Foreign companies are recruiting employees

en: All over countries rich with resources, companies are suspending operations.
de: Überall in den ressourcenreichen Ländern setzen Firmen ihren Betrieb aus.
translated_de: In the resources of the world, companies are putting their business on the ground.

en: Foreign companies such as the steel group Arcelor Mittal are withdrawing their employees, and several international airlines are no longer flying to affected regions.
de: Ausländische Unternehmen wie der Stahlkonzern Arcelor Mittal ziehen ihre Angestellten ab, mehrere internationale Fluggesellschaften fliegen die betroffenen Regionen nicht mehr an.
translated_de: Foreign companies such as the steel-coated Arcelor Mittal are attracting their customers, and several international airlines are not flying in the affected regions.

en: Even local traders and farmers are reacting: Only a few business people are still leaving their home towns to replenish their supplies.
de: Auch die einheimischen Händler und Bauern reagieren: Nur wenige Kaufleute verlassen noch ihre Heimatorte, um Nachschub zu besorgen.
translated_de: The domestic traders and farmers respond to the fact that only few merchants leave their homes to take care of their own fate.

en: In some areas of Sierra Leone and Liberia, where they have been put under quarantine, cacao and coffee beans, to name a few, and which are important for export, are rotting in the fields.
de: In einigen Gebieten in Sierra Leone und Liberia, die unter Quarantäne stehen, verrotten unter anderem die für den Export wichtigen Kakao- und Kaffeebohnen auf den Feldern.
translated_de: In some areas of Sierra Leone and Liberia, which are sub-quarants, we are rotting under anderem the important cacao and coffee beans in the fields for export.

en: The farmers do not dare leave their homes for the crops.
de: Die Bauern wagen es nicht, für die Ernte ihr Zuhause zu verlassen.
translated_de: The farmers do not want to leave their homes.

en: Food suppliers are scarce
de: Lebensmittel werden knapp
translated_de: Foods are scarce

en: "People are traveling less and less", Phillipe De Vreyer, a Parisian expert on the economy of West Africa said.
de: "Die Menschen werden immer weniger reisen", sagt Phillipe De Vreyer, Pariser Experte für die Wirtschaft Westafrikas.
translated_de: "The people are always less travelled", says Phillipe De Vreyer, expert in the economic west african economy.

en: For example, a man, who normally goes to the market and sells his vegetables, is choosing to stay at home.
de: Der Mann zum Beispiel, der normalerweise auf den Markt geht und sein Gemüse verkauft, bleibt lieber daheim.
translated_de: The Mann, for example, is going to be on the market normally and his vegetables are sold.

en: The population is, therefore, facing the consequences of the epidemic head on and feeling the pressure: Food suppliers are scarce.
de: Die Bevölkerung bekommt deshalb die Folgen der Epidemie direkt und drängend zu spüren: Lebensmittel werden knapp.
translated_de: The population is therefore able to see the consequences of the Epidemie directly and indirectly: food will be scarce.

en: The supply of staple foods such as rice is dwindling in the markets.
de: Auf den Märkten schwindet der Vorrat an Grundnahrungsmitteln wie Reis.
translated_de: The stalemate of the proposal is a fundamental rungs medium such as Reis.

en: At the same time, the image of the region, which is heavily reliant on international companies, is under threat, and this has far-reaching consequences.
de: Zugleich droht der stark von internationalen Firmen abhängigen Region ein Imageschaden - mit weit reichenden Folgen.
translated_de: The rise in the stark international companies' dependence on the region could be a 'image damage' with many consequences.

en: The biggest danger is that international companies are avoiding the region for what is essentially a long time, Phillippe Hugon, from the French Think Tank, Iris, said.
de: Die größte Gefahr sei, dass internationale Firmen die Gegend grundsätzlich über lange Zeit meiden, sagt Philippe Hugon vom französischen Think Tank Iris.
translated_de: The biggest risk is that international companies have been essentially ignoring the present for long periods, says Philippe Hugon of the French Think Tank Iris.

en: What is crucial is how wide and how long the virus will continue to spread.
de: Entscheidend sei, wie weit und wie lange sich das Virus noch ausbreiten werde.
translated_de: It is not clear how long the virus will be going to be.

en: Investors may get the impression "that it is dangerous to live in Guinea, Sierra Leone and Liberia, and, therefore, also to invest", Hugon warned.
de: Bei Investoren könne der Eindruck entstehen, "dass es gefährlich ist, in Guinea, Sierra Leone und Liberia zu leben und somit auch zu investieren", warnt Hugon.
translated_de: Investors can imagine that "it is dangerous to live in Guinea, Sierra Leone and Liberia and therefore to invest", warns Hugon.

en: The disease is also burdening the already strained national budgets of the States
de: Die Krankheit belastet auch die strapazierten Staatshaushalte der Staaten
translated_de: The disease also affects the strapped state budget

en: The disease is also burdening the already strained national budgets of the affected States.
de: Die Krankheit belastet auch die ohnehin strapazierten Staatshaushalte der betroffenen Staaten.
translated_de: The disease also affects the without-stressed state budget.

en: The rating agency Moody's fears that their budgets are being heavily strained by the high expenditure on the health system, and also by the declining economy.
de: Die Ratingagentur Moody's befürchtet, dass deren Budgets stark von den hohen Ausgaben für das Gesundheitssystem und zusätzlich von der sich verschlechternden Wirtschaft strapaziert werden.
translated_de: The Rating Agency Moody's believes that the budgets will be stifled by the high expenditures for health and, more importantly, by the weak economy.

en: The African Development Bank has already promised to provide financial aid to the tune of 60 million dollars (45 million euros) to the health systems of affected countries.
de: Die Afrikanische Entwicklungsbank versprach bereits, den Gesundheitssystemen der betroffenen Länder mit 60 Millionen Dollar (45 Millionen Euro) auszuhelfen.
translated_de: The African Development Bank has already spoken of the health system of the affected countries with a total of 60 million dollars (45 million Euro).

en: The effects in Nigeria, where up to now only a few Ebola cases have been diagnosed, are already noticeable.
de: Spürbar sind die Auswirkungen auch bereits in Nigeria, wo bislang nur wenige Ebola-Fälle diagnostiziert wurden.
translated_de: There are also a few effects in Nigeria, where only a few Ebola-Falle cases have been diagnosed.

en: Yet the oil-rich region in the south of the Niger Delta is not yet affected.
de: Zwar ist die ölreiche Region im südlichen Nigerdelta bisher nicht betroffen.
translated_de: The oil-rich region in the southern Niger Delta has not been affected by the situation.

en: However, elsewhere, many people are already staying at home for fear of becoming infected.
de: Doch anderswo bleiben bereits viele Menschen aus Angst vor einer Ansteckung zuhause.
translated_de: But anderswo still has many people in fear of a panic.

en: There is even a marked decline in the number of hotel reservations.
de: Auch Reservierungen in Hotels gehen deutlich zurück.
translated_de: The number of hotels has gone up dramatically.

en: Shooters are celebrating their 50th anniversary
de: Schützen feiern ihr 50. Jubiläum
translated_de: Schützen celebrates 50th anniversary

en: The gun club "Tannenwald" in Berngau is celebrating its 50th anniversary from 12th to 14th September.
de: Der Schützenverein "Tannenwald" Berngau feiert von 12. bis 14. September sein 50-jähriges Gründungsfest.
translated_de: The Schützenverein "Tannenwald" Berngau celebrated its 50th anniversary from 12. to 14. September.

en: The preparations for the party are well underway in Tannenwald gun club, which will celebrate 50 years since being established on 12th to 14th September.
de: Auf Hochtouren laufen beim Schützenverein Tannenwald die Vorbereitungen für das 50-jährige Gründungsfest von 12. bis 14. September.
