translated_de: The summits are being held at the Schützenverein Tannenwald, where the preparations for the 50-year foundingfest are carried out from 12 to 14 September.

en: The plan for Friday 12th September is an evening of entertainment provided by the group "Dorfrocker".
de: Geplant ist am Freitag, 12. September, ein großer Unterhaltungsabend mit der Gruppe "Dorfrocker".
translated_de: The event is on Friday, 12. September, a great evening of entertainment with the group "Dorfrocker".

en: The large cannon will be fired on Saturday at 18:00.
de: Am Samstag ist um 18 Uhr das große Böllerschießen.
translated_de: Saturday, at 18 a.m., the big blunderschies are being held.

en: Followed by a pleasant evening with "Stoapfälzer Spitzbuam" (Stoapfälzer rascals) in a large party tent.
de: Anschließend ist im großen Festzelt der Stimmungsabend mit den "Stoapfälzer Spitzbuam".
translated_de: Then, in the grand festival of the mood, the "stoapfälzer spitzbuam" is a 'stuff'.

en: A brass band will be catering for the music
de: Blaskapelle sorgt für die Musik
translated_de: Blaskapelle is the foundation for music

en: The highlights on Sunday will be the festival service, which will take place at 9:30am in the parish church, and also the processions at 2pm.
de: Höhepunkte am Sonntag sind der Festgottesdienst und 9.30 Uhr in der Pfarrkirche und der große Festzug um 14 Uhr.
translated_de: The highest points are Sunday' s Festgottes service and 9.30 in the Parish Church and the grand Fest at 14 p.m.

en: There will also be a ranking announcement in the afternoon for the national and county shooting competition.
de: Am Nachmittag ist auch die Preisverteilung des Bundes- und Gauschießens.
translated_de: The price distribution of the Federal and Gauschies is also available on the afternoon.

en: A particularly attractive sight will be the 25 festival women in their Dirndls.
de: Ein besonders schöner Anblick werden die 25 Festdamen mit ihren Dirndln sein.
translated_de: The 25 Festdams are a particularly beautiful view.

en: The festival band will be Berngau brass band.
de: Festkapelle ist die Blaskapelle Berngau.
translated_de: The capital is the Blaskapelle Berngau.

en: Mayor Wolfgang Wild and state secretary Albert Füracker have taken on the sponsorship.
de: Die Schirmherrschaft haben Bürgermeister Wolfgang Wild und Staatssekretär Albert Füracker übernommen.
translated_de: The syria of the country has taken over the presidency by Mr Wild and the State Secretary-General Albert Foracker.

en: The original name, "Schützengesellschaft Tannenwald Berngau" (gun society Tannenwald Berngau) dates back to 1907, when, on 21st March, the club was founded and described as "social entertainment by means of pistol and small-caliber target practice".
de: Die ursprüngliche Bezeichnung "Schützengesellschaft Tannenwald Berngau" stammt aus dem Jahr 1907, als am 21. März der Verein zur "gesellschaftlichen Unterhaltung mittels Übung im Zimmerstutzen- und Kleinkaliberschießen" gegründet worden ist.
translated_de: The original name "Schützengesellschaft Tannenwald Berngau" originated in 1907, as the United Nations has established the association for "social entertainment through exercise in rooms and small-scale liberties".

en: In 1937 the Nazi regime closed the club down.
de: Das NS-Regime hatte 1937 die Auflösung des Vereins veranlasst.
translated_de: The NSRegime was dissolved in 1937.

en: Then on 30th April 1964, 19 young men founded the club again, and launched the "new" gun club "Tannenwald" in Berngau at Lukas guest-house.
de: Erst 1964 haben sich sich wieder 19 junge Männer gefunden, die am 30. April im Gasthaus Lukas den "neuen" Schützenverein "Tannenwald" Berngau aus der Taufe gehoben haben.
translated_de: In 1964, 19 young men were found in the Lukas guesthouse, which was renamed the "neuen" Schützenverein "Tannenwald" Berngau, on 30 April.

en: Karl März and Adolf Ried led the club as range officers during its tough early years. The main objective then was to find a club pub and set up a shooting company.
de: Karl März und Adolf Ried führten den Verein als Schützenmeister durch eine schwierige Anfangszeit, in der es vornehmlich darum ging, ein Vereinslokal zu finden und den Schießbetrieb zu installieren.
translated_de: Karl March and Adolf Ried have led the Verein as a Schützermeister by a difficult start, in which it was a common sense to find a club local and to install the Schießbetrieb.

en: As early as autumn 1965 the shooting club started out in "Leininger" guest house with two teams competing against one another.
de: Bereits im Herbst 1965 startete der Schützenverein im Gasthaus "Leininger" mit zwei Mannschaften in den Rundenwettkämpfen.
translated_de: In autumn 1965, the Schützenverein started with two teams in the roundwetting.

en: The following year, target shooting was set up as a sport, organized into seven teams, ranging in ability, all the way up to the local premier league.
de: In den Folgejahren etablierten sich die Sportschützen, die mittlerweile in sieben Mannschaften organisiert waren, in allen Klassen bis hin zur 1. Gauliga.
translated_de: In the following year, the Sport Protections, which were now organised in seven teams, were established in all classes, until the 1st Gauliga.

en: The club records roll out every year, and the magic 380 rounds were set up for the first time in 1980 by Rudi Meier.
de: Die Vereinsrekorde purzelten alljährlich und die magische Grenze von 380 Ringen wurde zum ersten Mal 1980 von Rudi Meier erreicht.
translated_de: The club' s resolutions are all akin to the 380-ring limit and the magnification of the limits of 380 rings was reached in 1980 by Rudi Meier.

en: Just as the achievements of the active members has increased, so have the number of members.
de: So wie sich die Leistungsfähigkeit der aktiven Schützen erhöht haben, haben sich auch die Mitgliederzahlen positiv entwickelt.
translated_de: As the capacity of active workers has increased, membership numbers have also improved positively.

en: Once the club pub "Leininger" no longer met the requirements of a modern gun club, the club's management at the time, lead by Johann Rinn, decided to set up its future home in the basement room of the new "Landgasthof Härteis" (a country hotel).
de: Nachdem das Vereinslokal "Leininger" nicht mehr den Ansprüchen eines modernen Schützenvereins genügt hat, hat sich die damalige Vorstandschaft unter der Führung von Johann Rinn dazu entschlossen, in den Kellerräumen des neuen "Landgasthof Härteis" ein künftiges Domizil zu schaffen.
translated_de: After the club' s "Leininger" has not exceeded the demands of a modern Schützenverein, the damalige Board of Directors under Johann Rinn has decided to create a Domizil in the cellars of the new "Landgasthof" of the new 'Harteis'.

en: After 2700 hours of hard work, Father Strasser issued the blessing of the church for the new guns room on 8th May 1988.
de: Nach einer Arbeitsleistung von 2700 Stunden erteilte am 8. Mai 1988 Pfarrer Strasser für die neuen Schützenräume den kirchlichen Segen.
translated_de: The church of Strasser, who was commissioned to work for 2700 hours on 8 Mai 1988, was given the new sanctuaries.

en: One of the greatest highlights in the history of the club was without doubt the 44th local shooting competition, which is linked to the formal consecration of the new shooting flag in July 1991.
de: Einer der großen Höhepunkte in der Vereinsgeschichte war sicherlich das 44. Gauschießen, verbunden mit der feierlichen Weihe der neuen Schützenfahne im Juli 1991.
translated_de: One of the greatest achievements in the history of the club was the 44 Gauschies, which were accompanied by the celebration of the new Schützenfahne in July 1991.

en: On 23rd and 24th April 1994, the shooting club celebrated its 30th anniversary.
de: Am 23. und 24. April 1994 hat der Schützenverein sein 30-jähriges Gründungsjubiläum gefeiert.
translated_de: The Schützenverein celebrated its 30th anniversary on 23 and 24 April 1994.

en: In 1995 the cannon group was founded.
de: 1995 ist eine Böllergruppe gegründet worden.
translated_de: 1995 was a Böller Group.

en: Josef Schmalzl was the head of the cannon division.
de: Josef Schmalzl wurde Böllerreferent.
translated_de: Josef Schmalzl was referred to as Böller.

en: Organizing the Bavarian Cannon Meeting in 2005 was a huge challenge for the "cannon shooters", and for the club as a whole.
de: Eine große Herausforderung für die "Böllerer" und für den Verein insgesamt war die Ausrichtung des Bayerischen Böllertreffens 2005.
translated_de: The issue of the Baltics and the United Nations was the issue of the Bayer' s Böller Council in 2005.

en: Many hours of voluntary work was dedicated by members of the club last year to modernize the rooms and shooting facilities in the Berngau courtyard, making it state of the art.
de: In vielen Stunden ehrenamtlicher Arbeit haben die Vereinsmitglieder im vergangenen Jahr die Räume und die Schießanlage im Berngauer Hof modernisiert und damit auf den neuesten Stand der Technik gebracht.
translated_de: In many hours of volunteer work, the members of the Club have modernised the rooms and the restaurant in Berngauer Hof and adapted the latest technique.

en: Eleven teams go head to head
de: Elf Teams in Rundenwettkämpfen
translated_de: Elf teams in roundwettkämpfe

en: The sporting achievements of the shooting club are also impressive.
de: Sehen lassen können sich auch die sportlichen Leistungen des Schützenvereins.
translated_de: The sport of the Schützenverein can also be achieved.

en: Currently there are a total of eleven teams that are taking part in the competitions: six air rifles teams, one pellet gun team, one KK1 sport target pistol team, one youth team and two old-timer teams.
de: Insgesamt nehmen gegenwärtig elf Mannschaften an den Rundenwettkämpfen teil: sechs Luftgewehr-Mannschaften, eine Luftpistolen-Mannschaft, eine Sportpistolen KK1, eine Jugend- und zwei AH-Mannschaften.
translated_de: Insgesamt, the majority of the teams are against the clock: six air defence forces, one air defence force, one sport police force KK1, one youth and two AH.

en: The first team comprised of Lars Ellrich, Katharina Ellrich, Steffi Grad and Kerstin Kellermann was promoted to number 1 in the regional league in 2013/14, up from the local premier league (the highest of the shooting leagues in the ANB).
de: Die 1. Mannschaft mit Lars Ellrich, Katharina Ellrich, Steffi Grad und Kerstin Kellermann ist in der Runde 2013/14 von der Gauoberliga (höchste Liga im Schützengau ANB) in die Bezirksliga 1 aufgestiegen.
translated_de: The 1. team with Lars Ellrich, Katharina Ellrich, Steffi Grad and Kerstin Kellermann has increased in the district league 1 in the round 2013/14 of the Gauoberliga (highest Liga in the Schützengau ANB).

en: The second team comprised of Verena Moosburger, Alexandra Meier, Eva Schuhmann and Tobias Graml was promoted from the North local league to the local premier league.
de: Die 2. Mannschaft mit Verena Moosburger Alexandra Meier, Eva Schuhmann und Tobias Graml ist von der Gauliga Nord in die Gauoberliga aufgestiegen.
translated_de: The 2. team with Verena Moosburger Alexandra Meier, Eva Schuhmann and Tobias Graml is increasing in the Gauoberliga.

en: In addition to shooting, events such as Bockstechen, Fasching and Königsball, club excursions and also Christmas celebrations are all club traditions.
de: Neben dem Schießsport haben Veranstaltungen wie Bockstechen, Faschings- und Königsball, Vereinsausflug und Weihnachtsfeier Tradition.
translated_de: The sport has also been a celebration of Bocksteet, Faschings and Kingsball, Vereinsausflug and Christmas celebration.

en: The shooters also attend the parish and community festivals.
de: Mit dabei sind die Schützen auch bei den Festen in Pfarrei und Gemeinde.
translated_de: The ruins are also buried at the parishes and parishes.

en: Tony Stewart crashes in return to track
de: Tony Stewart erleidet Unfall bei Rückkehr auf die Rennstrecke
translated_de: Tony Stewart erled a crash in the return to the road

en: Tony Stewart's return to the track has ended only a little over halfway through his race at Atlanta Motor Speedway.
de: Tony Stewarts Rückkehr auf die Rennstrecke endete etwa auf halbem Wege durch sein Rennen auf dem Atlanta Motor Speedway.
translated_de: Tony Stewart' s return to the road is a half-mile journey through the Atlanta Motor Speedway.

en: Stewart hit the wall for the second time after his right front tire blew out on lap 172, ending his night.
de: Stewart fuhr zum zweiten Mal gegen die Mauer, nachdem sein rechter Vorderreifen in Runde 172 platzte und seinen Abend beendete.
translated_de: Stewart sat in second mal against the Mauer, whose right-wing wing was placed in round 172 and his evening was dragged.

en: Stewart drove his battered car to the garage and then exited without speaking to reporters.
de: Stewart fuhr sein beschädigtes Auto in die Garage und verließ es, ohne mit Journalisten zu sprechen.
translated_de: Stewart sat in the garage and he refused to speak with journalists.

en: His crew chief Chad Johnston said the 14 team was disappointed, but will now start focusing on next weekend's race in Richmond, Virginia.
de: Sein Teamchef Chad Johnston sagte, sein 14-köpfiges Team sei enttäuscht, konzentriere sich jetzt aber auf das Rennen am kommenden Wochenende in Richmond, Virginia.
translated_de: The teamchef Chad Johnston said that his 14-member team is enticed to concentrate on the Rennen at the next weekend in Richmond, Virginia.

en: "I wish we could have had a better effort and a better finish for him," Johnston said.
de: "Ich wünschte, wir hätten einen besseren Einsatz und ein besseres Ergebnis für ihn gehabt," sagte Johnston.
translated_de: "I believe that we would have better use and better results for him," said Johnston.

en: We'll go on to Richmond and hope we can do better there.
de: Wir fahren nach Richmond und hoffen, dass wir es dort besser machen können.
translated_de: We are going to Richmond and hope that we can do better here.

en: Stewart first went into the wall earlier in Sunday night's race following a collision with Kyle Busch, requiring work to the right side of his car.
de: Stewart fuhr bereits früher beim Rennen am Sonntag Abend nach einer Kollision mit Kyle Busch in eine Mauer und musste die rechte Seite seines Wagens reparieren lassen.
translated_de: Stewart was able to take the wagon off the road at the Rennen on Sunday evening after a collision with Kyle Busch in a Mauer and had to return the right side of his car.

en: "I went into today with some pretty good hopes of finishing well," Johnston said, adding, "It just didn't work out."
de: "Ich bin heute mit recht guten Hoffnungen auf ein gutes Ergebnis hineingegangen," sagte Johnston und fügte hinzu: "Es hat einfach nicht geklappt."
translated_de: "I am now in a position to achieve a good result," said Johnston and added: "It has simply not been a bad thing."

en: Not long after the second crash, Stewart's car was loaded onto the hauler and the team was packed up and ready to leave.
de: Nicht lange nach dem zweiten Unfall wurde Stewarts Wagen in den Schlepper geladen und das Team hatte gepackt und war zur Abfahrt bereit.
translated_de: After the second accident, Stewart' s wagon was loaded in the Schlepper and the team had been packing and was prepared to take off.

en: Stewart skipped three NASCAR Sprint Cup races after his car struck and killed a fellow driver in a dirt-track race in upstate New York.
de: Stewart ließ drei NASCAR Sprint Cup Rennen ausfallen, nachdem sein Wagen einen anderen Fahrer bei einem Aschenbahnrennen im Norden des Staates New York traf und tötete.
translated_de: Stewart canceled three NASCAR Sprint Cup races, a third driver being trafted and töteted at a lane race in New York, North America.

en: He decided to return this week, needing to win either at Atlanta or the next race at Richmond to claim a spot in the Chase.
de: Er beschloss, diese Woche zurückzukehren und entweder in Atlanta oder bei dem nächsten Rennen in Richmond zu gewinnen, um einen Platz in der Verfolgung zu gewinnen.
translated_de: This week, we will return to Atlanta or Richmond, either, to gain a place in the debate.

en: He returned to work as an investigation into the tragic incident that resulted in the death of 20-year-old Kevin Ward Jr., who had stepped on the track to confront Stewart during a race.
de: Er kehrte an seinen Arbeitsplatz zurück, während einer Untersuchung zu dem tragischen Vorfall, der zum Tod des 20-jährigen Kevin Ward Jr. führte, untersucht wird. Dieser war während eines Rennens auf die Fahrbahn getreten, um Stewart zu konfrontieren.
translated_de: It returned to his job in the course of a study on the tragic death of 20-year-old Kevin Ward Jr., which was a re-enactment of a re-enactment on the road to confront Stewart.

en: Authorities said Friday that the probe into the cause of the crash will last at least another two weeks.
de: Die Behörden teilten am Freitag mit, dass die Untersuchungen zur Ursache des Unfalls noch mindestens zwei Wochen andauern werden.
translated_de: The authorities have said on Friday that the investigations into the cause of the accident will be at least two weeks.

en: No decision has been made about whether Stewart will face charges.
de: Es wurde noch keine Entscheidung darüber getroffen, ob Stewart mit einer Anklage rechnen muss.
translated_de: There has been no decision on whether Stewart should be able to take a stand.

en: The three-time champion received a big cheer when he was introduced before the race.
de: Der dreimalige Champion wurde mit großem Beifall empfangen, als er vor dem Rennen vorgestellt wurde.
translated_de: The three-time champion was greeted with great support as he was presented before the Rennen.

en: Starting in the 12th spot, Stewart ran in the top 10 early in the race, getting as high as fourth.
de: Nach einem Start an 12. Position, war Stewart schon kurz danach in die ersten 10 vorgedrungen und lag zeitweilig auf Platz vier.
translated_de: After a 12th start, Stewart was already in the first 10 and was a good candidate for the fourth place.

en: Then, on lap 122 after a restart, Busch's No.
de: Nach einem Neustart in Runde 122, geriet Buschs
translated_de: After a new start in round 122, the spokesman for the spokesman

en: 18 machine got loose coming out of turn 2 and banged into Stewart, sending both cars against the wall.
de: Wagen mit der Nr. 18 außer Kontrolle nach dem Ausgang aus Kurve 2 und kollidierte mit Stewart, wobei beide Wagen gegen die Mauer fuhren.
translated_de: The n° 18 was supprimated by the gang from Kurve 2 and supprimated by Stewart, and both were supprimated by Mauer.

en: Stewart carried on but dropped back to 21st.
de: Stewart fuhr weiter, fiel aber auf Platz 21 zurück.
translated_de: Stewart continued to take the lead, but re-takes the place 21.

en: Dance-crazy youths wanted
de: Tanzfreudiger Nachwuchs gesucht
translated_de: The young talent of dancers is wanted

en: Just try it: Laura, Lena, Lisa, Marie, Bettina, Emma and manager Lisa Neitzel (from left to right) are looking forward to new members.
de: Einfach ausprobieren: Laura, Lena, Lisa, Marie, Bettina, Emma und Leiterin Lisa Neitzel (von links) freuen sich auf Mitstreiter.
translated_de: Simply announcing: Laura, Lena, Lisa, Marie, Bettina, Emma and Leiterin Lisa Neitzel (links) are delighted to be a part of the debate.

en: Like many other clubs, the jazz group also runs a day-long class in TV Jahn in order to make it to the prep school.
de: Wie vielen anderen Vereinen macht auch den Jazzgruppen im TV Jahn der Ganztagsunterricht an den weiterführenden Schulen zu schaffen.
translated_de: As many other clubs, the Jazz groups in TV Jahn make the whole-tags instruction an weiterführende school.

en: Some groups have seen sharp declines in attendees after the summer holidays.

en: Now, they are eagerly on the look out for youths for a sport which is healthy and a lot of fun.

translated_de: Now, a growing number of young people are looking for a sport that is healthy and has a great deal of fun.

en: The 20-year old tells us there are "three in the eight to twelves, six in the twelves to 15".

translated_de: "Drei in the group of Acht- to Zwölf years, six in the group of Zwölf to 15 years", raciated the 20-year-old.

en: If there were more active participants, the whole thing would be a lot more fun, "we could dance to completely different choreographs", she said.

translated_de: With more action, the whole would be more fun, "man could dance whole other musicography", says the group.

en: Anyone interested in dancing can come along and have a go, there is no obligation to join. The session run on Thursdays between 5 and 6, and on Fridays from 5 until 6:30 PM in the dance room at what was Hotel Meyer, 9 Freistraße.
de: Wer Lust auf Tanzen hat, kann donnerstags zwischen 17 und 18 Uhr oder freitags zwischen 17 und 18.30 Uhr im Tanzsportraum am ehemaligen Hotel Meyer, Freistraße 9, unverbindlich in die Trainingsstunde hineinschnuppern.
translated_de: If you want to dance, you can give the dances between 17 and 18 or free between 17 and 18 h 30 in the dancesport area at the former Meyer Hotel, Free Road 9, in the training session.

en: "Training usually starts with a warm up program", the trainer explained.
de: "Das Training beginnt regelmäßig mit einem Aufwärmprogramm", erzählt die Trainerin.
translated_de: The training begins regularly with a programme of re-training, according to the trainer.

en: We then practice different choreographs.
de: Danach werden verschiedene Choreografien eingeübt.
translated_de: The following are different Choreography.

en: JazzDance is such that there is no hard and fast way of doing it, which makes it open to many styles.
de: JazzDance hat das Merkmal, dass es keine festgelegte Form gibt und ist daher für viele Stile offen.
translated_de: JazzDance has the slur of the fact that it has no form set and therefore offends many styles.

en: Elements ranging from folklore and classical to sports and acrobatics are worked into Jazz Dance.
de: Elemente aus Folklore über Klassik bis zu Sport und Akrobatik werden im Jazz Dance verarbeitet.
translated_de: Folklore elements relating to classical music, sport and acoustics are processed in jazz dance.

en: And of course, the socializing isn't bad either.
de: Natürlich kommt auch die Geselligkeit nicht zu kurz.
translated_de: It is not just a matter of price.

en: "We sometimes go out to eat, watch dance films, and we have also slept over in the dance hall before now", Lisa Neitzel tells us.
de: "Wir gehen auch mal essen, gucken Tanzfilme und wir haben auch schon mal im Tanzraum übernachtet", berichtet Lisa Neitzel.
translated_de: "We are also going to be able to make gumbo dance films and we have already done something in the dance area," said Lisa Neitzel.

en: You can make friends in the group, share a wonderful hobby, and also do a great deal for your own motor development.
de: In der Gruppe könne man Freundschaften schließen, ein wunderschönes Hobby teilen und dabei noch eine ganze Menge für die eigene motorische Entwicklung tun.
translated_de: In the group, a wonderful hobby could be shared and there is still a whole lot of work to do with motor development.

en: If Jazz is not your thing, then you can also come along and try out one of the other groups offered by TV Jahn.
de: Wem Jazztanz nicht so liegt, der kann auch in eines der anderen Angebote des TV Jahn hineinschnuppern.
translated_de: We are not jazz dancing, but it can also be seen in one of the other TV Jahn offers.

en: Children and youngsters are always welcome to pop in and have a go during Wednesday's class. They can choose from children's dancing/jazz, video clip dancing and hip-hop.
de: Kinder und Jugendliche können immer mittwochs in den Unterricht in den Bereichen Kindertanz/Jazztanz, Bambini-Ballett, Videoclip-Dancing und Hip-Hop in den Unterricht hineinschnuppern.
translated_de: Children and young people can continue to participate in the lessons in children' s/jazztanz, Bambini-Ballett, videoclip dancing and hip-hop.

en: The dance teacher is Francisco Afonso.
de: Der Tanztrainer ist Francisco Afonso.
translated_de: The trainer of the dance is Francisco Afonso.

en: Adult couples are welcome to attend the dance evenings on Mondays and Wednesdays.
de: Erwachsenenpaare sind zu den Tanzabenden am Montag und Mittwoch willkommen.
translated_de: Adult couples are invited to the dance evenings on Montag and Wednesday.

en: If you are interested in discofox, slow waltzes, Viennese waltzes, rumba, cha-cha-cha or the tango, drop in and take part.
de: Wer Lust auf Discofox, Langsamen Walzer, Wiener Walzer, Rumba, Cha-Cha-Cha und Tango hat, darf vorbeischauen und mitmachen.
translated_de: If you are interested in Discofox, Langsamen Walzer, Wiener Walzer, Rumba, Cha-Cha-Cha and Tango, you should go and take it.

en: Bulgaria's Prison Officers Stage National Protest
de: Bulgarische Gefängnisaufseher protestieren landesweit
translated_de: Bulgaria' s s sfangnis are protesting in the country

en: Hundreds of prison workers from across Bulgaria have held a national protest in front the Justice Ministry in the capital Sofia.
de: Hunderte von Gefängnismitarbeitern aus ganz Bulgarien haben vor dem Justiziministerium in der Hauptstadt Sofia einen landesweiten Protest organisiert.
translated_de: Hundreds of workers from across Bulgaria have organised a nationwide protest against the Justiz Ministry in the capital of Sofia.

en: In a peaceful demonstration, they have reiterated their calls for the old working conditions, which were recently changed, to be restored.
de: In der friedlichen Demonstration wiederholten sie ihre Forderungen nach Wiederherstellung ihrer alten Arbeitsbedingungen, die kürzlich geändert wurden.
translated_de: In the peaceful demonstration, they renewed their demands for re-establishing their old working conditions which have been modified recently.

en: Higher salaries are also among a list of requests due to be discussed with interim Justice Minister Hristo Ivanov.
de: Auch höhere Gehälter stehen auf einer Forderungsliste, die mit dem Interim-Justizminister Hristo Ivanov diskutiert werden soll.
translated_de: There are also higher levels of support for a Fording List which will be discussed with the interim Justice Minister, Hristo Ivanov.

en: For a month, officers have protested symbolically against the new working hours, demanding to return to the old 24 hour shifts.
de: Die Beamten protestieren seit einem Monat symbolisch gegen die neuen Arbeitszeiten und fordern eine Rückkehr zu den früheren 24-Stunden-Schichten.
translated_de: The officials protest every month symbolically against the new working hours and demand a return to the previous 24-hour jobs.

en: Despite the meetings between the prison officers union and the Justice Ministry representatives, an agreement was not reached, Bulgarian National Radio (BNR) informs.
de: Trotz der Treffen zwischen der Gewerkschaft der Gefängnismitarbeiter und Vertretern des Justiziministeriums wurde keine Vereinbarung erzielt, meldete das nationale bulgarische Ratio (BNR).
translated_de: However, without the cooperation between the working group of the fakingnismists and the representatives of the Justiz Ministry, no agreement has been reached to bring the national Bulgarian Council (BNR).

en: Negotiations are ongoing, the head of the Chief Directorate on the Execution of Penalties Rosen Zhelyazkov told BNR.
de: Die Verhandlungen dauern an, teilte der Generaldirektor für die Durchführung von Strafmaßnahmen, Rosen Zhelyazkov dem BNR.
translated_de: The negotiations have been delayed, part of the Generaldirection for the execution of sanctions, Rosen Zhelyazkov, the BNR.

en: The protest of the prison workers union is expected to be joined by members of the Trade Union Federation of the Employees in the Ministry of Interior.
de: Der Protest der Gefängnismitarbeiter wird voraussichtlich von Mitgliedern der Gewerkschaft Vereinigung der Angestellten des Innenministeriums unterstützt.
translated_de: The protest of the fascist worker will be supported by members of the Working Group of the Internships.

en: Ukrainian army has abandoned Luhansk airport
de: Ukrainische Armee hat Flughafen von Luhansk aufgegeben
translated_de: Ukraine' s Armee has landed at Luhansk airport

en: Pro-Russian fighters are gaining ground again in East Ukraine.
de: In der Ostukraine sind die prorussischen Kämpfer weiter auf dem Vormarsch.
translated_de: In the East-UK, the pro-war fighters are still in the midst of the sand.

en: Following heavy fighting in which Russian tank divisions are also said to have participated, the Ukrainian army has today, Monday, abandoned Luhansk airport, the rebel stronghold.
de: Nach schweren Gefechten, an denen angeblich auch russische Panzerbataillone beteiligt waren, hat die ukrainische Armee heute, Montag, den Flughafen der Rebellenhochburg Luhansk aufgegeben.
translated_de: After a series of serious incidents, which were involved in the Russian Panzerbataillons, the Ukrainian Armees have now occupied the airport of Rebellenhochburg Luhansk.

en: The army announced at the same time that over the past 24 hours, seven soldiers have been killed.
de: Die Armee teilte zugleich mit, dass in den vergangenen 24 Stunden sieben Soldaten getötet worden seien.
translated_de: The Armed Forces share that in the last 24 hours seven Soldaten were seized.

en: The Ukrainian President, Petro Poroschenko, had previously taken appropriate action personally due to the heavy defeats suffered by his army in the fight against the separatists, and announced changes to the senior leadership of the army without going into detail.
de: Der ukrainische Präsident Petro Poroschenko hatte zuvor bereits personelle Konsequenzen aus den schweren Niederlagen seiner Armee im Kampf gegen die Separatisten gezogen und Veränderungen in der obersten Armeeführung angekündigt, ohne Details zu nennen.
translated_de: The Ukrainian President Petro Poroschenko had already had personal consequences from the grave defeats of his Armee in combat against the Separatists and a change in the upper Armed Forces, without giving any details.

en: Pro-Russian separatists shot down an aircraft
de: Prorussische Separatisten schossen Flugzeug ab
translated_de: Prosecutive Separatists schoss aircraft

en: In the fight against Ukrainian government troops, pro-Russian separatists say that they have once again shot down a warplane and two military helicopters.
de: Im Kampf gegen ukrainische Regierungstruppen haben prorussische Separatisten nach eigener Darstellung erneut ein Kampfflugzeug und zwei Militärhubschrauber abgeschossen.
translated_de: In the fight against the Ukrainian government, prorussians have again taken a combat aircraft and two military helicopters.

en: Rebel forces announced on Monday that around 100 soldiers are also believed to have been injured or killed in fighting in the Donezk region; according to Russian agencies.
de: Rund 100 Soldaten seien zudem bei Gefechten in der Region Donezk verletzt oder getötet worden, teilten die Aufständischen am Montag russischen Agenturen zufolge mit.
translated_de: Around 100 Soldaten were abused or seized in the Donezk region, causing the Russian agents to be forced to join the Russians on the Montag.

en: Coastguard ships sunk
de: Schiffe der Küstenwache versenkt
translated_de: Ships of coastal surveillance

en: The rebels also claimed that for the first time they have sunk two of the Ukrainian coastguard's boats in the Sea of Azov.
de: Die Aufständischen behaupteten zudem, erstmals im Asowschen Meer zwei Boote der ukrainischen Küstenwache versenkt zu haben.
translated_de: The French claim that, firstly, two boats were sent to the Ukrainian coast in the Asowes Sea.

en: The Ukrainian border police confirmed that two of its ships came under fire on Sunday near to the harbor town of Mariupol.
de: Der ukrainische Grenzschutz bestätigte, dass zwei seiner Schiffe am Sonntag in der Nähe der Hafenstadt Mariupol unter Beschuss geraten waren.
translated_de: The Ukrainian border protection confirms that two of its ships were gerashed in the vicinity of the port of Mariupol on Sunday.

en: During the attack seven border guards were injured, according to a spokesperson speaking to the station 112.ua in Kiev.
de: Dabei seien sieben Grenzschützer verletzt worden, sagte ein Sprecher in Kiew dem Sender 112.ua.
translated_de: Then seven border guards were injured, a spokeswoman said in Kiew the Sender 112.ua.

en: Two crew members are missing.
de: Zwei Besatzungsmitglieder galten als vermisst.
translated_de: Two members are a spokesman.

en: Local media blamed Russia for the incident.
de: Örtliche Medien machten Russland für den Vorfall verantwortlich.
translated_de: The media is a blatant example of Russia' s failure.

en: In addition to this, the separatists reported that they have taken control of several towns and villages in the Donezk region.
de: Die Separatisten berichteten überdies, mehrere Ortschaften im Gebiet Donezk unter ihre Kontrolle gebracht zu haben.
translated_de: Separatists reported that several localities in Donezk were under their control.

en: Diplomatic offensive in Minsk
de: Diplomatische Offensive in Minsk
translated_de: Diplomatic offensive in Minsk

en: The Ukrainian contract group are meeting today in the Belorussian capital city of Minsk.
de: In der weißrussischen Hauptstadt Minsk trifft sich heute die Ukraine-Kontaktgruppe.
translated_de: In the Belarusian capital, Minsk is now the Ukrainian-Kontakt Group.

en: Representatives from Ukraine, Russia and the OSCE, as well as an ambassador for the separatists from East Ukraine should take part.
de: Neben Vertretern der Ukraine, Russlands und der OSZE sollte daran auch ein Gesandter der Separatisten aus der Ostukraine teilnehmen.
translated_de: As a result, the Ukraine, Russia and the OSZE should also be able to join a group of separatists from the East-Karab region.

en: Prior to the meeting, all parties used their appearance as a means of publicly announcing their demands.
de: Im Vorfeld nutzten alle Akteure ihre Auftritte zur öffentlichen Bekanntgabe ihrer Forderung.
translated_de: In the field, all actors have their invitations to public communication.

en: NATO does not want to break agreements with Russia
de: NATO will Vereinbarungen mit Russland nicht brechen
translated_de: NATO will not break agreements with Russia

en: NATO will not break their agreements with Russian as a result of their planned deployment to East Europe in response to the Ukrainian crisis.
de: Die NATO wird durch die geplanten Stationierungen in Osteuropa infolge der Ukraine-Krise nicht ihre Vereinbarung mit Russland brechen.
translated_de: NATO will not break down its agreement with Russia by implementing the planned stationing in East Europe.

en: In Brussels on Monday, the Secretary General of NATO, Anders Fogh Rasmussen, said that NATO will adhere to the NATO-Russia Council formation agreement of 1997.
de: NATO-Generalsekretär Anders Fogh Rasmussen sagte am Montag in Brüssel, die NATO halte sich an die Gründungsvereinbarung des NATO-Russland-Rates von 1997.
translated_de: NATO General Secretary Anders Fogh Rasmussen said on Monday in Brussels that NATO stopped the establishment of the NATO-Russland Council in 1997.

en: Nevertheless, the head of NATO accused Russia of "a flagrant breach" of the agreement.
de: Der NATO-Chef beschuldigte allerdings Russland "eines krassen Bruches" der Vereinbarung.
translated_de: The NATO chef blames Russia for "crassing brussels" in the agreement.

en: "Today we must face up to the reality that Russia does not consider NATO as a partner", Rasmussen said.
de: "Heute müssen wir der Realität ins Auge sehen, dass Russland die NATO nicht als Partner betrachtet", so Rasmussen.
translated_de: "We must see in Auge the reality that Russia is not a partner in the NATO", so Rasmussen.

en: Documents and statements from the Russian side reveal "that they consider us as enemies".
de: Aus Dokumenten und Stellungnahmen von russischer Seite gehe hervor, "dass sie uns als Gegner betrachten".
translated_de: The Russian documents and opinions of the Russian side said that they are travesties.

en: Strengthened NATO presence

translated_de: Strength of NATO' s parliament

de: Rasmussen hat auch angekündigt, die NATO-Präsenz in Osteuropa verstärken zu wollen.
translated_de: Rasmussen has also promised to strengthen the NATO powers in Europe.

en: A NATO summit meeting in Wales to decide on a "Readiness Action Plan" will ensure that "we will have a more visible NATO presence in the East, if needs be", Rasmussen explained in Brussels on Monday.
de: Ein beim NATO-Gipfel in Wales zu beschließender "Readiness Action Plan" werde sicherstellen, dass "wir mehr sichtbare NATO-Präsenz im Osten haben werden, solange dies nötig ist", sagte Rasmussen am Montag in Brüssel.
translated_de: The NATO Summit in Wales will be able to conclude a "Ready Action Plan" that "we will have more visible NATO powers in the East so long as it is necessary", said Rasmussen on Monday in Brussels.

en: Kiev and Moscow have agreed to new talks on gas

en: According to official data, Russia and Ukraine have agreed to new talks to settle disputes over gas.

translated_de: Russia and Ukraine have issued official statements about new talks on the Beilegung of their Gas dispute.

en: The negotiations have been scheduled to take place next Saturday, the Russian Minister of Energy, Alexander Nowak, said on Monday.
de: Die Verhandlungen seien für kommenden Samstag angesetzt, sagte der russische Energieminister Alexander Nowak am Montag.
translated_de: The negotiations are scheduled for Saturday, said Russian Energy Minister Alexander Nowak on Monday.

en: The decision of the European Union as to whether they will also send a representative to the talks is yet to be made.

translated_de: It will be a decision of the European Union, and it will also be a representative to the discussions.

en: Due to the disputes over gas prices, Ukraine has not been receiving fuel from Russia for weeks.
de: Wegen des Streits über den Gaspreis bekommt die Ukraine seit Wochen keinen Brennstoff mehr aus Russland.
translated_de: We are not able to use the gas price in Ukraine for weeks.

en: The EU Energy Commissioner, Günther Oettinger has recently arbitrated between the two sides.
de: Zuletzt hatte EU-Energiekommissar Günther Oettinger zwischen beiden Seiten vermittelt.
translated_de: Last week, EU Energy Commissioner Günther Oettinger was able to communicate between two sides.

en: Ukraine warned that Russia could also suspend the gas supply to Europe.
de: Die Ukraine hatte gewarnt, Russland könnte auch die Gasversorgung für Europa unterbrechen.
translated_de: Ukraine had warned Russia that it could also break down the gas supply for Europe.

en: Europe purchases around one third of its natural gas from Russian sources, a large proportion of which flows through Ukraine.

translated_de: Europe draws about one third of its gas from Russian sources, which is a major part of Ukraine.

en: Genetic disorder often misdiagnosed
de: Genetische Störung oft falsch diagnostiziert
translated_de: Genetic problems often have a wrong diagnosis

en: A British woman says she spent many years thinking she was going to die after a misdiagnosis.
de: Eine Britin sagt, sie dachte als Folge einer Fehldiagnose über viele Jahre, dass sie sterben würde.
translated_de: One Brit said that they thought that they would be a result of a lack of diagnosis over many years.

en: Karin Rodgers spent most of her teenage life believing that she only had years to live after she was diagnosed with another disease.
de: Karin Rodgers lebte fast ihre gesamte Jugend in dem Glauben, dass sie nur noch wenige Jahre zu leben habe, nachdem sie mit einer anderen Krankheit diagnostiziert worden war.
translated_de: Karin Rodgers lived fast in the belief that she had only a few years to live, after being diagnosed with another disease.

en: She actually had Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease (CMT) - a group of inherited disorders that damage nerves outside the brain and spine.
de: Sie litt tatsächlich an der Charcot-Marie-Tooth-Krankheit (CMT) - einer Gruppe ererbter Störungen, die die Nerven außerhalb des Gehirns und des Rückenmarks schädigen.
translated_de: You lit the Charcot-Marie-Tooth-Krankness (CMT) - a group of erupted disorders which affect nerves outside the brain and the back.

en: Charity CMT UK said that misdiagnosis is a common problem among people with CMT because so little is known about the condition.
de: Charity CMT UK teilte mit, dass Fehldiagnosen ein häufiges Problem bei Menschen mit CMT sind, weil so wenig über diese Krankheit bekannt ist.
translated_de: Charity CMT UK is part of the fact that lack of diagnosis is a common problem for people with CMT because it is not known about this disease.

en: About 23,000 people in the UK are thought to have CMT, which can cause motor symptoms such as muscle weakness, an awkward gait and curled toes.
de: Etwa 23.000 Menschen in Großbritannien leiden vermutlich an CMT, die zu motorischen Störungen wie Muskelschwäche, einem unsicheren Gang und gekrümmten Zehen führen kann.
translated_de: Around 23.000 people in Britain are likely to suffer from CMT, which can lead to motor problems such as muscle weakness, a weak band and a broken Zehen.

en: Sufferers can also experience numbness or pain and the condition is incurable and progressive, meaning symptoms get worse over time.
de: Erkrankte leiden auch an Taubheitsgefühlen oder Schmerzen. Die Krankheit ist unheilbar und fortschreitend, was bedeutet, dass die Symptome mit der Zeit schlimmer werden.
translated_de: The disease is unheilable and threatening, and it is causing the symptoms to be worse at the time.

en: When Rodgers was 13 she was under the impression that she suffered from Friedreich's ataxia (FA) - a condition which had a very poor prognosis.
de: Als Rodgers 13 war, glaubte sie, dass sie an Friedreich-Ataxie (FA) leide - einer Krankheit mit sehr schlechten Überlebenschancen.
translated_de: As Rodgers 13 was, they hoped to be a Friedreich-Ataxie (FA) disease with very poor survival.

en: Rodgers thought that she was going to be wheelchair bound by the time she was 18 and dead before she reached her 30s.
de: Rodgers dachte, sie würde im Rollstuhl sitzen, bevor sie 18 würde, und vor ihrem 30. Geburtstag sterben.
translated_de: Rodgers thought they would sit in the Rollstuhl, before they would be 18 and before their 30th birthday.

en: The mother-of-two, who is now 51, said: "As a child I knew I couldn't do the same things as others.
de: Die Mutter von zwei Kindern, die heute 51 Jahre alt ist, sagte: "Als Kind wusste ich, dass ich nicht das Gleiche tun konnte wie die anderen.
translated_de: The mother of two children, who are now 51 years old, said: "Als Kind knew that I did not have the same thing as the other.

en: I was falling daily and everything took me longer to do.
de: Ich fiel ständig hin und alles dauerte bei mir länger.
translated_de: I am constantly in the process and everything has been long.

en: I could never roller-skate or skateboard with other kids and got bullied at school a lot because of the way I walked and ran.
de: Ich konnte nie mit den anderen Kindern Rollschuh oder Skateboard fahren und wurde in der Schule oft wegen meiner Art zu gehen und zu laufen gehänselt.
translated_de: I never had to go to the playground with the other children and I was often able to go to school because of my art and to run.

en: Rodgers said when she was aged 13, after several operations to release her Achilles tendons and straighten out her feet, she took a peak at her medical notes when her consultant left the room which said that she suffered from FA.
de: Rodgers sagte, dass sie im Alter von 13 Jahren nach mehreren Operationen zur Entlastung ihrer Achillessehnen und Streckung ihrer Füße ihre Krankenakte einsah, als ihr Arzt das Zimmer verlassen hatte und las, dass sie an FA litt.
translated_de: Rodgers said that they had been able to discharge their Achillessehnen and to re-establish their feet, as their doctor had left the room and that they had a FA.

en: "I felt guilty because I'd been nosy and so I didn't tell anybody, but I did come home, look up the condition at the library and wrote to the FA Association," she said.
de: "Ich fühlte mich schuldig, weil ich neugierig gewesen war, also habe ich das niemandem erzählt, aber ich ging nach Hause, suchte nach der Krankheit in der Bibliothek und schrieb an die FA-Gesellschaft," sagte sie.
translated_de: "I feel guilty because I was neugierig, I have never told anyone, but I went to the house, such as the disease in the library and wrote an FA-Geselly," said the spokesman.

en: When I got the information back I was gobsmacked and in the worst state of panic possible.
de: Als ich Antwort erhielt, war ich geschockt und geriet fürchterlich in Panik.
translated_de: As I replied, I was sceptical and utterly disappointed in Panik.

en: I thought I'd be in a wheelchair at 18 and dead by the time I was 25 and in between gradually lose all my ability.
de: Ich dachte, dass ich mit 18 im Rollstuhl sein würde und mit 25 sterben, und dazwischen langsam alle meine Fähigkeiten verlieren würde.
translated_de: I thought that I would be able to do 18 jobs and 25 jobs, and that, as soon as I can, all my skills would be lost.

en: I was going through this on my own and I planned my own funeral.
de: Ich machte das alles alleine mit mir aus und plante meine eigene Beerdigung.
translated_de: I made everything myself and plant my own beer.

en: She said by the time she reached 17 she realised that her walking abilities hadn't deteriorated as much as she thought they would have and asked her surgeon about it.
de: Sie sagte, als sie 17 wurde, wurde ihr klar, dass ihre Fähigkeiten nicht so stark abgenommen hatte, wie sie es sich vorgestellt hatte und befragte ihren Arzt.
translated_de: You said, as they were 17 years old, that their abilities were not so strong as they had presented and asked their doctor.

en: He just stood up and hugged me and said 'my dear I don't think you have it, as you would be in a wheelchair now.'
de: Er stand einfach auf, und umarmte mich und sagte, "meine Liebe, ich glaube nicht, dass du das hast, sonst wärst du jetzt schon im Rollstuhl."
translated_de: I stand simply and I am adamant and said: "meine Liebe, I do not believe that the hast, or is it still the greatest of the time now in the Rollstuhl."

en: I think you have something a lot less life threatening.
de: Ich glaube, du hast etwas weitaus weniger lebensbedrohliches.
translated_de: I believe that it has been far less living.

en: After some genetic testing she was found to have CMT.
de: Nach einigen genetischen Tests wurde bei ihr CMT festgestellt.
translated_de: A few gene tests have been carried out in their CMT.

en: "When he explained what CMT was, I thought I'd drawn the lucky straw," she said.
de: "Als er mir erklärte, was CMT war, fühlte ich mich, als wäre ich eine Gewinnerin," sagte sie.
translated_de: "I said that when CMT was a war, I felt that I would be a winner," said the spokesman.

en: Charity CMT UK has launched CMT awareness month to try to draw attention to the condition.
de: Charity CMT UK hat einen CMT-Awareness-Monat gestartet, um auf diese Krankheit aufmerksam zu machen.
translated_de: Charity CMT UK has launched a CMT awareness campaign to make this disease more alert.

en: Retired Sergeant Major Berni Biether has been working as an artificer ever since the closure of the former military training ground
de: Stabsfeldwebel a. D. Berni Diether arbeitet seit der Schließung des ehemaligen Truppenübungsplatzes als Feuerwerker

en: The last live round to be fired at the military training ground in Münsingen was in December 2004, which, at the end of 2005, after 110 years of military operation, was closed down.
