en: Washington-area business owners" tax burden mounts as economy rebounds
de: Steuerbelastung von Geschäftsleuten im Raum Washington steigt mit der wirtschaftlichen Erholung
translated_de: Taxation of business in Washington increases with economic recovery

en: A rebounding economy means more customers, higher sales and new jobs.
de: Eine Erholung der Wirtschaft bedeutet mehr Kunden, mehr Verkäufe und neue Jobs.
translated_de: The economy is regenerating, with more customers, more sales and new jobs.

en: It also means higher taxes.
de: Sie bedeutet auch höhere Steuern.
translated_de: This also means higher taxes.

en: State and local tax bills for companies across the country grew modestly last year as the economic recovery accelerated, according to new research released last week, and Washington-area firms were no exception.
de: Staatliche und örtliche Steuerbescheide für Unternehmen im Land stiegen im vergangenen Jahr leicht an, während sich die wirtschaftliche Erholung beschleunigte, so eine neu veröffentlichte Studie in der vergangenen Woche, und die Firmen im Raum Washington bildeten keine Ausnahme.
translated_de: State and local tax decisions for companies in the land have risen in the last year, while the economic recovery has been accelerated, so a new study has been published in the last week and the companies in Washington are not a exception.

en: District, Maryland and Virginia businesses collectively paid $27.6 billion to state and local coffers in fiscal 2013, an increase of 3.8 percent over the $26.6 billion collected in 2012.
de: Unternehmen im Raum District, Maryland und Virginia zahlten gemeinsam 27,6 Milliarden $ an staatliche und örtliche Stellen im Finanzjahr 2013, ein Anstieg um 3,8 Prozent gegenüber den Einnahmen von 2012 in Höhe von 26,6 Milliarden $.
translated_de: Companies in the space district, Maryland and Virginia paid jointly 27,6 billion dollars for public and local jobs in financial year 2013, a rise of 3,8 percent, comparative to the revenue from 2012, which was 26,6 billion dollars.

en: Businesses" state and local tax burdens last year expanded by 4.3 percent, to $671 billion, compared with 3.9 percent the year before, and it was the third consecutive year of growth after back-to-back years of shrinking bills in 2009 and 2010.
de: Die staatliche und örtliche Steuerlast der Unternehmen stieg im vergangenen Jahr um 4,3 Prozent auf 671 Milliarden $ an, im Vergleich zu 3,9 Prozent im Jahr zuvor, und es war das dritte Wachstumsjahr in Folge nach den mehreren Jahren sinkender Bescheide 2009 und 2010.
translated_de: The state and local tax burden of the company has increased in the last year at 4%, on 671 billion dollars, comparativement to 3% in the previous year, and the third growth year has been re-established after the sinking of the financial decisions in 2009 and 2010.

en: State taxes rose at a faster clip, 4.3 percent, than local levies, 3.9 percent, according to the study, which was conducted by professional services firm Ernst & Young and the Center on State Taxation, a tax policy group.
de: Staatliche Steuern stiegen stärker an als die örtlichen Abgaben, um 4,3 Prozent, so die Studie, die von der Dienstleistungsagentur Ernst & Young mit dem Zentrum für Staatliche Besteuerung, einer Steuerpolitikgruppe durchgeführt wurde.
translated_de: State tax increases more than the local tax, 4%, so the study of Ernst & Young' s services agency on the centre of state taxation was carried out by a tax policy group.

en: More than half of the District's tax revenue, 56 percent, comes from business taxes, while 36 percent of Maryland's revenue comes from firms.
de: Mehr als die Hälfte der Steuereinnahmen des District, 56 Prozent, stammt aus Unternehmenssteuern, während 36 Prozent der Einnahmen Marylands aus Unternehmen stammen.
translated_de: More than half of the District' s tax revenues are from corporate tax, while 36 percent of Maryland' s revenue is from companies.

en: Virginia, at 28 percent, generates the least amount of tax revenue, proportionately, from business.
de: Virginia erzielt mit 28 Prozent die geringsten Steuereinnahmen aus Unternehmen.
translated_de: Virginia achieved the lowest tax revenues from companies with 28 percent.

en: Much of the growth in tax revenue is being driven by a rebound in companies" real estate values, researchers say, which pushed property taxes up 3.7 percent this year after three consecutive years of sub-1 percent growth.
de: Ein Großteil des Anstiegs bei den Steuereinnahmen ist in einer Erholung der Immobilienwerte der Unternehmen begründet, sagen die Forscher, was zu einer Erhöhung der Immobiliensteuern um 3,7 Prozent in diesem Jahr nach den drei aufeinanderfolgenden Jahren mit Wachstumsraten von weniger als 1 Prozent führte.
translated_de: The majority of the increase in taxation is a result of a revival of the value of the company' s property, according to Forscher, which led to a rise in taxation on property in this year to 3% in the three successive years, with growth rates of less than 1 percent.

en: While a large share of those gains came from big states such as California, New York and Texas, it appears to be the same story in the Washington area as well.
de: Während ein großer Teil dieser Gewinne aus großen Staaten wie Kalifornien, New York und Texas stammte, scheint der Ablauf auch für den Raum Washington zuzutreffen.
translated_de: While a large part of these profits originate from large states such as Kalifornien, New York and Texas, it seems that the process will also be a matter of Washington.

en: Companies in the District, Maryland and Virginia collectively forked over $10 billion in state and local property taxes last year, up from $9.6 billion in 2012 - year-over-year growth of 4.2 percent.
de: Unternehmen im District, Maryland und Virginia zahlten gemeinsam über 10 Milliarden $ an staatlichen und örtlichen Immobiliensteuern im vergangenen Jahr, im Vergleich zu 9,6 Milliarden $ 2012 - ein Anstieg im Verlauf eines Jahres um 4,2 Prozent.
translated_de: Companies in District, Maryland and Virginia paid jointly over 10 billion $ an independent and local property tax last year, compared to 9,6 billion $ 2012 - a rise of 4% in the year.

en: But the apparent bounceback in property values isn't doing nearly as much to inflate state and local tax revenues in Maryland, where property taxes amount to barely more than a fifth of companies" tax bills.
de: Aber die scheinbare Erholung bei den Immobilienwerten ist in Maryland nicht so wirksam bei der Erhöhung von staatlichen und örtlichen Steuereinnahmen, da sich hier die Immobiliensteuern auf knapp mehr als ein Fünftel der Steuerbescheide von Unternehmen belaufen.
translated_de: But the apparent increase in property values in Maryland is not so effective in the absence of government and local taxation, as the taxation on property is running at less than a fifth of the company' s tax revenue.

en: Virginia and D.C. firms pay nearly half of their state and local tax bills in the form of property taxes.
de: Unternehmen in Virginia und D.C. zahlen fast die Hälfte ihrer staatlichen und örtlichen Steuern in Form von Immobiliensteuern.
translated_de: Companies in Virginia and D.C. pay fast the majority of their own public and local tax on property tax.

en: "What's happening in Maryland is that so much of their property, especially the tax base surrounding the D.C. area, is owned either by the government or by nonprofits, which don't pay property taxes," said Douglas Lindholm, executive director of the Center on State Taxation.
de: "In Maryland geschieht Folgendes: ein großer Teil der Immobilien, insbesondere im Steuergebiet um D.C., ist entweder im Besitz der Regierung oder von Non-Profit-Organisationen, die keine Immobiliensteuern bezahlen," sagte Douglas Lindholm, Geschäftsführer des Center on State Taxation.
translated_de: "In Maryland, there are consequences: a large part of the property, particularly in the tax field in D.C., is either in the administration or in non-profit organisations which do not pay tax on property," said Douglas Lindholm, director of the Center on State Taxation.

en: So Maryland is forced to rely much more heavily on, for example, its income taxes to pay for the same services you have in other states.
de: Maryland ist daher gezwungen, sich beispielsweise viel mehr auf die Einkommenssteuern zu verlassen, um die gleichen Dienstleistungen bieten zu können, die andere Staaten offerieren.
translated_de: Maryland is therefore a country which is a country which is a country which has many more income tax revenues, so that the same services can be offered by other countries.

en: The recent rebound in business tax revenue cannot all be attributed to the recovering real estate market.
de: Die jüngste Erholung bei den Steuereinnahmen durch Unternehmen kann nicht allein der Erholung des Immobilienmarktes zugerechnet werden
translated_de: The recent rise in the taxation of companies cannot be attributed to the rise in the market of property.

en: Business incomes also appear to be on the mend, according to the data.
de: Unternehmenseinnahmen scheinen sich ebenfalls zu erholen, so die Daten.
translated_de: Companies are also gaining their own data.

en: Companies in the region reported state corporate income taxes of $2.3 billion, up from $2.1 billion in 2012.
de: Unternehmen in der Region berichteten über Einkommenssteuern bei Staatsorganisationen von 2,3 Milliarden $ im Vergleich zu 2,1 Milliarden im Jahr 2012.
translated_de: Companies in the region reported on income tax in the public organisations of $ 2,3 billion in 2012, comparative to $ 2,1 billion.

en: Maryland collected $1 billion in corporate income tax revenue, the most in the region.
de: Maryland nahm 1 Milliarde $ in Unternehmenseinkommenssteuern ein, den höchsten Betrag der Region.
translated_de: Maryland amounted to 1 million dollars in corporate income tax, the highest amount in the region.

en: While trending in the same direction, the local tax burden on businesses isn't growing at the same pace in all three places.
de: Während der Trend in die gleiche Richtung geht, steigt die örtliche Steuerbelastung für Unternehmen nicht an allen drei Orten gleichmäßig an.
translated_de: In the same way, the local tax burden for businesses is not equal to all three locals.

en: The District's rate of growth was level with the national average, at 4.3 percent, while Maryland's growth was substantially faster at 4.9 percent.
de: Die Anstiegsrate im District entsprach mit 4,3 Prozent dem nationalen Durchschnitt, während der Anstieg in Maryland deutlich höher war, 4,9 Prozent.
translated_de: The increase in district rates was 4% higher than national average, while the increase in Maryland was significantly higher, 4% higher.

en: Only Virginia posted a below-average tax bill bump of 4.1 percent.
de: Nur Virginia meldete ein unterdurchschnittliches Steueraufkommen von 4,1 Prozent.
translated_de: Only Virginia has reported a modest tax rate of 4,1 %.

en: Virginia has the lowest corporate income tax by far of the three jurisdictions (all of which have flat corporate rates) at 6 percent.
de: Virginia hat mit 6 Prozent in allen drei Amtsbereichen die deutlich geringsten Unternehmenseinkommenssteuern (in allen drei gibt es feste Unternehmenssteuersätze).
translated_de: Virginia has a significant increase in corporate income tax in all three areas (in all three there are very specific corporate income tax rates).

en: Maryland's corporate rate is 8.25 percent, while the District's stands at a relatively high 9.975 percent.
de: Der Unternehmenssteuersatz in Maryland liegt bei 8,25 Prozent und im District bei verhältnismäßig hohen 9,975 Prozent.
translated_de: The corporate tax in Maryland is at 8,25% and in District at a relative high of 9,975%.

en: A similar study by the U.S. Chamber of Commerce earlier this year showed that Virginia had lower state and local business taxes and an overall better business tax climate than Maryland.
de: Eine vergleichbare Studie der US-Handelskammer zu Beginn dieses Jahres zeigte, dass in Virginia geringere staatliche und örtliche Unternehmenssteuern verlangt werden und insgesamt ein besseres Steuerklima herrscht als in Maryland.
translated_de: A comparable study by the US Foreign Affairs Chamber on the start of this year showed that in Virginia, small government and local corporate taxation is required and that, in general, there is a better tax climate than in Maryland.

en: The District wasn't evaluated in the study.
de: In der Studie wurde der District nicht untersucht.
translated_de: The district has not been examined in the study.

en: Despite its advantage, Virginia is facing competitive pressure from its neighbor to the south.
de: Trotz der Vorteile steht Virginia unter Druck durch seinen südlichen Nachbarn.
translated_de: Yet, Virginia is under pressure by its süd-wing wing.

en: North Carolina recently signed legislation lowering its corporate rate this year from 6.9 percent to 6 percent, in line with Virginia, and the rate will drop to 5 percent next year.
de: North Carolina hat Gesetze zur Senkung seiner Unternehmenssteuersätze in diesem Jahr von 6,9 Prozent auf 6 Prozent verabschiedet, dem gleichen Satz wie Virginia, und der Satz wird im kommenden Jahr auf 5 Prozent sinken.
translated_de: North Carolina has adopted a set of 6% to 6% to reduce its corporate tax rates in this year, the same set as Virginia, and the set will sink in the next year at 5%.

en: If the state continues to meet revenue goals in the coming year, the law could push the state's business income tax rate as low as 3 percent by 2017.
de: Wenn der Staat weiterhin seine Einkommensziele im kommenden Jahr erreicht, könnte dieses Gesetz den Unternehmenseinkommenssteuersatz des Staates bis 2017 bis auf 3 Prozent reduzieren.
translated_de: If the state continues to achieve its income targets in the next year, this legislation could reduce the state' s corporate income tax by up to 3 percent until 2017 .

en: Meanwhile, small businesses in the Washington region seem to be faring better and thus paying more state and local taxes, according to the recent study.
de: In der Zwischenzeit scheint es den Kleinbetrieben im Raum Washington besser zu gehen, und sie zahlen daher mehr staatliche und örtliche Steuern, so die jüngste Studie.
translated_de: In the meantime, the small businesses in Washington are better off and they pay more government and local taxes, as the recent study.

en: Business taxes paid as personal income taxes by small business owners - the pass-through structure by which most small firms are organized - in the District, Maryland and Virginia surged 20 percent last year to $2.4 billion, a much faster rate of growth than overall business taxes.
de: Unternehmenssteuern, die als persönliche Einkommenssteuern durch kleine Geschäftsleute gezahlt werden - eine Übergangsstruktur, nach der die meisten Kleinunternehmen organisiert sind - im District, Maryland und Virginia stiegen im vergangenen Jahr um 20 Prozent auf 2,4 Milliarden $ an, eine deutliche schnellere Wachstumsrate als die Unternehmenssteuern insgesamt.
translated_de: Companies taxed as personal income tax by small businesses - a merger structure which is the most organised small businesses - in District, Maryland and Virginia increased in the last year by 20 percent, a net increase of $ 2,4 billion, a net increase in growth than the companies taxed in general.

en: Researchers say that trend and the increase in business taxes nationwide are likely to continue this year, with overall sales tax revenue for state and local governments up 6.2 percent in the first three quarters of 2014 compared with the same period last year.
de: Die Forscher sagen, dass der Trend und der Anstieg bei den Unternehmenssteuern im ganzen Land vermutlich in diesem Jahr anhalten werden, mit einer Erhöhung der allgemeinen Mehrwehrsteuereinnahmen für den Staat und die örtlichen Regierungen um 6,2 Prozent in den ersten drei Quartalen 2014 im Vergleich zum selben Zeitraum des Vorjahres.
translated_de: The Forscher said that the trend and the increase in corporate tax in the whole of the country could be halted this year, with a reduction in the general increase in foreign taxation for the State and the local governments at a rate of 6% in the first three Quartal 2014, comparative to the same period of the year.

en: However, the Washington area may lag behind as the slowdown in federal spending takes its toll on the region's labor market.
de: Dennoch könnte der Raum Washington hinterherhinken, wenn die Ausgabenkürzung der Bundesregierung sich auf den Arbeitsmarkt in der Region auswirkt.
translated_de: Yet, Washington could be left behind if the Federal Government' s decision to re-election is a result of the employment market in the region.

en: Twin town: German beer for Guangzhou
de: Partnerstadt: Deutsches Bier für Guangzhou
translated_de: Partnerstadt: Deutsche Bier für Guangzhou

en: Hops and malt - a popular combination even in China.
de: Hopfen und Malz - auch in China eine beliebte Kombination.
translated_de: Hopfen and Malz - also in China - are a popular combination.

en: German beer is enjoying an excellent reputation in China.
de: Deutsches Bier genießt in China einen hervorragenden Ruf.
translated_de: The German beer has a great reputation in China.

en: Frankfurt's twin town in China would like a brewery, and also hopes for a direct flight connection between the two cities.
de: Frankfurts Partnerstadt in China wünscht sich nun eine Brauerei und hofft außerdem auf eine Flug-Direktverbindung zwischen den den beiden Städten.
translated_de: The Frankfurt Partner city in China is now a hub and hopes to establish a flight-district connection between the two cities.

en: German beer brewed in Frankfurt's twin town of Guangzhou - that is the burning desire of the Chinese officials.
de: Deutsches Bier, gebraut in Frankfurts Partnerstadt Guangzhou - so lautet der dringende Wunsch der Offiziellen in China.
translated_de: Deutsche Bier, gebraut in Frankfurt' s Partnerstadt Guangzhou - so lautet the urgent desire of the official in China.

en: "We would be delighted if a German brewery would set up business in our city", the deputy party secretary of the southern Chinese city, Li Yiwei, said this week during a visit to the city by an SPD delegate.
de: "Wir würden uns sehr freuen, wenn eine deutsche Brauerei sich in unserer Stadt niederlassen würde", sagte der Vize-Parteisekretär der südchinesischen Metropole, Li Yiwei, in dieser Woche beim Besuch einer SPD-Delegation in seiner Stadt.
translated_de: "We would very much like to see a German Brauerei in our city," said the Vize-Parteisekretary of the Swedish Metropole, Li Yiwei, in this week' s visit to the SPD delegation in his city.

en: Time and time again throughout the conversation, the official of the ruling communist party in China came back to this wish of the twelve million people metropolis.
de: Immer wieder kam der Funktionär der regierenden Kommunistischen Partei Chinas im Laufe des Gesprächs auf dieses Anliegen der Zwölf-Millionen-Metropole zurück.
translated_de: The role of the Communist Party China in the dialogue has always been re-established on this issue of the Zwölf-Millionen-Metropole.

en: Guangzhou, which is also known as Canton in Germany, is one of the richest cities in China Li advertised.
de: Guangzhou, das in Deutschland auch Kanton genannt wird, sei eine der reichsten Städte Chinas, warb Li.
translated_de: Guangzhou, which is also mentioned in Germany, is one of the richest cities in China.

en: So, the people also have the buying power to afford German beer.
de: Daher besäßen die Menschen auch die Kaufkraft, sich deutsches Bier leisten zu können.
translated_de: This is why the people are also able to buy German beer.

en: The Hessian SPD chairman Thorsten Schäfer-Gümbel, who led the German delegation, said to the host that he would keeps his ears open in Germany for a possible partner.
de: Der hessische SPD-Vorsitzende Thorsten Schäfer-Gümbel, der die deutsche Politikerdelegation anführte, sagte dem Gastgeber zu, er werde sich in Deutschland nach einem möglichen Partner für das Projekt umhören.
translated_de: The President-in-Office of the European Socialist Party, Thorsten Schäfer-Gümbel, who is the German delegation, said that he will be in Germany after a possible partner for the project.

en: "You don't need a lot to make beer: good water, grain and a zest for life", he added over lunch with the senior party member in Guangzhou.
de: "Für Bier braucht es nicht viel: gutes Wasser, Getreide und Lebensfreude", fügte er bei dem Mittagessen mit dem Parteioberen in Guangzhou hinzu.
translated_de: "Breaks are not too much: good water, good ice and good life", he added in the joint meeting with the party leaders in Guangzhou.

en: This zest for like already beams out of Mr Li, he said flattering the host.
de: Diese Lebensfreude strahle bereits Herr Li aus, schmeichelte er dem Gastgeber.
translated_de: Mr Li has already sat down with this spirit of life, and he has sat down with the host.

en: After that, the official from Guangzhou clicked glasses with Schäfer-Gümbel - albeit with red wine, which was served with dinner.
de: Daraufhin stieß der Funktionär aus Guangzhou mit Schäfer-Gümbel an - allerdings mit Rotwein, der zu dem Essen serviert wurde.
translated_de: The main reason for this is the work of Guangzhou with a sulphur - but with a rotwein which was served to the Essence.

en: The Chinese brand Tsingtao has traces leading back to the German art of brewing.
de: Die chinesische Marke Tsingtao geht auf deutsche Braukunst zurück.
translated_de: The Chinese Mark Tsingtao is back in the German Braukunst.

en: Tsingtao beer is brewed according to the German purity law.
de: Tsingtao-Bier wird nach dem deutschen Reinheitsgebot gebraut.
translated_de: Tsingtao-Bier will be slashed by the German Reinheitsgebot.

en: More business operations
de: Mehr Geschäftsverkehr
translated_de: More business transport

en: A second wish of the Chinese host would be a direct flight connection between Frankfurt and Guangzhou, the deputy party leader, Li, said.
de: Ein zweiter Wunsch der chinesischen Gastgeber wäre eine Flug-Direktverbindung zwischen Frankfurt und Guangzhou, sagte Vize-Parteichef Li.
translated_de: One second wish of the Chinese host would be to have a flight flight between Frankfurt and Guangzhou, said Vize-Parteichef Li.

en: Lufthansa used to offer such a flight, but canceled it for economic reasons in 2012.
de: Die Lufthansa hatte den Flug früher angeboten, aber im Jahr 2012 aus wirtschaftlichen Gründen gestrichen.
translated_de: The airhansa had previously offered the flight but it was withdrawn in 2012 from economic reasons.

en: "It would be worth it again", the local politician seemed convinced.
de: "Es würde sich wieder lohnen", zeigte sich der Kommunalpolitiker überzeugt.
translated_de: "I would like to see it again," said the Communist policyman.

en: "The business operations between our two cities are continuing to grow".
de: "Der Geschäftsverkehr zwischen unseren beiden Städten nimmt immer weiter zu".
translated_de: "The business transport between our two cities continues to increase".

en: At present, travelers would have to take a detour via Changsha in the province of Hunan, Li complained.
de: Derzeit müssten Reisende den Umweg über Changsha in der Provinz Hunan nehmen, klagte Li.
translated_de: The time is right for the journey to Changsha in the Province of Hunan to take a long line of Li.

en: The administration of the province of Guangdong, whose capital city is Guangzhou, is also hoping for a flight connection.
de: Auch die Verwaltung der Provinz Guangdong, deren Hauptstadt Guangzhou ist, hofft auf die Flugverbindung.
translated_de: The Province of Guangdong, the capital of Guangzhou, is also hoping to get to the airport.

en: The deputy governor of the province, Chen Yunxian, emphasized this wish during his talks with the social democrat.
de: Der Vize-Gouverneur der Provinz, Chen Yunxian, stellte diesen Wunsch bei seinem Gespräch mit den Sozialdemokraten in den Vordergrund.
translated_de: The VizeGouverneur of the Provinz, Chen Yunxian, emphasized this desire in his dialogue with the Socialists.

en: "That is a very good idea", Schäfer-Gümbel answered - the Chinese deputy minister, Li Jinjun, an intimate expert on Germany, nodded in agreement.
de: "Das ist eine sehr gute Idee", antwortete Schäfer-Gümbel - der chinesische Vizeminister Li Jinjun, ein intimer Kenner Deutschlands, nickte zustimmend.
translated_de: "This is a very good idea," said Schäfer-Gümbel, the Chinese Vice-President Li Jinjun, a former Kenner Germany, to be voted.

en: Well-cultivated partnership
de: Gepflegte Partnerschaft
translated_de: Partnership

en: The affable deputy party leader of Guangzhou hopes to visit Frankfurt next year for a partnership meeting.
de: Der leutselige Vize-Parteichef von Guangzhou hofft, dass er Frankfurt im nächsten Jahr zu einem Partnerschaftstreffen besuchen kann.
translated_de: The spokesman for the Guangzhou Vize Party hopes that the next year, in Frankfurt, the next year, a partnership meeting will be held.

en: Li Yiwei has already been to the Main, but not in the capacity of his role.
de: Li Yiwei war zwar bereits am Main, aber noch nicht in dieser Funktion.
translated_de: Li Yiwei was already in the main, but not in this function.

en: He only took up office this year after his predecessor was removed from office over corruption allegations.
de: Er kam erst in diesem Jahr ins Amt, nachdem sein Vorgänger wegen Korruptionsvorwürfen aus dem Amt befördert worden war.
translated_de: It was first introduced in this year, after the President' s actions were promoted to the Amt because of corruption.

en: Even the party leader of the region, Wan Qinglian, had to leave.
de: Auch der örtliche Parteichef Wan Qinglian musste gehen.
translated_de: The örtliche partychef Wan Qinglian was also involved.

en: The action taken against the officials from Guangzhou is part of the nationwide campaign against corruption in parties and the administration, which was rigorously implemented by the head of state, Xi Jinping.
de: Das Vorgehen gegen die Funktionäre aus Guangzhou ist Teil einer landesweiten Kampagne gegen die Korruption in Partei und Verwaltung, die von Staatschef Xi Jinping mit Härte durchgesetzt wird.
translated_de: The action against the functioning of Guangzhou is part of a nationwide campaign against corruption in party and administration, which is being carried out by the President of the State, Xi Jinping.

en: Before his career in politics, the new senior politician, Li Yiwei, worked for an American company, which is highly unusual in the Chinese communist party.
de: Der neue Spitzenpolitiker Li Yiwei hatte vor seiner Parteikarriere für ein amerikanisches Unternehmen gearbeitet, was höchst ungewöhnlich in der Kommunistischen Partei Chinas ist.
translated_de: The new leader of the political party, Li Yiwei, has worked for a US company before his party, which is a very unusual phenomenon in the Communist Party China.

en: Before taking office in Guangzhou, he was working as a senior official in Fujian, where car manufacturer VW has built a large factory.
de: Vor seinem Amtsantritt in Guangzhou war er als Spitzenfunktionär in Fujian tätig, wo der Autobauer VW ein großes Werk errichtet.
translated_de: Before his arrival in Guangzhou, Fujian was a top functionary in Fujian, where the auto-builder VW was a great work.

en: Frankfurt has officially adopted more than a dozen twin cities.
de: Frankfurt ist offiziell mehr als ein Dutzend Städtepartnerschaften eingegangen.
translated_de: Frankfurt is officially more than a dutzend city partnership.

en: Guangzhou, one of the twin cities located some 9000 kilometers away, is a connection that will be well looked after and cherished by both sides; for example, with a school exchange.
de: Die Verbindung zu dem 9000 Kilometer entfernten Guangzhou gehört zu jenen, die von beiden Seiten gepflegt werden, etwa mit einem Schüleraustausch.
translated_de: The connection to the 9000 km of Guangzhou is similar to those which are maintained by both sides, such as a student exchange.

en: Last year marked the 25 year of German-Chinese relations.
de: Im vergangenen Jahr wurde das 25-jährige Bestehen der deutsch-chinesischen Verbindung gefeiert.
translated_de: Last year, the 25-year anniversary of the deutsch-chinese connection was celebrated.

en: The South China metropolis, which lies on the Pearl River, is almost as strong as the whole of Hessen thanks to its economic power.
de: Die südchinesische Metropole am Perlfluss ist dabei mit ihrer Wirtschaftskraft fast so stark wie ganz Hessen.
translated_de: The Swedish capital of the Perlfluss is now so starkly influenced by its economic power as much as it is in the whole of the world.

en: Next year they would like to reach a gross domestic product of 250 billion euros, Li reported.
de: Im nächsten Jahr wolle sie ein Bruttoinlandsprodukt von 250 Milliarden Euro erreichen, berichtete Li.
translated_de: In the next year, they will reach a bruteinland product of EUR 250 billion, a report by Li.

en: Joan Rivers' Family Keeping 'Our Fingers Crossed'
de: Familie von Joan Rivers "drückt die Daumen"
translated_de: Familie of Joan Rivers "does the dilemme"

en: Joan Rivers has been unconscious since her arrival three days ago at a New York City hospital, but her daughter expressed hope today that the 81-year-old comedian will recover from her illness.
de: Joan Rivers ist seit ihrer Einlieferung in ein Krankenhaus in New York City vor drei Tagen bewusstlos; ihre Tochter zeigte sich jedoch heute hoffnungsvoll, dass sich die 81-jährige Komikerin von ihrer Krankheit erholt.
translated_de: Joan Rivers has been aware of the fact that she has been delivering her to a hospital in New York City for three days. However, her daughter has revealed today that she has been able to recover the 81-year-old comiker from his illness.

en: "Thank you for your continued love and support," Melissa Rivers said in a statement today.
de: "Danke für eure andauernde Liebe und Unterstützung," sagte Melissa Rivers heute in einer Mitteilung.
translated_de: "Thank you for your andauernde love and support," said Melissa Rivers today in a communication.

en: We are keeping our fingers crossed.
de: Wir drücken alle die Daumen.
translated_de: We all press the ground.

en: Her mother arrived at Mount Sinai Hospital Thursday after an emergency call that she was in cardiac arrest at an Upper East Side clinic, Yorkville Endoscopy, sources said.
de: Ihre Mutter wurde Quellen zufolge am Donnerstag nach einem Notfall wegen Herzstillstands in einer Klinik an der Upper East Side, Yorkville Endoscopy, in das Mount Sinai Krankenhaus eingeliefert.
translated_de: Your mother was a source of sympathy for a heart failure in a hospital in the Upper East Side, Yorkville, in the Mount Sinai hospital.

en: Doctors are intentionally keeping her sedated and under close supervision until they're more comfortable with her condition, which remains "serious."
de: Die Ärzte halten sie absichtlich sediert und unter genauer Beobachtung, bis sie mit ihrem Zustand zufriedener sind, der weiterhin als "ernst" beschrieben wird.
translated_de: The doctors are clearly sedated and surveyed, until they are satisfied with their condition, which is still described as "the most" of the case.

en: Reaction has been widespread, including overwhelming online support from the likes of Donald Trump, Montel Williams and Kelly Ripa.
de: Die Reaktionen kamen von vielen Seiten, auch in Form eines überwältigenden Online-Supports von Donald Trump, Montel Williams und Kelly Ripa.
translated_de: The responses were made by many sites, including in form of a re-evaluation of Donald Trump, Montel Williams and Kelly Ripa on the Internet.

en: Environmentally friendly vacuum cleaners and increasing wages
de: Umweltfreundliche Staubsauger und steigende Löhne
translated_de: Environmental friendly sandbags and rising wages

en: Strict environmental standards for the future shall apply to all cars and vacuum cleaners that go on sale as of today.
de: Für Autos und Staubsauger, die ab heute in den Handel kommen, gelten künftig strengere Umweltstandards.
translated_de: The cars and sands that are now in the hand are now subject to strict environmental standards.

en: As of September 1st, new vacuum cleaners will come with a label, similar to that on refrigerators and washing machines, which will allow buyers to see key information at a glance, such as the energy efficiency of the appliance.
de: Ähnlich wie Kühlschränke und Waschmaschinen erhalten neue Staubsauger vom 1. September an ein Etikett, auf dem der Käufer auf einen Blick zentrale Daten wie die Energieeffizienz des Geräts erkennen kann.
translated_de: As well as refrigerators and washing machines, new vacuums are being pumped from 1 September to a chain which can be accessed by the purchaser on a view to central data on the energy efficiency of the equipment.

en: New cars that fall under the emissions class "Euro 6" will receive a higher nitric oxide value.
de: Für neue Autos gelten in der Schadstoffklasse "Euro 6" schärfere Stickoxid-Werte.
translated_de: For new cars, the harmful Stickoxide waste is a standard in the Schadstoffklasse "Euro 6".

en: Aside from this, there is more money for scaffolders: They will receive a minimum wage of 10.25 euros as standard across the whole of Germany.
de: Außerdem gibt es mehr Geld für die Gerüstbauer: Die erhalten einen bundesweit einheitlichen Mindestlohn von 10,25 Euro.
translated_de: There is also more money for the scaffolding industry: the national minimum wage is a minimum of € 10,25.

en: Amazon buys Twitch for $1.04 billion
de: Amazon kauft Twitch für 1,04 Milliarden $
translated_de: Amazon bought Twitch for $104 billion

en: AMAZON just confirmed what the Information reported Monday morning: The online retailer - and video producer, and a hundred other things - is buying video streaming service Twitch for $1.04 billion ($US970 million).
de: AMAZON bestätigte soeben, was Information am Montag Morgen berichtet hatte: Der Online-Einzelhändler - und Videoproduzent, und eine Vielzahl andere Dinge - kauft den Videostreamingdienst Twitch für 1,04 Milliarden $ (970 Millionen US-$).
translated_de: AMAZON confirms that information was reported on Monday morning: The online retailer - and videoproduzent - and a lot of other things - bought Twitch' s videostreaming service for $104 billion (970 million US$).

en: The announcement comes as a surprise, not because no one expected Twitch to be bought, but because YouTube was widely expected to be the buyer.
de: Die Ankündigung kommt überraschend, nicht weil niemand eine Übernahme von Twitch erwartet hatte, sondern weil weithin vermutet wurde, dass YouTube das Unternehmen erwerben würde.
translated_de: The announcement is surprising, not because nobody had expected a Twitch acquisition, but because it was widely believed that YouTube would acquire the company.

en: Three months ago the sale of Twitch to Google's video service, for a cool billion, looked all wrapped up, and the pairing seemed natural.
de: Vor drei Monaten sah es so aus, als sei der Verkauf von Twitch an den Videodienst von Google für eine coole Milliarde beschlossene Sache, und die Zusammenarbeit erschien auch natürlich.
translated_de: It was a three month period that the sale of Twitch to the Google Video Service was a cool deal and the cooperation was also a natural one.

en: Twitch, founded only three years ago as Justin.tv, set out to be a general streaming service - a live version of YouTube.
de: Twitch, das erst vor drei Jahren als Justin.tv gegründet wurde, war als allgemeiner Streamingdienst gestartet - eine Live-Version von YouTube.
translated_de: Twitch, which was first launched in Justin.tv in three years, was a general streaming service - a live-streaming service from YouTube.

en: Instead, it quickly became a platform for gamers to broadcast their in-game feats; a "YouTube for live gaming," in Business Insider's words.
de: Stattdessen wurde es schnell zu einer Plattform für Spieler, die ihre Bravourstücke in Spielen veröffentlichten wollten, ein "YouTube für live Spiele", so ein Insider.
translated_de: It was quickly a platform for players who wanted to publish their Bravourstücks in games, a "YouTube for live games" and a Insider.

en: Twitch's interface.
de: Die Twitch-Schnittstelle.
translated_de: The Twitch Commission.

en: And "let's play," a genre of videos in which wiseacres give (mostly older) games the Mystery Science Theater treatment, are already popular on YouTube.
de: Und "let's play", ein Videogenre, in dem Besserwisser den (meist älteren) Spielen eine Anstrich von Geheimwissenschaftstheater geben, sind auf YouTube bereits sehr beliebt.
translated_de: And "let's play" is a videogenre which, in the case of older people, gives a remark on the field of science, is already very popular on YouTube.

en: The point is, YouTube comes up a lot when describing Twitch, so the news that YouTube was acquiring Twitch was greeted with a yawn, a textbook example of an entrenched tech company buying out a potential competitor.
de: Es ist eben so, dass YouTube oft genannt wird, wenn man Twitch beschreiben will, also wurde die Nachricht, dass YouTube Twitch kaufen wollte, etwas gelangweilt aufgenommen, ein Lehrbuchbeispiel eines etablierten Technikunternehmens, das einen potentiellen Konkurrenten aufkauft.
translated_de: It is also so that YouTube will be mentioned, if Twitch is to be written, that YouTube will be able to buy Twitch, a way to re-enter a teaching book, a technical company which is a potential competitor.

en: It's a mystery why the deal with YouTube fell through, considering it was reportedly willing to pay no less than Amazon.
de: Es ist ein Rätsel, warum der Deal mit YouTube nicht zustande kam, da das Unternehmen Berichten zufolge bereit war, ebenso viel zu zahlen wie Amazon.
translated_de: It is a question of why the deal with YouTube was not a reality, because the companies report was prepared to pay as much as Amazon.

en: All we have at the moment is this statement from Twitch CEO Emmett Shear: "We chose Amazon because they believe in our community, they share our values and long-term vision, and they want to help us get there faster."
de: Alles, was wir im Moment darüber wissen, ist diese Aussage von Emmet Shear, Präsident von Twitch: "Wir haben uns für Amazon entschieden, weil sie an unsere Community glauben, sie teilen unsere Werte und langfristigen Visionen und sie wollen uns dabei helfen, schneller dorthin zu gelangen."
translated_de: All that is, we know in the moment, the statement of Emmet Shear, President of Twitch: "We have decided to support Amazon because they believe in our community, share our values and our long-term visions and we want to help us to get to the point where we are."

en: Another mystery, frankly, is Twitch's incredible success.
de: Ein weiteres Geheimnis ist, ehrlich gesagt, der unglaubliche Erfolg von Twitch.
translated_de: Another symbiotic is, on the contrary, the incredible success of Twitch.

en: To snobs like me who declare that they'd rather play sports than watch them, it's hard to see the appeal of watching games rather than taking up a controller myself.
de: Für Snobs wie mich, die erklären, dass sie lieber Sport treiben als dabei zuzusehen, ist es schwer, die Attraktion zu begreifen, die davon ausgeht, anderen beim Spielen zuzusehen statt selbst die Kontrollkonsole in die Hand zu nehmen.
translated_de: Snobs, as I say, who prefer sport to be seen as a spectator, is a serious matter of preventing the attack which is taking place, and other things in the game rather than the control console in the hand.

en: It's one thing to look over your friend's shoulder at 3 in the morning as she creeps through Resident Evil, and quite another to watch some rando get 20 headshots in a row in Call of Duty.
de: Es ist eine Sache, einem Freund um 3 Uhr morgens über die Schulter zu schauen, während sie durch Resident Evil schleicht, und etwas ganz anderes, einem Spinner dabei zuzusehen, wie er 20 mal nacheinander in Call of Duty in den Kopf geschossen wird.
translated_de: It is a matter of looking at a friend at 3 p.m. on the school, while they are a little sluggish by Resident Evil, and a whole other matter of looking at a spinner who is a bit more than 20 times in the head.

en: All the games you could be watching right now.
de: All diese Spiele könnten Sie jetzt gerade ansehen.
translated_de: All these games could you just watch.

en: Another problem is that many of today's most popular games are first-person, so watching footage of them, without controlling the viewpoint yourself, can be a Do It Right-worthy recipe for a headache.
de: Ein anderes Problem liegt darin, dass viele der beliebtesten Spiele heute Ego-Spiele sind, also kann das Zusehen ohne eigene Kontrolle über die Blickperspektive ein richtig gutes Rezept für Kopfschmerzen sein.
translated_de: Another problem is that many of the most popular games of the day are Ego games, but the view without a proper control of the view can also be a good remedy for head pain.

en: I concede that speedruns, in which the Roger Bannisters of our electronic age complete entire games in record time, are entertaining.
de: Ich gebe zu, dass die Schnelldurchläufe, in den die Roger Bannisters unseres Elektronikzeitalters ganze Spiele in Rekordzeit absolvieren, unterhaltsam sind.
translated_de: I am pleased that the rapid occurrence of the entire games played by Roger Bannister in our electronic timealters are still in the process.

en: But unless someone is a virtuoso at gaming or humour, his Twitch channel isn't likely to be all that interesting.
de: Aber solange nicht ein Spiel- oder Humorvirtuose dabei ist, ist sein Twitch-Kanal vermutlich nicht so sehr interessant.
translated_de: But, if it is not a game or a humourous thing, it is probably not so much of an interesting thing to do with Twitch.

en: But what do sceptics like me know?
de: Aber was wissen Skeptiker wie ich schon davon?
translated_de: But what is the scepticism I have already had?

en: Twitch has 55 million unique visitors monthly and is the fourth-largest source of peak internet traffic.
de: Twitch wird von 55 Millionen unterschiedlicher Besucher pro Monat aufgerufen und ist die viertgrößte Quelle von Internetverkehrsspitzen.
translated_de: Twitch is attracting 55 million different visitors per month and is the fourth largest source of internet traffic.

en: How, exactly, will Amazon capitalise on this?
de: Und wie genau will Amazon daraus Geld machen?
translated_de: And how much will Amazon make money?

en: It's hard to imagine Twitch being folded into Amazon Instant Video as elegantly as YouTube could have just swallowed Twitch.
de: Es ist schwer, sich vorzustellen, dass Twitch so elegant in Amazon Instant Video integriert wird, wie YouTube Twitch einfach hätte schlucken können.
translated_de: It is difficult to imagine that Twitch is so elegant in Amazon Instant Video, as YouTube Twitch would have a simple chance of snatching.

en: But Twitch has something any company would love to attract: hordes of advertiser-coveted young men.
de: Aber Twitch hat etwas, was jedes Unternehmen gerne hätte: Tausende von jungen Männern, die als Werbekunden umworben werden.
translated_de: But Twitch has something that every company would like to see: Taus of young men who are advertising customers.

en: As Twitch chief Shear said, Amazon and Twitch "are both believers in the future of gaming," and the medium shows no sign of shrinking, even - gulp - as a spectator sport.
de: Wie der Vorsitzende von Twitch, Shear, sagte, Amazon und Twitch "glauben beide an die Zukunft des Gaming," und das Medium zeigt keine Anzeichen einer Schrumpfung, noch nicht mal - schluck - als Zuschauersport.
translated_de: As the President of Twitch, Shear said, Amazon and Twitch "glauben both the future of gaming" and the Medium does not show any signs of a rumpfung, nor is it a good thing to do as a spectator sport.

en: But this is just one of many things that need doing: Almost 50 years after the construction of the space observation radar TIRA, the case, known as the radar dome, is to be completely rebuilt.

en: Sylvester Stallone's The Expendables 3 has made back less than $30 million of its $90 million budget in the US, while Sin City: A Dame to Kill For has made back only $12 million of its $70 million budget.
de: "The Expendables 3" von Sylvester Stallone spielte weniger als 30 Millionen Dollar seines 90 Millionen Dollar Budgets in den USA ein, während "Sin City: A Dame to Kill For" lediglich 12 Millionen Dollar seines Budgets von 70 Millionen Dollar einspielte.

en: The Cameron Diaz vehicle Sex Tape took only $14.6 million in its opening weekend, while children's films such as How To Train Your Dragon 2 are also showing disappointing box office returns.

translated_de: The film "Sex Tape" on Cameron Diaz played only 14,6 million dollars during the opening week, while children films such as "Drachenzähmen" were also made in the entry.

en: An article from Telegraph film critic Robbie Collin indicates that, when it comes to children's movies, the poor quality of the films themselves might be to blame.
de: Ein Artikel des Telegraph-Filmkritikers Robbie Collin deutet an, dass bei den Kinderfilmen der Mangel an Qualität bei den Filmen selbst der Grund sein könnte.

en: Collin called 2014 the "the worst" year yet for children's films, and described How To Train Your Dragon 2 as a merely "functional" fantasy sequel.

en: But when it comes to film pitched at a slightly older market, it appears that the issue might not necessarily lie with the quality of the films themselves.
de: Bei Filmen für eine etwas ältere Zielgruppe scheint es jedoch so, als ob die Qualität der Filme nicht unbedingt das Problem ist.
translated_de: However, for films for a somewhat older audience, it seems that quality of films is not the problem.

en: In July, Entertainment Weekly compared the average CinemaScore and Metacritic ratings for every summer release playing on at least 2,000 screens between May's Memorial Day holiday and July 20, for 2013 and for this year.
de: Im Juli verglich Entertainment Weekly die durchschnittlichen CinemaScore- und Metacritic-Bewertung für jeden Sommerfilmstart, der zwischen dem amerikanischen Memorial Day und dem 20. Juli 2013 und im laufenden Jahr auf mindestens 2000 Leinwänden gezeigt wurde.
translated_de: The average CinemaScore and Metacritic Assessment for every summer film start, which was shown between the American Memorial Day and the 20 July 2013 and in the course of the year on minimum 2000 clones, was in July.

en: The results, which take the opinion of both cinema audiences and film critics into account, suggest that this year's crop of films are of similar calibre last year's hits.
de: Die Ergebnisse stützen sich auf die Meinung der Kinobesucher und Filmkritiker und deuten darauf hin, dass die diesjährigen Filmhits denen des vergangenen Jahres gleichwertig sind.
translated_de: The results support the opinion of cinematographers and filmmakers and indicate that the films hit the last year are equally important.

en: Some commentators have suggested that changing viewing habits and the increased popularity of web streaming services such as Netflix may be to blame.
de: Einige Kommentatoren meinen, dass die Entwicklung auf sich verändernde Sehgewohnheiten und die wachsende Popularität von Web-Streaming-Diensten wie Netflix zurückzuführen ist.
translated_de: Several speakers have said that the development of new homes and the increasing popularity of web streaming services such as Netflix is a return to the development.

en: Director Jon Favreau, who is currently working on Disney's forthcoming Jungle Book film, told the website Hollywood Reporter: "I think times are changing."
de: Regisseur Jon Favreau, der derzeit an Disneys bald erscheinenden Dschungelbuch-Film arbeitet, sagte gegenüber der Webseite Hollywood Reporter: "Ich glaube, die Zeiten ändern sich."
translated_de: Jon Favreau, the director of the Disney World' s Dschungelbuch-Film, said to the Hollywood Reporter' s website: "I believe that the time has changed."

en: We have to acknowledge that and not try to chase what used to be.
de: Wir müssen das akzeptieren und nicht versuchen, der Vergangenheit nachzulaufen.
translated_de: We must accept and not attempt to repeat the past.

en: In contrast to Hollywood's current box office slump, Netflix recently saw revenue from its streaming content service reach $1.2bn, almost doubling last year's figure of $837m.
de: Im Gegensatz zu den derzeit schwachen Kassenergebnissen der Hollywoodproduktionen erzielte Netflix in jüngster Zeit Umsätze mit den Streaming-Inhalten in Höhe von 1,2 Milliarden Dollar, fast doppelt so viel wie im vergangenen Jahr, in dem der Umsatz 837 Millionen Dollar betrug.
translated_de: In contrast to the current low-quality Hollywood productions, Netflix has achieved in recent years a doubling of USD 1.6 billion in streaming, nearly twice as much as last year, in the amount of USD 837 million.

en: Last summer, director Steven Spielberg criticised studios for relying too much on comic book franchises, and predicted a Hollywood "meltdown."
de: Im letzten Sommer kritisierte der Regisseur Steven Spielberg die Filmstudios dafür, dass sie sich zu sehr auf Verfilmungen von Comics konzentrierten und prophezeite eine "Kernschmelze" Hollywoods.
translated_de: In the summer of last year, Regisseur Steven Spielberg criticised the film studios for focusing on comics and prophecy a "smell" Hollywood.

en: In light of the current downturn, some commentators are arguing that his dire prophecy may have held some truth to it.
de: Im Licht des derzeitigen Abschwungs gesehen argumentieren einige Kommentatoren, dass seine düstere Prophezeiung durchaus einen wahren Kern enthalten könne.
translated_de: In light of the current debate, some Commentators argue that his düster prophecy could contain a key element.

en: With summer 2015 set to usher in a slate of potential big box office hits, including Avengers: Age of Ultron, Minions and Jurassic World, other figures within the film industry are feeling more optimistic.
de: Aufgrund der im Sommer 2015 zu erwartenden potentiellen Kassenschlager, darunter Avengers: Age of Ultron, Minions und Jurassic World sind andere Vertreter der Filmindustrie jedoch optimistischer:
translated_de: The potential spokesman for the film industry, including Avengers: Age of Ultron, Minions and Jurassic World, is however optimistic:

en: X-Men producer Simon Kinberg recently described the drop in box office takings as simply "cyclical," telling Hollywood Reporter: "Next summer will be the biggest box-office summer in history, and nobody will be worrying about the business."
de: Der Produzent von X-Men, Simon Kinberg, beschrieb den Rückgang der Kassenergebnisse kürzlich als einfach "zyklisch" und sagte gegenüber Hollywood Reporter: "Der nächste Sommer wird der größte Sommer an der Kinokasse überhaupt sein, und niemand wird sich mehr um das Geschäft Sorgen machen."
translated_de: The Produzent of X-Men, Simon Kinberg, wrote the return of the Kassen results in a simple "zyklist" and told the Hollywood Reporter: "The next summer will be the greatest summer in the cinemas and nobody will be more concerned about the business."

en: A few years ago, when the second table tennis regional division was canceled in an attempt to streamline the leagues, a step in the right directions was taken.
de: Als vor einigen Jahren die 2. Tischtennis-Bezirksklasse zwecks Straffung der Ligen-Einteilung gestrichen wurde, ist das ein Schritt in die richtige Richtung gewesen.
translated_de: The second amendment to the table tennis-style squats class was adopted in the Ligen section in the past few years, which was a step in the right direction.

en: Now, the German table tennis association has introduced an additional, third league into the program.
de: Nun hat der Deutsche Tischtennisbund eine zusätzliche 3. Bundesliga ins Programm genommen.
translated_de: The Deutsche Tischtennisbund has now added a further 3. Bundesliga programme.

en: The consequence: Any team that has not been promoted, has been demoted.
de: Die Folge: Wer nicht aufgestiegen ist, ist abgestiegen.
translated_de: The result: who is not on the rise is on the rise.

en: For example, Göttingen's top class team, Torpedo, avoided demotion in the premier league relegation, but will now play in the fifth division as of next season.
de: So hat Göttingens klassenhöchstes Team Torpedo in der Oberliga-Relegation zwar den Abstieg vermieden, spielt in der kommenden Saison jedoch nur noch fünftklassig.
translated_de: The Torpedo Team of the Class of the Year has also been a flop in the Ligue One delegation, but only five times in the coming season.

en: The Torpedo's women's team remain in the fourth division despite their superb clean-sweep in the Regionalliga.
de: Viertklassig bleiben Torpedos Damen, trotz ihres grandiosen Durchmarsches in die Regionalliga.
translated_de: The four-day conference will remain Torpedos, even though they have grand bribes in the Regional League.

en: The Torpedo boys and girls are starting in the Lower Saxony liga, just like the lads from SC Weende.
de: Die Jungen und Mädchen von Torpedo starten in der Niedersachsenliga, ebenso wie die Jungen des SC Weende.
translated_de: The young and young girls of Torpedo start in the Netherlands, as well as the young girls of SC Weende.

en: The SG Lenglern and Torpedo reserves are stepping up into the new Verbandsliga, but there are no longer any clubs from Göttingern in the Landesliga.
de: Die SG Lenglern und die Torpedo-Reserve treten in der neuen Verbandsliga an, in der Landesliga sind keine Göttinger Klubs mehr vertreten.
translated_de: The SG Lenglern and the Torpedo Reserve are in the new banding league, in the national league, there are no other clubs representing the SG.

en: For the women, TTV Geismar does play in the Verbandsliga, and the Torpedo's second team plays in the Landesliga.
de: Bei den Damen spielt der TTV Geismar in der Verbandsliga, die Torpedo-Zweite in der Landesliga.
translated_de: The ladies are the TTV Geismar in the bandliga, the Torpedo Zone in the countryliga.

en: From a structural point of view, this seems to be a better regional division, when in fact, it is just the new Southern Regional Premier League.
de: Was von der Zusammensetzung aussieht wie eine bessere Bezirksklasse, ist nun die neue Bezirksoberliga Süd.
translated_de: The new regional division of South is now a better district class.

en: Stepping up into this are: TSV Seulingen, VfB Lödingsen, Torpedo III, Geismar, Einbeck, Hammenstedt, Bovender SV, Langenholtensen, FC Weser and TTC.
de: Hier treten TSV Seulingen, VfB Lödingsen, Torpedo III, Geismar, Einbeck, Hammenstedt, Bovender SV, Langenholtensen, der FC Weser und der TTC an.
translated_de: The TSV Seulingen, VfB Lödingsen, Torpedo III, Geismar, Einbeck, Hammenstedt, Bovender SV, Langenholtensen, FC Weser and the TTC are also involved.

en: Dransfeld and SC Weende represent the area in the regional league, whereas TTC II, Rot-Weiß, Bovender SV II and TTV Geismar II and III represent the area in the regional division. The Regional Premier League for women is at least kicking off with a good start.
de: In der Bezirksliga spielen als regionale Vertreter Dransfeld und der SC Weende an, in der Bezirksklasse der TTC II, Rot-Weiß, der Bovender SV II und die Teams des TTV Geismar II und III. Die Bezirksoberliga der Damen beginnt zumindest in Sollstärke.
translated_de: In the districtliga, the Regional Representatives are Dransfeld and SC Weende, in the district class of TTC II, Rot-Weiß, Bovender SV II and the Teams of TTV Geismar II and III.

en: Güntersen, TTC and TTV Geismar II are all here as part of the party.
de: Güntersen, der TTC und der TTV Geismar II sind hier mit von der Partie.
translated_de: Güntersen, the TTC and the TTV Geismar II are here with the Partie.

en: In the regional league, Torpedo III and Sattenhausen/Wöllmarshausen are taking to the field.
de: In der Bezirksliga starten laufen Torpedo III und Sattenhausen/Wöllmarshausen auf.
translated_de: In the districtliga, starters are launching Torpedo III and Sattenhausen/Wöllmarshausen.

en: With each of the nine teams
de: Mit je neun Mannschaften
translated_de: With new teams

en: SC Weende sends a girl into the small regional league.
de: Der SC Weende schickt seine Mädchen in die kleine Bezirksliga.
translated_de: The SC Weende sent his girls to the small districtliga.

en: Even the regional league's relay team for SCW boys, which is where Torpedo II is also starting, is not complete.
de: Auch die Bezirksliga-Staffel der SCW-Jungen - dort startet noch Torpedo II - ist nicht komplett.
translated_de: The districtliga-staffel of SCW-Jungen - where it started still Torpedo II - is not complete.

en: As for the regional division, Geismar, Tuspo Weende and Bovender SV are heading into their season.
de: In einer Bezirksklasse gehen Geismar, Tuspo Weende und der Bovender SV in die Saison.
translated_de: In the district class, Geismar, Tuspo Weende and the Bovender SV are in the season.

en: In the first season of the newly-founded regional association, both district divisions from Göttingen are starting out with each of the nine teams.
de: In der ersten Saison des neugegründeten Regionsverbandes starten die beiden Göttinger Kreisligen mit je neun Mannschaften.
translated_de: In the first season of the new Regionsverband, the two Göttinger Kreisligen started with each new team.

en: As for the West relay team; that is made up of Rot-Weiß II, Bovender SV III, Laubach II, Torpedo IV and V, MTV Grone, Dransfelder SC II, Mielenhausen and SG Lenglern II.
de: In der West-Staffel sind das Rot-Weiß II, Bovender SV III, Laubach II, Torpedo IV und V, MTV Grone, Dransfelder SC II, Mielenhausen und SG Lenglern II.
translated_de: In the West-Staffel are the Rot-Weiß II, Bovender SV III, Laubach II, Torpedo IV and V, MTV Grone, Dransfelder SC II, Mielenhausen and SG Lenglern II.

en: Sattenhausen/Wöllmarshausen, Nikolausberg and Landolfshausen are some of the teams making up the East relay team.
de: In der Ost-Staffel spielen unter anderem Sattenhausen/Wöllmarshausen, Nikolausberg und Landolfshausen.
translated_de: In the East-Staffel, there are Sattenhausen/Wöllmarshausen, Nikolausberg and Landolfhausen.

en: The women's district division is made up of Sattenhausen/Wöllmarshausen II, Bilshausen, Hemeln, Seulingen II, Tuspo Weende and SG Rhume.
de: Die Damen-Kreisliga besteht aus Sattenhausen/Wöllmarshausen II, Bilshausen, Hemeln, Seulingen II, Tuspo Weende und der SG Rhume.
translated_de: The ladies league is based on Sattenhausen/Wöllmarshausen II, Bilshausen, Hemeln, Seulingen II, Tuspo Weende and the SG Rhume.

en: That is much better than the district of Osterode, where there are no longer any female teams at a district level.
de: Das ist immer noch besser als im Kreis Osterode, wo es auf Kreisebene gar keine Damen-Teams mehr gibt.
translated_de: It is always better than in the East, where there are no ladies teams in the East.

en: It is remarkable that none of the six second division teams in the district achieved their potential. The innovative and bustling district committee are going to have to come up with something.
de: Auffallend, dass keine der sechs 2.Kreisklassen Sollstärke erreicht, hier wird sich der innovative und umtriebige Kreisvorstand schon einmal Gedanken machen müssen.
translated_de: If there is no one in the six polarised states, this is a matter of thinking about the innovative and ad-hoc circles.

en: Nato summit: First protests in Newport and Cardiff
de: Nato-Gipfel: Erste Proteste in Newport und Cardiff
translated_de: Nato-Gipfel: First Proteste in Newport and Cardiff

en: There have been protests over the weekend by those opposed to the Nato summit in Newport.
de: Am Wochenende gab es Proteste von Gegnern des Nato-Gipfels in Newport.
translated_de: The weekend was the Protest of the opponents of the Nato Summit in Newport.

en: On Saturday, hundreds gathered in Newport city centre for an anti-Nato march.
de: Am Samstag versammelten sich Hunderte im Zentrum von Newport zu einem Anti-Nato-Marsch.
translated_de: On Saturday, hundreds of people gathered in Newport' s centre to fight against the sea.

en: And on Sunday in Cardiff, around 150 people came together at Cardiff's county hall for what was described as a counter-summit.
de: Am Sonntag kamen etwa 150 Menschen in Cardiff vor der dortigen Stadthalle zusammen, um einen sogenannten Gegengipfel abzuhalten.
translated_de: On Sunday, around 150 people were together in Cardiff, before the city hall, to hold a so-called meeting.

en: Stephen Fairclough has been following developments for us over the weekend and has spoken to protesters who have travelled from Bridgend to Belgium.
de: Stephen Fairclough hat für uns die Entwicklungen am Wochenende verfolgt und mit Demonstranten gesprochen, die aus Bridgend nach Belgien gereist sind.
translated_de: Stephen Fairclough has been addressing the development of the week and speaking with the Demonstrants who are reliant on Bridgend to Belgien.

en: Teens airlifted from Blue Mountains
de: Teenager aus den Blue Mountains ausgeflogen
translated_de: Teenagers from the Blue Mountains

en: TWO teenage bushwalkers have been winched to safety after spending the night stranded in the NSW Blue Mountains.
de: ZWEI jugendliche Buschwanderer wurden mit der Seilwinde in Sicherheit gebracht, nachdem sie die Nacht über in den Blue Mountains in NSW gefangen waren.
translated_de: The sands of the ZWEI were brought to safety by the wind, and they were caught in the night in the Blue Mountains in NSW.

en: THE 16-year-old girl and 18-year-old man went hiking just after midday on Sunday at Govetts Leap in Blackheath.
de: DAS 16-jährige Mädchen und der 19-jährige Mann brachen kurz nach Sonntagmittag in Govetts Leap in Blackheath zu ihrer Tour auf.
translated_de: DAS 16-year-old girls and the 19-year-old man braced shortly after Sunday' s Sunday morning in Govetts Leap in Blackheath to take their tour.

en: Concerned relatives called police about 8pm when they hadn't returned home.
de: Besorgte Verwandte riefen um etwa 20 Uhr die Polizei, als die beiden nicht nach Hause zurückgekehrt waren.
translated_de: The police were called to the house around 20 a.m., as the two were not returned.

en: A search party involving local police and rescue squad was sent out and the pair were found about 11pm near Bridal Veil Falls.
de: Ein Suchtrupp aus örtlicher Polizei und Rettungsdiensten brach auf und das Paar wurde um etwa 23 Uhr in der Nähe der Bridal Veil Wasserfälle gefunden.
translated_de: A Suchtrupp was allegedly allegedly a member of the local police and rescue services and the pair was found around 23 a.m. in the vicinity of the Bridal Veil Waterfall.

en: The girl had injured her knee and the man had fallen and hit his head.
de: Das Mädchen hatte sich am Knie verletzt und der Mann war gestürzt und hatte seinen Kopf aufgeschlagen.
translated_de: The girls had been beaten on the Knie and the Mann was gesturbed and had his head slashed.

en: Officers remained with the pair overnight and they were winched out on Monday morning.
de: Rettungskräfte blieben über Nacht bei dem Paar, und sie wurden am Montag morgen ausgeflogen.
translated_de: Rettungskräfte remained for the night at the Paar and they were slashed on Monday.

en: They were taken by ambulance in a stable condition to Blue Mountains Hospital.
de: Sie wurden in stabilem Zustand mit einem Krankenwagen in das Blue Mountains Hospital eingeliefert.
translated_de: They were in stable condition with a car in the Blue Mountains Hospital.

en: Anti-government protests escalate in Pakistan
de: Regierungsfeindliche Proteste in Pakistan eskalieren
translated_de: Governmental proteste in Pakistan is eskalating

en: Around 1000 protesters have been forced out of the PTV buildings by soldiers, according to the Minister of Information, Pervaiz Rashid.
de: Die rund 1000 Demonstranten seien von Soldaten aus dem PTV-Gebäude gedrängt worden, sagte Informationsminister Pervaiz Rashid.
translated_de: The 'environ 1000' demonstrations were made from Soldaten from the PTV-Gebäude, said Information Minister Pervaiz Rashid.

en: After a good half an hour or so, the station began broadcasting again.
de: Der Sender habe nach gut einer halben Stunde die Ausstrahlung wieder aufgenommen.
translated_de: The Sender has now returned the radiation after a half hour.

en: The director of PTV, Athar Farooq, said that demonstrators armed with sticks had damaged equipment in the editorial offices.
de: PTV-Direktor Athar Farooq sagte, die mit Stöcken ausgerüsteten Demonstranten hätten Geräte in der Redaktion beschädigt.
translated_de: The PTV Director, Athar Farooq, said that the stöcked Demonstranten had a stifling effect in the Redaktion.

en: There was no mentioned of the number of people killed or injured.
de: Tote oder Verletzte wurden nicht gemeldet.
translated_de: Nos to or lasts were reported.

en: The demonstrators are demanding the resignation of the Head of Government, accusing him of vote rigging.
de: Die Demonstranten fordern den Rücktritt des Regierungschefs, dem sie Wahlbetrug vorwerfen.
translated_de: Demonstranten demand the resignation of the Governments which they have chosen.

en: The police announced that on Monday, around one kilometer away from the residence of the Prime Minister, Nawaz Sharif, approximately 3000 demonstrators clashed with security forces.
de: Die Polizei teilte mit, rund einen Kilometer von der Residenz des Premierministers Nawaz Sharif entfernt sei es am Montag wieder zu Zusammenstößen von rund 3000 Demonstranten mit Sicherheitskräften gekommen.
translated_de: Police have gathered around a mile from the Prime Minister' s residence, Nawaz Sharif, to meet around 3000 demonstrators with security forces on Monday.

en: According to statements released by the hospital, a police officer was injured.
de: Nach Krankenhausangaben wurde ein Polizist verletzt.
translated_de: After hospital discharges, a policeman was injured.

en: At least three people were killed and more than 500 injured at the weekend when demonstrators attempted to gain access to Sharif's residence.
de: Am Wochenende waren mindestens drei Menschen getötet und mehr als 500 verletzt worden, als Demonstranten versuchten, zu Sharifs Residenz vorzudringen.
translated_de: At the weekend, at least three people were killed and more than 500 were injured, as demonstrators tried to ring Sharifs Residenz.

en: They are demanding the resignation of the Prime Minister.
de: Sie fordern den Rücktritt des Ministerpräsidenten.
translated_de: You demand the resignation of the Ministers.

en: Following a meeting in the army's headquarters on Sunday evening, the powerful military called for a political solution to the conflict, stating there was "no time to waste or a need to use violence".
de: Das mächtige Militär hatte am Sonntagabend nach einer Sitzung im Armee-Hauptquartier zu einer politischen Lösung des Konflikts aufgerufen, "ohne Zeit zu verschwenden und ohne Gewalt anzuwenden".
translated_de: The powerful military had called on Sunday evening after a meeting in the Armed Forces to find a political solution to the conflict, "without violence and without time".

en: The statement also announced that: "The army remains bound by its duty to ensure the safety of the State".
de: Weiter hieß es in der Mitteilung: "Die Armee bleibt ihrer Rolle verpflichtet, die Sicherheit des Staates zu gewährleisten".
translated_de: The message is also a message: "The Armed Forces remain their role, to ensure the security of the States".

en: The escalating violence stirred up concern that the military may have to intervene, a military that has already revolted on many occasions in the past.
de: Die eskalierende Gewalt hat Sorge vor einem Eingreifen des Militärs geschürt, das in der Vergangenheit bereits häufiger geputscht hat.
translated_de: The eskalating violence has caused concern for the intervention of the military, which has been a frequent occurrence in the past.

en: The above protests, led by Imran Khan, an opposition politician, and Tahirul Qadri, a preacher, have been ongoing since independence day on 14 August.
de: Die vom Oppositionspolitiker Imran Khan und dem Prediger Tahirul Qadri angeführten Proteste dauern seit dem Unabhängigkeitstag am 14. August an.
translated_de: The protests of opposition policy leader Imran Khan and President Tahirul Qadri have been lasted for 14 August since the election.

en: Sharif is refusing to step down.
de: Sharif lehnt einen Rücktritt ab.
translated_de: Sharif rejects a return.

en: On Sunday Khan and Qadri called upon their supporters to persevere.
de: Khan und Qadri hatten ihre Anhänger am Sonntag dazu aufgerufen, auszuharren.
translated_de: Khan and Qadri had their supporters called on Sunday to be a part of the conversation.

en: "We will not leave until we have forced Sharif to resign", Khan said.
de: "Wir werden nicht zurückgehen, ohne Sharif zum Rücktritt gezwungen zu haben", sagte Khan.
translated_de: "We will not return, without Sharif to return", said Khan.

en: Qadri made similar comments:
de: Qadri äußerte sich ähnlich.
translated_de: Qadri is very similar.

en: Khan accuses Sharif of having fraudulently won the parliamentary vote last May.
de: Khan wirft Sharif vor, die Parlamentswahl im Mai vergangenen Jahres durch Betrug gewonnen zu haben.
translated_de: Khan has a chance to win the Parliament' s election in May last year.

en: Qadri is demanding the resignation of both the central and provincial governments.
de: Qadri fordert den Rücktritt der Zentral- und der Provinzregierungen.
translated_de: Qadri demands the return of the Central and Provincial Governments.

en: A provisional government should then reform the voting system, and call new elections.
de: Dann soll eine Übergangsregierung das Wahlsystem reformieren und Neuwahlen ausrufen.
translated_de: Then, it should be a gang-regulation of the electoral system and a re-election.

en: More than 40,000 members of the security forces have been deployed to protect the government district.
de: Mehr als 40 000 Sicherheitskräfte sind im Einsatz, um das Regierungsviertel zu schützen.
translated_de: More than 40 000 security forces are deployed to protect the government' s offices.

en: At first, the demonstrators led a peaceful protest in front of the parliament building. Then, at the weekend, Khan and Qadri called upon them to force entry into Sharif's residence.
de: Die Demonstranten hatten zunächst friedlich vor dem Parlament ausgeharrt, bis Khan und Qadri sie am Wochenende dazu aufriefen, zu Sharifs Residenz vorzudringen.
translated_de: The Demonstranten had to be fried before Parliament, until Khan and Qadri were forced to resign on the weekend, and to take Sharifs Residence.

en: After its second win of the season, Hütteldorf is in third place on the table.
de: Hütteldorfer nach zweitem Saisonsieg auf Platz drei der Tabelle.
translated_de: The Hütteldorfer won the second season on the table at the table.

en: A bitter week came to an end for Rapid on Sunday with a 2:0 win over Grödig.
de: Mit dem 2:0 über Grödig hat für Rapid eine bittere Woche am Sonntag ein versöhnliches Ende genommen.
translated_de: The 2:0 vote on the day of the re-election of the Irish Parliament has slowed for a bitter week on Sunday.

en: Coach Zoran Barisic, whose team reached an interim low at the end of the Europa League on Thursday, said that "the victory is very liberating".
de: "Der Sieg ist sehr befreiend", sagte Trainer Zoran Barisic, dessen Team mit dem Aus in der Europa League am Donnerstag ein Zwischentief erreicht hatte.
translated_de: "The victory is very free", said Trainer Zoran Barisic, who had a very close relationship with the team at the European League on Thursday.

en: The captain and goalkeeper, Steffen Hofmann, who climbed up to third place with Grün-Weiß, confirmed that "the sense of achievement was extremely important".
de: "Das Erfolgserlebnis war unheimlich wichtig", bestätigte Kapitän und Torschütze Steffen Hofmann, der mit Grün-Weiß auf Platz drei vorstieß.
translated_de: "The success was unheimably important," said Kapitän and Torschütz Steffen Hofmann, who, with Grün-Weiß, were on the podium three.

en: Schrammel's dream goal has led Rapid on to a road to victory. Two winning seasons show that Rapid have reacted in the right way to the disappointment experienced against Helsinki, and they reach the end of the international season with heightened morale.
de: Schrammel-Traumtor bringt Rapid auf Siegerstraße Rapid hat mit dem zweiten Saisonsieg die richtige Reaktion auf die Enttäuschung gegen Helsinki gezeigt und geht mit einem Erfolgserlebnis in die Länderspiel-Pause.
translated_de: The Schrammel-Traumtor is bringing Rapid to the town of Siegers Rapid has shown the correct response to the Helsinki entanglement and is a success in the country game.

en: "We wanted to show a positive reaction", the defender Thomas Schrammel said, whose magnificent and skillful corner in the 14th minute set them on a winning course.
de: "Wir wollten eine positive Reaktion zeigen", sagte Außenverteidiger Thomas Schrammel, der mit seinem herrlichen Führungs-Volley vom Sechzehnereck in der 14. Minute die Weichen auf Sieg gestellt hat.
translated_de: "We wanted to show a positive response," said the Foreign Secretary-General, Thomas Schrammel, who has defended his magnificent leadership in the 14 minute period.

en: "I thought I'd build up all of the frustration from Thursday, and smashed it into the top of the net", the 26-year old said smiling.
de: "Ich habe mir gedacht, ich hau den ganzen Frust vom Donnerstag rein und schnalzte ihn unter die Latte", meinte der 26-Jährige lächelnd.
translated_de: "I have thought that I would have to take the whole frustration of the Donnerstag and snatch it under the table," said the 26-year-old.

en: 13th of November 2010 was, until now, the last time that Schrammel had scored in a team from the Bundesliga, and that was with Ried.

en: After weeks of verbal wrangling Italy's Premier - and sitting EU-Chairman - Matteo Renzi, has managed to push through his nomination of his foreign minister, Federica Mogherini, as head of EU- Foreign Policy, despite strong conservative opposition at the special EU summit. She will be the successor of the Britain, Catherine Ashton.
de: Nach wochenlangem Tauziehen hat Italiens Premier und amtierender EU-Vorsitzender, Matteo Renzi, gegen starke konservative Widerstände auf dem EU-Sondergipfel vergangene Woche die Nominierung seiner Außenministerin Federica Mogherini als Chefin der EU-Außenpolitik durchgesetzt, Sie wird Nachfolgerin der Britin Catherine Ashton.
translated_de: After a long period of debate, Italy' s Premier and EU President, Matteo Renzi, has fought against a strong, constructive debate on the EU Council last week, citing his foreign minister Federica Mogherini as Chef of the EU-Assocation Policy, and you will follow the Brit Catherine Ashton.

en: Renzi observes how the government-friendly daily newspaper, La Repubblica, describes the appointment of Mogherini, who was also seen as the favourite by the government, as a strengthening of the position of the Social Democrats and of his own position in the EU.
de: Renzi betrachtet, wie die regierungsnahe Tageszeitung La Repubblica wiedergibt, die Berufung seiner auch im Regierungsteam als Favoritin geltenden Mogherini als Stärkung der Position der Sozialdemokraten und seiner eigenen in der EU.
translated_de: Renzi looked at the recent report on the Repubblica' s re-election, which, in the Government' s team, was a favourite, and he was a spokesman for Mogherini, a stifling position of social-democrats and their own in the EU.

en: He expects it to provide a boost for his "Reform Package" in Italy.
de: Er erwartet davon auch einen Auftrieb für sein "Reformpaket" in Italien.
translated_de: It is also expected that the reform package will be re-drafted in Italy.

en: Renzi hopes, not least, to be able to thus quieten the left-wing party basis which is always stirring against him, for Mogherini is considered to be one of their group - albeit one of the more moderate.
de: Nicht zuletzt hofft Renzi, damit auch die immer wieder gegen ihn aufbegehrende linke Parteibasis ruhig zu stellen, denn Mogherini wird dieser - wenn auch eher in gemäßigter Weise - zugeordnet.
translated_de: It is not only a hope that Renzi will be able to put the party' s links to him, but that Mogherini will - if he does - be able to re-organise it.

en: In opposition to the conservative representatives, Commission President Jean-Claude Juncker and the Pole Donald Tusk, who was named as Council President, were voted in, so the prevailing opinion in Rome, in order to achieve a political balance.
de: Gegenüber den konservativen Vertretern mit Kommissionspräsident Jean-Claude Juncker und dem als Ratspräsidenten nominierten Polen Donald Tusk werde, so die vorherrschende Meinung in Rom, damit ein politischer Ausgleich hergestellt.
translated_de: In contrast, the representatives of the Conservative Party, Jean-Claude Juncker, and the Polish President, Donald Tusk, will be appointed as the President of the Council, so that the previous opinion in Rom will be a political issue.

en: The agreement of the EU-Parliament is considered to be safely secured.
de: Die noch ausstehende Zustimmung des EU-Parlaments gilt als sicher.
translated_de: The remaining approval of the EU Parliaments is a guarantee.

de: Sonst hätte Staatspräsident Giorgio Napolitano die Nominierung der 41jährigen Politikerin der regierenden Demokratischen Partei (PD) wohl kaum eine "wichtige Anerkennung" der Rolle Italiens in der EU genannt.
