de: Sie besetzte traditionelle Schwerpunkte italienischer Außenpolitik wie den Nahen Osten, wurde durch Studien zum NATO-Einsatz in Afghanistan, an dem Italien mit einem Truppenkontingent beteiligt ist, bekannt, pflegte die Kontakte zu den Sozialdemokraten in Europa und zu den Demokraten in den USA.
translated_de: It has a tradition of focusing its foreign policy on the Nah East, which has been influenced by NATO studies in Afghanistan, which is involved in the Italian territory, and which has a strong influence on social democracy in Europe and in the USA.

en: Since 2008 she has been a member of the Chamber of Deputies, in which she serves as an expert on Defence and European and International Affairs.
de: Seit 2008 ist sie Mitglied der Abgeordnetenkammer, in der sie Expertin für Verteidigung und europäische und internationale Angelegenheiten ist.
translated_de: Since 2008, they have been Member of the Council of the European and International Affairs Experts.

en: When Renzi became Premier in February 2014, he appointed Mogherini as his Foreign Minister.
de: Als Renzi im Februar 2014 Premier wurde, berief er Mogherini zu seiner Außenministerin.
translated_de: As Renzi was elected in February 2014, he appointed Mogherini to his external minister.

en: If the PD today enjoys a better relationship with the strong freedom movement in the country, which contributed to the more than 40 percent votes for the Party in the EU elections, then it was Federica Mogherini who played a leading role in that, as is strongly believed in PD circles.
de: Wenn die PD heute wieder ein besseres Verhältnis zur starken Friedensbewegung im Lande hat, die zu den über 40 Prozent Stimmen der Partei bei den EU-Wahlen im Mai beitrug, dann habe, wie in PD-Kreisen vermerkt wird, Federica Mogherini einen Anteil daran.
translated_de: If the PD has again improved its relationship with the strong peace movement in the country which has increased to over 40% in the EU elections in Mai, then Federica Mogherini has, as in PD talks, contributed to that.

en: The claims in Brussels that the new EU-Foreign Minister has too little diplomatic experience and therefore lacks clout, is rebutted by the PD.
de: Den Vorhaltungen in Brüssel, die neue EU-Außenbeauftragte habe zu wenig diplomatische Erfahrung, fehle es also an Substanz, wird in der PD gekontert.
translated_de: The Brussels protests, which have little diplomatic experience, are also a substanz, which is a stumbling block in the PD.

en: In Brussels, the realistic stance taken by Logherini in the Ukrainian crisis have been attacked and denigrated, particularly by the Polish members and those representing the Baltic States.
de: In Brüssel werden, vor allem von Polen und den baltischen Mitgliedern, mißtrauisch realistische Akzente Mogherinis zur Krise in der Ukraine verfolgt und als "rußlandfreundlicher Kurs" diffamiert.
translated_de: In Brussels, particularly from Poland and the Baltic Members, mißtrauous realist Akzente Mogherinis will be a victim of the crisis in Ukraine and will be a "very friendly course" in the Russian Federation.

en: She is a supporter of Pipeline South Stream, run by the Russian firm Gasprom, through which Russian natural gas is to be transported directly to southern Europe, by-passing Ukraine. This will also make Italy's own energy secure.
de: Sie befürwortet die von der russischen Firma Gasprom betriebene Pipeline South Stream, über die russisches Erdgas unter Umgehung der Ukraine direkt nach Südeuropa transportiert werden soll, was auch der Energiesicherung Italiens dient.
translated_de: You are referring to the South Stream pipeline which is being operated by the Russian company Gasprom, which will be transported directly to Ukraine, which is also used by the Italian energy protection company.

en: After Renzi had assumed his position as EU-Chairman in July, Mogherini embarked on her first state visit to Moscow.
de: Nachdem Renzi im Juli seine Amtszeit als EU-Vorsitzender angetreten hatte, reiste Mogherini zu ihrem ersten Staatsbesuch nach Moskau.
translated_de: After Renzi' s appointment as EU President in July, Mogherini has been unable to make his first visit to Moskau.

en: Photos showing her shaking hands with Putin were received in Brussels with indignation, as was the fact that she invited the Kremlin chief to an economic summit in Milan in October.
de: Fotos, die sie mit Putin beim Shake-hands zeigten, wurden in Brüssel mit Empörung aufgenommen, ebenso, daß sie den Kreml-Chef für Oktober zu einem Mailänder Wirtschaftsgipfel einlud.
translated_de: Photos which they showed with Putin at Shake Hands were taken in Brussels with a spokesman, and that they were invited to a Mailänder Economic Summit by the Kreml Chef for October.

en: A total of nine people began their training course on Monday, at emz-Hanauer in Nabburg.
de: Insgesamt neun junge Leute haben am Montag ihre Ausbildung bei emz-Hanauer in Nabburg begonnen.
translated_de: Insgesamt, nine young people have started their training at emz-Hanauer in Nabburg on Monday.

en: They include a trainee, who had already completed another course in the same company.
de: Darunter ist ein Azubi, der bereits zuvor eine andere Ausbildung in dem Unternehmen abgeschlossen hat.
translated_de: It is a Azubi who has already completed another training in the company.

en: The new trainee employees will receive training for four future job areas: Electronics engineers (three trainees); mechatronics engineers or technicians (two); tool mechanics (two) and process engineers (two).
de: In vier Ausbildungsberufen sind die neuen Mitarbeiter künftig tätig: Elektroniker (drei Auszubildende), Mechatroniker (zwei), Werkzeugmechaniker (zwei) und Verfahrensmechaniker (zwei).
translated_de: In four trainings, the new employees will be employed: electrical engineers (drei exits), mechanics (zwei), toolmechanics (zwei) and procedural mechanics (zwei).

en: All the trainees come from the county of Schwandorf: Tobias Braun and Thomas Bücherl from Schwarzach, Stefan Brickl and Florian Rewitzer from Schmidgaden, Johannes Beer from Neunburg vorm Wald, Felix Domaier from Oberviechtach, Daniel Sorgenfrei and Sebastian Zahner from Pfreimd, as well as Ferdinand Strebl from Teunz.
de: Alle Azubis kommen aus dem Landkreis Schwandorf: Tobias Braun und Thomas Bücherl aus Schwarzach, Stefan Brickl und Florian Rewitzer aus Schmidgaden, Johannes Beer aus Neunburg vorm Wald, Felix Domaier aus Oberviechtach, Daniel Sorgenfrei und Sebastian Zahner aus Pfreimd sowie Ferdinand Strebl aus Teunz.
translated_de: All Azubis come from the Landkreis Schwandorf: Tobias Braun and Thomas books from Schwarzach, Stefan Brickl and Florian Rewitzer from Schmidgaden, Johannes Beer from Neunburg before Wald, Felix Domaier from Oberviechtach, Daniel Sorgenfrei and Sebastian Zahner from Pfreimd and Ferdinand Strebl from Teunz.

en: The new trainees had previously attended middle and junior high schools.
de: Die neuen Auszubildenden besuchten zuvor Haupt- beziehungsweise Mittelschulen und Realschulen.
translated_de: The new pupils visited the primary schools and real schools before.

en: From Wednesday until Friday, the trainees of all the various ages were going to a Team Building event in Oberammergau, which included among other things an all-day hike and rafting on the Inn River.
de: Von Mittwoch bis Freitag fahren die Auszubildenden aller Jahrgänge sowie die Ausbilder zu einem Teambildungsevent nach Oberammergau, wo unter anderem eine Ganztageswanderung und Rafting auf dem Inn auf dem Programm stehen.
translated_de: From Wednesday to Friday, the exhibitors will be invited to a team-building event in Oberammergau, where, among other things, a whole-tageswax and a re-sale on the programme.

en: The company has 435 employees throughout Germany and 950 worldwide.
de: Das Unternehmen zählt deutschlandweit 435 und weltweit 950 Mitarbeiter.
translated_de: The company has 435 employees worldwide and 950 worldwide.

en: The number of trainees across all age-groups totals 27.
de: Die Zahl der Auszubildenden über alle Jahrgänge verteilt beträgt 27.
translated_de: The number of applicants surveyed in all the years is 27.

en: France's Socialists should 'shut up and sort France out', Francois Hollande's key ally says
de: Die Sozialisten in Frankreich sollten "den Mund halten und Frankreich in Ordnung bringen," sagte der wichtigste Verbündete von Francois Hollande.
translated_de: The socialists in France should "keep Mund and bring France in order," said the important Dutch delegation.

en: Mr Valls called on the deeply divided Left to "show its affection" for the embattled Socialist president, whose reshuffle has failed to meet the approval of the vast majority of French.
de: Herr Valls rief die tief gespaltene Linke dazu auf, "ihre Liebe" für den umstrittenen sozialistischen Präsidenten zu zeigen, dessen Kabinettsumbildung auf Missbilligung bei der großen Mehrheit der Franzosen gestoßen ist.
translated_de: Mr Valls has urged the deepest links to show "love" for the socialist Presidents who are stepping up to the presidency of the country that the Kabinetts are being re-election by the majority of the French.

en: The president deserves everyone's respect, he deserves our loyality, he deserves our support.
de: Der Präsident verdient jedermanns Respekt, er verdient unsere Loyalität, er verdient unsere Unterstützung.
translated_de: The President deserves every respect, respect, respect, support, support.

en: "It is our duty to remain at his sides," he said, to applause.
de: "Es ist unsere Pflicht, an seiner Seite zu bleiben," sagte er bei großem Applaus.
translated_de: "It is our duty to remain on its side," he said in a large speech.

en: As a placatory gesture, the prime minister insisted his government would not call into question France's controversial 35-hour working week, despite inflammatory suggestions it should relax the rules earlier in the week by Emmanuel Macron, the new economy minister.
de: Als beschwichtigende Geste bestand der Premierminister darauf, dass seine Regierung die kontroverse 35-Stunden-Woche in Frankreich trotz heftiger Forderungen nach einer Lockerung der Regelung von Seiten Emmanuel Macrons, der neuen Wirtschaftsministers, nicht in Frage stellen werde.
translated_de: The President of the United States, the President of the United States, has said that his government will not be able to address the troverse 35-Stunden Prize in France, despite the hefty demands made by the new economic minister, Emmanuel Macron.

en: On Saturday, Mr Hollande had implored his fellow Socialists to remain "united" with the government.
de: Am Samstag hatte Herr Hollande seine Mitsozialisten dringend dazu aufgerufen, sich "vereint" mit der Regierung zu zeigen.
translated_de: On Saturday, Mr Hollande called his socialists urgently to show "coherence" with the government.

en: But Christiane Taubira, the justice minister, put a spanner in the works by turning up to a meeting of rebel Socialist MPs and criticising the Socialist Party for letting the French "lose faith in their future."
de: Aber Christiane Taubira, die Justizministerin, streute Sand ins Getriebe, in dem sie bei einem Treffen abtrünniger sozialistischer Abgeordneter auftrat und die Sozialistische Partei dafür kritisierte, dass sie die Franzosen "den Glauben an ihre Zukunft" nehme.
translated_de: But Christian Taubira, the Justizminister, is a sand miner, in which he slammed socialists at a meeting of the socialist party and kritised that they accepted the French "denomination to their future" .

en: Marine Le Pen, the far-Right National Front leader, heaped scorn on the Socialists' constant in-fighting by saying she did not see the new Valls government lasting more than just a few months.
de: Marine Le Pen, die weit rechts stehende Führerin der Nationalen Front, verspottete die ständigen Grabenkämpfe der Sozialisten und sagte, dass sie sich nicht vorstellen könne, dass die neue Valls Regierung länger als ein paar Monate durchhalten werde.
translated_de: Marine Le Pen, the far-right leader in the National Front, strove of the ongoing fights against socialists and said that they cannot imagine that the new Valls government will be able to keep for a few months.

en: Francois Hollande the Emperor has no clothes, but neither has Prince Manuel Valls, forced to put together a new government when the previous one didn't even survive the summer.
de: Francois Hollande ist der Kaiser ohne Kleider, aber Prinz Manuel Valls hat auch keine, sie sind gezwungen, eine neue Regierung zu bilden, wenn die alte nicht mal einen Sommer überlebt hat.
translated_de: Francois Hollande is the Kaiser without clothes, but by virtue of Manuel Valls, they are not a new government, if the old has not survived a summer.

en: "And the new one won't survive the fall or the winter either," Miss Le Pen told supporters.
de: "Und die neue wird ebenfalls den Herbst oder Winter nicht überleben," sagte Fräulein Le Pen gegenüber Unterstützern.
translated_de: "The new will also not be reviving in autumn or winter," said Fräulein Le Pen in front of supporters.

en: She reiterated her party's call for a parliamentary dissolution, saying she was confident it could win early elections and stood ready to govern.
de: Sie wiederholte den Ruf ihrer Partei nach einer Auflösung des Parlaments und sagte, sie sei zuversichtlich, bei vorgezogenen Wahlen als Sieger hervorzugehen und sei zur Regierung bereit.
translated_de: You again reaffirmed the position of their party in favour of a resolution by Parliament and said that it is likely to be a candidate for the presidency and that the government is prepared to do so.

en: France's ruling party suffered a drubbing in March municipal elections and the far-right National Front came out on top in EU elections in May.
de: Die regierende Partei Frankreichs erlitt eine Niederlage bei den Kommunalwahlen im März und die rechtsgerichtete Nationale Front lag bei den EU-Wahlen im Mai vorn.
translated_de: The French Party, which is a member of the French Party, has a re-election in March and the right-wing national front is still in the EU' s favour in Mai.

en: A poll in Sunday's Journal du Dimanche found 76 per cent of French believe the Socialist Party risks breaking up into several rival factions before the end of Mr Hollande's presidential term in 2017.
de: Eine Umfrage in der Sonntagszeitung Journal du Dimanche ergab, dass 76 Prozent der Franzosen der Meinung sind, dass die Sozialistische Partei der Gefahr ausgesetzt ist, vor dem Ende der Amtszeit Hollandes 2017 in mehrere rivalisierende Fraktionen zu zerfallen.
translated_de: The Dimanche Journal of Sunday' s Times stated that 76 percent of French people believe that the socialist party is putting the risk of falling in several rival factions before the end of the Dutch period.

en: Pascal Perrineau, a political scientist at Sciences Po university, warned the French would fast lose patience unless the new Socialist government succeeds in improving the economy and record unemployment.
de: Pascal Perrineau, ein Politikwissenschaftler an der Sciences Po Universität, warnte davor, dass die Franzosen schnell die Geduld verlieren würde, wenn die neue sozialistische Regierung keine Verbesserung der Wirtschaft und der Rekordarbeitslosenzahlen erziele.
translated_de: Pascal Perrineau, a policy scientist at the Sciences Po University, warns that the French would soon lose their heads if the new socialist government did not improve the economy and the unemployment rate.

en: "It has a small window of opportunity, but public opinion needs to quickly feel things are changing," he warned.
de: "Es gibt ein kleines Fenster für Möglichkeiten, aber die öffentliche Meinung muss schnell fühlen, dass sich die Dinge ändern," warnte er.
translated_de: "There is a small window for possibilities, but public opinion must quickly be able to change things," warns him.

en: Otherwise, the situation could further degenerate.
de: Ansonsten könne sich die Situation weiter verschlechtern.
translated_de: The situation could also be deteriorated.

en: Norwegian Cruise nears $3 billion Prestige Cruises deal
de: Norwegian Cruise kurz vor einen Deal mit Prestige Cruises von 3 Mrd $
translated_de: Norwegian cruise is short-sighted with a deal with Prestige cruises of $ 3 Mrd.

en: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd NCHL.O, the world's third largest cruise operator, is in advanced talks to acquire peer Prestige Cruises International Inc for around $3 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.
de: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd NCHL.O, der drittgrößte Kreuzfahranbieter der Welt, führt laut Kennern der Branche fortgeschrittene Verhandlungen zum Erwerb des Konkurrenten Prestige Cruises International Inc für etwa 3 Milliarden $.
translated_de: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd NCHL.O, the third largest cruise operator in the world, has negotiated a progress in the acquisition of the Conkurrent Prestige Cruises International Inc for around $ 3 billion.

en: A deal would give Norwegian Cruise, a company with a market value of $6.8 billion, access to Prestige Cruises' luxury cruise ships and affluent clientele as it competes with bigger rivals Royal Caribbean Cruises Ltd (RCL.N) and Carnival Corp (CCL.N).
de: Ein Deal würde Norwegian Cruise, einem Unternehmen mit einem Marktwert von 6,8 Milliarden $, Zugang zu den Luxuskreuzfahrtschiffen von Prestige Cruises sowie zu dessen wohlhabender Kundschaft geben, während es mit größeren Rivalen wie Royal Caribbean Cruises Ltd (RCL.N) und Carnival Corp (CCL.N) im Wettbewerb steht.
translated_de: Norwegian Cruise, which has a market value of $6 billion, would give access to the luxury cruise ships of Prestige Cruises and its prosperous Kundschaft, while competing with larger rivals such as Royal Caribbean Cruises Ltd (RCL.N) and Carnival Corp (CCL.N).

en: An agreement may be announced as early as this week, the sources said on Sunday, cautioning that the talks could still fall apart.
de: Eine Einigung könnte bereits in dieser Woche verkündet werden, sagten die Quellen am Sonntag und warnten, dass die Gespräche aber auch ergebnislos enden könnten.
translated_de: A proposal could already be proposed this week, announcing the sources on Sunday and warning that the talks could also end.

en: The owner of Prestige Cruises, private equity firm Apollo Global Management LLC (APO.N), also owns a 20 percent stake in Norwegian Cruise.
de: Der Eigentümer von Prestige Cruises, die Private-Equity-Gesellschaft Apollo Global Management LLC (APO.N) besitzt auch einen Anteil von 20 Prozent an Norwegian Cruise.
translated_de: The owner of Prestige Cruises, the Private Equity Group, Apollo Global Management LLC (APO.N) has a Norwegian cruise of 20 percent.

en: The sources asked not to be identified because the negotiations are not public.
de: Die Quellen baten darum, anonym bleiben zu können, da die Verhandlungen nicht öffentlich seien.
translated_de: The sources should remain anonymous, since negotiations are not public.

en: Norwegian Cruise and Prestige Cruises representatives did not respond to requests for comment, while an Apollo spokesman declined to comment.
de: Vertreter von Norwegian Cruise und Prestige Cruises antworteten nicht auf Bitten um Kommentare, während ein Sprecher für Apollo einen Kommentar ablehnte.
translated_de: Members of Norwegian Cruise and Prestige Cruises have not responded to any comments, while a speaker for Apollo has refused to comment.

en: Miami-based Norwegian Cruise operates 13 cruise ships in routes spanning North America, the Mediterranean, the Baltic, Central America and the Caribbean.
de: Das in Miami beheimatete Unternehmen Norwegian Cruise betreibt 13 Kreuzfahrtschiffe auf Routen zwischen Nordamerika, dem Mittelmeer, der Ostsee, Mittelamerika und der Karibik.
translated_de: Norwegian Cruise, a company in Miami, operates 13 cruise ships on routes between North America, the Middle East, the East, Middle East and Karibik.

en: It had revenues of $2.57 billion in 2013, up 13 percent from 2012.
de: Seine Einnahmen lagen 2013 bei 2,57 Milliarden $, ein Anstieg von 13 Prozent im Vergleich zu 2012.
translated_de: The total expenditures were amounted to 257 billion dollars in 2013, a rise of 13 percent in comparison to 2012.

en: Prestige Cruises, also based in Miami, operates under the Oceania and Regent brands, which together have eight cruise ships traveling to Scandinavia, Russia, the Mediterranean, North America, Asia, Africa and South America.
de: Prestige Cruises, ebenfalls in Miami angesiedelt, agiert unter den Markennamen Oceania und Regent, die gemeinsam acht Kreuzfahrschiffe auf Routen nach Skandinavien, Russland, dem Mittelmeer, Nordamerika, Asien, Afrika und Südamerika betreiben.
translated_de: Prestige cruises, also in Miami, are a brand name for Oceania and Regent, which are a common route for the cruising of eight routes in Scandinavia, Russia, the Mediterranean, North America, Asien, Africa and South America.

en: It posted revenues of $1.2 billion in 2013, up 6 percent from the year earlier.
de: Es meldete Einnahmen für 2013 von 1,2 Milliarden $, ein Anstieg von 6 Prozent im Vergleich zum Vorjahr.
translated_de: The amount of revenue for 2013 was $12 billion, a rise of 6 percent in comparison to the previous year.

en: The $29 billion cruise industry is expected to benefit in the coming years from the rise of the middle class in emerging economies such as China and India.
de: Die Kreuzfahrtbranche liegt insgesamt bei etwa 29 Milliarden $ und in den nächsten Jahren wird für sie aufgrund der Stärkung der Mittelklasse in Schwellenländern wie China und Indien erwartet.
translated_de: The cross-country sector is estimated to be worth around 29 billion dollars and in the next few years it will be financed by the weaker middle class in Sweden, as China and India expect.

en: Companies are racing to position themselves as the cruise operators of choice for these new customers.
de: Die Unternehmen versuchen sich für diese neuen Kunden als die beste Wahl bei den Kreuzfahrtanbietern zu positionieren.
translated_de: The company is trying to position these new customers as the best choice for the cruise operators.

en: Prestige Cruises registered with U.S. regulators for an initial public offering in January 2014.
de: Prestige Cruises beantragte bei den US-Regulierungsbehörden im Januar 2014 den Börsengang.
translated_de: Prestige Cruises beantragte in January 2014 to the Börsengang of the US Regulating Authority.

en: Apollo has been the company's majority shareholder following an $850 million deal in 2007.
de: Apollo ist der Mehrheitsaktionär bei dem Unternehmen seit einem 850 Millionen $ Deal 2007.
translated_de: Apollo is the majority shareholder in the company since a deal worth $ 850 million in 2007.

en: Norwegian Cruise was created in its current form in 2000 through a merger with a cruise operator owned by Genting Bhd (GENT.KL), the leisure and casino conglomerate controlled by Malaysian billionaire Lim Kok Thay.
de: Norwegian Cruise entstand in seiner derzeitigen Form im Jahre 2000 durch eine Fusion mit einem Kreuzfahrtanbieter im Besitz von Genting Bhd (GENT.KL), einem Freizeit- und Kasinomischkonzern unter der Kontrolle des malaysischen Milliardärs Lim Kok Thay.
translated_de: Norwegian cruises were able to enter its current form in 2000 by fusion with a ferry operator in the seat of Genting Bhd (GENT.KL), a leisure and kasinomicalkonzern under the control of Malaysian Milliardaire Lim Kok Thay.

en: Apollo made a $1 billion investment in Norwegian Cruise in 2008.
de: Apollo investierte 2008 1 Milliarde $ in Norwegian Cruise.
translated_de: Apollo invested 1 million dollar in Norwegian cruise in 2008.

en: Norwegian Cruise went public in January 2013.
de: Norwegian Cruise ging im Januar 2013 an die Börse.
translated_de: Norwegian Cruise went on to be the Börse in January 2013.

en: Genting had a 28 percent stake, Apollo had a 20 percent stake and private equity firm TPG Capital LP had an 8 percent stake in the company as of the end of June, according to a regulatory filing.
de: Genting hielt Ende Juni laut Zulassungsbehörden 28 Prozent der Anteile, Apollo 20 Prozent der Anteile und die Private-Equity-Gesellschaft TPG Capital LP einen Anteil von 8 Prozent an dem Unternehmen.
translated_de: Genting accounted for 28 percent of the company' s share, Apollo 20 percent of the company' s share and the Private Equity Equity Capital LP accounted for 8 percent of the company' s share.

en: Carnival, Royal Caribbean Cruises and Norwegian Cruise together account for 82 percent of the North American cruise passenger berth capacity, according to Prestige Cruises' initial public offering registration document.
de: Carnival, Royal Caribbean Cruises und Norwegian Cruise verfügen gemeinsam laut der der ursprünglichen Antragsdokumente für den Börsengang von Prestige Cruises über 82 Prozent der Passagierkapazitäten bei amerikanischen Kreuzfahrtschiffen.
translated_de: Carnival, Royal Caribbean Cruises and Norwegian Cruises have jointly complied with the original request document for the transport of Prestige Cruises, which is about 82 percent of passengers in American cruise ships.

en: Hong Kong pro-democracy activists heckle China official day after vote ruling
de: Pro-Hongkong-Aktivisten verurteilen China am Tag nach der Wahlentscheidung.
translated_de: China' s pro-Hong Kong actions are condemned at the end of the election.

en: A group of Beijing loyalists stood nearby waving China's flag.
de: Eine pekingtreue Gruppe schwenkte in der Nähe die chinesische Flagge.
translated_de: A pekingtreue group is threatening to flee the Chinese flag.

en: The NPC Standing Committee on Sunday endorsed a framework to let only two or three candidates run in Hong Kong's 2017 leadership vote.
de: Der ständige Ausschuss des Nationalen Volkskongresses verabschiedete am Sonntag ein Rahmengesetz, das lediglich zwei oder drei Kandidaten für die Führungswahl in Hongkong im Jahre 2017 zulässt.
translated_de: The Permanent Committee of the National People' s Council approved on Sunday a framework legislation which only allowed two or three candidates to take part in the Hong Kong election in 2017 .

en: All candidates must first obtain majority backing from a nominating committee likely to be stacked with Beijing loyalists.
de: Alle Kandidaten müssen zunächst die mehrheitliche Unterstützung eines Nominierungskomitees erzielen, das voraussichtlich mit pekingtreuen Mitgliedern besetzt ist.
translated_de: All candidates must firstly get more than a nominationskomitee, which is likely to be a strong member.

en: The decision makes it almost impossible for opposition democrats to get on the ballot prompted pro-democracy activists to renew their vow to bring Hong Kong's financial hub to a halt with "Occupy Central" protests.
de: Durch diese Entscheidung wird es für oppositionelle Demokraten fast unmöglich, zur Wahl zugelassen zu werden und veranlasste Pro-Demokratie-Aktivisten dazu, ihre Drohung wahrzumachen und mit "Occupy Central"-Protesten den Finanzplatz Hongkong lahmzulegen.
translated_de: This decision will make it impossible for opposition Democrates to be elected and to re-evaluate pro-democracy actions to be rewarded with 'occupatory central' protests on Hong Kong' s financial place.

en: Political reform has been a major source of tension in Hong Kong, with China party leaders fearful of calls for democracy spreading to other cities.
de: Politische Reformen sind seit langem ein umstrittenes Thema in Hongkong; und die Parteiführung Chinas befürchtet, dass die Rufe nach Demokratie sich auf andere Städte ausweiten.
translated_de: Politic reforms are a long-term issue in Hong Kong and China' s political governance is concerned that the Ruf of Democracies is expanding in other cities.

en: Following the publication by Beijing of a white paper outlining China's authority over Hong Kong in June, democracy activists held an unofficial referendum on voting in the special administrative region, and hundreds of thousands marched to the city's business district and staged a sit-in.
de: Nach der Veröffentlichung eines Pekinger Weißbuches, in dem im Juni die Vorherrschaft Chinas über Hongkong dargelegt wurde, hielten Demokratieaktivisten ein inoffizielles Referendum zum Wahlverfahren in der Sonderverwaltungsregion ab, bei dem Hunderttausende in den Geschäftsbezirk der Stadt marschierten und dort ein Sit-in organisierten.
translated_de: After publication of a Peking White Paper, which was published in June by the Chinese Republic of Hong Kong, the Democracy activists held a re-election referendum in the special administrative region, where hundreds of thousands of people were marschled in the city' s business district and where a meeting was organised.

en: Li's briefing is being organized by the Hong Kong government and China's Liaison Office in Hong Kong.
de: Lis Befragung wird von der Regierung in Hongkong und dem chinesischen Verbindungsbüro in Hongkong organisiert.
translated_de: Litigation is organised by the government in Hong Kong and the Chinese liaison bureau in Hong Kong.

en: The vice chairman of the Standing Committee's Legislative Affairs Commission, Zhang Rongshun, and the Deputy Director of the State Council's Hong Kong and Macau Affairs Office, Feng Wei, were also due to speak in a series of briefings throughout the day.
de: Der stellvertretende Vorsitzende der Rechtskommission des ständigen Ausschusses, Zhang Rongshun sowie der Vizedirektor des Büros für Angelegenheiten Hongkongs und Macaus des Staatsrates, Feng Wei, sollten im Verlauf des Tages befragt werden.
translated_de: The present President of the Commission of the Permanent Committee, Zhang Rongshun and the Vice-President of the Office for Angelity Hongkong and Macaus of the State Council, Feng Wei, should be asked in the morning.

en: Student activists said they would gather outside of the Hong Kong chief executive's office in the afternoon.
de: Studentische Aktivisten kündigten an, sich am Nachmittag vor dem Büro der Führungsspitze in Hongkong zu versammeln.
translated_de: Student activists are preparing to take part in the meeting at the Hong Kong office.

en: Britain made no mention of democracy for Hong Kong until the dying days of about 150 years of colonial rule.
de: Großbritannien sah bis zur Endphase der 150-jährigen Kolonialregierung in Hongkong keinerlei demokratische Elemente vor.
translated_de: Britain has no democratic element in Hong Kong until the end of the 150-year colonial reform.

en: Putin demands Kiev open 'statehood' talks with eastern Ukraine
de: Putin verlangt von Kiew die Aufnahme von "Staatlichkeitsgesprächen" mit der Ostukraine
translated_de: Putin demands Kiew to take part in "staativity talks" with the Eastukraine

en: Russian President Vladimir Putin demanded Sunday that the Ukrainian government cease battling separatists in the country's east and immediately begin negotiations on the breakaway region's "statehood," according to Russian news accounts of his remarks.
de: Der russische Präsident Wladimir Putin verlangte russischen Medienberichten zufolge am Sonntag, dass die ukrainische Regierung die Kämpfe gegen die Separatisten im Osten des Landes einstellt und unmittelbar mit Verhandlungen zur "Staatlichkeit" der abtrünnigen Region aufnimmt.
translated_de: The Russian President Wladimir Putin demanded Russian media reports on Sunday that the UK government is committing the fight against separatists in the East of the country and immediately negotiates with the Russian authorities on the "stability" of the region.

en: His spokesman, Dmitry Peskov, later clarified that Putin didn't mean to imply that the eastern Ukrainian territory under separatist control would become part of Russia, but that its status within Ukraine had to be revised to give the Russian-speaking region the power to protect its rights and interests.
de: Sein Sprecher Dimitri Peskow stellte später klar, dass Putin damit nicht gemeint habe, dass das unter der Kontrolle der Separatisten stehende Gebiet der Ostukraine ein Teil Russlands werde, sondern dass sein Status gegenüber der Ukraine neu definiert werden müsse, um der russischsprachigen Region die Macht zur Vertretung seiner Rechte und Interessen zu geben.
translated_de: The Speaker Dimitri Peskow later said that Putin had not agreed that the territory of the East-Caribbean will be part of Russia under the control of the Separate Regions, but that his status will be redefined in regard to Ukraine, so that the Russian region can give power to protect its rights and interests.

en: But Putin's call upon the Kiev government to negotiate with the pro-Russia insurgents as equals corresponded with the apparent strategy he has followed since the violence began five months ago: Help the separatists take territory and force the Ukrainian government to grant the newly proclaimed Novorossiya region virtual independence to align with Russia instead of the West.
de: Putins Aufruf an die Kiewer Regierung zu Verhandlungen auf Augenhöhe mit den pro-russischen Aufständischen passt jedoch zu der von ihm seit Beginn der Ausschreitungen vor fünf Monaten anscheinend verfolgten Strategie: Hilfe für die Separatisten beim Einnehmen von Gebieten und Druck auf die ukrainische Regierung, um der neu proklamierten Region Novorossija faktische Unabhängigkeit für eine Allianz mit Russland statt mit dem Westen zu ermöglichen.
translated_de: Putin' s call to negotiations with the pro-Russian government in equal measure is a strategy which he has adopted since the start of the committees in five months, namely aid for the separatists in the introduction of areas and pressure on the Ukrainian government to enable the new pro-Russian region to have a faktical independence for a alliance with Russia instead of with the West.

en: In an interview with state-run Channel One television, Putin denounced the Ukrainian military campaign to recover separatist-held territory in the eastern Donetsk and Luhansk regions that were seized in March and April, after Moscow annexed Ukraine's Crimean peninsula on March 18.
de: In einem Interview mit dem staatlichen Fernsehsender Kanal Eins verurteilte Putin die ukrainische Militärkampagne zur Rückeroberung der von Separatisten gehaltenen Gebiete in der östlichen Regionen Donezk und Luhansk, die im März und April eingenommen wurden, nachdem Moskau die ukrainische Halbinsel Krim am 18. März annektiert hatte.
translated_de: In a interview with the Kanal-TV channel, Putin condemned the Ukrainian military campaign to restore the separatist areas in the eastern regions Donezk and Luhansk, which were taken in March and April, after Moskau had annexed the Ukrainian peninsula crime on 18. March.

en: The Kremlin and the separatists have lately branded the seized territory "Novorossiya," or "New Russia," a term that harkens to pre-revolutionary glory days of the Russian empire.
de: Der Kreml und die Separatisten haben in letzter Zeit das eingenommene Gebiet als "Novorossija" oder "Neurussland" bezeichnet, ein Begriff, der an die vorrevolutionäre Glanzzeit des russischen Imperiums erinnert.
translated_de: The Kreml and the Separatists have defined in recent times the one-sided area as "Novorossija" or "Neurussland" as a term which reminds us of the early revolutionary Glanz of the Russian Imperium.

en: Putin said that anyone who believed peace talks are in the offing as Ukrainian politicians launch campaigns for an Oct. 26 parliamentary election and while government troops are attacking civilian communities in separatist-held regions is "a prisoner to illusions," Itar-Tass reported.
de: Putin wies darauf hin, dass all diejenigen, die im Zuge der Kampagnen ukrainischer Politiker für die Wahlen am 26. Okt. und während Regierungsgruppen zivile Gemeinden in den von Separatisten gehaltenen Gebieten angreifen auf baldige Friedensgespräche hoffen "in ihren Illusionen gefangen" sind, berichtete Itar-Tass.
translated_de: Putin also said that all those who were involved in the campaign for the election of Ukraine on 26 October and while government groups of zivil communities in the Separate Areas are launching bald peace talks, itar-tass reported.

en: "We must immediately commence substantive talks and not only on technical issues, but also on the political organization of society and the statehood status of southeast Ukraine in order to serve the interests of people living there," he said.
de: "Wir müssen umgehend ausführliche Gespräche aufnehmen, nicht nur zu technischen Fragen, sondern auch zur politischen Organisation der Gesellschaft und dem Staatsstatus der Südostukraine, um die Interessen der dort lebenden Menschen zu wahren," sagte er.
translated_de: "We must have a thorough discussion, not just about technical issues, but also about the political organisation of the society and the state of South-Eastukraine, to ensure the interests of the people living there," he said.

en: Peskov said Putin's reference to statehood was meant in the context of the broader autonomy that has been discussed for months with the Kiev leadership as it struggles to allay fears in the Russian-speaking areas that their cultural and linguistic rights are in danger.
de: Peskow sagte, dass Putins Verweis auf die Staatlichkeit im Kontext mit der größeren Autonomie gesehen werden müsse, die seit Monaten von der Kiewer Führung diskutiert wird, um Befürchtungen in russischsprachigen Gebieten zu zerstreuen, dass deren kulturelle und sprachliche Rechte gefährdet seien.
translated_de: Peskow said that Putin' s sensitivity to the state of Russia will be viewed as a result of a larger autonomy which will be debated since months of the Kiewer leadership, to ensure that the rights of the Russian people are protected by cultural and cultural rights.

en: Only the Ukrainian government can grant the eastern regions the necessary autonomy, Peskov said.
de: Nur die ukrainische Regierung kann den östlichen Gebieten die notwendige Autonomie erteilen, sagte Peskow.
translated_de: The Ukrainian government can only share the necessary autonomy in the eastern areas, said Peskow.

en: It's not a matter to be negotiated between Ukraine and Russia, Peskov said, "because it's not a conflict between Russia and Ukraine, but an internal Ukrainian conflict."
de: Es geht hier nicht um Verhandlungen zwischen der Ukraine und Russland, sagte Peskow, "weil es nicht um einen Konflikt zwischen Russland und der Ukraine geht, sondern um einen internen Konflikt in der Ukraine."
translated_de: It is not a conflict between Russia and Russia, said Peskow, but a conflict between Russia and Ukraine. It is a conflict in Ukraine.

en: The Kremlin spokesman's intercession to correct the "misinterpretation" of Putin's remarks underscored the Russian leadership's approach to dealing with the separatist rebellion in the east differently from its outright seizure of Crimea, where the majority of the 2 million population is ethnic Russian.
de: Die Klarstellung des Kremlsprechers zur Korrektur der "Fehlinterpretation" von Putins Bemerkungen unterstrich den Führungsanspruch Russlands beim Umgang mit der separatistischen Rebellion im Osten im Gegensatz zu der direkten Annektion der Krim, auf der die Mehrheit der 2 Millionen Bewohner ethnische Russen sind.
translated_de: The clarification of the Kreml speakers on the Korrektur of Putin' s "fehlinterpretation" underscores the leadership challenge that Russia is facing in relation to the separatist rebellion in East, in contrast to the direct Annexation of crime, which is the majority of the 2 million inhabitants of ethnic Russia.

en: Moscow would have a much more difficult fight to annex even the Donetsk and Luhansk regions of eastern Ukraine, as most of the 6.5 million residents are not Russian and pre-conflict polls showed broad support for staying within Ukraine.
de: Moskau hätte weit größere Schwierigkeiten, die Regionen Donezk und Luhansk in der Ostukraine zu annektieren, da die meisten der 6,5 Millionen Einwohner keine Russen sind und Umfragen aus der Zeit vor dem Konflikt eine breite Mehrheit für den Verbleib in der Ukraine ergaben.
translated_de: Moskau would have much more problems in annexing the regions Donezk and Luhansk in the Eastukraine, because most of the 6,5 million people are not Russy and questions have been raised over the past few years for the remaining population in Ukraine.

en: The autonomy that Russian diplomats have discussed in international forums would grant regional governments in Ukraine the authority to determine their own trade agreements and foreign relations, effectively handing the Kremlin de facto control over territory that would link the Russian mainland with Crimea.
de: Die Autonomie, die von russischen Diplomaten auf internationalen Foren angesprochen wurde, würde den regionalen Regierungen in der Ukraine Vollmacht geben, eigene Handelsabkommen und Außenbeziehungen zu verhandeln, und so dem Kreml de facto die Kontrolle über ein Gebiet geben, das das russische Staatsgebiet mit der Krim verbindet.
translated_de: The autonomy which Russian diplomats have spoken of in international forums would give the regional governments in Ukraine full power, own trade agreements and external relations, and so the Kreml would give de facto control over a territory which the Russian territory is a combination of.

en: The Black Sea peninsula annexed five months ago is home to Russia's main naval fleet as well as commercial maritime facilities and historic coastal resorts.
de: Die vor fünf Monaten annektierte Halbinsel im Schwarzen Meer ist der Heimathafen für den Großteil der russischen Marine sowie ein wichtiger Handelshafen und historische Küstenregion.
translated_de: The annexed Halbinsel in Schwarz Meer, which has been annexed for five months, is the home of the vast majority of the Russian marine, and is a significant trade and historical coastal region.

en: The regions between Russia's Rostov area and Crimea are also home to mines, factories and foundries that produce vital components for the Russian military.
de: Die Regionen zwischen dem Rostowgebiet in Russland und der Krim ist darüber hinaus reich an Minen, Fabriken und Gießereien, die wichtige Komponenten für das russische Militär herstellen.
translated_de: The regions between the Rostow region in Russia and the Krim are rich in minerals, famines and ghettos, which are the important components of the Russian military.

en: Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko proposed during his inauguration speech on June 7 that Ukrainian lawmakers - after new elections -- weigh constitutional amendments to give more control to the disparate regions over their finances and the status of languages.
de: Der ukrainische Präsident Petro Poroshenko schlug bei seiner Rede zur Amtseinführung am 7. Juni vor, dass die ukrainische Gesetzgebung - nach Neuwahlen - Zusätze zur Verfassung bedenken solle, mit denen den jeweiligen Gebieten eine größere Kontrolle über ihre Finanzen und den Status der Sprachen eingeräumt wird.
translated_de: The Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko has sat in his Rede on the amendment on 7 June, urging the Ukrainian legislation to be approved - after the new elections - with a greater control of their finances and the status of the languages in the respective areas.

en: But his vision of autonomy appears to differ sharply from that of the Kremlin and the separatist rebels Moscow is accused of arming and instigating.
de: Aber seine Vorstellung von Autonomie scheint in scharfem Gegensatz zu denen des Kreml und der separatistischen Rebellen zu stehen, deren Bewaffnung und Aufstachelung Moskau vorgeworfen wird.
translated_de: But his view of autonomy appears to be a sharp contrast to the Kreml and the separatist rebels, which will be a swaying and a swaying Moskau.

en: Putin's latest call on Kiev to deal with the separatist leaders as equals followed new advances by the rebels last week after Russian troops and tanks entered eastern Ukraine from a previously peaceful area along the Sea of Azov.
de: Putins letzte Aufforderung an Kiew, mit den Separatistenführern auf Augenhöhe zu verhandeln, folgte nach einem weiteren Vordringen der Rebellen in der vergangenen Woche, nachdem russische Truppen und Panzer über die vorher friedliche Region entlang dem Asowschen Meer in die Ostukraine eingedrungen sind.
translated_de: Putin' s last request to negotiate with the Separatist leader in the eye, follows another rebellion in the last week, involving Russian Truppen and Panzers over the previously fried region along the Asow Sea in the Eastukraine.

en: The Russian-backed separatists took control of the town of Novoazovsk in a drive that Ukrainian security officials say they fear is the opening of a campaign to seize the strategic coastal territory all the way to Crimea.
de: Die von Russland unterstützten Separatisten übernahmen im Handstreich, der laut Befürchtungen ukrainischer Sicherheitsbeamter der erste Schritt einer Kampagne zur Übernahme der strategischen Küstenregion bis zur Krim ist, die Kontrolle von Nowoasowsk.
translated_de: Russia has supported separatists' s repression, which is the first step in a campaign to take the strategy-coastal region to the crime of Nowoasowsk.

en: That has spurred a massive civilian and military effort to fortify Mariupol, a steelmaking port of 500,000 that lies between Novoazovsk and the narrow gateway into the Crimean peninsula.
de: Aus diesem Grund sind massive zivile und militärische Vorbereitungen angelaufen, um Mariupol, einen Stahlindustriehafen mit 500.000 Einwohnern zu befestigen, der zwischen Nowoasowsk und dem schmalen Zugang zur Halbinsel Krim liegt.
translated_de: In this way, massive zivil and military preparations are being planned to protect Mariupol, a steel industry port with 500.000 inhabitants, between Nowoasowsk and the border of the peninsula.

en: Poroshenko on Saturday addressed a meeting of European Union leaders in Brussels to urge action to prevent further Russian aggression against Ukraine, a former Soviet republic that has been independent for 23 years.
de: Poroshenko sprach am Samstag bei einem Treffen der EU-Führung in Brüssel und bat dringend um Taten, um eine weitere russische Aggression gegen die Ukraine zu verhindern, eine frühere Sowjetrepublik, die seit 23 Jahren unabhängig ist.
translated_de: Poroshenko spoke at a meeting of the EU in Brussels on Saturday and asked for a further Russian aggression against Ukraine, a former Soviet Republic, which has been independent since 23 years.

en: "We are close to the point of no return," Poroshenko warned.
de: "Wir stehen kurz vor einem Punkt, an dem es kein Zurück mehr gibt," warnte Poroshenko.
translated_de: "We are just starting to see a point where there is no need to be resisted," warns Poroshenko.

en: Thousands of foreign troops and hundreds of foreign tanks are now on the territory of Ukraine.
de: Tausende fremder Truppen und hunderte fremder Panzer befinden sich nun auf dem Territorium der Ukraine.
translated_de: Tausende of the displaced people and a hundred of the displaced people are now in the Ukraine territory.

en: The EU summit took no definitive action; the leaders called for drafting more punishing sanctions on Russia to be imposed in the event of an unspecified escalation of the Ukraine crisis.
de: Der EU-Gipfel beschloss keine konkreten Aktionen, die Führung verlangte den Entwurf weiterer Sanktionen gegen Russland, die bei einer unspezifizierten Eskalation der Ukrainekrise in Kraft treten sollen.
translated_de: The EU summit has no concrete action which the leadership must take to the conclusion of further sanctions against Russia, which should be imposed in the absence of a re-evaluation of Ukraine.

en: Ukrainian soldiers had to withdraw from their positions in Ilovaysk after two columns of Russian armor and 1,000 troops last week moved into the Donetsk region to bolster the beleaguered separatists, Col. Andriy Lysenko, spokesman for the Ukrainian National Security and Defense Council, told reporters in Kiev on Saturday.
de: Ukrainische Soldaten mussten sich von ihren Positionen in Ilowajsk zurückziehen, nachdem zwei russische Panzerkolonnen und 1.000 Soldaten letzte Woche in die Donezkregion eindrangen, um die belagerten Separatisten zu unterstützen, sagte Oberst Andrij Lysenko, Sprecher des Ukrainischen Nationalen Sicherheits- und Verteidigungsrates Reporten am Samstag in Kiew.
translated_de: Ukraine' s Soldaten have withdrawn from their positions in Ilowajsk, after two Russian Panzerkolonnen and 1.000 Soldaten last week in the Donezk region, to support the belagert Separatists, a statement from the head of the Ukrain National Security and Defence Council on Saturday in Kiew.

en: The first of a reported 63 Ukrainian soldiers who were trapped in Ilovaysk by the Russian incursion were swapped Sunday for 10 Russian paratroopers captured inside Ukrainian territory a week ago, Lysenko said Sunday.
de: Die ersten vermutlich 63 ukrainischen Soldaten, die durch den russischen Einfall in Ilowajsk eingeschlossen wurden, wurden am Sonntag gegen 10 russische Fallschirmjäger ausgetauscht, die vor einer Woche auf ukrainischem Gebiet gefangen genommen worden waren, teilte Lysenko am Sonntag mit.
translated_de: The first, probably 63 Ukrainian Soldaten, which were seized by Russians in Ilowajsk, were exchanged on Sunday against 10 Russian Fallschirms, which were taken captive in Ukraine for a week, and a part of Lysenko on Sunday.

en: Nude photo scandal embroils Australian celebrities and Gabi Grecko
de: Nacktfotoskandal um australische Promis und Gabi Grecko
translated_de: Photographs of the 'select' of the 'select'

en: Geoffrey Edelsten has vented his disgust at hackers who may have stolen nude images of fiancee Gabi Grecko and a who's who of Hollywood A-listers.
de: Geoffrey Edelsten machte keinen Hehl um seinen Ärger über Hacker, die vermutlich Nacktbilder seiner Verlobten Gabi Grecko und ein Who is Who der A-Promis aus Hollywood gestohlen haben.
translated_de: The spokesman for the spokesman for the spokesman for the spokesman for the spokesman for the spokesman for the spokesman for the spokesman for the spokesman for the spokesman for the spokesman for the spokesman for the spokesman for the spokesman for the spokesman for the spokesman for the spokesman for the spokesman for the spokesman for the spokesman for the spokesman for the spokesman for the s

en: Tinseltown is reeling after a series of explicit photos showing a nude Jennifer Lawrence hit the internet in a major celebrity hacking scandal.
de: Die Filmstadt ist in Aufregung, nachdem eine Serie eindeutiger Fotos einer nackten Jennifer Lawrence in einem Hackingskandal um Promis im Internet aufgetaucht sind.
translated_de: The film city is in the process of re-imagining a series of clearly titled photos of Jennifer Lawrence in a hacking campaign to promote the Internet.

en: The hacker responsible is said to have 60 nude photos of Hunger Games star Lawrence and superstars including models Kate Upton and Cara Delevingne, singers Rihanna, Ariana Grande and Lea Michelle and actors Kirsten Dunst.
de: Der dafür verantwortliche Hacker verfügt wohl über 60 Nacktfotos von Lawrence, Star aus "die Tribute von Panem" und von Superstars, darunter den Models Kate Upton und Cara Delevingne, den Sängerinnen Rihanna, Ariana Grande und Lea Michelle sowie der Schauspielerin Kirsten Dunst.
translated_de: The responsible Hacker has over 60 Nacktfotos of Lawrence, Star from "The Tribute of Panem" and Superstars, including the Models Kate Upton and Cara Delevingne, the singers Rihanna, Ariana Grande and Lea Michelle and Schauspieler Kirsten Dunst.

en: Australian actors Teresa Palmer, Emily Browning, Yvonne Strahovski, and Melbourne-based Grecko also had personal pictures allegedly retrieved due to an iCloud leak.
de: Von den australischen Schauspielerinnen Teresa Palmer, Emily Browning, Yvonne Strahovski, und Grecko aus Melbourne wurden angeblich auch private Fotos aufgrund einer iCloud-Lücke publik.
translated_de: The Australian actors Teresa Palmer, Emily Browning, Yvonne Strahovski and Grecko from Melbourne were also photographed in private photos because of a cloud-based publication.

en: There are 101 celebrity names on the list.
de: Auf der Liste stehen 101 Promis.
translated_de: On the list are 101 Promis.

en: Edelsten, who proposed to Grecko last month, told Confidential: "It's disgusting".
de: Edelsten, der sich letzten Monat mit Grecko verlobt hatte, sagte gegenüber Confidential: "Es ist widerlich."
translated_de: Edelsten, who had been lobbying last month with Grecko, said to the Confidential: "It is more broadly."

en: All private correspondence and images should remain private.
de: Alle privaten Briefe und Bilder sollten privat bleiben.
translated_de: All private briefs and images should remain private.

en: It's disgraceful that personal information can be stolen and dispersed to others.
de: Es ist eine Schande, dass private Informationen gestohlen und an andere weitergegeben werden können.
translated_de: It is a rule that private information can be manipulated and subsequently given to others.

en: Grecko, who is in New York, reportedly told a news website the hacking was "shameful" and those targeted would "feel violated."
de: Grecko, zur Zeit in New York, sagte Berichten zufolge einer Nachrichtenwebseite, dass der Hack "schändlich" sei und dass die Betroffenen "sich verletzt" fühlten.
translated_de: Grecko, who was in New York, said reports on a news site that the hack was "schäful" and that the victims "have been hurt" by the hack.

en: The hacker is believed to have 30 images of Palmer with ex-boyfriend Scott Speedman, including two frames where she is lounging topless in a pool.
de: Der Hacker hat vermutlich 30 Bilder von Palmer mit ihrem Ex-Freund Scott Speedman, darunter zwei Aufnahmen, in denen sie oben ohne in einem Pool liegt.
translated_de: The Hacker has probably 30 images of Palmer with his ex-Freund Scott Speedman, including two images, in which they are above without a pool.

en: Palmer's film credits include Love And Honor, opposite Liam Hemsworth.
de: Zu den Filmwerken Palmers gehören "Liebe ist unbesiegbar" mit Liam Hemsworth.
translated_de: The filming company Palmers is a "Liebe is unbesieging" with Liam Hemsworth.

en: Palmer, Chuck star Strahovski and Sucker Punch actress Browning yesterday had no comment on the hacked pictures.
de: Palmer, Chuck-Star Strahovski und die Schauspielerin Browning aus Sucker Punch standen gestern für Kommentare zu den gehackten Bildern nicht zur Verfügung.
translated_de: Palmer, Chuck-Star Strahovski and the Schauspielerin Browning from Sucker Punch were not available for comment on the hacked images.

en: A representative for Lawrence told TMZ: "This is a flagrant violation of privacy."
de: Ein Vertreter Lawrence' sagte gegenüber TMZ: "Es ist eine abscheuliche Verletzung der Privatsphäre."
translated_de: One representative Lawrence said to TMZ: "This is a deliberate violation of the private sector."

en: Actor Seth Rogen lashed out at the hacker, tweeting: "Posting pics hacked from a cell phone is really no different than selling stolen merchandise."
de: Schauspieler Seth Rogen verurteilte den Hacker in seinem Tweet: "Gehackte Bilder aus einem Handy zu posten ist nichts anders als der Verkauf von Hehlerware."
translated_de: The actor, Seth Rogen, criticises Hacker in his Tweet: "Gehackt images from a Handy to post is nothing anders than the sale of Hehlerware."

en: Just legally speaking, it shouldn't be tolerated to report stolen pics.
de: Rein rechtlich gesehen sollte das Weiterverbreiten gestohlener Bilder nicht toleriert werden.
translated_de: It is rightly thought that the future of images should not be tolerated.

en: Cyclists, joggers and walkers took part yesterday in the 8th Cycling Event on the Grosser Feldberg mountain, giving their support to 'Help for Children with Cancer'.
de: Radler, Jogger und Wanderer waren gestern beim 8. Radeln auf den Großen Feldberg dabei und haben damit den Verein "Hilfe für krebskranke Kinder" unterstützt.
translated_de: Radler, Jogger and Wanderer were at the 8. Radels on the Grand Feldberg and supported the United Nations' "Hilfe for young children".

en: The Tour was a hard grind for some, while others treated it as a light training session.
de: Die Tour, die für die einen eine Tortur war, stellte für die anderen ein leichtes Training dar.
translated_de: The tour, which was a torture war, was a very easy training for the other.

en: However, everyone agreed on one thing: It was a lot of fun.
de: In einem waren sich jedoch alle einig: Es hat Spaß gemacht.
translated_de: However, there were all the things that were involved: it was fun.

en: Thomas Studanski must have slept well last night.
de: Thomas Studanski dürfte vergangene Nacht gut geschlafen haben.
translated_de: Thomas Studanski has been able to sleep well in the last night.

en: For the very first time in his life the head of the Oberursel Brewery took his bike up the Feldberg.

translated_de: First of all, in his life, the Chef of the Oberurseler Brauhaus was able to take the Rad on the fieldberg.

en: And for a good cause.
de: Für den guten Zweck.
translated_de: For good purposes.

en: He can put up with a little muscle stiffness, especially since his participation in the 8th Cycling Event on the Grosser Felberg was in aid of the 'Help for children with cancer' association, and gave him a valuable personal insight.
de: Den kleinen Muskelkater kann er da leicht wegstecken, zumal ihm die Teilnahme am 8. Radeln auf den Großen Feldberg zugunsten des Vereins "Hilfe für krebskranke Kinder" (Frankfurt) auch persönlich eine wertvolle Erkenntnis gebracht habe.
translated_de: The small muscle cat can be able to take a very easy approach to the participation of the 8th annual Radel in the Grand Field toguns the club' s "Hilfe for young children" (Frankfurt) and personally have a valuable knowledge.

en: A great thing.
de: Eine tolle Sache.
translated_de: This is a great thing.

en: "I now know that I can do it - brilliant!"
de: "Ich weiß jetzt, dass ich das kann - prima!"

en: You didn't happen to have a little break to milk the applause?

de: Nee, wenn ich einmal angehalten hätte, wär's aus gewesen...

en: Like Thomas Studanski, a member for the CDU in the Oberursel town council, many of the 718 participants struggled in the early mountain dew, coming close to exhaustion, but arriving happily on top of the summit plateau.
de: Wie Thomas Studanski, der für die CDU im Oberurseler Stadtparlament sitzt, quälten sich viele der 718 Teilnehmer gestern im Frühtau zu Berge und kamen der Erschöpfung nahe, aber glücklich auf dem Plateau an.
translated_de: As Thomas Studanski, the CDU member of the Oberurseler City Council, has travelled to the mountains of 718 participants in the early morning and has been a little nearer to the emigration, but happy on the plateau.

en: On the other hand, some others found it much easier to complete the full eleven kilometre route between Hohemark and Feldberg.
de: Anderen dagegen fiel es leichter, die gut elf Kilometer lange Strecke zwischen Hohemark und Feldberg zu überwinden.
translated_de: And the other is easier to cross the elf-long route between Hohemark and Feldberg.

en: Norman Diessner, for example.
de: Norman Dießner zum Beispiel.
translated_de: Norman Dießner, as a example.

en: The Green Politician, wearing all red, from the municipal council - red clothes, red bike - looked to be taking it gently ("Quit some professionals here, so it's all about finishing!") - and then looked almost like a pro himself as he arrived at the end 45 minutes later without pausing for breath.
de: Der ganz in Rot auftretende Grünen-Politiker aus dem Kreistag - rotes Dress, rotes Bike - machte am Start noch etwas auf Understatement ("Jede Menge Profis, da ist Ankommen das Ziel!"), erwies sich dann aber am Berg doch als halber Profi und ging nach 45 Minuten ohne Atemnot durchs Ziel.
translated_de: The whole skewed skewed skewed by the skewed skewed skewed by the skewed skewed skewed skewed by the skewed skewed skewed skewed skewed skewed skewed skewed skewed skewed skewed skewed skewed skewed skewed skewed

en: He was another one who did it all in one go, as did Nina Kuhn, press spokesperson for the Oberursel Council, who did the route along side Frank Grüneisen.
de: Auch er ist die Strecke in einem Rutsch durchgefahren, wie auch Nina Kuhn, Pressesprecherin der Stadt Oberursel, die sich gemeinsam mit Frank Grüneisen auf den Weg gemacht hatte.
translated_de: It is also a road that is paved in a Rutch, as well as Nina Kuhn, Presse Speaker of the City of Oberursel, who has made the journey together with Frank Grüneisen.

en: For both the triathletes the "Feldberg Cycling Event" was not necessarily a sporting challenge: "This one is about charity, and that's why we're glad to be here - we'd have gone out riding anyway today," Kuhn said.
de: Für die beiden Triathleten war das "Feldberg-Radeln" nicht unbedingt eine sportliche Herausforderung: "Hier geht es um Charity, da sind wir gerne mit dabei - eine Ausfahrt hätten wir heute ohnehin gemacht", so Kuhn.
translated_de: For the two athletes, the "Feldberg-Radeln" was not a sport challenge: "It is a Charity, we are very happy with it - we have been without any excuses today", so Kuhn.

en: Along the route they met up with Paul Wenzel from Oberreifenberg.
de: Unterwegs hatten sie Paul Wenzel aus Oberreifenberg getroffen.
translated_de: Paul Wenzel was a member of the Oberreifenberg.

en: The boy (12) had driven down to Oberusel in the morning, only to immediately go back up again.
de: Der Junge (12) war am Morgen nach Oberursel hinuntergefahren, um gleich darauf wieder auf die Höhe zu strampeln.
translated_de: The Jungle (12) was able to take the train to the summit on morning morning, and to return to the summit.

en: Florian Zierz from Frankfurt got himself into the saddle at 9 am; he "did" the Feldberg twice, before then wheeling back home.
de: Der Frankfurter Florian Zierz hatte sich am Morgen um 9 Uhr daheim in den Sattel geschwungen, "machte" den Feldberg zwei Mal, um dann mit Spaß nach Hause zu rollen.
translated_de: The Frankfurter Florian Zierz had sat at 9 a.m. in the Sattel, "macht" the fieldberg two times, then with pleasure in house.

en: Another one who enjoyed himself was "Fritten-Toni".
de: Spaß hatte auch "Fritten-Toni".
translated_de: Fun also had "Fritten-Toni".

en: For the manager of the Oberursel cult kiosk, taking part in cycling events which go over the Feldberg is perfectly natural.
de: Für den Chef des Oberurseler Kultkiosks gehören Radtouren über den Feldberg einfach dazu.
translated_de: For the chef of the Upper Head, Kultkiosks, there are simply Radours on the fieldberg.

en: He took just 40 minutes to do the route with his 6.5-kilo racing bike.
de: Er hatte mit seinem 6,5-Kilo-Rennrad 40 Minuten angepeilt.
translated_de: He had 40 minutes to eat with his 6,5 Kilo-Rennrad.

en: A mad event.
de: Ein verrücktes Ereignis.
translated_de: This is a reversal.

en: For this cause I'm very glad to be here," commented Andreas Balzke.
de: Für diesen Zweck - da bin ich gerne dabei", meinte Andreas Balzke.
translated_de: For this purpose - I am very much here", said Andreas Balzke.

en: The well-conditioned man from Mainz said he was an "ambitious racing cyclist."
de: Der durchtrainierte Mainzer sagt von sich, dass er ein "ambitionierter Rennradler" ist.
translated_de: The trained Mainzer said that he is a "ambitionary Rennradler".

en: And he must be, since he was riding a "Fixie-Bike" which is a bike without gears...
de: Das muss er auch sein, denn er war mit dem "Fixie-Rad" unterwegs, das sind zwar auch Rennräder, aber ohne Schaltung...
translated_de: It must be a good thing, because it was on the "Fixie Road" and that was a good thing, but without a switch...

en: But it wasn't only cyclists who jaunted to the top - as was evidenced not only by the 20 walkers, who climbed up via the White Wall and the Fuchstanz, but also by a jogger who pulled behind him a tyre with weights attached to him by a rope.
de: Dass es auch ohne Rad locker nach oben ging, bewiesen nicht nur die 20 Wanderer, die über die Weiße Mauer und den Fuchstanz zum Gipfel hinauf stiegen, sondern auch ein Jogger, der an einer Kordel einen Autoreifen mit Gewichten hinter sich herzog.
translated_de: It was also not only the 20 Wanderers who climbed over the White Mauer and the Fuchstanz to Gipfel, but also a Jogger, a Cordel with a car with weights.

en: Mountain Rescue doctor, Professor Volker Lischke, who was there with his team to provide safety, and who was equipped with a four-wheel Bully and Quad, said: "I know him from Frankfurt - he trains for a specialist sleigh trail - it's just that he pulls the sleigh himself." The man is, therefore, in a sense his own sleigh dog.
de: Bergwacht-Arzt Professor Volker Lischke, der mit seinem Team, ausgerüstet mit Allrad-Bully und Quad, für Sicherheit sorgte, sagte: "Den kenn" ich aus Frankfurt, der trainiert für einen speziellen Schlittentrail, nur dass er den Schlitten halt selbst zieht". Der Mann ist also gewissermaßen sein eigener Schlittenhund.
translated_de: Prof Volker Lischke, who, with his team, is equipped with allrad-Bully and Quad, for safety, said: "I am a fan of the fact that I am a fan of a special sandrail, only that the sand is thrown away" and that the Mann is a very own sandrail.

en: The 718 participants - which made them the greatest number ever - were sent off up the course in groups in the morning.
de: Die 718 Teilnehmer - und damit so viele wie noch nie - waren am Morgen in Gruppen auf die Strecke geschickt worden.
translated_de: The 718 participants - and so many as ever - were sent to the group on the route on the morning.

en: The walkers started at 9.30 am.
de: Die Wanderer zuerst um 9.30 Uhr.
translated_de: The Wanderer first arrived at 9.30 p.m.

en: Then it was the turn of the cyclists and runners, who began at 10 am.
de: Es folgten die ersten Radfahrer und Läufer um 10 Uhr.
translated_de: The first Radfahrer and Läufer are set to take place at 10 p.m.

en: Five minutes later the first Mountain-bikers set off.
de: Fünf Minuten später legten die ersten Mountainbiker los.
translated_de: Five minutes later, the first Mountainbiker lost his seat.

en: Bent Hansen, Chairman of the Association 'Cycling on the Grosser Feldberg' gave the starting orders and wished those taking part an enjoyable trip.
de: Bent Hansen, Vorsitzender des Vereins "Radeln auf den Großen Feldberg", gab die Startkommandos und wünschte den Teilnehmern einen schönen Ausflug.
translated_de: Bent Hansen, Chairman of the Association "Radels on the Big Feldberg" gave the start committee and wished the participants a nice exit.

en: Next year, he hopes to have safety barriers on the course for the benefit of those taking part on the Feldberg.
de: Für nächstes Jahr hoffe er, dass es gelingt, die Strecke zum Feldberg hinauf zur Sicherheit der Teilnehmer zu sperren.
translated_de: In the next year, I hope that the route to Feldberg will be able to be spersed in the safety of the participants.
